name: customer
title: Tenho este cartão ha mais de ano....e não recomendo!
content: Tenho este cartão ha mais de ano. Usei algumas vezes para testa-lo, bem em mais de metade dos estabelecimentos portugueses, ele nao funciona, porque nao é um master card como conhecemos, é um cartão considerado estrangeiro, o que faz com que os comerciantes pagam mais comissoes no TPA, então este cartao em Portugal, utilidade quase nula. No estrangeiro usei, mas testei-o com os cartões portugueses, nao paguei comissões nem com um nem com outro...vantajem nula. Nao dá para fazer pagamento de serviços e muito limitado. A minha opinião, é que não compensa, apesar de ser gratuito, ao fazer um pagamento num TPA pode ficar mal como ja fiquei várias, em Portugal, quase nenhum comerciante aceita este tipo de cartão porque tem maiores taxas....

name: Manuel Domroes
title: So hab jetzt mit dem BaFin gedroht und…
content: So hab jetzt mit dem BaFin gedroht und denen gesagt das ich nen Beweis habe das dass Geld seit dem 23.09.19 raus ist und an meine ibaner N26 gegangen ist. Es wird jetzt wohl erstmal geprüfte und im besten Fall laut dem live Chat soll ich morgen eine Info haben was da los ist. Als ich meinte das die Foren voll mit negativen Kommentare ist wie kein Gehalt Eingang etc. wollte er von einer Störung nichts wissen alles sei in bester Ordnung. Daraufhin meinte ich als Mitarbeiter würde ich dies auch behaupten!! Ich halte euch auf dem laufenden!
reply: Bonjour Véronique,Nous sommes sincèrement navrés de cette situation.En tant qu’établissement détenteur d’une licence bancaire, N26 a l'obligation légale de vérifier l’identité de ses clients à intervalles réguliers. Une fois que vous aurez commencé le processus de re-vérification d'identité, vous pourrez continuer d’utiliser votre carte N26, de recevoir vos virements, de jouir des bénéfices de votre crédit et vos prélèvements automatiques pourront être débités.Lorsque la nouvelle vérification de votre identité sera terminée, vous aurez à nouveau pleinement accès à toutes les fonctionnalités de votre compte N26.Si vous n'avez pas accès à l'application, vous pouvez joindre notre Service Clientèle par le web. Il vous suffit de cliquer sur "Démarrer un chat" en bas de cette page : https://support.n26.com/fr-fr/vos-debuts/compte/comment-contacter-n26Nous espérons que notre réponse vous a été utile et vous remercions de votre compréhension.Salutations,Votre équipe N26.

title: Absolutely terrible customer service
content: Absolutely terrible customer service. I have been trying to close my account with n26 for 2 months, I had no idea a "bank" could make things so difficult, everything time I speak to a rep via chat or email I get a different often contradicting response.They did nothing when I told them I had lost my n26 card. Do not bank with n26, find a proper bank with standards even if its more effort to set up
reply: Hello Alex.We are very sorry to learn that your experience was not as we intended it to be.We would like to learn more about your situation and help you, but obviously it would not be safe for you to send us your personal data on this public post.Please write us at support@n26.com .Of course we take your security very seriously and we want to assist you with your lost card.Regards,Your N26 Team

name: SleekStylish
title: Finger weg von N26
content: Ich wollte mein Konto im August diesen Jahres schließen und habe dies, wie von N26 gewünscht, per Formular getan. Um sicher zu gehen habe ich noch eine Kündigung per Post (Einschreiben mit Rückschein) gesendet die nachweislich am 06.08.2019 entgegengenommen wurde. Heute ist der 02. Oktober - also gut 2 Monate nach Zustellung der Kündigung - und nichts ist passiert - außer das ich Ende September den Jahresbeitrag ( N26 BusinessBlack) für das kommende Jahr in Rechnung gestellt bekommen habe! Und das für ein Konto was schon längst geschlossen und gekündigt sein sollte. Der Kundenservice und Support ist verheerend und spottet jeder Beschreibung. N26 hat nicht mal ansatzweise den Kundenservice für seine deutschen Kunden im Griff aber Hauptsache es wird in die USA und in den Rest Europas expandiert...Ihr verprellt die Kunden die euch in euren Anfangsjahren als Startup-Bank unterstützt und wachsen lassen haben und ich hoffe das euch das irgendwann mal auf die Füße fällt...verdient habt ihr es!
reply: Danke für deine ehrlichen Worte.Wir geben immer unser Bestes um Probleme zu vermeiden und möchten besser verstehen, was passiert ist. Bitte sende uns doch eine private Nachricht an unseren N26_Support Twitter Account: https://twitter.com/N26_Support?s=09 oder über unseren Facebook Account: https://www.facebook.com/N26DE/. Wir würden uns freuen dir bei dem Problem helfen zu können. Gruß, dein N26 Team

name: Vera
title: Pairing not working
content: I use N26 account for over half a year. It worked OK until the new app was installed in September.Today I have not been able to pair my smartphone. Neither could my husband, who also has N26 account. When we try several times to log in hoping that the pairing would finally work. This is totally frustrating. We are unable to make urgent transfer.
reply: Hello Vera, thanks for your feedback.We are constantly monitoring the status of our apps and it does not seem that we are detecting anything unusual.We would love to help you, but we need to carry out a more thorough investigation, that's why we ask you to contact us privately (it is not safe for you to write your data in a public post).Write us a mail at support@n26.com Regards,Your N26 Team.

name: Thomas Campbell
title: I've never had such a nightmarish…
content: I've never had such a nightmarish experience with a bank before. Right now, for example, I have to "pair" my brand-new smartphone with my account because for certain transactions, such as payments to another bank account, you cannot use only the web app, as is the case with every other bank where I have account, but you also have to go on N26's smartphone app and "confirm" the transaction. The problem? Although I've done everything I'm supposed to do, the N26 Android app REFUSES to "pair" my smartphone with my account. I have an important payment of nearly 800 euros I need to send no later than today, but I'm blocked from "confirming" it. I could tell more horror stories, as my wife also has struggled mightily with N26 and their obviously deeply flawed smartphone app, but I'll leave it at that... The worse part, however, is N26's clear inability and unwillingness to address and fix these issues. Every time I've gone on their customer chat line I've been made to feel that I'm the one causing the problem, not their ridiculous complicated system of "verification," exacerbated by their faulty software and customer service support system.
reply: Hello Thomas, Even though we are very sorry to learn about your experience we would like to thank you for your feedback.As you probably already know we have adopted a double factor verification to maximise the safety of our customers.Some banks adopt a verification code sent via SMS, other banks use a physical code generator, we send a notification directly on your mobile app in order to confirm a payment.We would like to help you understand what didn't quite work in your verification process, but of course we need further information.Please contact us at support@n26.com , and feel free to report anything you feel like, we will do everything in our power to solve your situation and to improve our service.Of course we do not believe it is your fault if something didn't quite go as intended, we are sorry if we made you feel that way.Thanks again for the time you put for writing this feedback and we are looking forward to have the chance to support you again.Regards,Your N26 Team.

name: Fahd “F.E.” EDDE
title: En un mot une banque interactive qui a…
content: En un mot une banque en ligne avec une simplification des services bancaires réussie. Une app sécurisée et bien pensée. Un léger bémol sur le tarif de l’offre métal à 17€/mois pour des avantages un peu faible.

name: Sebastian Nienaber
title: Terrible customer support
content: Terrible customer support, was just chatting to a guy called Anselm and he was very dismissive and unhelpful.
reply: Hello Sebastian,we are very sorry to learn about your experience with our customer support agent.Of course we don't mean to be dismissive and unhelpful. That is why we are working everyday from 7 AM to 11 PM 7 days a week to be always there for you whenever you need us.For some cases you can also write us on Facebook and Twitter in English, French, Spanish, German and Italian.We encourage you to contact us again, we will do whatever we can to meet your service expectations.Regards,Your N26 Team

name: GERAUD RIBEYRON
title: Banque très intéressante…
content: Banque très intéressante particulièrement pour les voyageurs

name: Alma Ballot
title: Their customer service is a nightmare
content: Their customer service is a nightmare! Had to contact them 4 times and it's not finished : cannot have access anymore to my account cuz I changed my phone number and didn't think about changing the registered number with a new one. The asked me a withdrawal so I did and they had to call me. First time : I missed it I was driving and they called twice but in the SAME minute : how smart is it. Then contacted them back and they never called me back. So annoying and loosing time. Do not recommend it
reply: Hey Alma, thank you for reaching out. We're very sorry about this.Please be aware that we’re currently experiencing a high volume of enquiries. As a result, the wait times to receive your call back may be a bit longer than usual, 48 hours in total.Thank you for your understanding.Best,Your N26 team.

name: Anderson Sampaio
title: La N26 est une banque moderne
content: La N26 est une banque moderne, international et que j'imagine concentrera la plus partie de mes affaires dans une future proche à cause de la facilité pour une personne qui voyage beaucoup comme moi.

name: Alice
title: Banque efficace je recommande
content: Banque efficace qui vous épargne les commissions exorbitantes quand vous payez dans une autre devise que l'Euro. Personnel compétent

name: Rowland
title: Terrible customer service
content: Terrible customer service. They keep disconnecting me when they don't have an answer, and there's no way to rate them.
reply: Hello, thank you for your feedback.We sincerely apologise for any inconvenience you had while contacting our LiveChat. Could you please explain your issue so we can help you ? You can also send a email at : support@n26.com explaining your situation. We'll get back to you as soon as possible.Best,Your N26 team.

name: RW
title: Eine einziges Chaos
content: Eine einziges Chaos! Bin seit April dort Kunde. Trotz Identifizierung per Videoanruf fordert mich die App auf, eine Identifizierung durchzuführen. Somit ist die App ist wochenlang nicht nutzbar wodurch ich keinen Zugriff mehr auf's Geschäftskonto habe. Support (nur Chatbot oder Mail) kriegt es nicht hin und nötigt mich regelrecht zur Kontoauflösung. Als Selbständiger eine Katastrophe.
reply: Hey, danke für dein Feedback.Als lizenzierte Bank sind wir gesetzlich dazu verpflichtet, unsere Kunden darum zu bitten, ihre Identität in regelmäßigen Abständen zu verifizieren. Der Prozess dauert nur wenige Minuten. Die E-Mail, die du von uns erhalten hast, erklärt, wie sich das auf dein Konto auswirkt, bis du die Verifikation abgeschlossen hast.Danke für dein Verständnis.Gruß, dein N26 Team.

name: Cem Klein
title: N26- Frust, inkompetenz, noch mehr Frust
content: N26Zum Privatgirokonto kann ich nichts  sagen um Überweisungen zu kontrollieren oder wenige Zahlungen zu tätigen könnte es geeignet sein.Aber ich verwende es als Geschäftskonto, habe mich wegen den kostenlosen Zahlungen für N26 entschieden. Es wird ein Geschäftskonto suggeriert, aber es ist alles andere als ein geeignetes G-Konto, die 2 Schritt-Verifizierung klappt in der Regel beim zweiten Versuch, nach einer Überweisung wird man rausgeschmissen und dann erneut das selbe Procedere. Für wenige Überweisungen braucht man teilweise bis zu eiber std, im Vergleich dauert es bei anderen Instituten knapp 5 Minuten.Der Aufbau, Masken sind nicht fürein  G- Konto geeignet.Der Support ist eher Alibi. Schnelle Hilfe könnt Ihr nicht erwarten.N26, zieht euch aus dem Businesskonto-Geschäft zurück, suggeriert nicht Dinge, die Ihr nicht könnt,
reply: Hey, vielen Dank für dein Feedback. Wir arbeiten mit Hochdruck an unserer App und unserem Kundenservice, damit wir euch immer die bestmögliche Benutzererfahrung und den bestmöglichen Kundenservice liefern können. Wir leiten dein Feedback weiter. Gruß, dein N26 Team.

name: Jax
title: The way N26 handles (new) customer…
content: The way N26 handles (new) customer problems is a disaster. For two days I tried to get my ID verified through the newly installed N26 app by trying to take (several) pictures of my passport. The in-app camera "take picture"-button does not respond however, so it is not possible to make a picture of my passport (only to view it in their app. Also, my phone-camera and everything else on my phone (Samsung S9) works properly, so it is clearly the problem within their app..When I contacted the customer support (only available through chat), all the help i get is a "copy-paste"-standard reply; that I need to reinstall the app. Tried to reinstall the app four times now. When not possible to send the ID pictures via email, because of fraud reasons, that's ok. But try then to make a decent app that works on 99% of the phonesFinally decided to not use n26. What a bunch of amateurs

name: Fabio
title: schlimmste onlinebank ever!!
content: schlimmste onlinebank ever!!! aus unerklärlichen gründen wurde mir wochen später geld abgebucht, was zuvor per mail angekündigt wurde. daraufhin kontaktierte ich den support per mail -7 tage keine antwort!!! zig male war ich im support chat, min. 20 minuten wartezeit bis überhaupt ein mitarbeiter ansprechbar war. für jeden schriftlichen kommentar wartezeit von 3 minuten, somit hängt man ewig in den support chats ab. in den chats selbst wird einem nicht geholfen- schlechtes englisch, nochmalige ewige wartezeit, wenn man auf deutsch kommunizieren will. es werden wahllos irgendwelche ewig langen texte kopiert, anstatt auf präzise gestellte fragen genauso konkret zu antworten. ich habe sofort gekündigt!!! nie wieder n26!!!
reply: Good morning, thank you for your comment.We are very sorry that you could not verify your identity within the app. What you can do is download the app on another smartphone and take the pictures of your ID there directly.Please note that as soon as your identity is verified, you can pair another smartphone (your Samsung S9 in this case) and use the app with it.We hope this answer helped you out.Regards,Your N26 team.

name: Samy L Tambwe
title: Effective
content: Effective, sleek and distinctive..!Helpful customer service, and absolutely understanding team who try their best to solve or resolve issues adequately..Plus the cards look amazing 😉
reply: Hey, danke für deine ehrlichen Worte.  Vielen Dank für dein Feedback. Wir arbeiten mit Hochdruck an unserem Kundenservice, damit wir euch die bestmögliche Benutzererfahrung und den bestmöglichen Kundenservice liefern können. Für die Unannehmlichkeiten möchten wir uns entschuldigen. Wir werden dein Feedback für dich weiterleiten.Gruß, dein N26 Team.

name: Ялхарой Y
title: J'ai perdu mon téléphone et je ne peux…
content: J'ai perdu mon téléphone et je ne peux pas entrer dans mon compte avec mot de passe Je voudrais que vous facilitiez l'entrée

name: Cilja Allenstein
title: Katastrophe!
content: Katastrophe!! Mir wurden von N26 Lastschriften doppelt abgebucht. Ich konnte diese „aus technischen Gründen“ nicht zurück buchen... seit über 3 Wochen keine Reaktion.. weder per Mail noch im Chat kümmert sich jemand. Bei den Unternehmen ist auch kein Geld angekommen! Über 500€ fehlen mir und keine Reaktion von N26... nur : Ihre Beschwerde ist in Bearbeitung Verarsche !

name: Dawn Stephens
title: Fabulous banking .easy to use even for…
content: Fabulous banking .easy to use even for us oldies who hate technology!!! Support right there with live chat if needed.....i love my new account thanks so much :)

name: Claude Olivier
title: Il manque bancontact sur la carte Métal…
content: Il manque bancontact sur la carte Métal N26

name: KHALED KALROM
title: Formidable
content: Formidable et tres pratique par tout dans le monde

name: Imer Orozco
title: Two weeks trying to complete the id…
content: Two weeks trying to complete the id verification process but it never connected... deleted/created my account three times, tried with two smartphones both with Android 9, WiFi and 4G, uninstalling/installing the app several times, restarted the smartphones, contacted chat support I don't even remember the number of times and still nothing....Very disappointed... I wonder what would happen if I have a real problem with my money... not worth the try.
reply: Hey, thank you for your message.We sincerely apologise about this situation. Could you please tell us what error message appears on your N26 app ? We'll look into this for you.Best,Your N26 team.

name: Guin
title: Je me suis laissé séduire par N26
content: Je me suis laissé séduire par N26, mais au final j aurai mieux fait de me casser une jambe.J ai validé mes documents avec un conseiller,  chaque fois je tente de me connecter cela me demande un code que je suis censé recevoir par SMS  mais se code n arrive jamais.. C est bidon n 26
reply: Bonjour, nous sommes désolés de cette situation !Si vous n'avez pas accès à l'application, vous pouvez joindre notre Service Clientèle par le web. Il vous suffit de cliquer sur "Démarrer un chat" en bas de cette page : https://support.n26.com/fr-fr/vos-debuts/compte/comment-contacter-n26Salutations,Votre équipe N26.

name: dom_
title: Ceci est mon expérience
content: Ceci est mon expérienceJe suis satisfait du fonctionnement en général de la banque, des multiples options gérables par moi même de ma carte et de mon compte via l'application, de la réactivité du service client.Je ne suis pas satisfait parfois seulement :difficulté d'accès au SAV, victime de son succés ?Nouveau: 2FA (factors authentification)Fort bien peut être pour la sécurité, mais il y a d'autres moyens qui ne me bloqueraient pas complètement si j'ai omis d'emmener mon tel...

name: Antoine
title: Excellent overall experience
content: I'm using this bank for 3 years now.Nothing to say, everything works perfectly fine.And when you have an issue the customer support got your back !

name: Rebecca Dernbach Fotodesign
title: Saftladen
content: Saftladen, Überweisung ist seit einer Woche nicht raus und ich komme nicht an mein Geld. Kündigung folgt! Kundenchat sagt ist in Bearbeitung, wann dass alles endet ist nach 3 Anfragen immer noch nicht klar...
reply: Hey, danke für dein Feedback. Wurdest du denn weitergeholfen Rebecca? Sonst bitten wir dich eine private Nachricht an unseren N26_Support Twitter Account: https://twitter.com/N26_Support?s=09 oder über unseren Facebook Account: https://www.facebook.com/N26DE/ zu schicken. Wir würden uns freuen dir bei dem Problem helfen zu können.Gruß, dein N26 Team.

name: Julie Pince
title: Ravie !
content: Simple, clair, pratique, accessible, tout ce qu'on peut attendre d'une banque !

name: Karine Piffre
title: Compte facile à ouvrir c'est rapide
content: Compte facile à ouvrir c'est rapide, transmettre les documents hyper simple, notre carte arrivé très très vite, notifications lors de mouvements sur le compte en temps réel. Contacter le chat est facile et les personnes sont agréables. Jamais un mot plus haut que l'autre et ça fait la différence avec certains autres chats bancaire...Le seul bémol c'est de ne pas pouvoir déposer de chèques ou espèces sans passer par un autre compte pour faire un virement ce qui est parfois pénalisant.

name: Jamie McNaught
title: Account closed, money not returned, no way to contact and now they publicly libel me!
content: n26 have closed my account without notice.They have not returned my money.They have provided no explanation.I have no way to contact them.Yes, I know I can get my money back by going to the Financial Ombudman Service (which I will), but the reality is that I will never be compensated for my time.n26 are simply a joke. Really, don't waste your time with these people, use one of the other challenger banks, all of which are significantly better than this.Update: If you need to understand n26's, their response tells you all you need to know. The comment is libelous - they are accusing me of breaching their terms and conditions. I have not and they know it. What is even more disapointing is that they respond to reviews in under a day - formal complaints on the other hand go unanswered for weeks.Update2: They have now returned about two thirds of my money. Still no explanation where the rest is. Still no response to my emails so I will need to escalate this to the Financial Ombudsman Service for their assistance.
reply: Hey Jamie, thank you for taking the time to write a comment.We apologise for your situation, but as a fully-fledged bank, N26 must submit itself to banking regulations in place. Said regulation is aimed at protecting our users and we never close an account without warning you and always have a reason to do so.You won't encounter issues when using your bank account if you don't breach our terms and conditions. Thank you for your understanding.Best,Your N26 team.

name: jc Nourmont Boniface
title: une équipe professionnelle a l'écoute
content: une équipe professionnelle a l'écoute ! une visibilité très claire ! je recommande vivement les services de N26

content: Réactivité remarquable

content: I have been using N26 for about 6 months now,it IS very easy and very quick to use.Very good costumer care as wellI would recommend it highly.

title: L'appli n26 est très bien
content: L'appli n26 est très bienLes questions sont répondu rapidement et sont très clairement efficacement reglees

name: Karin Metcalf

content: Absolute Frechheit wie man behandelt wird. Wollte meine Telefonnummer ändern, daraufhin musste ich ewig im Chat verbringen und etliche Sicherheitsfragen zu beantworten um dann zu hören das ich zu einem Automat gehen muss um Geld abzuheben. ( Der nächste Automat ist 4 km entfernt) Das tat ich dann , nun hiess es das mein Dolument das ich zur Verifizierung brauch nicht im System ist und ich es per mail schicken muss ?? Daraufhin soll ich dann noch einmal zum Automat und alles von vorne ... Habe mein Konto gelöscht -NIE WIEDER !!
reply: Hey, danke für dein Feedback.Für alle Unannehmlichkeiten möchten wir uns entschuldigen. Wir geben immer unser Bestes um Probleme zu vermeiden. Wir werden dein Feedback weiterleiten.Gruß, dein N26 Team.

name: DADA moh
title: Très simple clair aucun problème depuis…
content: Très simple clair aucun problème depuis l'ouverture bonne continuation je suis très satisfait merci N26J'espère juste qu'on pourra déposer de l'espèce sur notre compte en France

name: Chris Tophe
title: Bonne banque en ligne
content: Bonne banque en ligne. Un peu chere

name: Bernhard
title: N26 - Kündigen unmöglich?
content: Ich war nun einige Jahre Kunde bei N26. Nachdem aber immer mehr Vorteile abgeschafft wurden, die mich ursprünglich zum Wechsel bewegt hatten, habe ich im April die Kündigung eingereicht. Ich habe auch eine Bestätigung der Kündigung erhalten. Ausgeführt wurde diese aber nie. Im Juni habe ich daher die Kündigung erneut ausgesprochen mit 14-tägiger Fristsetzung. Nun darf man gerne einmal raten wie der Stand meiner Kündigung zum heutigen Tage ist...
reply: Hey, danke für dein Feedback. Für die Unannehmlichkeiten möchten wir uns entschuldigen. Bitte sende uns doch eine private Nachricht an unseren N26_Support Twitter Account: https://twitter.com/N26_Support?s=09 oder über unseren Facebook Account: https://www.facebook.com/N26DE/. name: Azincot Philippe

name: badr khouzima
title: I like my experience with N26
content: I like my experience with N26. Simple, easy and whenever there is an issue you get to solve through the chat support, following the automatic responder or chatting with an agent. Much simple than traditional banks which are turning their institutes into online banks, but they still a headache to figure out things easily. 5 stars to N26

name: Denise Colon
title: pas beaucoup aide pour personnes agèes…
content: pas beaucoup aide pour personnes agèes ça fait 7jrs vidèo connection pas forte ;alors que je suis au dèbit car je regarde mes enfants sur skype +selfie;première fois je fais j en ai fait 10 photos pas acceptèes+j ai la carte depuis 15jrs j ai besoin de cet argent+6 fois j ai demandè de laide ;bon sang j arrive pas mettre mes papiers didentitè ++++c est très compliquè pour moi merci+++jai un petit smarphonne WIKO LENNY 3 le moins cher

name: Sam Brau
title: Customer Service is a joke
content: Customer Service is a joke. I haven't been able to access my bank account for over a week, and I am told I will receive a call within 24 hours to verify my identity - but the call never came so I must keep talking to their customer support and starting the issue a fresh. To make matters worse, if I do not link my phone within 10 more days they will cancel the account - but I can't link it with their customer support.
reply: Bonjour Denise, nous sommes sincèrement navrés que vous rencontriez des difficultés à ouvrir votre compte N26 et à valider vos documents.Nous voulons cependant vous aider, et il est nécessaire dans ce cas de joindre directement notre Service Client.Vous pouvez y procéder en vous connectant sur Google Chrome depuis un ordinateur. Il vous suffit par la suite de cliquer sur "Démarrer un chat" en bas de cette page : https://support.n26.com/fr-fr/vos-debuts/compte/comment-contacter-n26Nous espérons que cette réponse vous a été utile.Salutations,Votre équipe N26.

name: TEMMAM BILAL
title: J'admire toutes les qualités de N26
content: J'admire toutes les qualités de N26, depuis plus d'1an que j'utilise vraiment aucun souci et aucun frais payé, vraiment je la conseil . Bravo l'équipe N26
reply: Hey Sam, we are very sorry about this !Our Customer Service is able to help you for this matter. Please note that depending on our workload, your callback can take place 48 hours after your conversation with the LiveChat. We apologise for this delay.Regards,Your N26 Team.

name: petit
title: Une équipe dynamique
content: Une équipe dynamique, et très professionnel. Que du bonheur

content: Etant en voyage autour du monde, cette carte est idéale dû au peu de frais et à la simplicité de gestion du compte par l'application.

In der App nur Chat Funktion die einen den letzten Nerv kostet E-Mail Kontakt Tod geschaltet! Diese Bank wird bald verschwunden sein ich Rate jedem zu Monese die Top Bank schlecht hin! Ich habe so den Kanal voll von diesem Laden!

name: Founé DOUCOURE
title: Rien n’a dire sa va faire 1 mois que je…
content: Rien n’a dire sa va faire 1 mois que je suis chez N26 l’inscription était vraiment facile.
reply: Hey Tom, danke für dein Feedback.Hier findest du alle Informationen, wie du eine Lastschrift zurückbuchen kannst: https://support.n26.com/de-de/probleme-beheben/zahlungen-und-uberweisungen/wie-kann-ich-eine-lastschrift-ruckgangig-machenWenn die Lastschriften älter als 2 Wochen alt sind, kannst du diese manuell nicht zurückbuchen lassen über den Button der App.Gerne helfen wir dir natürlich im Chat damit weiter. Dort musst du nur einmal ansprechen, dass die Lastschriften doppelt abgebucht worden sind und du diese zurück haben möchtest.Die Kollegen werden dies sofort umsetzen und das Geld wird dir in wenigen  Tagen zurück erstattet. Grüße, dein N26 Support-Team.

name: Yann
title: Service client très réactif compétent…
content: Service client très réactif compétent et le tout en français

name: Sunil

content: Wish I never dealt with them taking in authorised transactions. Cannot speak to anyone. Making excuses. You name it. Diabolical. Please please please avoid them.

name: a holding
title: Best bank service I've ever had ..
content: I needed a basic bank account very quickly and N26 has delivered not only extremely speedy service (i got my card within 3 days) but the customer service is second to none ... I had trouble finding an online statement and Ricardo was superb in his patience with me and answered my chat support within 1 minute .. no other bank has measured up to this service ..

name: Sean Beasley
title: Loving my experience with them so far
content: Loving my experience with them so far. Everything from setup to the app functionality to the quality of the metal card is flawless

name: Marina Bonomi MB

name: Terigi

name: Urban Purkat

name: Riccardo

name: Mme DUQUENNOY Julie

name: Cathal Monkey
title: Brilliant
content: Brilliant way to keep track of money and spending Use code ca17682@n26 for money when you sign up and use your free card

name: Nie_wieder_N26
title: In schlechtem englisch angeschriehen werden
content: Ich habe meiner freundin die N26 als Spaßkonto empfohlen. Bei der Legitimierung wurde, warum auch immer, englisch mit ihr gesprochen. Ich war im Raum und hab alles gehört, das englisch des Mitarbeiters war groten schlecht. Weder ich, noch sie konnte seine Anweisungen verstehen. Darauf hat der Mitarbeiter sehr unfreundlich regaiert und angefangen zu sie an zu schreien. Ich bin irgenwann eingeschritten, was zum ende der Legitmation führte. Das ist auch gut so, ich selbst werde mein Konto nun auch schließen
reply: Hey, danke für dein Feedback!Die Verifikation wird von der Partnerfirma IDNow durchgeführt, welche alle Verifikationen in der Video-Verifizierung durchführt.Wenn du uns eine Email zukommen lässt, mit Datum und Zeitpunkt so gut es geht, können wir dein Feedback an die Kollegen weiterleiten, sodass dies hoffentlich nie wieder passieren wird.Wir entschuldigen uns für die Unannehmlichkeiten der Verifikation und dies ist natürlich nicht das wofür N26 steht und was wir unseren geschätzten Kunden entgegen bringen möchten.Wir hoffen, dass du uns diese Informationen per Email an Supporln26.com zusendest, sodass wir dort weiterhelfen können.Grüße, dein N26 Support Team.

name: Renaud
title: Banque on line tres simple…
content: Banque on line tres simple d'utilisation et service Chat tres efficace.A recommander vivement.Fini les queues et attente !!!

name: Снежана Гендурова
title: Excellent service
content: Excellent service. Si vous voulez un bonus de 15E, utilisez le code: georgim7080

name: James
title: Exceptionally awaful at everything
content: There are so many things wrong with this bank. The app and online banking are missing numerous basic functions - such as saving regular payees or managing direct debits.But the worst thing about them is their customer service. I had my phone stolen so I couldn't access my account. It took hours and hours waiting to get through to someone. Then I had to go through re-verification - sending my ID and selfies - and wait until they got back to me. The process takes 10 days! 10 days without access to your bank account! And they really couldn't care less. Their attitude is 'this is the way it is, live with it.'I've taken my banking elsewhere.03/10 Response to N26:No, my card isn't working. Being able to receive money is no good if I can't send payments or use my card. Same boiler-plate response, no help or support. They think it's OK to lock people out for 10 days. Ridiculous.07/10Still locked out. Borrowed all I can from friends and family. Literally eating beans on toast twice a day with the little I have left. Late bills are piling up. N26 is ruining me and they don't care.
reply: Hey James, thank you for reaching out.We are sorry that you feel this way. Please be aware that we’re currently experiencing a high volume of enquiries. As a result, the wait times to connect to a customer service agent may be a bit longer than usual. Concerning your N26 account, please note that during the re-verification, you could still use your card, your direct debits were collected and you could still receive incoming transfers.We thank you for your understanding.Best,Your N26 Team.

name: Mirabelle
title: immer noch eine hervorragende Bank
content: immer noch eine hervorragende Bank, ich habe bisher keine Probleme denn da funktioniert der support einwandfrei, so schnell und gut funktionierend habe ich noch nie einen support erlebt wie der von der N26

name: Herbert
title: Diese Bank ist vom Servive das…
content: Diese Bank ist vom Servive das SCHLECHTESTE was ich je erlebt habe. Der Chat ist so gut wie NIE erreichbar. Telefonrückruf ist NUR FÜR METALKUNDEN !!!!!  Auf Mails ,kommt wenn überhaupt, nur, dass man an der Anfrage arbeitet. auf eine Zahlungsnachweis warte ich jetzt seit fast einer Woche, da es hier keine Kontoauszuge gibt.Ich kann nur JEDEM empfehlen FINGER WEG VON DIESER BANK !! !!! DAS ist eine einzige Frechheit, denn auch diese Bank lebt von Kunden und das scheint bei diesem Verein niemand zu interessieren.

name: Sandie D.
title: La vraie solution face aux banques fossiles !
content: Banque transparente, simple et efficace. Une vraie banque adaptée aux besoins des clients : pas de conseillers/commerciaux qui essayent de vendre des produits bancaires inutiles; pas de services inutiles; donc pas de frais injustifiés! Et le tout, littéralement sous la main! (Accessible depuis son smartphone)
reply: Hey Herbert, danke für dein Feedback.Aufgrund der PSD2 Änderungen wurde unser Chat stark kontaktiert, dies hat sich nun allerdings nun beruhigt und unser Chat ist wie gewohnt in nur wenigen Minuten erreichbar.Ebenfalls funktioniert unser Telefonline zwar nur für Metalkunden aber wir bieten für alle Kunden natürlich einen Rückrufservice im absoluten Notfall an. Dies muss natürlich im Chat begründet werden.Sobald unsere Kollegen Zeit haben deine  Email zu bearbeiten werden diese das auch machen.Gerne kannst du du den  Chat eröffnen und um Bearbeitung bitten, sodass dies sofort erledigt wird.Grüße, dein N26 Support-Team.

name: Milu
title: Seit 2 Tagen wird mir versprochen dass…
content: Seit 2 Tagen wird mir versprochen dass man sich sofort um mein Anliegen kümmert - man hätte alles weitergeleitet und beschleunigt! NICHTS ist passiert. Vertröstet und hingehalten wird man!! wenn man dann nochmal im Chat nachfragt ... dann kommt nur die Aussage „geduldige dich bitte noch etwas“ ich weiß nicht ob der Bank überhaupt bewusst ist, das Kunden Verpflichtungen haben und Rechnungen begleichen müssen!! es ist ein Unding. Langsam wird mir klar warum einige lieber zur anderen Banken mit Namen gehen!! denn da wird nicht lange geredet, sondern direkt gehandelt. Normalerweise sollte diese Bank zu sehen das alles problemlos klappt - besonders nachdem schon große Zeitungen negative Dinge schreiben. Was nützt ist es ... wenn diese Bank das beste Startup Unternehmen ist wenn sie sich nicht um die Angelegenheiten ihrer Kunden kümmern. ( sorry für die Rechtschreibung - aber ich bin wütend und einfach nur enttäuscht ) der bafin habe ich auch geschrieben. Es geht nicht mehr anders!

name: Heni Kouki
title: Excellent service
content: Excellent service, merci beaucoup
reply: Hey Milu, danke für dein Feedback.Sobald die Kollegen dein Ticket bearbeiten werden auch sämtliche angesprochene Lastschriften zurückgebucht.Diese müssen  natürlich alle von uns geprüft werden und alle Transaktionen durchgegangen werden, sodass wir das Geld nicht doppelt zurücksenden auf dein Konto, weil es bereits erstattet wurde. Spätestens Anfang dieser Woche solltest du dein Geld zurückerhalten.Grüße, dein N26 Support-Team.

name: roux jb
title: Une banque simple, à l’écoute, professionnelle
content: J’ai découvert N26 par hasard et c’est une très bonne banque

name: Nadir Berkane
title: Très bon service
content: Très bon service

name: Tanguy Putz
title: Efficient
content: Efficient, Quick, smart. Drop the dinosaurs

name: Ju Gulus
title: Très bonne banque en ligne pas de…
content: Très bonne banque en ligne pas de surprise cependant le tarif de la Metal est élevé.

name: Franco Bertin
title: N26 ? Per me pessima.
content: Sto aspettando un bonifico in entrata sulla mia N26 Mastercard da 17 giorni. Ho interpellato la chat : pessima , le solite risposte standard . A domande specifiche e concrete non sapevano rispondere. Ho chiesto se potevano verificare dove erano finiti i miei soldi : hanno detto di rivolgermi a chi me li ha mandati (!?).Oggi stesso chiudo il conto .

name: HM
title: NEVER BE WITH N26 BANK
content: The system became garbage after the 2FA-authentication started.Support didn't respond properly to my questions and they kept wasting my time using security questions as an excuse.I still haven't logged in to the APP and I've been notified by 10/1 to recheck my ID and I've never been able to log in to the APP.I am going to file a claim against N26 BANK with my legal team from the EU.All documents and support materials have been prepared and will be submitted to the EU court soon.n26, why the hell are you asking SMS(FA) questions about my security questions?And you're closing the CHAT first when the client isn't even finished?

name: Craig Scott
title: Very good way of to do Banking for your…
content: Very good way of to do Banking for your business.
reply: Ciao Franco, grazie per averci contattato.Ci dispiace per la tua esperienza e capiamo perfettamente il tuo stato d'animo.Possiamo confermarti, tuttavia, che è una prassi normale accertarsi che non ci siano stati dei problemi da parte della banca da cui è partito il bonifico.Detto ciò ti incoraggiamo a ricontattarci, siamo ansiosi di aiutarti a risolvere il tuo caso.Buona giornata.

name: Sergio Glock
title: Macchinosa da usare
content: Macchinosa da usare, poco chiara la piattaforma, se hai bisogno di aiuto c è solo una misera chat che ti risponde in automatico e senza operatore, per fare un bonifico c ho messo un ora, assurdo, sembra quasi sia strutturata in modo da scoraggiare l utente a togliere i soldi.Andate su una chiarissima e comoda Postepay
reply: Hello, thank you for taking the time to write this message.We sincerely apologise for any trouble you've had with the app. It is mandatory for your account safety to answer security questions when starting a chat. This way, all your informations remain private and protected. We thank you for your understanding on this particular point.You do not need to log in your N26 App in order to re-verify your identity. You will be asked to upload your documents as soon as you open your app.We hope this answer was useful.Best,Your N26 Team.

name: Thomas Romstad Stein
title: Everything was working fine until they…
content: Everything was working fine until they suddenly blocked my access to my account with an incoherent and absurd claim that my phone was not my phone. And the refused to help me basically stealing everything I had in my account

name: Quentin Hsbc
title: So happy with this bank
content: I gotta be honest I'm really surprised to see so many bad comments, especially about the customer service. It's been working great for me the two times I needed it. It might be different in the US or UK but N26 implementation in these countries is really new so I guess it will be better with time. Anyways, it really works great in Europe and I'm so happy to use it as a French living in England!
reply: Ciao Sergio.Ci dispiace capire che tu non abbia trovato un'esperienza d'uso ottimale.Abbiamo cercato di rendere la nostra app estremamente semplice e facile di utilizzo, ci farebbe piacere avere un commento dettagliato sul perché è stato difficile fare un bonifico e, soprattutto, come pensi che dovrebbero essere disposte le funzioni nella nostra app.Ci teniamo sottolineare che la parte automatizzata della chat è solamente l'anticamera della conversazione con un nostro agente del customer support: basta selezionare l'opzione "voglio chattare con un operatore" e verrai assistito da una persona in carne ed ossa.Buona giornata.

name: Benjamin F.
title: Carte gratuite service client compétent…
content: Carte gratuite service client compétent et facile à joindre
reply: Hey Thomas, thank you for taking the time to write this review. We just need you to upload your ID in order for us to re-verify your account. This is a security measure taken to ensure that your data remains protected. Our Customer Service is able to help you on this matter. Please click on "Start a chat" at the bottom of the following page : https://support.n26.com/en-de/fixing-an-issue/other/how-to-contact-n26 Thank you for your understanding.Best,Your N26 team.

name: JWN
title: Read. DO NOT open an Account. Here's why....
content: Do Not. No matter what you may have heard or what you may read. Do not open an "account" with N26.A bank- or any consumer business- should be judged by how it performs in its worst moments and not its best. N26 is a perfect example. This innovative start-up has gained customers and market penetration but has done so at the expense of its customers: its' tech platform is unstable and its customer service is non-existent. Truly- you'll get five answers for a question but NEVER get a person on the telephone. Though N26 promotes itself as an online bank, that's a ruse. When problems arise its ability to solve them requires the sort of traditional intervention of staff to solve problems that can't be solved by an algorithm. And its investment in staff is abysmally low. I've been locked out of my account- while traveling overseas- for three weeks now. Despite assurances that my debit card would continue to work it does not (see below). I've had to make costly compromises to how I bank myself abroad that have wiped out any advantage that N26 promotes- and has cost me hundreds of dollars. Prior to this debacle I had bad consistently bad experiences over the past 18 months: five terminated / dropped online conversations and a wait as long as 90 minutes for an ONLINE chat. No kidding- an online chat. I'm told by insiders that N26 spends 10,000x more money on customer acquisition than it does on customer service. N26 is focused on building a paying customer base but fails miserably in terms of customer service. When I received a response a week or so after my account was locked it came from the "Complaints Department" (not a Customer Service Department as you would expect.) To wit, I'm not a complain I'm a customer- a distinction that's lost on this tone-deaf company.  Its founders are worth over $100 million while customers' needs are ignored. This is why banking gets a bad name and tech founders a reputation as entitled predators.
reply: Hey, thank you for reaching out.We sincerely apologise for this situation.Please be aware that we’re currently experiencing a high volume of enquiries. As a result, the wait times to connect to a customer service agent may be a bit longer than usual. Concerning your N26 account, please note that during the re-verification, you can still use your card, your direct debits are collected and you can still receive incoming transfers. We just need you to upload your ID into the app so we can re-verify   your identity.Thank you for your understanding.Regards,Your N26 team.

name: Holger Thieke
title: Kontoschließung trotz Kündigung  und…
content: Kontoschließung trotz Kündigung  und mehrerer Aufforderungen nicht erfolgt. Erreichbar nur per Chat, wo nur allg. pauschale Vertröstungen erfolgen.Kündigung zum 18.07.2019, heute ist der 26.09.2019.
reply: Hey Holger,danke für dein Feedback und bitte entschuldige die Unannehmlichkeiten. Bitte sende uns doch eine private Nachricht an unseren N26_Support Twitter Account: https://twitter.com/N26_Support?s=09 oder über unseren Facebook Account: https://www.facebook.com/N26DE/. Wir würden uns freuen dir bei dem Problem helfen zu können.Gruß, dein N26 Team.

name: Melli Mello
title: La banque parfaite quand tout va…
content: La banque parfaite tant que tout va bien !Si vous n'avez pas de soucis et n'envisagez pas d'en avoir alors c'est la banque parfaite ! Depuis plus de 10 jours je ne peux plus accéder à mon compte en ligne (seule façon de gérer son compte).  Malgré mes nombreux "chats" ou on me promet à chaque fois un rappel sous 48 heures (ce qui est déjà beaucoup quand on est seule à Singapour), RIEN N'A ÉTÉ FAIT pour régler mon problème. Le support client est juste une fumisterie. Je suis à chaque fois en relation avec des amateurs qui ne sachant pas quoi faire m’envoient des messages copiés-collés. J'ai souvent reçu le même. Pour une banque qui se veut celle des voyageurs, c'est juste inacceptable.
reply: Bonjour, nous sommes navrés de cette situation.Lors de la re-vérification de votre identité, vous pouvez toujours utiliser votre carte, vos débits directs sont débités et vous pouvez recevoir vos virements.Nous avons simplement besoin, pour des raisons légales, que vous téléchargiez de nouveau votre document d'identité à l'application.Merci de votre compréhension sur ce point.Salutations,Votre équipe N26.

name: Sofia
title: Worthless
content: Worthless. From the beginning, their sms verification was not working. That was over 9 months ago. They have done nothing about it. Now I am trying to access my account, finally figured out how to get in touch with them through chat, which feels like is hidden because they probably don't want people to bother them. Rep tells me they will send an email with the detailed report. It's been over 24 hours and I have received nothing and I cannot access the account.
reply: Hey Sofia, thank you for reaching out.Has your issue been solved ? Please, let us know so we can help you.Best,Your N26 Team.

name: Mathiile Duvivier
title: Je suis à la N26 depuis 1an
content: Je suis à la N26 depuis 1an. J'en suis relativement satisfaite, le service client est accessible, efficace et aimable. Je regrette seulement le fait que les décalages horaires ne soit pas prit en compte, j'ai dû effectué un changement de numéro n'ayant plus accès à l'ancien, la dernière étape consiste à recevoir un appel avec l'échange d'un code, j'ai reçu l'appel alors que je dormais.. J'espère que N26 va être un peu plus alerte à ce sujet.Hormis ça, très bonne banque quand on voyage !

name: Pascal Barnouin
title: creation tres simple et CB gratuite…
content: creation de compte tres simple et CB gratuite. 0 frais. hotline performante. Une néo banque parfaite !

name: Lily
title: DO NOT USE
content: I wish I had read reviews of this bank before I made the mistake of signing up for it. I got an account, transfered money into it, and immediately learned that I would never be able to log into the app or the website because I had an American number and the two-factor authentication cannot go through. Infuriating! I didn't close my account, and I used the card once to withdraw cash from an ATM successfully. Then, my card was stolen and I was unable to log into my account but somehow figured out a way to 'block' my card temporarily. The next day, I got a notification that a purchase had been authorized - so it was NOT blocked? I called the US support number, who had no record of my account existing since I opened it abroad, and didn't even have the support number that I was supposed to call. There IS no support number. I had to open a chat and it took five different chats and several hours to even get someone to block my account. They said someone will call me "within 24 hours" to pair my phone to my account and let me in. He wouldn't even let me see which purchases were attempted. I am withdrawing all of my money and canceling this account immediately. I have never been more stressed out from a banking experience! Unbelievable that I cannot access my own account while some stranger is off spending my money!
reply: Hey Lily,we are sorry to learn about your experience.The two factor authentication is obviously intended for security reasons. As a bank with an official license from the ECB we are compelled to do anything in our power to maximise our customer's security, that's why we asked you to provide us with a phone number.Have you contacted us right after you realised that you couldn't go through the authentication process with your American phone number?We believe we could have helped you figuring out a way to log into your account.Without our customer being authenticated within the app we cannot provide personal information, let alone transaction information because it would not be safe.We encourage you to contact us again in the future, we will do everything in our power to help you out.Regards,Your N26 Team

name: Deepal Jayasekara
title: Extremely buggy app, and the app is all they have
content: Withdrawal - We tried to withdraw some money from the ATM, We got a notification that the transaction was successfully authorized, and the amount was deducted from the account. But the ATM didn't give any cash. Later we found out an explanation on their website saying "It happens". Why don't you fix the issues you have, rather than writing articles to decorate the bug as a feature???Foreign transfer - I wanted to perform a foreign currency transfer. I tried two times, and both failed giving an "Unexpected Error Occurred" red banner and a forever spinning "Processing" banner. Then we contacted support to see what's wrong. And we got the most stupid and hilarious response ever. He said that they use Transferwise as a service to do foreign transfers which THEY HAVE NO CONTROL OF. Then they asked me to contact Transferwise DIRECTLY to get my problem sorted. I myself is a software engineer who has years of experience in the Payments industry, so I know how things work. Why would you ask your customer to contact YOUR 3rd party service which the customer has ABSOLUTELY NO CONTRACT with????? That's the most stupid and ridiculous answer ever. Getting a bank statement - Getting a full bank statement for official purposes is a nightmare. Support told us they don't issue certified bank statement including the history of transactions. You can only get a statement verifying your current balance (which is ridiculous)
reply: Hey, thank you for taking the time to write this review.We are sorry that you feel that way. We are always looking to improve the quality of our services and are always open to your observations. If you wish to give feedback or have any ideas that could improve your experience (concerning app improvements, ideas for new features, quality of Customer Service...), you can send an email to : ideas@n26.com and we'll make sure to forward it to the relevant teams. Regards,Your N26 Team.

name: Raphaël PILORGET
title: Banque en ligne sérieuse avec un…
content: Banque en ligne sérieuse avec un service client réactif et professionnel. Je recommande à 100%. Idéal quand on voyage.

name: Allan Kennedy
title: I have had a problem with my app when I…
content: I have had a problem with my app when I upgraded it I tried to contact their customer services and I am still waiting for them to contact me.
reply: Hey Allan, we are very sorry about that !Could you please contact our Customer Service by clicking on "Open a chat" at the bottom of the following page : https://support.n26.com/en-de/fixing-an-issue/other/how-to-contact-n26 ? One of our agents will help out.Regards,Your N26 Team.

name: WE
title: Das ist keine Bank
content: Das ist keine Bank; eher ein Call Center.Habe Konto angemeldet; soweit verifiziert, erste Startüberweisung durchgeführt.Dann kan eine mail dass das Konto sofort geschlossen wird wegen verstoß gehen die AGB:...dein N26 Konto gemäß § 19 Abs. 3 der Allgemeinen Geschäftsbedingungen außerordentlich zu kündigen.....Nach vielen mails mit der Bitte dies zu erklären (habe m.e. alle Bedingungen eingehalten) sowie anrufen beim Kundenservie kam einfach nichts. Dann panisch Schufa Auskunft eingeholt; war aber excellent.Habe Geld wieder abgezogen.Das ist unprofessionell und m.e. echte Zeitverschwendung.Rate dringend ab hier ein Konto zu eröffnen!Konto wurde geschlossen; bekomme aber bis heute noch aufforderungen meine Karte zu aktivieren (sollte mal wegen DSVGO klagen)
reply: Danke für dein Feedback. Als vollwertige Bank muss sich N26 den geltenden Bankvorschriften unterwerfen. Diese Regelung zielt darauf ab, unsere Nutzer zu schützen. Bei der Verwendung deines Bankkontos treten keine Probleme auf, wenn du nicht gegen unsere Allgemeinen Geschäftsbedingungen verstößt. Gruß, dein N26 Team.

name: Ehemals zufriedener Kunde.
title: Kundenservice reagiert nicht auf meine Emails.
content: Ich kann seit zwei Wochen nicht mehr in die App rein, habe dies vor ca. zwei Wochen dem Kundenservice gemeldet -bis jetzt keine Reaktion.Daraufhin habe ich letzten Sonntag meine Kontokündigung eingereicht und auch auf diese Email habe ich bis heute keine Antwort bekommen. Ich bin einfach nur noch verzweifelt und ratlos.
reply: Danke für dein Feedback und bitte entschuldige die Unannehmlichkeiten.Bitte schicke uns eine private Nachricht an unseren N26_Support Twitter Account: https://twitter.com/N26_Support?s=09 oder über unseren Facebook Account: https://www.facebook.com/N26DE/. Wir schauen uns das gerne für dich an.Gruß, dein N26 Team.

name: Amélie Martinez
title: Service client réactif et courtois
content: Pas de frais cachés, service client contactable très rapidement via le tchat en ligne et réponse rapide.Seul regret, pas la possibilité de faire des paiement en plusieurs sur les sites internet.

name: Juan Pablo
title: Great experience
content: I love N26 best bank ever

name: Heithor de Mello
title: amazing service
content: I got my account for near a year now and I’m really happy. A few times I need support and was amazing, fast and friendly

name: LAFFITTE
title: Service au top
content: Service au top, fiable et rapide.. merci..

name: Clement
title: Service client AU TOP
content: 0 frais de carte ou compteBanque simple pour voyagerService client AU TOP

name: Andrew
title: Used these for a while now and 100%…
content: Used these for a while now and 100% recommended, very easy to use and customer service are very helpful.

name: Maria Teresa Marconi
title: Io non ho aperto nessun conto con N26
content: Io non ho aperto nessun conto con N26, ma continuo a ricevere mail che mi chiedono informazioni private dicendomi che sono stati effettuati accessi sul mio conto INESISTENTE da dispositivi e/o luoghi non conosciuti!!! Ma la vogliamo smettere?????????? Tra l'altro, chi ha dato loro la mia mail?????????
reply: Ciao, Maria Teresa, hai fatto benissimo a scrivere questo commento perché ci permette di parlare di un argomento importantissimo.Se non sei cliente N26 e ricevi delle mail che ti invitano ad "aggiornare i tuoi dati" devi prestare la massima attenzione, non trasmettere nessun dato e cestinare la mail: si tratta di mail phishing.Il phishing è una pratica attuata da mailntenzionati per estorcere i tuoi dati per fini illeciti.Scrivici sui messaggi privati della nostra pagina Facebook oppure alla mail support@n26.com per segnalarci qual è l'indirizzo email da cui hai ricevuto questi messaggi, ti assicuriamo che prenderemo delle contromisure.Grazie ancora della tua segnalazione.Buona giornata.

name: Marine AMARO MARIA
title: C'est une banque rapide et sûr
content: C'est une banque rapide et sûr. Vous devez valider chaque nouvelle connexion à votre compte. Les paiements sont instantanés. Une validation sur l'app peut être demandé.Le Service Client est rapide, sympa et efficace.L'offre la plus basse est gratuite avec CB inclus ! L'ouverture est rapide avec vérification d'identité.

name: Tupo
title: A word of warning to anyone considering…
content: A word of warning to anyone considering N26.No SWIFT payments. You can’t get paid from people internationally unless they use transfer wise. If you are being paid by your employer or receiving funds for a sale you cannot expect everyone to send funds via a 3rd party, adding an unnecessary 3rd person.Live Support via chat only. Answers feel like they are template responses 99% of the time. It doesn’t feel like a bank and feels like an underpaid student with no financial qualification is on the other end.To break free from this shambles of a company I paid 11 months N26 you @ 110 euros to leave them and it took 2 over 2 weeks for them to close my account after repeated emails and chats asking them to do so.You could argue I should have researched before I signed up. True. But I just expected the above as a given.
reply: Hey, thank you for taking the time to write this comment.We are very sorry that you feel that way.First, concerning SWIFT payments, it is indicated in the Terms and Conditions of your account that N26 only supports SEPA payments. You can find the info about this here : https://support.n26.com/en-fr/getting-started/payments-and-transfers/how-to-make-transfers-in-foreign-currenciesOur phone support line is reserved to Metal users. Our agents can help you via LiveChat everyday from 7 am to 11 pm.Finally, if you had subscribed to a premium account, you had 14 days to revoke it without any fees. Afterwards, it is indeed mandatory for you to pay the remaining fees, as written in your contract.We hope this answer was useful.Regards,Your N26 Team.

name: PPCD
title: Virement retenu par N26 sans justification
content: Depuis le mois d'août, les virements SEPA entrants sont systématiquement bloqué pendant 7 jours par N26. Le nombre de jours correspond à la limite avant un retour vers la banque émettrice. Quand on interroge le service client, la réponse est toujours la même: "Nous n'avons aucune visibilité sur les virements, demandez à votre banque émettrice". Je demandé à la BNP de mener une enquête de paiement mais N26 ne répond jamais ce qui confirme qu'ils retiennent les fonds, je suppose pour se rémunérer. De plus, ils se réfugient derrière le fait que s'agissant d'une banque allemande le droit français ne s'applique pas.Devant ce comportement plus que douteux et un service client déplorable, j'envisage de clore mon compte (aux torts de N26) après plus de 2 ans de fonctionnement sans incident.En savoir plus sur
reply: Bonjour, nous sommes désolés de cette situation.Si le virement que vous avez effectué semble hors délais, nous vous invitons effectivement à contacter directement la banque émettrice afin de lancer une investigation bancaire car nous ne pouvons pas procéder à une investigation bancaire pour un virement entrant. Nous vous invitons cependant à consulter les raisons pour lesquelles un virement peut échouer ici : https://support.n26.com/fr-fr/resoudre-un-probleme/paiements-et-virements/pourquoi-mon-virement-a-echoueSalutations,Votre équipe N26.

name: Erika
title: They got all my funds without notice or explanation!
content: They had a second identification check up while I'm living abroad and their system cant support my foreign passport online unless I go back to Germany to present it "again" to the local post office. All my funds are frozen and my only option is to close the account and transfer all my funds to my bank account abroad, but their system also don't recognize my other bank. I'm trying to contact their customer support every day without response, explanation, update or estimate to have this problem solved. I have bills to pay and there's no landline to call, they are only an online bank and completely dismissive to all my attempts to resolve this situation! I feel helpless!!! My worse experience with a bank! Get your funds out of this bank ASAP!------Waw! This answer from n26 to my review is just but a politically correct answer. You know things are not working this way, I'm trying to contact you but nothing. No answer, no estimate, and obviously I can't proceed with the identification process unless I return to Germany. What are u talking about? This is your politically correct answer to keep fooling your future customers? You are the worst bank experience! All wrong! It's been a month and I'm still waiting for my funds to be transfered without access to my account. The app doesn't work, I can't complete the identification, no answer by email or any update or estimate for this situation to be resolved from the chat.
reply: Hey Erika, thank you for your message. We sincerely apologise about this situation.As a licenced bank, we’re legally obligated to request customers to verify their identity at regular intervals. Once you start the process to verify your identity again, you’ll still be able to use your card to make purchases, receive money, have full benefits of any overdraft & credit, and direct debits will still be collected. When verification of your ID is complete, you’ll have full access to your account features and app.We thank you for your understanding.Regards,Your N26 Team.

name: Wilma Martens
title: I needed support because my smartphone…could'nt get the verificationcode
content: I needed support because my smartphone had no update's more. After update N26 I needed a higher android version.So I could'nt log in anymore. By double check for the update I bought a cheap nice smartphone. This one had a new phone number, so I still could'nt log in. N26 called me for the new number after security checking they put my new number in my account. I had some problems to log in again, I unpaired in my account the new number. Stupid of me. So again asking for help and they help me quick and with a lot of patience to pair my new phone. I'm very thankfull en satisfied with N26. By the way I did know about the language. You can read it in theirs conditions agreement.
reply: Bonjour, merci de votre message.Nous sommes sincèrement navrés de cette situation.En tant qu’établissement détenteur d’une licence bancaire, N26 a l'obligation légale de vérifier l’identité de ses clients à intervalles réguliers. Si vous avez contacté notre Service Client, notez que vous êtes rappelé sous 48 heures maximum. Salutations,Votre équipe N26.

name: Andy
title: Say Nooooo to N26
content: I've been using N26 now ever since it launched in the UK and I'm not really impressed.What I like about N26 the most is the signup process is extremely quick and simple. Gone are the days that banks should be sending out forms to fill in, or having to take your ID into a branch. I think the whole signup process took just a few minutes which is fantastic.The debit card wasn't exactly quick to arrive, from memory I believe it was around 2 weeks, which is pretty slow even by UK bank standards.The app is quite buggy, the most annoying bug for me is that when I login, quite often I get logged out straight away. Although it's not a bug, rather an annoying feature, is if you use fingerprint logins, you have to login with the password every 30 days and re-enable fingerprint logins.The bank doesn't support debit debits, which make it impossible to use for your day-to-day banking. Also when sending payments to other banks, you have to type the sort code, account number, and reference every time you make a payment. N26 is the only bank to my knowledge which doesn't remember recent payments or payees. That is very annoying!One of the biggest problems for me using N26 is the double charging problem, which doesn't appear to happen with any other UK bank. Typically when making a payment with your debit card, the merchant will first perform a check with the bank to make sure you have enough money in your account, and if so, the bank reserve that money (which you see as a pending transaction). Later, the merchant actually debit your account, and the original "reserved" amount is then released. I've seen it quite a lot with N26 where the merchant takes the amount from my account, but the original "reserved" amount is still pending. This means you can actually be double charged for purchases, until the pending transaction is released which can take up to 30 days. Meanwhile you have less money in your account which can be used.You'll find you also have to re-confirm your ID every so often. N26 is the only bank I know to do this, but it is the way they do it which is a problem. When they want to re-formed your ID, you'll be notified by the app at a seconds notice, at which point your banking app stops working and you can't make full use of the app such as making payments. Unless you are carrying your ID, and can get it re-confirmed quickly, you could end up with no access to your money (in certain circumstances).Finally I just want to wrap up with the N26 customer services. I've spoken to N26 support for two different issues now, firstly my debit card not working, and the above double charging problem. The impression I got from both customer service agents, was they couldn't be bothered. They showed very little interest in the problems and were arrogant in places.Overall, I like that N26 is trying to be modern and high-tech, but the execution and quality of service is pretty poor. If you are looking for a modern bank which offers good service and support, I would recommend Monzo or Starling over N26.

name: Anna Upeniece
title: Identity re-verification - poor support - IDnow
content: Have enjoyed using N26 for nearly 3 years until a week ago when I asked to re-verify my identity. I’m following the process 10-15 times a day but no luck. IDnow Identification Expert is never available. In the meantime I cannot withdraw money or make any payments including bills and rent!Unable to reach N26 on a phone. Chat support are of no help.
reply: Hey Andy, thank you very much for taking the time to write this review.We sincerely apologise concerning the malfunctions you've had with the app. We are always looking to improve the quality of our services and the new app updates should solve any existing issues. If you wish to give feedback or have any ideas that could improve your experience (concerning app improvements, ideas for new features, quality of Customer Service...), you can send an email to : ideas@n26.com and we'll make sure to forward it to the relevant teams. Concerning your transactions, note that your N26 card is a MasterCard debit. This means that two kind of transactions can take place : - Authorizations. A blocked or reserved amount made by a retailer or merchant. Once an authorization has been confirmed, we can’t cancel or reverse it. At that point, a few things can happen to your authorization : it turns into a presentment, it's rejected, or it expires (and automatically returns to your account up to 12 days at the latest). - Presentments. The actual amount that is deducted from your account. Regarding the re-verification, please note that as a licensed bank, we’re legally obligated to request customers to verify their identity at regular intervals. Once you start the process to verify your identity again, you are still be able to use your card to make purchases, receive money, have full benefits of any overdraft & credit, and direct debits are still collected. When verification of your ID is complete, you’ll have full access to your account features and app.We hope this answer was useful to you and thank you again for your honest feedback !Regards, Your N26 Team.

name: Thomas Bonnet
title: Services utiles et sécurisés
content: Carte utile à l'étranger et au quotidien. Support très réactif. Content d'être membre N26.
reply: Hey Anna, thank you for reaching out. We sincerely apologise about this situation.As a licenced bank, we’re legally obligated to request customers to verify their identity at regular intervals. Once you start the process to verify your identity again, you’ll still be able to use your card to make purchases, receive money, have full benefits of any overdraft & credit, and direct debits will still be collected. When verification of your ID is complete, you’ll have full access to your account features and app.We thank you for your understanding.Regards,Your N26 Team.

name: pamela DALIBON

name: Linn
title: Stay away from this bank
content: Stay away from this bank! There are no other options in Germany for non-German speakers, but save yourself some time, effort and stress and don't sign up with N26.Every single step has been a hassle. I signed up two months ago and I've still not been able to use it. The startup video process took an hour, many assistants just hung up when I didn't speak German.I tried transferring money from my EU home country but it wasn't accepted. Upon trying to figure out why, they had no information to give me, and my bank of 15 years in my home country told me that this was N26's problem, not theirs. I've repeatedly tried to fix this, but they refuse to help me further.They've recently updated their login process to ask for phone verification, and they didn't tell me before implementing this. I've had trouble with sim cards here as well, and my phone number changes all the time. I tried changing this through the customer chat and they asked me if I could go to an ATM to make a transaction in order to verify myself. Just to change my phone number! Up until recently, all they've asked for a login has been an email and a password.The principle to have to go verify myself like that is just wrong. I've complained about that and they don't listen. I've asked for a different way of verifying myself (my bank in my country have many means of verification) and they asked me about my 5th transaction in my bank. I haven't even had 1 transaction! I answered that, and apparently the answer was wrong and the assistant closed the chat. I've asked the customer service 4 times now, having waited several hours on and on, and they just transfer me to other assistants or the internet connection is abrupted on their side.Highly unprofessional.

name: Patrick
title: Very Amateurish
content: After using N26 for several months without complaint, they suddenly updated their app.  It was a mandatory update, and they disabled older versions.  This new update had the feature of a cryptographic signature requiring a direct download from the Google Play Store.  This is a problem for me because I don't agree with Google's terms and conditions or privacy policy.  I download my apps elsewhere.Other banks use a cryptographic signature to verify the integrity of the app, not that I have agreed to Google's t&c.  This is like the old days when companies required you to have a Windows computer to use their services.Anyway, this app upgrade abruptly made my account unusable and blocked most of my payment options.  It was days before I was able to get through to customer service on their chat window, and was obviously not the only one with a problem.  I asked them to close my account and transfer the balance, and they are unable to give me a time frame for completing this.
reply: Hey Linn, thank you for taking the time to write this review.We are sorry for the trouble you've experienced concerning your verification. Note that you can change the langage of contact by clicking on Account > Settings > App Settings > Language. If your incoming transfer is outside of the estimated time frames, please contact the sender (bank) for a payment investigation. We can't investigate incoming transfers, but we've collected a few reasons why your SEPA or foreign currency transfer could have failed : https://support.n26.com/en-fr/fixing-an-issue/payments-and-transfers/why-did-my-sepa-transfer-failRegarding re-verification, please note that as a licensed bank, we’re legally obligated to request customers to verify their identity at regular intervals. Once you start the process to verify your identity again, you’ll still be able to use your card to make purchases, receive money, have full benefits of any overdraft & credit, and direct debits will still be collected. When verification of your ID is complete, you’ll have full access to your account features and app.Finally, if you have any ideas on how to improve your experience and our services, you can send an email to : ideas@n26.com and we'll forward your suggestions to the relevant teams.We thank you for your understanding.Regards,Your N26 Team.

name: Luc Montgomery
title: I withdraw €100 on saturday
content: I withdraw €100 on saturday! And they charged me 3 × €100 on my account! Had to fight to get a refund! Only  got 100€ back...still waiting for my other 100€!It takes them 2 sec to steal our money and 12 days to give it back!No solutions givenVery poor customer service  very dissapointed and donc know if I will ever see my 100€ again
reply: Hey Luc, we sincerely apologise for this situation.Your N26 Mastercard is a debit card, which means banking in real-time. There are two main transaction types that take place during an in-store or online purchase:- Authorizations. A block or reserved amount made by a retailer or merchant. Once an authorization has been confirmed, we can’t cancel or reverse it. At that point, a few things can happen to your authorization: it turns into a presentment, it's rejected, or it expires (and automatically returns to your account up to 12 days at the latest).- Presentments. The actual amount that is deducted from your account. Sometimes you’ll see both the authorization and the presentment if they become disconnected or due to technical issues at the payment terminal. Eventually the authorization will expire. If it doesn’t, please reach out to Customer Service (Account > Help > LiveChat).We thank you for your understanding and hope this answer was useful.Best regards,Your N26 Team.

reply: Hey Sandy, thank you for reaching out.Our customer service agents are available and fully able to assist you everyday including Sundays and bank holidays, from 07:00 to 23:00. You can also contact us by sending us an email at support@n26.com. Make sure to send it from your address linked to your N26 account so we can see your previous interactions and fully understand your situation.We thank you for your understanding and hope this answer was useful.Regards,Your N26 Team.

title: Beware of N26
content: I have used N26 for almost 2 years and in that time they have turned into a joke!! There customer service is now nonexistent as they have got rid of all their telephone numbers. They are an online remote bank that you can't contact. Their chat feature is a deception so new customers think that their is a way to contact them.I am waiting for a new debit card as my old one cracked into pieces. You are required to pay and it still takes them 2 weeks to get the card to you. In the meantime the latest version of the app has unpaired my account from my mobile so I cannot transfer my money to a usuable account. The only thing they can say on the chat is "be patient"!!Well patience gets you nowhere when you need to live.My advice, find a reliable bank because N26 is not. It shouldn't be allowed to call itself a bank when it is only a glorified prepaid debit card.
reply: Hey James, thanks for reaching out.The phone line is reserved to Metal users, but our customer service is available via LiveChat everyday including Sundays and bank holidays, from 07:00 to 23:00. Deliveries in some specific areas in the following countries (Estonia, Greece, Italy, Netherlands, Portugal, Slovakia and Spain) may take longer. Please consider this before taking any action regarding a card re-order.Also, note that you can order your card in Express, which takes 3 working days to arrive and costs 25 euros.We thank you for your understanding and hope this has been useful.Regards,Your N26 Team.

name: Olaf Gast
title: extrem schlechter "Service", Konto nicht erreichbar, Polizei bereits in Berliner Zentrale wegen wütendem Kunden
content: N26 ist sicher ein cooles schlankes Konzept, aber die sind einfach nicht erreichbar! 1 Jahr Nutzung, alles gut, obwohl die Kreditkarte erst 3 Monate nicht ankam. Nach 1 Jahr Nutzung und top Umsätzen sollte ich mich neu identifizieren, warum auch immer: das lief gut, aber ab da keinerlei Zugriff mehr auf die app. "Verification in progress", seit 8 Tagen ... Mein Kontostand etc.: nicht zugreifbar für mich!! Und: Klärung unmöglich! Telefon no chance, chat klappt seit Tagen nicht, mails gehen nicht, jedenfalls ohne Antwort ... ERGO: Der "Service" ist furchtbar, so daß mir weder diese "Bank" noch das schlanke Konzept was nutzen!Die Polizei war bereits laut Presse in der Berliner N26 Zentrale, weil ein israel. Kunde dort wütend auftauchte, weil er auch keinerlei Kontozugriff und Service bekam, analog "verification in progress"  Diese Bank könnte mangels Service einfach mal ins Visir der Bafin geraten und rechtlich untergehen, in Zeiten der prio des Kundenservice`, oder? Will man sich bei 3,5Mrd. Umsatz und bereits 1300 Mitarbeitern keinen einzigen Telefon-Supporter leisten? Findet man cool, daß zig Kunden so erneut "verifiziert" werden, daß danach keinerlei Kontozugriff mehr geht, trotz posit. "Verifikation"? Und wen will man anrufen, anmailen, oder wie chatten, wenns nicht geht? Untragbare "Bank", wenngleich aktuell ein hype!
reply: Hey Olaf, danke für dein Feedback.Die erneuten Verifikationen waren eine Sicherheitsdurchführung welche von der Bafin aufgetragen wurde um die Konten und unsere Durchführung der Sicherheit zu prüfen.Diese erneute Verifikation kann ganz einfach mit dem Ausweis durchgeführt werden, welchen du damals zur 1. Verifikation genommen hast.Solltest du in dieser Zeit einen neuen erhalten haben, liegt es in deiner Verantwortung diesen bei uns in der Datenbank aktualisieren zu lassen, sodass wir ihn für die Video-Verifikation erneut nutzen können.Dazu kannst du eine Email von deiner hinterlegten Email Adresse an Support@n26.com senden, mit deinem neuen Ausweis, welcher bei uns gespeichert wird, sodass der erneuten Verifikation nichts im Wege steht.Grüße, dein N26 Support-Team.

name: Robin Witney
title: It's a new Internet banking and for me…
content: It's a new Internet banking and for me it works if I have a problem it's soon sorted

name: Ovidiu Marian
title: All is fine and works..
content: All is fine and works... but there is a big minus, the direct debits. Direct debits will end up to be forced upon your account even if you do not have any money to cover the bill in the account and also even if you do not have any overdraft. So they will bounce the first time but in about 2 months time you can expect that this direct debits will be forced upon your account even if you don't have the money to pay them or have 0 money in your account. So you will be forced into minus and the next time money flows in your account it will be taken away. So be careful, especially if you are getting Hartz IV or if you are having a bad financial time.Update: NO, you have NO control over direct debits in this situation, it happened to me so it will happen to everybody, or am I a special case?
reply: Hi there, thanks for taking the time to let us know. Our mobile app is designed for you to stay up to  date on the amount you have in your account to avoid going into a negative balance. You are always in complete control of this. We take this sort of feedback very seriously, so we will be passing this on for you. Best,Your N26 Support Team

name: Sandra Kindt
title: Mit dem IPhone 5 sind keine…

reply: Hey Sandra, danke für dein Feedback.In diesem Fall, bitten wie dich aus Sicherheitsgründen unser Support-Team via Chat zu kontaktieren. Dort kann dir ein Agent weiterhelfen. Du kannst den Chat unten auf dieser Seite öffnen:https://support.n26.com/de-de/mach-mehr-mit-n26/sonstiges/psd2-und-starke-kundenauthentifizierung. Gruß, dein N26 Team.
