name: Brilix
title: Nel complesso bene, considerati l'uso e il costo zero
content: Procedura di richiesta facile e rapida. Mi hanno aperto il conto dopo mezzora, la carta è arrivata in 7 giorni lavorativi e ha un aspetto talmente minimalista e povero da risultare simpatica. Gli accrediti da bonifico sono lenti, ma il fatto che possano impiegare anche 2 o 3 giorni è scritto chiaro. Il conto ha alcuni limiti, parimenti ben evidenti nelle condizioni contrattuali che sono scritte in modo chiaro, con l'unico dubbio relativamente al fatto che il contratto è regolato dalla legge tedesca ( e dubito che chi non sia un avvocato internazionalista sia in grado di comprendere le conseguenze di ciò sul piano pratico). Per acquisti su internet e le spese da bancomat mi pare funzioni e nessuna banca "fisica", che io sappia,  fornisce tali servizi  a costo zero. La app e il sito, come tutte le cose, richiedono un minimo di esperienza e orientamento, ma a me sembrano chiari e ben fatti. La chat nella mia esperienza risponde subito, le risposte in effetti sono un po' stereotipate, con una tendenza a ripetere quello che sta scritto nelle FAQ, ma con un po' di pazienza si arriva al risultato. Salvo un caso isolato di uno che mi ha chiuso la comunicazione mentre scrivevo la domanda, sono stati tutti gentili.  Usandolo nel modo giusto per quello che offre, e salvo sorprese, il giudizio del conto è positivo. A maggior ragione considerando i costi delle banche con una sede fisica, che hanno molto ridotto il personale e tendono comunque a far fare autonomamente al cliente tutte le operazioni.

name: Pamela Yañez Castillo
title: AWFUL BANK AND CONTACT SERVICE
content: This bank has been a nightmare. The re-verification process didn't work out because I'm not living in Germany anymore, I opened my account with my Chilean passport but now is no supported, so they just freeze my account and now I can't get access to my money. They sent me an email so they can close my account and send the remaining funds as soon as I give a new IBAN. I did that 2 weeks ago! This electronic bank is a JOKE. Contact support is not helpful at all they just ask for your email and after a few security questions they just say, "sorry the cancelations departments work independently from us, we don't have access to the info". I'm so angry, I just want my money back. But no one gives a solution.
reply: Hey Pamela, we are very sorry to read about your experience with us. As a licenced bank, we’re legally obligated to request customers to verify their identity at regular intervals. If you sent your cancellation request, it will be taken into account by the relevant department and you will receive a reply once your account has been closed and your funds sent to your IBAN. There is indeed no way for our customer service agents to make this process quicker. We are sorry about this.We thank you for your understanding.Regards,Your N26 Team.

name: Carl Carrano
title: Do not bother about this bank if you…
content: Do not bother about this bank if you have an american mobile phone number. You need to be able to receive text messages to login and they cannot seem to figure out how to send such to a US number despite the fact that everyone else on earth can. Their website says contact customer service if you have a US number but when you do you get twenty different stories ands weeks of run around with the utimate bottom line that they can' fix it and you have to have a EU phone number. Do not waste your two weeks like I did. They are useless.
reply: Hi Carl, thanks for the feedback. We do apologise for that. However, we have since resolved the issue. You just need to come on the chat from within the app or support center and we can get this sorted for you.Best,Your N26 Support Team

name: Tomas
title: Stolen card
content: Stolen card. It's the only bank which charges you for issuing a new card in case of robbery. I cannot understand that. Strongly will recommend you to choose other electronic banks.
reply: Hey Tomas, we are very sorry to read about your experience with us.The fee will be charged for the replacement of cards which were lost, stolen or misappropriated or in case of other unauthorised use of the card. This does not apply, where the circumstances that haveled to the replacement are imputable to the Bank or where the Bank is responsible for these circumstances. In other cases, the fee will only be charged if the issuing of a replacement card resultsfrom circumstances for which you bear responsibility and under which we are not legally obliged to supply a replacement card.You can find more informations about this here : https://docs.n26.com/legal/01+DE/01+Account/en/13account-pricelist-en.pdf We thank you for your understanding.Regards,Your N26 Team.

name: Leah Williams
title: Nightmare Bank
content: I admit that I was pretty naive when I signed up for n26.  As an American expat living in Europe I found the traditional banks slow, bureaucratic, and difficult to work with.  N26 seemed like the perfect answer.  I was interested primarily in the convenience it offers.What I should have been more concerned about was accountability.  With n26, there is none.  There isn't anyone you can go to if something goes wrong.Something went very wrong, in my case.  And because n26 support is such a black hole I still can't really even say what it was.Essentially, I was frozen out of my app and then the web account went too.  I'm not some nefarious character and don't have any financial irregularities: I get a regular paycheck and pay rent and utilities every month, go to the same grocery stores, etc.  I have a US passport and a German Blue Card.  I'm not sure how my account was flagged but it was.And every interaction with support has ranged from frustrating to miserable as I explain again and again how I need to access my account.  After two weeks of this--contacting support every single day--I was told that my account needed to be closed and to send an email to support to transfer the funds.  This was over a week ago and still I have not received any of my money back or any kind of update.  It took another two hours and four separate support chats this morning just to verify that my email was received.  But the agent STILL could not say when I would receive my funds.In the meantime, I am unable to receive my paycheck, pay my rent or bills - life has ground to a halt.  I've never been in this position before.  So please, before you sign up for n26, consider the worst case scenario.  And if convenience really means that much to you, ensure you've got a backup account somewhere else.
reply: Hey Leah, thank you for taking the time to write this review.We are sorry to read about your experience with us. We apologise for your situation, but as a fully-fledged bank, N26 must submit itself to banking regulations in place. Said regulation is aimed at protecting our users and we never close an account without warning you and always have a reason to do so.If your account is closed, you'll be contacted by email. Please note that from this point, our Customer Service agents will not be able to give you any informations as your case will be handled by our Backoffice department. You won't encounter issues when using your bank account if you don't breach our terms and conditions. Thank you for your understanding.Best,Your N26 team

reply: Danke für dein Feedback und entschuldige bitte die Unannehmlichkeiten. Dieses Upgrade ist aufgrund der EU-Vorschriften zur Sicherheit für PSD2, die N26 erfüllen muss, erforderlich. Im Juli 2019 haben wir angefangen unsere Kunden darüber zu informieren, dass sie aufgrund regulatorischer Veränderungen der EU bezüglich PSD2 ihre App aktualisieren müssen, um den Sicherheitsanforderungen zu entsprechen. Wenn du mehr darüber lesen willst, dann kannst du das hier machen: https://support.n26.com/de-de/mach-mehr-mit-n26/sonstiges.Gruß, dein N26 Team.

name: Karsten Esser
title: Unseriöser Umgang mit Kunden
content: 1. Kontoeröffnung - alles problemlos, schnellend unkompliziert.2. Banking - per app einfache Handhabung aber fehleranfällig2. KundenserviceHier muss ich leider mehr schreiben. In den Monaten April bis August diesen Jahres habe ich einige Beträge, die meinem Girokonto belastet wurden zurückbuchen lassen.Soweit so gut. Am 12.09. wurden genau diese Beträge wieder dem Konto belastet. Leider konnte ich sie nun aber nicht zurückbuchen, da sich die Referenzbuchungen auf Ein Datum älter als 8 Wochen beziehen. Also habe ich den Chat mit einem Mitarbeiter gestartet um alles zu klären. Man verwies mich auf den nächsten Monat, da hier wohl ein technischer Fehler vorläge, der nur von der entsprechenden Abteilung geklärt werden kann. Man sagte mir aber auch einen Rückruf auf Kulanz zu (persönliche Gespräche sind nicht Leistungen außerhalb der teuren Mitgliedschaft (16 EUR monatlich). Also wartete ich. Es tat sich nichts. Weder Erledigung noch Rückruf. Also startete ich immer wieder einen Chat um eine Klärung herbei zu führen. Doch ich erhielt immer nur die gleichen Antworten (teilweise mit den gleichen Rechtschreibfehlern). Ich wurde immer nur vertröstet. Am Donnerstag schrieb ich per Fax die Geschäftsführung an (ist ja eine GmbH). Und siehe da, am Freitag erhielt ich um 11.30 einen Rückruf. Man entschuldigte sich bei mir und meinte, dass man eine Lösung gefunden hätte und ich bekäme innerhalb von 24 Stunden die ca.1.000 EUR wieder gutgeschrieben.Auch dieses Versprechen wurde nicht eingehalten. Bei einem erneuten Versuch, heute eine Antwort per Chat zu bekommen, musste ich mich wider mit Textbausteinen zufrieden geben. Von einem Dienstleister erwarte ich, dass gerade bei nachweislichen Fehlern sofort gehandelt wird und vor allem, dass offen kommuniziert wird. Ich erwarte aber nicht, dass man Geld einzieht und sich danach auf "Tauchstation" begibt. Diese Vorgehensweise kenne ich nur von Personen, die schlicht das Geld zur Rückzahlung nicht haben und nicht den Respekt haben, dies auch zuzugeben.Ich kann nach diesen Erfahrungen nur abraten, hier ein Konto zu eröffnen. Nach meiner Recherche häufen sich solche Erfahrungen in der letzten Zeit und zeigen auf, dass N26 einfach noch nicht so weit ist, wie sie sagen.
reply: Hey Karten, danke für dein Feedback.Bei allen Rücklastschriften, besonders jene, welche schon länger als 8 Wochen alt sind, müssen die Kollegen natürlich die kompletten Transaktionen durchgehen um sicher zu gehen, dass das Geld nicht bereits von dir selbst zurückgebucht worden ist durch den Button in der App.Inzwischen wurde alles behoben, sodass dies nicht wieder vorkommen wird und alles mit den Händlern besprochen wird, welche noch offene Lastschriften forderten.Grüße, dein N26 Support-Team.

name: Giacomo Piliego
title: The worst customer service ever....
content: The worst customer service ever....I checked wether I was an eligible user first. Then I attempted to create an account by completing the process of scanning my passport.Something went wrong (possibly because the app did not recognize my official government passport) and I got blocked.Tried again but evidently my data had been flagged. I got prompted to contact customer support. I do just that and the very unhelpful chat boy tells me to write an email to have the account unlocked. I do that and receive no response (for 3 months that is). Finally I get around to contact the customer service again. Chat girl is online this time, asks all bunch of security questions and finally tells me that she cannot help and she will contact an internal department to get this fixed. Chat girl says that I will receive and email and before I can type “but”... she’s gone... I doubt I will ever receive an email or any sign from these folks.Customer service paints the picture of a company. Do the math...
reply: Hey, thank you for reaching out. We are very sorry to read about the experience you've had with us. Could you please send us an email at : support@n26.com from your address linked to your account so we'll be able to read your past interactions, understand exactly the issue and get back to you with a solution ?We thank you for your patience and sincerely apologise again.Regards,Your N26 Team.

name: Nino Kucurski
title: Same customer representative  hangup…
content: Same customer representative  hangup two times during verification process.She  was arrogant, impatient,cold person.She definitely is not for this kind of job.I hope that someone listen that calls. Terrible weekend  experience.How you treated us,on same way you can except how we will treated you.
reply: Hey Nino, Even though we are very sorry to learn about your experience we would like to thank you for your feedback.Please contact us at support@n26.com , and feel free to report anything you feel like, we will do everything in our power to solve your situation and to improve our service.Of course we do not believe it is your fault if something didn't quite go as intended, we are sorry if we made you feel that way.Thanks again for the time you put for writing this feedback and we are looking forward to have the chance to support you again.Regards,Your N26 Team.

Make you own mind up do your research, I’m very happy with my decision.

name: Lukas Pop
title: Finger weg von den Betrügern!!!!
content: Finger weg von den Betrügern.Ich bin mittlerweile jetzt schon fast 2 Jahre bei N26.Anfang hatten die echt ein gutes Konzept. Banking nur mit dem Handy. Perfekt für mich als Student. Jedoch hats sich in letzter Zeit vieles verändert.Unter anderem hat N26 keine Kundenhotline mehr. Mann kann da einfach nicht anrufen. Wenn man Probleme mit der Karte oder dem Konto an sich hat muss man die über die im Chat konaktieren. Der Verbindungsaufbau klappt jedoch bei 500 Versuchen vielleicht nur ein einziges mal. Und wenn mans dann mal geschafft hat, dann brauchen die mindestens 10 Minuten um auf ne Frage zu antworten und in den aller meisten Fällen können die einem auch nicht helfen. Der Kundenservice per Mail ist ebenfall miserabel. Auf eine Anfrage von mir bekam ich eine Antwort erst nach ganzen 2 Wochen! Ich möchte doch einfach einen ganz normalen Kundenservice haben, wie bei jeder 0815 Bank auch, wo man jeder Zeit anrufen kann und einem geholfen wird.Wie viele andere auch habe ich ebenfalls Probleme mit dem Lastschrifteinzug. Im Juni konnte eine Lastschrift nicht eingezogen werden (bzw. ich hab absichtlich kein Geld eingezahlt weil der Einzug nicht autorisiert war). Schön und gut, aber vor einer Woche aus dem nichts haben die wieder das Geld abgebucht. Aber diesmal war es nicht der Gläuber der damals versuchte die 250€ abzuheben, nein, diesmal ist es N26 die mir einfach so das Geld abgezogen hat. Der Gläuber hat mir auf Nachfrage bestätigt das er keine Zahlung erhalten hat. Das Geld hat sich einfach aufgelöst. 250€ und das als Stundent ist verfammt viel. Und der absolut schlechte Kundenservice antworter ebenfalls nicht. Lastschriften kann man in der App auch nicht zurück geben. Wurde also einfach bestohlen. Wahrscheinlich pleite? Finger weg von den Betrügern!!

name: Anders Brix Serup
title: Horrible bank!!!
content: I would strongly recommend for anyone to stay far away from this bank. They change the agreements with you without telling you and they have the ABSOLUTE WORST and most rude service people in the world. You get no help at all if you have an issue. Stay far far away!!!

name: Thomas H
title: N26 ... für mich Geschichte
content: Hatte gestern das selbe Problem wie viele andere,Lastschriften, die schon eingezogen wurden, wurdeneinfach erneut Eingezogen. Ohne Möglichkeit der Rückbuchung.Bin gespannt ob diese Wirklich beim "Empfänger" angekommen sind.Es wurden gestern mal ganz spontan Lastschriften von ca.1200 Euro eingezogen. Kann jetzt N26 echt niemanden mehr empfehlen.Ich wechsele jetzt auch wieder zu einer Vernünftigen Bankdie ihr Handwerk versteht.
reply: Hey, danke für dein Feedback.Unsere Hotline ist nur für den absoluten Notfall und für Metal Kunden gedacht. Wenn du ein Metal Kunde bist, dann findest du die Hotline Nummer in deiner Mobile App.Derzeit gibt es ein hohes Anliegen an Kunden im Live Chat, weshalb es zu längeren Wartezeiten kommen kann. Wir versuchen immer unser Bestes um Kundenanfragen zu schnell wie möglich zu bearbeiten. Dein Feedback wird weitergeleitet. Wir nehmen gerne alle Informationen zu den Lastschriften auf.  Bitte sende uns doch eine private Nachricht an unseren N26_Support Twitter Account: https://twitter.com/N26_Support?s=09 oder über unseren Facebook Account: https://www.facebook.com/N26DE/. Gruß, dein N26 Team.

name: Carla Head

content: Easy to set up. Everything explained upfront. A simple but easy to use bank account.
reply: Hey, thank you for taking the time to write this review.Please contact us at support@n26.com , and feel free to report anything you feel like, we will do everything in our power to solve your situation and to improve our service.Regards,Your N26 Team.

name: Jörg Schlingmann
title: Sehr Unseriöse Bank
content: Sehr Unseriöse Bank! Kontakt zum Kundenservice nur über Chat möglich. Falls mal überhaupt erreichbar, mieser Kundensupport.Absolute Katastrophen Bank! Kann nur davon abraten, modernes Online Banking sieht anders aus!
reply: Hey Thomas, danke für dein Feedback.Bei allen Rücklastschriften, besonders jene, welche schon länger als 8 Wochen alt sind, müssen die Kollegen natürlich die kompletten Transaktionen durchgehen um sicher zu gehen, dass das Geld nicht bereits von dir selbst zurückgebucht worden ist durch den Button in der App.Inzwischen wurde alles behoben, sodass dies nicht wieder vorkommen wird und alles mit den Händlern besprochen wird, welche noch offene Lastschriften forderten.Grüße, dein N26 Support-Team.

name: Stephan
title: N26 hat 6 Lastschriften erneut…
content: N26 hat 6 Lastschriften erneut eingezogen, die Monate zurück liegen, diese können nicht storniert werden. Die Bank scheint insolvent, rettet euer Geld und nehmt es vom Konto. Der Fall wurde jetzt an den Anwalt übergeben und eine Anzeige wegen des Verdachts der Unterschlagung erwirkt.
reply: Hey Stephan, danke für dein Feedback.Bei allen Rücklastschriften, besonders jene, welche schon länger als 8 Wochen alt sind, müssen die Kollegen natürlich die kompletten Transaktionen durchgehen um sicher zu gehen, dass das Geld nicht bereits von dir selbst zurückgebucht worden ist durch den Button in der App.Inzwischen wurde alles behoben, sodass dies nicht wieder vorkommen wird und alles mit den Händlern besprochen wird, welche noch offene Lastschriften forderten.Grüße, dein N26 Support-Team.

name: Rinske Zijsling
title: Reality check
content: What they'll sell you:Business You account, THE account for traveling working freelancers! 1 business card and one card for your personal expanses! So convenient! And an insurance too! And yes, after you explained your personal situation as a digital nomad I still totally recommend this account for you! You want this, you need this look at all these fancy colored cards!Reality:- The personal card for personal expanses is a Maestro card. You can’t pay abroad with a Maestro for your daily coffe, shoppings, hotel stays or anything else. You can order things online. Or withdrawl money. So you can walk the streets with a lot of cash money in your pockets. Feeling unsafe. Oh and of course you have to pay an exchange rate everytime you withdraw. Yes, you will pay hundreds of extra euro’s a year for that.- This is Online banking but you, dear traveling working freelancer, need a mobile cellphone number in every country you will travel to. You can’t log in or use support chat if you don’t have one. Even better, we’ll freeze your account. And no we will not get back to you about your complaint about that in de chat. Nor help you with that. You can ofcourse use your expensive phone contract from your home country. Problem solved right?- The ensurance is just for 3 months at a time max. Good luck with that full time remote worker.- Oh and if you buy something, let’s say a camera in Japan. We’ll take that money from your account twice. And return that 2nd payment 10 days later. And yes we do that every time. You don’t mind do you?  - And you didn’t really think we would actually help you with ANYTHING in the chat did you….
reply: Hi Rinske, Thanks for taking the time to leave your feedback.It is possible to use your N26 You Business Mastercard for personal expenses if you so wish. We recommend using the Maestro should you want to distinguish purchases between the two cards, but you are free to use your Mastercard as you see fit. The withdrawal fee of 1.7% in a foreign currency is waived if you are a You account holder, however the Mastercard currency conversion rate will still apply. We accept international phone numbers, so there is no need to change between numbers if you are travelling. It is not necessary to be logged in to use the support chat, as you can access the live chat from directly within the N26 support center. You can also use live chat from our webapp on a desktop: https://app.n26.com/loginIf you find yourself being double charged in a certain country and this puts you in any sort of financial difficulty, please reach out to us immediately on live chat so that we can ensure these funds are returned to you as soon as possible.Best Regards, Your N26 Support Team

name: Michelangelo Cariolo
title: You need to do an upgrade to make…
content: You need to do an upgrade to make possible save account details (bank account a d sort code) to make easy the payments
reply: Hey, thank you for your feedback !As a Mobile Bank, it is very important to us to insure great services on the app. Updates are indeed mandatory in order for you to keep using N26, and for everything to work.This said, we are always looking to improve the quality of our services and if you have any idea on how to improve your experience, please send us an email at : ideas@n26.com and we'll make sure to forward your suggestions to the relevant teams.Regards,Your N26 Team.

name: Pascal Vandersteegen
title: J'attend ma carte pour pouvoir me faire…
content: J'attend ma carte pour pouvoir me faire une idée sur les services de N26  au fait j'ai pas bien regarder vous n'avez pas de compte épargne je pense   ca serait peut-être bien de prévoir celà ;)Rajout commentaire:  service clientèle impeccable suite à un léger problème de compte, celui-ci a été résolut dans les 2h00.Parfait.

name: florian pezet
title: First app ever seen !
content: First app ever seen !Since the update of the app everything is going wrong. My phone wasn't recognize as a paired device anymore, only solution is to receive an sms code. The system doesnt work and I never received any sms.I'm abroad travelling and without access to my money... I let you imagine the chaos.So I search for help and try to contact the support (there's no phone number). And that's where the fun begin, tried for days to contact them never worked. It appears to was because it doesnt work on my samsung S9 ... thankfully I could use my iPad. One time out of two you deal with an AI who doesnt help you, sometimes they just hang up on you.Finally after days they solve my problem, I'm relieved and happy ... for 6hrs !!! Same problem go on again, phone not paired anymore, doesnt receive the SMS.I'm actually trying to get someone on the support chat.Don't go to this bank you would only regret it !!I'm gonna send the email to close my account !!
reply: Hey Florian, we are very sorry about this situation.If you do not have access to your N26 app, you can always start a LiveChat with us by clicking on "Open a chat" at the bottom of the following page : https://support.n26.com/en-de/fixing-an-issue/other/how-to-contact-n26Our agents can help you everyday (including Sundays and bank holidays) from 07:00 to 23:00.We thank you for your understanding and hope this answer was useful.Best,Your N26 Team.

name: Djellila
title: Service client nickel
content: J’ai contacté le service client au alentour de 22h55 et on a quand même répond à ma demande malgré que l’horaire d’ouverture soit dépassé

name: Stranded  in NYC
title: No security or support form n26
content: Recently was scammed online.  The scammers used the n26 payment portal.  Two chat agents have ignored my explanation and closed chats on me without answering my questions.  They got back to me days later saying there was nothing they could do.  No explanation or details have been provided.  I've been a customer for years and the one time I really need help they're not there for me.  Still waiting for some kind of explanation. . . .PS the agent said there was no way to reach them by phone.  A quick google will show you that that's not the case.
reply: Hi,We're sorry to learn of this situation.If you have made a card payment to someone else and you do not receive your goods, or they are not as advertised, it is possible to dispute this via a Chargeback. This is a relatively simple process where we dispute the card charge with Mastercard to claim your funds back. The chargeback process also applies if your card has been stolen or used where you did not authorise it. If you have sent funds via a bank transfer, the necessary step would be to initiate a Payment Investigation to track the funds. As you have to confirm a bank transfer yourself from within your own mobile app, and enter your unique PIN, it can be more difficult to retrieve the funds, but a Payment Investigation can be started.It is possible to contact us via phone from directly within your mobile app if you are an N26 Metal customer. You can contact us 24/7 in English via live chat from your mobile app, web app, or through the N26 Support Center.Best Regards,Your N26 Support Team

name: Gi. No.
title: Come si deve fare? Bisogna laurearsi in telefonia?
content: Sto cercando di aprire un conto ma ho problemi con i devices che uso. Via pc arriva ad un certo punto e poi chiede lo smartphone o il tablet... con smartphone: (KitKat 4.4.2 e l'app giusta) continua a dire che i dati sono sbagliati, ma non è vero dato che con tablet (che però ha MM 6.0) mi fa entrare e poi si blocca all'ultimo passaggio. Chiamo a telefono per un aiuto e ... è uno scherzo? Dicono di rivolgersi alla chat online! Ma se non riesco ad accedere come faccio?Aggiungo oggi 21.09 che chi continua a sminuire gli utenti "fregati" è sicuramente un pagato per fornire falsità e fare accedere altri malcapitati!22.10: per fortuna bastavano 10 minuti! Comunque vi invito anche qui a cancellare i miei dati perché ho nel frattempo provveduto e non ho avuito tutti quei problemi.Grazie ugualmente
reply: Ciao, grazie per il tuo feedback.Siamo spiacenti di apprendere della tua esperienza con N26, chiaramente non è questa l'idea che proponiamo ai nostri clienti.Nel tuo caso qualcosa è andato storto, da quello che ci segnali il tuo smartphone non soddisfaceva i nostri requisiti minimi di sicurezza (android 6.0 o superiore).Riguardo il tuo tablet, bisognerebbe esaminare il modello e la marca del dispositivo e cercare di capire cos'ha bloccato la tua operazione di iscrizione.Puoi accedere alla chat online anche da un altro dispositivo (ad esempio un comune computer con browser Chrome) a questo indirizzo:https://support.n26.com/it-it/come-iniziare/altro/come-contattare-n26 . Saremo felici di aiutarti. Buona giornata

title: Great bank with decent customer…
content: Great bank with decent customer service. N26 are constantly improving and as a new customer from a foreign country I found the whole sign-up experience to be excellent and their overall customer care to be improving. Love using the card and bank - being in total control over my money is such a huge plus and thoroughly enjoy that N26 has basically allowed me to take control over my money!

name: Giorgio Bonfiglio
title: Avoid.
content: Reported a serious issue with their service, they have been telling me for about three years that they are investigating and will get back to me soon.I would happily continue the negative review but support team lying and going silent should be enough to avoid a company. There are better alternatives to N26.
reply: Hey Georgio,We apologise for the negative experience that you had with our customer service. We do our best to train each of our representatives on how to properly handle our customers’ issues, including how to escalate problems that they are unable to assist with. We understand your disappointment, and apologize for any inconvenience that this may have caused you.You can send us an email to support@n26.com via the email address you registered your account with. We will then take it from there. You can also contact our chat directly within the mobile app and webapp or from certain Support Center articles about opening an account (Available via our support center from a computer.) We also offer support on Twitter.Best,Your N26 Support Team

name: Audrey Bouvier
title: Stay away
content: Stay away! Terrible customer service. You cannot talk to anyone beside by chat after waiting for an hour and trying 3 times to resolve an issue and they always find a new step to delay the procedure. They use an unsecured method to verify your identity. Like going to a ATM and type a wrong PIN. Well, duh anyone can do that if they steal my card and purse with passport. Then they can't verify what you did because they don't think about ATM fees or exchange fees added. So you stay 1h waiting each time for nothing and you are stuck out of your account, everything is based on your phone app.The agent shut me off at the end because I was telling her how insecure their method was. I still can't access my funds and worrying to have provided all my personal information to chat people thru internet connections now and still not have access to my money. My husband also can't access his own account as the new app is not compatible with his phone so they asked him to buy a new phone. Unbelievable. The day we can access our accounts again, we move everything out!
reply: Hi Audrey, we do apologise for the experience you had. Sounds like there was some miscommunication here. We take this sort of feedback very seriously, so we will be passing this on for you. We would be happy to help you if you contact us via our Twitter Support. An agent will be glad to help out.Best,Your N26 Support Team

Some competitors offer several accounts at the same time (for example UK+EU+US), which makes it easier to transfer money into another acc.

Pourtant leur CGU stipule que même en clôture immédiate un délai est accordé.Pratiques strictement illégales.Je n'ai commis aucune infraction à leur CGU,tout est en règle.De plus rien ne justifie une clôture immédiate de compte dans mon cas.Un signalement à la banque de France ainsi qu'à L'OCBF et à L'ABE(autorité bancaire européenne) s'impose.

title: 1 etoile pour la gratuite
content: passe a 1 etoile service incompetent un virement qui n arrive pas, ce compte m'est devenu inutile
reply: Bonjour,Toutes les transactions bancaires sur votre compte N26, qu’elles soient entrantes ou sortantes, sont régies dans le cadre du SEPA, le réseau de paiement européen.Le SEPA stipule que les virements et les prélèvements automatiques vers et à partir de comptes SEPA doivent être exécutés dans le délai d'un jour ouvrable bancaire. Cette règle s'applique à tous les virements nationaux et internationaux d'un compte SEPA à un autre.Notez que, selon les horaires d’ouverture des banques participantes, un jour bancaire ouvrable peut représenter jusqu'à deux jours ouvrables.Si le virement que vous avez effectué semble hors délais, nous vous invitons à contacter directement la banque émettrice afin de lancer une investigation bancaire. Nous ne pouvons pas procéder à une investigation bancaire pour un virement entrant. Cordialement,Support N26

content: €15/£15 with code    davidhap1193 I'm delighted thus far. Sign up went without a hitch and card arrived a few days later. Activated it and received €15.  Been using a month now and it's been flawless.

name: Nathalie ficot
title: Je trouve la banque bonne
content: Je trouve la banque bonne

Si vous avez des préoccupations ou des suggestions, n'hésitez pas à nous contacter à l'adresse support@n26.comCordialement,Support N26

name: Keyvan Firouzi
title: By a mistake my friend helped me open a…
content: By a mistake my friend helped me open a N26 you account. I found out that it is a wrong account when I saw a negativ balance. I didn't understood why it is negative. I contacted the customer service and found out the account is N26 You. I wrote them to close the account it is a mistake. But the answer I got was I had 14 days to that and now it is too late and I must pay for one year or 10 € a month fees to close the account or just keep it until one year is finished. Why they don't charge you from the beginning. It's not a bank. They are a new kind of thieves. The last answer I got from the customer service (Hey Keyvan,Thanks for your reply. We've received your cancellation request. However, we're not able to proceed with the cancellation because you have 11 monthly payments remaining for a total of 108,90 €.Please make sure you have sufficient funds in your N26 account so we can deduct the fees and end your N26 Metal as soon as possible.Have a great day,WojciechN26 Customer ServiceN26 Bank GmbH | Managing Directors: Markus Gunter, Richard GroeneveldKurfürstenstraße 72 | 10787 Berlin | GermanyHRB ID: 170602B (Berlin District Court Charlottenburg) | VAT ID: DE 30/595/7096) DO NOT OPEN An ACCOUNT IN THIS PLACE.
reply: Hey Keyvan, when you sign up for an account you have to accept the terms and conditions of signing for a premium account such as You. It states in this process, that there is a 14 day period in which you can cancel. Apologies if you missed this deadline. We will pass on your feedback.Best,Your N26 support team.

name: Marcelo Brigato Junior
title: Great experience!
content: It is sad to read some of the "bad" reviews in here for these guys.You have to bear in mind, they are still a bank and have to adhere to security protocols for our safety.I imagine there must be easier and simpler ways to do it, however, compared to "traditional" banks, they are extremely simple and effective.I definitely recommend it.

name: Sylvia Brinded Püls
title: It’s been a year and nothing has happened
content: For a year it hasn’t been possible to activate my card. After getting a new phone I haven’t been able to link my account to the new phone and without an activated card I can’t do that. So for months I haven’t been able to access my account, let alone my money! In the support chat they said I had to email them which I did. After giving them every information they needed they said they couldn’t help me any further via email and I had to use the chat using a reference number. After doing so the person said he couldn’t help me and they would email me. When I asked to check in my records on my issues (another request I had sent months earlier was to send me a letter via post where it would show my address for registration purposes in my new home) he said that there was nothing showing and I just had to wait for them to email me. I’ve never experienced such bad customer service and little knowledge. I’ve spoken to at least 10 different people in the last year and nothing has happened so far! All I want now is my money and to close the account! I can not recommend this bank AT ALL!!!
reply: Hi there, sorry you had a bad experience. Thanks for taking the time to let us know. We take this sort of feedback very seriously, so we will be passing this on for you. We would be happy to help you if you contact us via our Twitter Support. An agent will be glad to help out and get this escalated for you.Best,Your N26 Support Team

name: Kateryna
title: Keinen Zugang zum eigenem Konto
content: Seit Mitte August habe ich keinen Zugang zu meinem Geld... Ich habe N26 Girokonto seit November 2017 und war eigentlich zufrieden... bis einen bestimmten Zeitpunkt. Ich habe die E-Mail von N26 erhalten wo steht dass ich re-verification machen soll. Ich habe das in meinem App durchgeführt.. und wurde sofort von dem App rausgeschmissen - mit der Information dass mein Land (ich komme aus der Ukraine) bei N26 nicht mehr akzeptiert ist. Was ist das für eine Diskriminierung? Ich habe online Support kontaktiert und Aussage bekommen dass es leider so ist und ich muss mein Konto schließen. Natürlich habe ich sofort ein neues Konto in „normalem“ Bank geöffnet. Es hat aber natürlich gedauert. In der Zeit hatte ich keinen Zugang zu meinem Geld und konnte sogar meine Wohnung nicht bezahlen obwohl ich eigentlich genug Geld auf dem Konto habe! Nach der Anfrage mein N26 Konto zu schließen und das Geld zum neuen Konto zu überweisen, hat es auch lange gedauert bis jemanden von N26 auf meine E-Mail reagiert. Jetzt warte ich auf mein Geld seit 2,5 Wochen und habe immer weniger Hoffnung dass ich es wieder bekomme... Keiner antwortet mehr entweder im Chat oder per E-Mail...Es ist echt traurig, dass in so einen sicheren Land wie Deutschland so eine unsichere Finanzinstitute existieren - hätte ich niemals gedacht, dass sowas passieren konnte, dass man sein 2 Jahren gesammeltes Geld einfach nicht zugreifen kann! Ich kann leider dieses Bank nicht weiterempfehlen. Habe bereits einen Termin bei Verbraucherzentrale gemacht...
reply: Hey Kateryna, danke für dein Feedback.Aus Sicherheitsgründen oder Bearbeitungsgründen können wir nicht alle Dokumente akzeptieren.Wenn neue Dokumente eines Landes herausgebracht werden, müssen wir diese erstmal in unserem System einspeichern, die Sicherheit gewährleisten, dass unser System die Dokumente akzeptieren kann.Wenn es diesbezüglich Änderungen gibt, nehmen wir alle Veränderungen vor, weshalb diese in dieser Zeit nicht genutzt werden können, bis wir diese in unserer Datenbank gespeichert haben und für die Kunden zur Nutzung der Verifizierung genutzt werden können.Sobald die Ukrainischen Dokumente wieder akzeptiert werden können, findest du diese hier: https://support.n26.com/de-de/erste-schritte/persoenliche-daten/wie-kann-ich-mich-ausweisenGrüße, dein N26 Support-Team.

name: bp
title: Une véritable bande de blaireaux
content: Une véritable bande de blaireaux, il n'y a pas d'autres mots pour les qualifier ! Tout un bordel pour modifier le numéro, avec des conseillers incompétents, et qui ne maîtrisent même pas la langue française ! Je passe des meilleurs, avec leur manière archaïque de procéder ..Conclusion, deux jours à contacter des incapables sur prétendu "livechat" pour obtenir un code, recevoir un appel d'un type plutôt impoli, pour modifier mon numéro de portable et refaire la synchro, oui, tout ça pour ça, mais à la fin, il a rentré un mauvais numéro, du coup c'est comme si je n'avais rien fait !!!Ah et oui, j'ai voulu contacter les pseudo agents incompétents, et pareil, ça quitte la discussion sans prévenir, comme bon leur semble !!Une véritable arnaque, des incapables, et tout sauf recommandable ! Une des pires néobanques du marché
reply: Bonjour,Nous nous excusons pour l'expérience négative que vous avez rencontré avec notre service clientèle. Nous donnons notre 100% chaque jour pour nous assurer  les besoins de nos clients. Nous faisons de notre mieux pour former chacun de nos représentants sur la manière de traiter correctement les problèmes de nos clients, y compris sur la résolution des problèmes qu’ils ne peuvent pas résoudre. Nous apprécions votre retour car cela nous permettra d’améliorer nos services et opérations. Pouvez-vous débuter un chat à partir de notre centre de support? Un de nos agents se chargera de vous venir en aide pour corriger votre numéro de téléphone.Vous pouvez également vous connecter au Livechat en consultant certains articles de notre Support Center relatifs à l’ouverture d’un compte. Voici le lien de notre chat: https://support.n26.com/fr-fr/vos-debuts/compte/comment-ouvrir-un-compte-n26Cordialement,Support N26

name: Jo Leon
title: Initial set up
content: Very quick response Very polite concise and helpful Thank you Monzo!

name: Peter
title: Habe Lastschriften zurückgegeben und…
content: Habe Lastschriften zurückgegeben und die Erstattung erhalten jetzt nach 8 Wochen werden die Lastschriften erneut abgebucht und ich kann die Lastschriften nicht mehr zurückbuchen. Aussage der Bank ich soll mich an den Empfänger wenden.
reply: Hey Peter, danke für dein Feedback.Bitte melde dich im Kundensupport-Chat, inzwischen haben wir diesen Prozess angepasst, sodass wir dir das Geld von unserer Seite aus zurückholen können.Die Kollegen werden die Transaktionen kontrollieren und bereits bezahlte Transaktionen natürlich erstatten .Grüße, dein N26 Support-Team.

name: Mergey
title: Très bonne expérience jusqù àttend…
content: Très bonne expérience jusqù àttend réponse du support pour valider,

name: Maoboy J-E
title: J’ai contacté N26
content: J’ai contacté N26, pour un souci et j’ai eu une conseillère, qui a été vraiment professionnel, elle a tout fait pour régler le souci.Elle a été à l’écoute, consciencieuse, vraiment  le service client N26 m’a épaté.

name: Martine Boitelle
title: J aimerais pouvoir communiquer des que…
content: J aimerais pouvoir communiquer des que j en aurais besoin pour avoir tous les renseignements dont j aurais besoin au bon moment. D avance merci. Cordialement. VERHILLE Martine

name: Matthias Müller
title: Vor einer Woche wurden Lastschriften…
content: Vor einer Woche wurden Lastschriften aus dem Mai und Juni diesen Jahres eingelöst. Warum auch immer, das kann mir bei der N26 keiner erklären. Das geld ist aber niemals bei den Gläubigern angekommen. Keine Ahnung wo mein Geld gerade rumschwirrt. Bei der N26 kann und will man mir das nicht beantworten. Rückrufe bekomme ich nicht und sobald der Support nicht weiter weiß, wird der Kontakt abgebrochen. Das ist alles so unfassbar.
reply: Hey Matthias, danke für dein Feedback. Für die Unannehmlichkeiten möchten wir uns entschuldigen. Wir nehmen gerne alle Informationen zu den Lastschriften auf und leiten diese für dich weiter. Bitte sende uns eine private Nachricht an unseren N26_Support Twitter Account: https://twitter.com/N26_Support?s=09 oder über unseren Facebook Account: https://www.facebook.com/N26DE/. Gruß, dein N26 Team.

name: Jonathan Proffit
title: Sans tracas, et totalement gratuit
content: Simplicité, gratuité et réactivité à la pointe de mes attentes.Vous créer votre compte gratuitement, sans modalité exacerbé quand dans les autres banques.J'ai personnellement recu ma mastercard en trois jours.Génial, non?

name: eugine genius
title: Quanti statt qualli...
content: Quanti statt qualli...Geld eingang und ausgang okey aber der Support ist Mülldie Bank spart am Falschen ende!!!falls du jemals ein Problem haben solltest dann wirst du bei n26 keine Hilfe finden
reply: Hey Eugine,danke für deine ehrlichen Worte.Wir arbeiten ständig daran unseren Kundenservice zu verbessern, damit wir euch die bestmögliche Benutzererfahrung und den bestmöglichen Kundenservice liefern können. Schicke uns doch bitte eine private Nachricht an unseren N26_Support Twitter Account: https://twitter.com/N26_Support?s=09 oder über unseren Facebook Account: https://www.facebook.com/N26DE/. Wir würden uns freuen dir bei dem Problem helfen zu können.Gruß, dein N26 Team.

name: Jack Flanagan
title: Pointless and difficult re-verification…
content: Pointless and difficult re-verification process. Useless customer support.
reply: Hey Jack,As a licenced bank, we’re legally obligated to request customers to verify their identity at regular intervals. Once you start the process to verify your identity again, you’ll still be able to use your card to make purchases, receive money, have full benefits of any overdraft & credit, and direct debits will still be collected. When verification of your ID is complete, you’ll have full access to your account features and app.We thank you for your understanding.Regards,Your N26 Team.

name: Matthieu Ferrero
title: Very convenient
content: Very convenient, quick-actions bank. Everything is in an application or by phone, no need to go anywhere, everything is really fast : transfers, answers from customer service, card receiving,... It's just the nowadays bank. Din't wait anymore

name: Aydin T
title: Über so einen Kundenservice habe ich mich schon lange nicht aufgeregt ! Und ich dachte Vodafone ist schon eine Katastrophe
content: Sehr geehrtes N26Ich war bis vor kurzem ziemlich zufrieden, da alle getätigten Überweisungen/Geldeingänge geklappt haben. Da ich bisher noch nie etwas hatte und das Konto mit den Zahlungseingängen und Ausgängen völlig fehlerfrei waren, musste es ja mal krachen.Ich habe damals das normale N26 Standart Konto eröffnet, da es noch kein Business Konto in der Produktpalette gab. Nun habe ich versucht, entweder das alte Konto auf ein Business Konto umzustellen oder ein neues Business Konto zu eröffnen. Leider hatte ich in den letzten Tagen so viel Kopfschmerzen, weil ich gegen AGB's Paragraf 19 Abs. 3 verstoßen haben soll.Leider habe ich festgestellt, dass keiner dieser Punkte zutreffen, bis auf die Business Nutzung. Ich habe 4 verschiedene Agenten im Chat versucht zu erklären, was das Problem ist. Alle haben wortwörtlich den Chat mit ich kann Ihnen nicht weiterhelfen und beende hiermit das Gespräch, geschlossen. Der Kundenservice ist absoluter Schrott, unhöflich und inkompetent. Ich habe damals noch eine Telefonnummer gehabt der N26 gehabt, die mir sagt das es nur nicht den Chat gibt und in dringenden Fällen ein Rückruf vereinbart werden kann. Totaler bullshit, alles schön reden ...Auf meine Mails wird stumpf nicht reagiert ...Eine simple Umstellung auf das Business Konto ist wohl nicht gewünscht oder gewollt.Wenn das nicht Service durch und durch ist...Sry Leute, lasst die Finger weg und geht zu den regionalen Banken. Kundenorientierung ist eine Katastrophe Kundenservice ist eine Katastrophe Kompetenz des Kundenservice ist mehr als mangelhaft!Sehr geehrtes N26 Team Ich betone nochmals, dass ein Verstoß nicht vorliegt. Kunden grundlos zu kündigen mit solchen E-Mails ist eine absolute Unverschämtheit. Eine Rechtfertigung ihrerseits ist nicht gewünscht.
reply: Hey Aydin, danke für dein Feedback.Bei Verstoß unserer AGB kann dir der Kundensupport und auch wir nicht weiter aushelfen.Wir selbst können den Grund nicht einsehen und dir mitteilen, was geschehen ist.Wir können dir bei Verstoß leider kein neues Konto anbieten und bedauern diese Entscheidung sehr.Wir wünschen dir weiterhin alles gute.Grüße, dein N26 Support-Team.

name: Andrew
title: AVOID N26!!
content: AVOID N26!!! DO NOT OPEN A BANK ACCOUNT WITH THEM!Do you open a bank account. Live chats are a scam and I still haven't been able to access my account like many others have commented. It seems like the live chat agents come up with a new lie every time and are always unable to resolve my problem. One even ended the chat before doing anything to resolve my problem.
reply: Hi Andrew, thanks for taking the time to let us know. We take this sort of feedback very seriously, so we will be passing this on for you. We would like to assist but you have not specified the issue you had. We would be happy to help you if you contact us via our Twitter Support. An agent will be glad to help out.Best,Your N26 Support Team

name: Bill
title: No access to account
content: Before I start complaining and explaining my current situation, I want to start off by saying that I was initially very happy with N26: A mobile bank! This was great for my, since I frequently travel abroad. A Debit card that I can use around the world and connect to all kinds of apps (my usual bank doesn't have this option). For about half a year, this worked great for me and would recommend N26 to people in need of something similar.Then came the moment when I suddenly had to verify my account using the 2-step authentication. Usually, that shouldn't be a problem, but I'm using a different phone number now (old phone got stolen). After chatting a few times (since there is no phone number available), they called me back with a lot of questions to confirm my identity. So far, everything made sense and my number was changed to the correct number. All was good again :)Or so I thought. Then It was time to verify my login by inserting the SMS code I would receive by SMS. You might have guessed it at this point, but no code would ever be sent to my phone. I did receive some kind of error and tried to have the SMS message resent a couple of times, but with no positive result. The number must be correct, since they also managed to call me back.It's 5 days later now and I still do not have access to my bank account. If have no idea how much money is still on that account and have no way to transfer it to another. The only way for me to know for sure if there is enough money on that account for anything, is by getting cash out of the ATM and pay for everything in cash (which means I also pay the €2,00 fee every time I get money out of an ATM). So since last Friday i've been contacting customer service by using the 'live chat'. The service agents keep telling me they will be in contact 'today' or 'tomorrow'. Today marks day 5 after first contact. Today I spoke with a service agent who told me it could take a 'few weeks'. At this point I didn't know what I was reading. A few weeks being unable to check my own balance, let alone transfer funds to pay bills! He did not seem to appreciate it very much when I told him waiting for weeks wasn't really an option for me.Now, I work in customer service myself and have seen some crazy things, but never as crazy as having to wait a few weeks before I can access my account. I understand (and appreciate) that there are security protocols. But when I give all my personal details and tell them the exact amounts and locations of my last transactions to confirm my identity, they still can't help me at all and the only thing for me to do is wait.Moral to the story: Great app when everything works, but customer service has a lot to learn. Make sure you change all your personal details in your account as soon as they change. Otherwise, you might end up like me feeling like being locked out of your car on a abandoned road with 150km to the nearest sign of civilization.I will update the review as soon as the situation changes.When it comes to customer service: - not easy to reach on live channels.  - Not a very personal approach (although there were some friendlyl ones)Lots of templates that didn't really fit into the conversation, not feeling like agents are reading the situation actively. More like scanning for keywords. - chats get closed fast by agents if you don't respond fast enough. - follow-ups (call-backs, e-mails) didn't happen when promised.
reply: Hi Bill,Thanks for taking the time in leaving us your review. Firstly we regret that you were put in such situation. We arrange callbacks within the next 24 hours, we apologise as you were not called within that timeframe. We do our best to train each of our representatives on how to properly handle our customers’ issues, including how to escalate problems that they are unable to assist with. Your concern was not handled properly, and we are going to take steps to ensure that this situation does not repeat itself. We will also pass on your feedback regarding the chats current ending time due to inactivity. We really appreciate your feedback as it will allow us to improve our services and operations. If you are unable to reach our live chat within the app, alternatively you can contact us via our support center. At the bottom of the page there's a button "open a chat", here is the link: https://support.n26.com/en-fr/getting-started/account/how-to-prove-my-identitySCA is being introduced as part of the revised European Payments Services Directive (PSD2) which applies to all European Banks. The objective of PSD2 is to enhance the security of the customers’ data and account security. SCA acts as an additional layer of security for all N26 customers by providing Two-Factor Authentication (2FA). When you log into your N26 account from the web app or a non-paired device, you’ll be asked to confirm a push notification on your paired device or you can request an SMS code to be sent to your registered number to confirm your login attempt. This ensures that only you can log into your N26 account. We apologise that you encountered issues receiving the SMS. We value our customers and understand how important it is to offer exceptional service. If you have any concerns or suggestions please do not hesitate to contact us at support@n26.com. Best,Your N26 support team

name: Jennifer
title: N26 sind Betrüger
content: Vorabinfo: Ich befinde mich in der Privatinsolvenz und habe monatlich einen Freibetrag. N26 schafft es nie mir den Freibetrag rechtzeitig freizuschalten, so dass am 1. eines Monats ständig Lastschriften platzen, obwohl genug Geld drauf wäre. Dadurch habe ich eine permanente Rennerei, unnötige Kosten und Probleme ohne Ende. Diesen Monat ist es allerdings so, dass ich seit mehr als einer Woche nicht mehr auf mein Geld zugreifen kann. Ohne Grund, einfach so, obwohl Geld drauf ist. Der Kundenservice reagiert auf gar keine E-Mail, obwohl Sie eine Antwort innerhalb von 1 bis 2 Tagen versprechen und die Agents im Chat sind derartig inkompetent. Behaupten ständig sie würden mein Anliegen weiterleiten und mir dann eine E-Mail schicken. Aber nichts passiert. Das was bei der N26 abgeht, ist garantiert nicht legal. Ich habe eine Beschwerde bei der Bafin eingereicht, sowie beim Verbraucherschutz. Diese Bank ist das allerletzte, die größte Verarsche.
reply: Hey Jennifer, danke für dein Feedback.Mastercard ist ein amerikanisches Unternehmen, dort gibt es sowas wie P-Konten nicht, daher kommt es zu Schwierigkeiten mit dem Freibetrag.Mastercard versteht die Zurücksetzung am 1. des Monats nicht, da es nicht überall P-Konten gibt, somit wird das von Mastercard nicht erkannt.N26 passt das dann gerne für betroffene Kunden an, daher ist es ja so wichtig und empfehlenswert, dass man den Support seiner Bank kontaktiert, sollte dies nicht automatisch zurück gesetzt werden.An einer automatischen Zurücksetzung arbeiten wir natürlich bereits und bitten um ein wenig Geduld für diesen Prozess.Grüße, dein N26 Support-Team.

name: andrea gilbertson
title: Misleading referral programme
content: I signed up to N26 using a referral code and was promised  £15 or €15 bonus. However now that I'm all signed up I've found out on live chat that it's the person who referred me who gets the referral bonus not me. I have been completely misled. Other challenger bank 2 way referral programmes are much fairer.
reply: Hi Andrea. apologies for the misunderstanding on this. I am sure we can get something sorted for you. Can you please contact us via our Twitter Support. An agent will be glad to help out.Best,Your N26 Support Team

name: Bannerman
title: On line assistance
content: Went on line chat, agent Konstantinos quickly identified my problem, assured me it would be solved which he did very quickly and efficiently.  It was a Sunday afternoon.  Very satisfactory.  Thank you.

name: Anna
title: Très bonne banque en ligne
content: Très bonne banque en ligne. Ouverture de compte en quelques minutes et surtout sans conditions de revenus.Tenue de compte entièrement gratuite. Possibilité d avoir une carte visa même pour les interdits bancaires. L application est très facile à utiliser. J encourage vivement ceux qui ne sont pas satisfaits de leur banque à ouvrir un compte N26 !

name: Robert's Lebeau
title: New Generation of Bank Connected
content: Probably ( I hope for sure )The N26 is the ...Futur Bank of the New World Order* Believe me. I'm just 67 years old.Always at 400 miles per hour.And Hyper Active in the Design of Tiny House Container.With my little #ExtremeConceptElement C° and my card N26 follow me everywhere. I need "Her"God Bless All the People from this Planet

name: Michael
title: As a migrant to DE
content: As a migrant to DE, this is the only bank I found which is in English (may be there are others, but I don't know yet). Account is opened in a matter of minutes (no need to wait 2 weeks appointment like Sparkasse). Video ID people are weird. The lady spoke in English. Very confident and quick, but I didn't understand a word... Called again - got to the guy and was identified without any problems (but this is not N26, but Video ID service).

name: Laura Baumann
title: EINE EINZIGE KATASTROPHE
content: EINE EINZIGE KATASTROPHE. Unprofessionell und ignorant. Keiner kann helfen, die mitarbeiter antworten auf keine email. Lasst die Finger davon und schont eure Nerven!
reply: Hey Laura, danke für dein Feedback.Du bist, wie viele andere auch, von der Umstellung des PSD2 betroffen: Du kannst dich nur mit der Handynummer einloggen, welche du mit deinem N26 Konto verknüpft hast.Wenn du deine Handynummer nicht up-to-date hältst mit deinem N26 Konto, kann dir natürlich kein Zugriff gewährt werden, weil du den SMS Code nicht erhältst.So wie viele andere (Deshalb ist auch die Chat Wartezeit so hoch), müsstest du nun in den Chat und deine Handynummer ändern lassen.Dies machst du am besten, wenn du es über einen Support-Center Artikel tätigst: https://support.n26.com/de-de/erste-schritte/persoenliche-daten/wie-kann-ich-mich-ausweisenGrüße, dein N26 Support-Team.

name: Marco Rothenburger
title: Der Kundenservice ist das Letzte was es…
content: Der Kundenservice ist das Letzte was es gibt. Nur noch Chat und niemand erreichbar. Hatte die Chatanfrage mehrmals wiederholt nach 12 Stunden immer noch keiner Interesse Probleme zu besprechen. Sehr schlecht! Lohnt sich nicht mehr.Es gibt nicht mal die Möglichkeit Sepamandate zurück zu ziehen.Rechtlich ist das auch nicht erlaubt.N26 Masterkart hat fast Weltweit kaum noch Azeptanz.So schnell kann man eine Firma gegen die Wand fahren. Viele Versprechungen für nichts ;P
reply: Hey Marco, danke für dein Feedback.Lastschriften, welche älter als 8 Wochen alt sind, können vom Kunden selbst nicht zurückgefordert werden.Sollten die Händler noch unrechtmäßige Lastschriften fordern, kannst du dies im Chat ansprechen, sodass wir alle Transaktionen durchgehen, diese mit den Händlern abklären und dir das Geld für unrechtmäßige Lastschriften zurückfordern.Grüße, dein N26 Support-Team.

name: Anca
title: Took me few minutes to set up the…
content: Took me few minutes to set up the account for Germany, immediately called back for the verification. Super easy to use,the app is super user friendly.One thing that is weird...maybe because I was used to something different in terms of mobile banking : when i pay something, the total does not change instantly, it waits until the purchase is confirmed. So the total amount of money may be different than the reality (that's how i made a payment and now ahve to pay the 3 eur fine that the transaction was denied due to lack of funds). Anyway...overall, i think it is worth the shto

name: Theresa Rü
title: Ungenügender Kunden Service !
content: Keine Möglichkeit irgendwie auf mein Konto zuzugreifen. Die angebliche "Kunden Hotline" ist eine automatische Stimme die einem sagt, dass man den Chat benutzen soll und dann auflegt. Der Chat funktioniert seit Tagen nicht. E-Mails werden ignoriert. Ein ungenügender Kunden Service!!!!
reply: Hey Theresa, danke für dein Feedback.Du bist, wie viele andere auch, von der Umstellung des PSD2 betroffen: Du kannst dich nur mit der Handynummer einloggen, welche du mit deinem N26 Konto verknüpft hast.Wenn du deine Handynummer nicht up-to-date hältst mit deinem N26 Konto, kann dir natürlich kein Zugriff gewährt werden, weil du den SMS Code nicht erhältst.So wie viele andere (Deshalb ist auch die Chat Wartezeit so hoch), müsstest du nun in den Chat und deine Handynummer ändern lassen.Dies machst du am besten, wenn du es über einen Support-Center Artikel tätigst: https://support.n26.com/de-de/erste-schritte/persoenliche-daten/wie-kann-ich-mich-ausweisenGrüße, dein N26 Support-Team.

name: Anne
title: Snabba svar och tydliga.
content: Snabba svar och tydliga.

name: Doyen Pascal
title: Pourquoi payer cette mastercard qui est…
content: Pourquoi payer cette mastercard qui est considérée comme une carte prépayée et non acceptée par les loueurs de véhicules ? J'ai la même chose gratos chez Sogexia...
reply: Bonjour Pascal, merci de votre retour.Nous proposons des MasterCard à débit immédiat, et c'est cette fonctionnalité qui empêche à certains loueurs de véhicules d'accepter votre carte.Certains, comme SIXT, acceptent tout à fait les cartes N26. Il vous faut simplement vous renseigner auprès de l'entreprise au préalable.Nous espérons que cette réponse vous a été utile.Salutations,Votre équipe N26.

name: Johannes Hunger
title: EU-Richtlinie zur 2-Faktor-Authentifizierung stürzt N26 ins Chaos
content: App ohne Ankündigung auf Android 6.0 upgegradet. Somit alle Kunden mit Android 4.0/5.0 etc konkret handlungsunfähig. Ohne App sind keine Überweisungen möglich, da die Transaktion via Zwei-Faktor-Authentifizierung bestätigt werden muss. Kundenchat weiß keinen Rat. Rasselt nur die techn. Bedingungen durch, obwohl kein Bot, sondern Mitarbeiter. Durch die zusätzliche Störung, die seit 13.09.19 andauert, auch am 16.09.19 kein Abheben an Bankautomaten möglich. Keine Zahlung an Supermarkt-Kassen, oder auch Apotheken möglich.Aktuell auch keine Nutzung der App "Numbrs" möglich. Konto kann nicht verbunden werden. Kunden mit einem Android, älter als 6.0 kommen also definitiv nicht an ihre Einlage. Sie können, weder das Geld zu anderen externen Konten transferieren, noch das Konto am Automaten leeren. Am 16.09.19 auch Zugang zum Onlinebanking via Desktop PC nicht möglich.
reply: Hey, danke für dein Feedback. Dieses Upgrade ist aufgrund der EU-Vorschriften zur Sicherheit für PSD2, die N26 erfüllen muss, erforderlich. Im Juli 2019 haben wir angefangen unsere Kunden darüber zu informieren, dass sie aufgrund regulatorischer Veränderungen der EU bezüglich PSD2 ihre App aktualisieren müssen, um den Sicherheitsanforderungen zu entsprechen. Danke für dein Verständnis und bitte entschuldige die Unannehmlichkeiten. Gruß, dein N26 Team.

name: Nick
title: Just tried setting up a UK account
content: Just tried setting up a UK account.  5 minutes later I get an email:"Let’s try your ID verification again.Hey Nicholas,It appears that there was an issue with some of the data or documents you submitted and we were unable to complete the identity verification procedure. No worries, you’re able to try again!To help you complete the process we’ll send you a follow-up email shortly with some additional tips on how to successfully complete verification.If you’re unable to retry your verification in the app, reach out to our customer support and they’ll be able to give you more specific details on what went wrong and help you resolve the issue."So I try to contact chat support three times because there was nothing wrong with my i/d and each time chat shuts down quickly with the message:"There is a connection issueSorry that we are not able to chat with you. Try connecting again or come back later."There's nothing wrong with my internet connection or with my UK driving licence.  This seems on first contact with it to be a joke company.Tried a 4th time and 20 minute wait (so far) for chat assistance.  Ridiculous.
reply: Hi Nick, we do apologise for this. Can you try both WiFi and data connection for this, as some WiFi connections can cause an echo, which does not connect the call. Also, please check if your phone is listed on this page, as this can cause some issues. There are fixes on here should you be using one of these devices. https://support.n26.com/en-eu/getting-started/account/how-to-get-push-messagesBest,Your N26 support team.

name: Mauri Lindberg

content: After a normal (lengthy) waiting time before the chat opened I got wonderful customer service from the agent (Stylianos) He remained calm and professional even when I jumped from one topic to another and now that I think back, I was definitely one of those “difficult” customers. He solved my case on the spot and patiently stayed on the line waiting for me to confirm that all my queries are answered.Exemplary service - thank you - I will get my wife to join N26 ,too.

name: Carmen
title: Uno spettacolo
content: Uno spettacolo! N26 mi permette di pagare sia tramite telefono con NFC , fare bonifici, pagamenti con carta contactless/Bancomat. È un conto vero e proprio con una fantastica app a disposizione , tramite la quale è possibile disabilitare la carta, cambiare il codice,  visualizzare i saldi del conto e molte altre info utili. La preferisco rispetto alle altre perchè ha 0 costi, è possibile ricaricarla tramite bonifico, i prelievi sono gratuiti ,( fuori Europa 1.7% di commissioni) e non ha limiti di deposito. Vi permette anche di ricevere ben 15€ regalo al primo pagamento se usate il mio codice: fabiog6862

name: Erik Vansaren
title: General view of the service
content: Customer Support:- There is no phone number. It existed because I called it because of a technical problem and the impossibility of solving it due to the absence of the internet.To date it means that if you find yourself without internet due to a technical breakdown of your phone or a local network problem, you will not have access to your account nor to customer support. Not really very well.- Providing customer support exclusively through a chat, on a 7cmx12cm screen is not exactly the top of UX, especially when it comes to serious problems and not simple questions.- Providing customer support via desktop PC chat offers several problems, such as authentication.The authentication consists of the request for 3 questions, of which the third asks you to communicate the fifth charge to your account or the names of at least two companies with recurring charge and relative amount.The problem is that the agents in question do not always offer you the possibility to say which are the recurring charges and if you cannot have access to the account to tell them the fifth charge received, they simply close the chat.In addition to the agents that sometimes close the chat even without explanation, you can also add any connection problems, both on the phone and on the desktop.In short, a truly painful experience. There is a lot of talk about making life simpler but a company with millions of euros in financing can't even get a phone line which could simply authenticate the call from the app itself like airbnb does.- Bank Transfer ProcessSince performing mobile operations does not represent maximum comfort, there is a desktop version that becomes useless, as instead of sending a text message with confirmation code for the bank transfer which could be easily read on screen without open the sms itself, N26 app sends a push notification that requires the manual confirmation of the transfer, unlocking the mobile phone screen and logging into the app.How to make life complicated.- Double authenticationRecently N26 has adapted to the European double authentication standard, obviously here too, it did it in the most complicated way possible.1. I go to log into the bank account via my computer, I can't, the bank says I have to confirm the access on my mobile.2. Meanwhile, via the bank's app, I receive a push notification asking me to confirm the access, but I can't do it at the first "tap", I must first unlock the screen, while the notification has disappeared from the screen.3. To confirm, in any case, I have to log in to my account on the app installed in the mobile, to which you ask yourself what sense to log into the account on the mobile to confirm access to the account from the desktop, and you also wonder why not have sent a simple text message with a code, which, among other things, can be read on the screen without unlocking the cell and logging into the account.4. I find out that you can actually request a text message, but to do so, in the pop-up that says "confirm access to your account" I have to click on "help", at the point a new pop-up opens, explaining that by clicking on "send" you will receive a text message with a confirmation code.I do it, but then the bank's website tells me "sorry it's been too long"Considering that there are more chances that they will steal my phone than they have of accessing my PC or discovering user and password and accessing it from another PC, I would say that we are doing very well.It is worth noting that between sending the SMS as the main solution and then eventually the push notification of the app, the banks had complete discretion on how to manage the token.- TransparencyN26 is exactly like any other bank, if they can lie or deceive you for an advantage, they will do it without problems.In principle, the monthly withdrawals were free and unlimited, the bank used a lot of leverage on this in their advertisements.Then the free withdrawals were reduced to 5 monthly after which you pay to withdraw.Even the bank account had to be free, but then they changed that too and now a questionable credit check is performed, if you don't get a certain score, they offer you a paid bank account. Arguable because it happened to a friend of mine who has absolutely no problems.In essence, if you can avoid it, you avoid it.
reply: Hi Erik, thanks for taking the time to let us know. We take this sort of feedback very seriously, so we will be passing this on for you. Outlining where you think we can improve helps us to prioritise where we need to improve, so we appreciate this. Best,Your N26 support team.

title: Sono 7 mesi che la uso è tutto ok senza…
content: Sono 7 mesi che la uso è tutto ok senza spese senza costi NIENTE avete codice iban codice della carta di credito gestione del conto su internet facile da usare pagate con la carta dove volete prelievi dal bancomat dove volete senza pagare alla PIO E AMEDEO ma che volete più io ho chiuso il mio conto intesasanpaolo addirittura che pagavo 3 euro al mese per mantenere il mio conto ma in fondo è giusto così se lo stato vuole il pagamento virtuale ma non più contanti dovrebbero togliere le spese.

content: Ich nutze mein n26 Konto beruflich, dementsprechend auch das "Business" Profil, für das ich zahle. Nur so viel Business steckt in dem Konto gar nicht. Ich habe heute erfahren, dass Drittprogramme wie lexoffice (Buchhaltung) nicht mehr unterstützt werden.Jetzt habe ich die Problematik, händisch 2 Monate Buchhaltung aufzuarbeiten, das irgendwie in Lexoffice zu integrieren und mir ein neues Konto zuzulegen. Das wird mich 2-3 Tage Arbeit kosten, dass ich N26 am liebsten in Rechnung stellen würde. Von einer beruflichen Nutzung bei n26 kann ich nur abraten. Kundenservice ist eine Katastrophe.

You can check our system requirements here: https://support.n26.com/en-eu/getting-started/account/can-i-download-the-n26-app-on-my-smartphone If you are not receiving the SMS code we ask that you first contact us again via live chat from our Support Center. Racconto cosa mi è successo un paio di mesi fa: mi si è rotta la carta nel portafoglio, ne ho ordinata un altra a pagamento (6€) e in due giorni era a casa mia. Sono andato a Londra per un viaggio e si è smagnetizzata. Ho scritto al customer care e in 2 GIORNI LAVORATIVI era a casa mia di nuovo GRATIS. Customer care molto disponibile per qualsiasi cosa e chiarimenti. Non sono pagato da N26 ma mi ci trovo davvero talmente bene rispetto alle altre banche tradizionali che ho voluto fare questa recensione. Scusate il tema :)

content: Simplemente genial!!!! Jamás he tenido problemas al pagar con ella ni al sacar dinero en cajeros y ni por internet! La descubri por casualidad y es lo mejor que he hecho abrirme la cuenta y además fue super fácil y la tarjeta en pocos dias estaba en mi casa! Yo os la aconsejo y además es una manera de controlar los gastos ya que en esa cuenta solo tienes lo que vas ingresando es decir para gastos puntuales a no ser que domicilies la nómina ahi. Bravo por N26!!!!

I find myself unable to log-in to the app half of the time because of 2-factor authentification, I am unable to directly contact the service center and it takes a while to get a response from them, some of their requests do not make sense...it really went from super smooth to cryptic. It's a shame because the original concept is valuable

name: RickyW
title: N26 Service - Absolutely Abysmal Customer Service at N26 Bank
content: I have to say this N26 bank service is absolutely absymal and appalling. Your N26 account gets blocked for any number of "reasons" meaning a whole load of ridiculous "ID re-verification" palaver each time in order to unblock it.N26 Customer service is practically impossible to reach. There is no phone service to reach N26 Bank, and if you can't get into your N26 account, then it can be nigh on impossible to reach their text "chat" service. N26 have now messed up my account again with some app update, which means yet again I can't get into my account - neither by the N26 website nor via the N26 app on mobile phone. Great. Now I have to spend hours chasing around trying to get into contact with the practically non-existent N26 "support". I am also very concerned about the risks of my N26 account suddenly being "frozen" for any of their numerous spurious reasons, which causes innocent people real problems. Plenty of examples of this kind of treatment from N26 can be found both here at the Trustpilot as well as elsewhere online.N26's marketing promotions and general tone is also glib and irritating. Emails from N26 that address you with "hey", and pictures of happy smiling "support" people that you never can reach (they  probably don't even exist in reality, maybe they are just standard image library pictures)  N26 are a heap of dung with what must be the worst customer service of any bank. Avoid.

reply: Hi Ricky, thanks for taking the time to let us know. We take this sort of feedback very seriously, so we will be passing this on for you.We would be happy to help you if you contact us via our Twitter Support. An agent will be glad to help out.  Alternatively, you can use this link to come on the chat. From here, you do not need to sign in:- ​​​​​​​The N26 Support Center. Scroll to the bottom of the page and you will see "Open a chat" in a green box: https://support.n26.com/en-gb/getting-started/other/how-do-i-contact-n26As a fully-fledged bank, N26 must submit itself to banking regulations in place. Said regulation is aimed at protecting our users.You won’t encounter issues when using your bank account if you don’t breach our terms and conditions.As for the marketing promotions, we are happy to get this turned off for you. You can do this in the app, or request it on chat or Twitter support.Best,Your N26 support team.

name: JJ.Nortyperson
title: Avoid them like the plague
content: Avoid them like the plague. They opened my account, and just as I closed my UK business and would rely on N26 until my new bank account could be opened, they decided that my documents weren't right, demanded I re-submit them by camera and phone. I tried over and over to get the documents to them, the instructions given were ridiculous. They rejected my documents over and over despite the documents being genuine and accepted elsewhere,  and have left me with a blocked account and several months money not reaching me, leaving me unable to proceed with the house move and opening of my new bank account. Their response has been appalling and my situation is dire now. They have wrecked my new life. Thanks N26, I hope this review is part repayment. I am disabled and if anyone disabled or vulnerable wants a good bank, avoid this one, the stress is intolerable.This dreadful bank have tried to leave a reply to defend themselves, how pitiful, they have time to do that but not to REFER MY CASE to their regulators as requested by me. Hilariously, their response is signed 'Your N26' or similar. What a laugh, they forced my account closed as I said they would, when asked to refer my case to the ombudsman. Do avoid N26, they are crooks, they are callous, they are from a few centuries ago, before customer services were invented, and although they forced the closure of my account after accusing me of fraud, they still have to refer my case to the regulator, so they need to get busy with that instead of writing silly replies to my review. I got a proper bank account so what the point of N26's petty and archaic behaviour was, I do not know.  Avoid them like the plague, don't suffer as I did.

I am very pleased for opening an account with N26.

Le service client via le chat jusqu'à 23h cest vraiment le top, l'application est génial aussi simple a utiliser et ont reçoit une notification des quon effectue un paiement par carte cest vraiment génial.  Sa na rien a voir avec les autres banque classique vraiment n26 pour moi cest la meilleure banque de toutes les autres banque
