name: Bernhard S.
title: N26 sperrt Kunden ohne Grund
content: N26 sperrt Kunden ohne Grund - Geld kann zwar noch abgebucht werden jedoch wird ohne Grund die Geschäftsbeziehung beendet. N26 hat sehr wenig Transparenz und der Kundenservice ist miserabel. Finger weg und ab zu einer richtigen Bank :)
reply: Hey, danke für dein Feedback.Als vollwertige Bank muss sich N26 den geltenden Bankvorschriften unterwerfen. Diese Regelung zielt darauf ab, unsere Nutzer zu schützen. Bei der Verwendung deines Bankkontos treten keine Probleme auf, wenn du nicht gegen unsere Allgemeinen Geschäftsbedingungen verstößt.Gruß, dein N26 Team.

name: Jan
title: Be careful
content: Was waiting for them that they come to Switzerland. Now I received a mail that I can create my account. Trying to do so, I receive an error message `There is a problem with your personal information, contact support’. The button ‘contact support’ in the mail opens the N26 app on my phone and nothing more. No support here. The App support link on the App Store opens a ‘page not found’. After searching any support on their website, I found a chat support. A person named ‘Joao’ asked me for a few details and decided that the mail address I gave him was not ok. So he closed the chat with the comment ‘I appreciate the effort, but the information you have provided is not matching the one in our system (...) I will now have to close this chat. Have a great day!’. The information I gave them was fine, I triple checked it and they used it to send me information mails. Seems there is a huge support problem with N26, beside this, it is the first time a chat agent refuses to help and hangs up on me. I contacted them on their Facebook site, they replied and asked for two questions. I answered. Then no more reply. I reminded them and receive the same initial two questions seems to be a chat robot. I still can’t open an account since 2 weeks.What a silly waste of time.
reply: Hi Jan,Thank you for taking the time to leave this review. We apologise that your sign-up did not go as anticipated.When you receive a notification to contact support when signing up, this means that you have already registered your details with us in the past, and they are currently on our system. It can also indicate that you already have another active account with us. As you can only have one N26 account,  the system will block another application - at that point, you can either continue with your old sign-up attempt, or you can contact us on live chat so that we can remove the old application so that you can start again. You can also email us at support@n26.com from the email address you used on your application, so that we can wipe your old data.Best Regards, Your N26 Support Teamm

name: Lukas
title: miserabler Kundenservice! Finger weg
content: Sehr schlechter Kundenservice! Kann meine Nummer seit 2 Monaten nicht ändern, da meine neue Nummer angeblich bereits benutzt wird. Habe daraufhin Dokumente an den Support geschickt, die belegen, dass diese nun meine Nummer ist, aber als Antwort bekam ich nur, dass ich eine andere Nummer benutzen soll!Soll ich nun extra einen Vertrag abschließen, weil der Support inkompetent ist?Konto habe ich nun gekündigt. Beschwerde an die BaFin wird folgen.

name: Breno
title: Very disappointed with the service
content: Very disappointed with the service. I've been waitingsso much to see n26 entering Swiss market. Than, it come, with a terrible costumer service, no boardeless account, only offering euro in the Swiss market. Just sad about the services
reply: Hey Lukas,danke für dein Feedback. Für die Unannehmlichkeiten möchten wir uns entschuldigen. Wenn du deine Nummer aktualisieren möchtest, diese aber schon bei einem anderen Kunden hinterlegt ist, dann müssen wir die Person, bei der die Nummer schon hinterlegt ist, darüber informieren, dass die Nummer geändert werden muss. Sobald diese geändert wurde, kannst du deine hinterlegen. Wir bitten dich uns nochmal im Live Chat zu kontaktieren, damit wir dir dabei helfen können. Du kannst den Live-Chat in der Mobile App, der Web App oder in unserem Support Center öffnen. Du kannst den Chat auch unten auf diesen Seiten öffnen:https://support.n26.com/de-de/mach-mehr-mit-n26/sonstiges/psd2-und-starke-kundenauthentifizierung.https://support.n26.com/de-de/erste-schritte/sonstiges/wie-kontaktiere-ich-n26Versuche es bitte auf deinem Handy und auf einem PC in verschiedenen Browsern. Gruß, dein N26 Team.

reply: Hi Breno,We appreciate your feedback in regards to our Swiss launch, and regret that you feel this way. If you have any suggestions for the improvement of our Swiss accounts, please send us an email at ideas@n26.com, which is our dedicated email address for collecting valued customer feedback.Best Regards,Your N26 Support Team

name: Sven Scholten
title: Bin seit Jahren Kunde und war…
content: Bin seit Jahren Kunde und war zufrieden. Heute am 11.09.19 hat N26 angefangen mich zu bestehlen! Es wurden 4 Lastschriften abgebucht die nicht einlösbar waren. Also insgesamt sollte ich 12 Euro zahlen. Die Bank gaukelt mir aber ein Minus von 28 Euro vor! Das sind nochmal 16 Euro Extra die mir einfach so geklaut werden. Zudem erdreisstet sich die Bank Lastschriften nun mehrfach am gleichen Tag abzubuchen. Das heißt wenn die einmal zurück gegangen sind buchen die am gleichen Tag teilweise die gleiche Lastschrift 3 bis 4 mal erneut ab und kassieren für jeden Versuch wieder 3 Euro! So kann man den Kunden betrügen! Ich werde Strafanzeige erstatten!

name: Maxxymick
title: Extremely easy and hassle free to sign…
content: Extremely easy and hassle free to sign up, no ridiculous fees like regular banks. Customer service excellent and can't do enough to help, and no long holding times like other banks
reply: Hey Sven,danke für dein Feedback. Wir nehmengerne alle Informationen zu den Lastschriften auf.  Bitte sende uns doch eine private Nachricht an unseren N26_Support Twitter Account: https://twitter.com/N26_Support?s=09 oder über unseren Facebook Account: https://www.facebook.com/N26DE/. Gruß, dein N26 Team.

name: Macky
title: Hugely disappointing
content: Hugely disappointing! If something seems too good to be true, it usually is.  Summary of my issues with N26:- In-app verification process failed (many, many times)- In-app video chat/ verification failed (and took many, many attempts to connect to a verificaiton agent)- When answered, the in-app video chat/ verification agents did not speak English and abruptly terminated my video calls without reason (four times)- My requests to close my N26 account and delete my data were met with emailed auto-responses from N26 to "try again"- Since closing my N26 account (finally), I am still reciving unsolicited email from N26 addressed to another person (not me) i.e. my data have not been deleted.Past support case id numbers:- 06287057- 06356171- 06356172  I can't review my actual use of N26 because the verification process failed over and over again. I initiated the verification process multiple times, via the N26 app, but the app failed to upload my verification documents every time (I made many, many attempts). I am certain that my smartphone, camera and N26 app were up-to-date and fully functioning, as were my documents and wi-fi connection. Despite this, the verification process failed many, many times.  The next day I was invited, by email, to verify my identity using video chat inside the N26 app. On four different occasions each German speaking verification agent who answered my video call hung up abruptly, without reason, when I politely requested to communicate in English. Actually connecting to an agent via video call on each of these occasions took a very, very long time and I had to endure many failed attempts (this took several hours).  The emails I got from N26 to resolve these issues merely provided: (a) links to existing N26 public support documentation online, (b) further invites to re-try video verification using the N26 app again, (c) suggestions that I use the N26 app to make more video calls to N26 support, which cannot be accessed until the account is verified btw, (d) requests that I contact N26 support via a button in my web browser, but the button is inactive and does not function and (e) on my phone, the button redirects me back to the verification page, inside the N26 app, in an endless, time-consuming, frustrating loop.I had to search the internet to locate an email address for N26 support, as it is not shown on the N26 web site clearly. I have since made a number of email requests for N26 to close my account and delete my data. Initially these requests were met with more of the same 'try again' automatic email responses that I mentioned previously i.e. (a), (b), (c), (d) and (e) above. After some stern insistence, I'm now told (by email) that my N26 account is to be closed (finally)! Nonetheless, N26 thought it appropriate that the account closure email should also include a link to a feedback form, so that I could explain why I want to close my N26 account! My reasons should be very clear. I'm not sure when I can expect my N26 data to be deleted though. I am now receiving unsolicited email from N26 that are addressed to a person named "Sgquadhyaeao". MY NAME IS NOT "Sgquadhyaeao" and (according to N26) I NO LONGER HOLD AN ACCOUNT WITH N26.I was never able to access my N26 account because the verification process failed. This means that I have not used N26 to conduct any financial transactions. As a result, any data retention requirements governed by financial regulations that may supersede the European Union's General Data Protection Regulations (EU GDPR) do not apply. Consequently, my 'right to erasure' or ‘right to be forgotten’, under the EU GDPR, Chapter 3, Article 17, Section 1 (a), takes legal precedence. According to the EU GDPR, I have the right to obtain from N26 the erasure of personal data concerning me without undue delay. N26 are legally obligated to erase my personal data, without undue delay, on the grounds that my 'personal data are no longer necessary in relation to the purposes for which they were collected or otherwise processed'.  I have nothing further to say to N26 other than: I insist that N26 DELETE MY DATA with immediate effect. Please REFRAIN FROM COMMUNICATING WITH ME further, unless it is to confirm that my data have been deleted successfully. Most of all, DO NOT SEND ME REQUESTS to re-try video verification or to fill out feedback surveys (especially if the requests are address to another person)!  I do not recommend signing up with N26 until major improvements happen, with particular regard to improving the poor quality N26 in-app customer support. Customer satisfaction is paramount to the success of any public-facing business. I am not confident that N26 can take care of my money securely! It's a real shame that I couldn't get to use my N26 account. The N26 service seemed like a perfect fit for my banking needs and my budget. I hope that N26 improves their service so that other customers don't have to share my experiences.

name: Guillaume
title: Mon expérience avec N26 est Top

name: RobinP
title: Can be barely be used in The Netherlands
content: Though the idea is great, the card they deliver can barely be used in The Netherlands. Even though they claim that the card can be used everywhere, most Dutch stores do not accept the card and some major banks do not allow the card to be used in their ATM's.UPDATE:Your N26 Mastercard is accepted wherever the Mastercard logo is shown. >> In The Netherlands it is NOT.We apologise if you are having issues using your card with some merchants. >> Not some merchant, but MOST merchants.Have you contacted our live chat support so we can take a closer look at this with you? >> Yes, they just claim that it should work everywhere, like a regular Dutch bank card. That is simply not true. It works at Jumbo supermarkets only, all other supermarkets are refusing the card. It does not work like any other cards and can barely be used here.
reply: Hey Robin,Thanks for your feedback. Your N26 Mastercard is accepted wherever the Mastercard logo is shown. We apologise if you are having issues using your card with some merchants. Have you contacted our live chat support so we can take a closer look at this with you? - Your card is most likely not being accepted, as the merchant does not accept Mastercard. Please note that you can also order a Maestro card for use in the Netherlands, as it is more widely accepted there than Mastercard. You can do this from directly within your mobile app.Best,Your N26 support team

name: Franco Grasso
title: Excellent service and support
content: Excellent service and support. Best bank I ever had in my 50 years of business activity.

name: Paul
title: Nicht praxistauglich...
content: Seit mehreren Tagen kann man keine Überweisung mehr machen (Es kommt immer die Meldung: "Ein unerwarteter Fehler ist aufgetreten, bitte entschuldigen die Unannehmlichkeiten...").Der Chat-Support verweist lediglich an s******@n26.com. Von dort kommt seit Tagen keine Antwort... Unglaublich schlechter Service! :-((Da es gefühlt bei jedem dritten Login Probleme irgendeiner Art gibt, werde ich jetzt auch noch bei einer etablierten Bank ein Konto eröffnen... allein auf N26 zu setzen ist mir zu riskant.Das Einzige, was wirklich gut klappt ist die Kontoeröffnung (komplett online, auch aus dem Ausland). Nur deshalb bin ich bei diesem Laden gelandet...UPDATE: Mittlerweile sind 7 Tage vergangen. Überweisungen funktionieren immer noch nicht und der Support hat sich (trotz meiner Nachfrage) noch nicht gemeldet. Ich werde jetzt definitiv zu einer anderen Bank wechseln. Kann doch nicht sein, dass man nicht an sein Geld kommt. Insbesondere als Unternehmern hat man ja schon öfter mal zeitkritische Überweisungen (Finanzamt, Sozialabgaben...)
reply: Hey Paul, danke für dein Feedback.Bitte führe dies einmal aus, welches dafür sorgt, dass alle fehlerhaften Synchronisationen zwischen der App und dem Server bereinigt werden: 1. Entknüpfe dein Smartphone2. Deinstalliere die App3. Schalte das Gerät für 2 Minuten aus, um Hintergrunddaten zu löschen4. Schalte das Smartphone ein und installiere die App neu5. Verknüpfe das Smartphone wiederGrüße, dein N26 Support-Team.

name: Adam Jackson
title: avoid at all costs!
content: Although the app is useful, they closed my account without warning or reason. Left me in real trouble as I’m disabled and couldn’t receive disability payments. Customer service wouldn’t talk to me quoting vague terms.. I extremely risky to bank with if that’s what they do.. avoid avoid avoid!

name: Pietro
title: Dopo aver pazientemente dato tutti i…
content: Dopo aver pazientemente dato tutti i miei dati personali, carta di identità, firme, foto, codice fiscale e tessera sanitaria, mi sono sentito rispondere che non è possibile aprire il conto, senza nessuna spiegazione, nascondendosi dietro una legge europea. Ora mi domando: tutti i miei dati dove sono andati a finire?Metto in guardia tutti quanti dal fornire i propri dati a questa azienda.Risposta di N26 16 set 2019 Ciao Pietro.Ci dispiace apprendere della tua esperienza.Come ti abbiamo già comunicato in fase di iscrizione, non è stato possibile aprire un conto corrente.Ti abbiamo fornito tutte le informazioni possibili in fase di iscrizione, ti ringraziamo per la tua pazienza.Buona giornata.In risposta a N26:Ecco la pseudo risposta che basta leggere per capire e, preciso, non in fase di iscrizione ma due giorni dopo ho saputo del diniego. Pertanto i miei connazionali sono avvertiti ed approfitto per chiedere ai Preposti Nazionali se non sia il caso di verificare che la prassi adottata sia a norma di legge e a tutela della privacy. Grazie. Re- Per cortesia cambiate disco……..
reply: Hey Adam,We apologise for the inconvenience this caused you. For further assistance we advise you to reply to the email you received regarding this matter. Please note you can contact our Twitter support or email us at support@n26.comBest,Your N26 support team

A éviter
reply: Ciao Pietro.Ci dispiace apprendere della tua esperienza.Come ti abbiamo già comunicato in fase di iscrizione, non è stato possibile aprire un conto corrente.Ti abbiamo fornito tutte le informazioni possibili in fase di iscrizione, ti ringraziamo per la tua pazienza.Buona giornata.

Cette dernière a notamment pour objectif d’assurer la protection des clients. Si votre compte N26 est bloqué, le service concerné va examiner votre cas et reviendra vers vous par email.Pour plus d'informations : https://mag-fr.n26.com/compte-n26-bloqu%C3%A9-nous-vous-expliquons-pourquoi-ef27470083ca?gi=dcb928774a25Salutations,Votre équipe N26.

name: Cayla Harvey
title: Overall I endorse N26
content: Overall I endorse N26. I am an American who studied abroad, in Germany, then Switzerland a year later. My experience: I was able to start my account in the U.S.A. but I needed a European phone number to verify, which I got when I was in Germany. A year later in Switzerland I was able to  change my phone number, after a long call to the N26 help line. But I love they have no atm withdrawal fees in Europe (for some amount per month). Also, it is much cheaper for me to transfer money to my N26 account than to use my American credit card. So overall, I have had a good experience with N26 as a U.S. citizen who is living in Europe for a few months.

name: Marc Lorotte
title: Mon avis sur N26
content: Moi, j'aime le fait que des que vous servez de la carte, le débit est immédiat sur l'application, pas besoin d'attendre, de n voir deux jours. Le fait que l'on créer des espaces pour faire une cagnotte pour ce que l'on veut, sans être obligé de signer des dizaines de papiers.La simplicité d'utilisation.

name: Sanan
title: The worst online banking
content: Very bad support, misinformation on their app and never protect customer rights. 1. I got charged from the ATM without any information and N26 showed me this ATM on their app. When I asked them to investigate on it they said sorry we can not do something. We can just check our app. Sorry but if you show me that I have free withdrawals and show me some list of ATMs and then I got charged more you have to at least investigate on it and give me detailed information instead of saying sorry. 2. Once I bought a flight ticket and in the last step when they asked me to approve the payment through 3D security I just declined because I found others. I cancelled it but it got charged. When I asked to investigate that they said they can not. If you can not protect my account with 3D security why you have it? If you give permission to the other system to charge me even if I decline it?3. Every time when I write something to them I disconnect automatically and connect the new person and they ask to explain everything again and again. They always try to prove that the problem is on my connection which I tried mobile, wi-fi and ethernet. And this problem occurred in all of them.
reply: Hi Sanan,Thank you for taking the time to leave your feedback.We do offer an ATM map within the app, however this is simply a guide which indicates which ATMs around you can accept your N26 Mastercard. This does not mean that some of these ATMs may not charge you a private fee for availing of their service, however it should be displayed onscreen before withdrawing that a fee may be charged. We have no influence over private ATM fees, and therefore cannot refund them. In the event you are charged by N26 for a withdrawal once you have passed your free withdrawal limit, the maximum amount would be 2 EUR.It seems that the authorisation to debit the funds from your account had happened with your attempted ticket purchase. This would reserve the amount for the merchant to collect for your purchase. As it was not completed, the funds will simply bounce back to your account without need for further action.Please note that it is also possible to access live chat via desktop from within the web app in the event you are having issues with mobile. You just need to login to the following link to do so: https://app.n26.com/loginYou can also open a chat from within the N26 Support Center.Best Regards,Your N26 Support Team

name: Chris sheath
title: REPORTING THEM TO THE FCA - AVOID!!!
content: accidentally transfered money to my other account but one number was wrong on the sort code. They initialy told me not to worry and I will have this back in 2 weeks. Spoke with them today and they said it was recredited but I spent it before it showed which is absolute nonsense. Have the N26 Metal card so thought they may be able to help. The lady on the phone then advised that the balances on the app for UK customers is incorrect which has been an ongoing bug for some time. They dont tell you about this. I will be reporting them to the FCA.
reply: Hi Chris,We would like to investigate this further for you. Can you kindly send us an email to support@n26.com, or reach out to our Twitter support page so we can help?Best Regards,Your N26 Support Team

name: Filip
title: bank went wrong
content: I was using N26 for 8 months until I received email that I need to re-verify my identity. It came as a surprise to me that I am not able to do that anymore because N26 thinks that people from North Macedonia should not be able to use their services. This is a discriminatory politics of the bank especially to me as an already existing customer with regular income. I trusted the bank to keep all my incomes for 8 months and as a result I was asked to move to other bank. They advised me to open new bank account where they will transfer all my money. There was nothing to worry about they said. From this point I was not able to use the account as before. I was not able to check my bank statement on the application, was not able to do direct debit or receive money on the account. On the email I was informed that I will be able to do all of the above, but because of some unexplained reason I was not able. I ended without receiving my August salary on the account and not being able to transfer money for rent or electricity and at the same time I started to receive letters in my mailbox to pay all outstanding bills. I am risking to loss my apartment or have a bad SCHUFA score just because N26 changed its mind who can use their services and is taking so long to do the final step and transfer the money to the new account. I had already more then 10 conversations with chat support, through email and phone calls and everyone was ensuring me that it will be done soon. From last Wednesday I am not able to use the account at all. My money are trapped by N26 and I feel helpless and really worried.I am sure that my case is not unique and other people are experiencing the same issue. I already advised a lot of Macedonians to start the process of closing the N26 account before N26 ask for that and end up in a loop without any sign of end.
reply: Hey Filip,We apologise that you found yourself in this situation. We do our best to train each of our representatives on how to properly handle our customers’ issues, including how to escalate problems that they are unable to assist with. Were you able to get further assistance regarding your transfer? You can contact us on Twitter or send us an email to support@n26.com via the email address you registered your account with. We will then take it from there. You can also contact our chat directly within the mobile app and webapp or from certain Support Center articles about opening an account (Available via our support center from a computer.) Best,Your N26 Support Team

title: They will take your money away from you…

reply: Hey,As a fully-fledged bank, N26 must submit itself to banking regulations in place. Said regulation is aimed at protecting our users. You won't encounter issues when using your bank account if you don't breach our terms and conditions. You can send us an email to support@n26.com for further assistance or contact us via our live chat support.Best, Your N26 support team

title: Just love my N26 Black card
content: Just love my N26 Black card. It was SO fantastic to have while in Australia. Purchases and cash withdrawals without the extra charges one usually incurs. The insurance and extras that come with the Black card are bonuses particularly when traveling.Back home, if there's a long period where not travelling outside Eurozone, the standard N26 card wud suit me better and be less costly. Love the fact that I can see my purchases immediately that I've used my card. Topping up is easy and putting limits on max spend is very easy to do. Help is at hand thru the app if any problems arise.

name: Monika M Securum
title: Great and simple to use
content: I have been using N26 account for everyday spending and so far it has been great. App is very easy to use and I love the idea Of using spaces to save money for holidays and etc. As they are simple to set up and to transfer money into them, also once I pay money into them, they are not affected by transaction in the main section, even if there isnt enough money to cover a payment which is great as it prevents me from spending it until I have reached a goal.The process Of setting the account up was simple and quick, card came fairly fast, considering it came from germany to UK. It would be better if delivery could be tracked as it requires a signature.I had to contact customer service once and it was simple and my issue has been resolved really fast.However it would be really useful if I was able to set up a list Of recipients instead Of having to manually Enter account number and sortcode every time.

name: Krzysztof Nykiel
title: Solange es sich um "business as usual"…
content: Solange es sich um "business as usual" handelt, ist das vorherrschende Geschäftskonzept von ganz guter Qualität. ABER! Meine Kreditkarte - Mastercard von N26 und meinem Handy, wurde vor zwei Monaten in Griechenland gestohlen. Es ist erst ein paar Wochen her, dass ich eine E-Mail-Adresse für den N26-Support gefunden habe (ohne Mobiltelefon ist die N26-App fast unbrauchbar). Ich habe eine E-Mail an den N26-Support geschrieben, und meine Situation beschrieben, wird von einer neuen E-Mail-Adresse gesend werden, weil ich keinen Zugriff auf meine icloud und damit auch keinen Zugriff auf meine Apple-Mail hatte (aufgrund der zweistufigen Bestätigun, durch Apple beim Senden eines Codes an mein gestohlenes Mobiltelefon) Nach einer Weile bekomme ich eine Antwort vom N26-Support, from Carlos ( wenn der Name erfunden ist, steht darin ein Teil der Verantwortung des betreffenden Mitarbeiters, aber auch ein Teil der unternehmensverantwortungsbewussten Geschäftspolitik) Er kan nichts helfe, weil ich shreiben von nicht registreret - bei N26, e-mail adresse. Ich bekom Zugrif zu meine apple mail, und habe sendt zwei e-mail, uchne anvort! Jetzt lebe ich in Athen, auf der Straße, und nur mit der hilfe einiger süßer menschen, und meiner schönen großen schwester, konnte ich in den strassen von Athens ohne kreditkarten und ohne geld überleben. Suma sumarum, reist du mehr als zwei mal im Jahr, möchte ich sehr, sehr gut über die Wahl der Bank nachdenken (besonders N26). Teilen gerne die nachrichten auf FB![ ref:_00D24H3gm._5001o3mMWyF:ref ]
reply: Hey,danke für dein Feedback. Wenn du uns von einer nicht hinterlegten Email Adresse kontaktierst, dann können wir aus Sicherheitsgründen leider nicht weiterhelfen, da wir dich darüber nicht identifizieren können. Dein Anliegen musst du uns bitte immer von deiner bei uns gespeicherten Email-Adresse zuschicken. Wir bitten dich dafür Verständnis zu haben.Wir verstehen, dass das eine ärgerliche Situation für dich ist und für die entstandenen Unannehmlichkeiten möchten wir uns bei dir entschuldigen. Gruß, dein N26 Team.

title: Tja, N26 will nicht und sagt nicht warum ...

Heute kam die nette Absage: Wir wollen dich nicht, und wir sagen dir nicht warum. Leider sind da die Bankenrichtlinien schuld.... Häää, über all habe ich ein Konto, Kredit etc. haben die etwa andere Richtlinien.Schade wahrscheinlich werde ich nie erfahren warum mich der Roboter abgelehnt hat. Aber vielleicht auch besser so. Was wäre wenn er später mein Konto sperren würde, weil vielleicht meine Haarfarbe nicht mehr zur N26 passt. Also es bleibt ein Glücksspiel bei N26, bei Revolut fing das besser an.

Diese Regelung zielt darauf ab, unsere Nutzer zu schützen.Bei der Verwendung deines Bankkontos treten keine Probleme auf, wenn du nicht gegen unsere Allgemeinen Geschäftsbedingungen verstößt.Gruß, deinN26 Support-Team.

name: Oleg
title: N26 вычеркнула Украину из своего…
content: N26 вычеркнула Украину из своего списка. Для граждан Украины счета не открывают. Я работаю в Германии по контракту, имею немецкий номер и прочее, но открыть счет не удалось. Пытался выяснить почему. Служба поддержки промямлила что-то невразумительное — дескать, невозможно проверить валидность украинских документов. При этом N26 открывает счета гражданам любых других стран, даже из стран с крайне критической экономической и политической ситуацией. И только украинцам — нет.
reply: Ciao , grazie per averci scritto. In quanto banca con effettiva licenza bancaria europea (BCE) N26 è soggetta alle normative bancarie in vigore. Lo scopo di queste norme è quello di garantire la protezione dei clienti.Se il tuo conto N26 è bloccato, hai ricevuto di certo una mail con le informazioni e la procedura da seguire. Il servizio dedicato sta esaminando il tuo caso e ti ricontatterà via email. Per ulteriori dubbi non esitare a consultare questo articolo: https://mag-it.n26.com/conto-n26-bloccato-ti-spieghiamo-perch%C3%A9-3cdb2ae50a08Buona giornata.

name: khalid abu samra
title: When I enrolled to be a client at N26
content: I got a problem while verification, this takes alitte more time and finally, they fix it. thank you.
reply: Hi Khalid,We sincerely apologise for the inconvenience this has caused you. In accordance with European banking processes, N26 is legally obligated to verify our customers at regular intervals.  We regret that the re-verification process did not go smoothly for you.As we no longer offer the option to verify via Post Office, it is now necessary to complete the video verification process as is required with all N26 German accounts. Regrettably, our verification partner cannot accept all documents. We would never want our customers to believe we are discriminating them in relation to their nationality. The reason that a document cannot be accepted is usually due to the lack of security features on said document. Our current list of accepted documents can be found here, and we are constantly trying to add more to the list: https://docs.n26.com/cs/Support%20Center/Verification/201804-supporteddocs-DE-EN.pdfWe hope that a resolution for this issue has been reached, but we encourage you to reach out to us via support@n26.com or our Twitter Support channel if you require any further assistance.Best Regards,Your N26 Support Team

name: Ludovic Lacoque
title: Quatre étoile car j'attends toujours un…
content: Quatre étoile car j'attends toujours un format compte étudiant 15/18ans avec Cb et que l'on peut toujours mieux faire.

name: Kaci Nemli
title: BANQUE GRATUITE ET TRANSPARENTE ET…
content: BANQUE GRATUITE ET TRANSPARENTE ET EFFICACE.N HESITER PLUS!OPERATIONS EN TEMPS REEL SUR L APPLICATION N26.GESTION DES PLAFONDS DE RETRAITS JOURNALIERS ET MENSUELS .GESTION DE LA CARTE ET DES PAIEMENTS SANS CONTACT.

name: Thierry Abiven
title: simple à utiliser
content: simple à utiliser, parfaitement sécurisé, je recommande cette application intuitive et intelligente

name: Customer
title: Perfect bank
content: It is perfect solution for foreigners in Germany, especially if you don't speak German. I have been a customer almost for 2 years now and I should say online banking has never been so easy. Customer support is very helpful(in the rare cases that you need to use it) and the mobile app allows you to operate with your money extremely easy. I definitely recommend N26!!

name: Paul SA
title: It is a nice concept, but...
content: It is a nice concept, but I have had many issues with them, and it is never easy:1st, the card wasn't being delivered - sure, it is not entirely their fault, but from my UX perspective, it was freaking frustrating 2nd, I can't transfer money to a different currency - aside from a (IMO) huge flow issue, every time I tried, I received a system.error message like "could not establish connection with the server". I talked several times with customer support, and each time it was the same: reinstall APP, prey to God it works  - it didn't,  still doesn't 3rd - I  was asked to revalidate my ID, and for some reason they could not do it (although it is the same ID I used while creating the account - my passport), and now I am locked out of the APP, which means no money transfers, no online payments, no nothing - just card payments (on POS) and ATM withdrawals, but that does not help me pay bills or rent - so I don't have full access to my money (and I am still waiting for a solution from their end, and it has been 3 days already).If they fix their APP, and put in place the necessary processes to offer speedy solutions for critical issues (like mine), than it is wort it - if not, then maybe it's better if you go to a "normal" bank...L.E. I decided to cancel my collaboration with them, and as they were sending an email of good-bye, with this in it:"While this process is being completed you can use your card normally, make purchases and withdraw from ATMs, receive transfers, use overdraft services, insurance and credit services."...in parallel they were also blocking my account, so, in fact, now I can't even use the card at a POS or ATM, so, I am totally blocked from reaching or using my money. Good thing I have a back-up, cause otherwise I would be totally screwed. I believe it is total chaos there, they do not have clear processes or user flows, it is A MESS.My rating was 3/5, now I downgraded to 1/5, because it turned from bad to "oh my God, is this real life?! Is this a prank? Are there hidden cameras?"

name: Lara Costa
title: Im a new client but
content: Im a new client but, by the instant, everything worked fine. A great and quick costumers service and my debit card arrived on time. Any delay or problem. I recommend this online bank!
reply: Hi Paul, thanks for taking the time to give us feedback. We use this to improve on what we do.We apologise for the card being lost, we do everything we can to get this sent out straight away.For TransferWise, we encountered an issue that was affecting some accounts. For the time being when we work on a fix, you can use TransferWise.com and log in with your N26 details there.For the verification, we can help straight away with this. please come on the chat, at the end of this post there is a link, where you do not need to sign in.If you need immediate assistance, please come on the Live Chat or Twitter support so we can help.- ​​​​​​​The N26 Support Center. Scroll to the bottom of the page and you will see "Open a chat" in a green box: https://support.n26.com/en-gb/getting-started/other/how-do-i-contact-n26Best,Your N26 support team.

name: Andrew Ramsay
title: Excellent customer services very happy…
content: Excellent customer services very happy with my contactless debit card highly recommend this online bank.

name: Myrelle Moreira
title: Avoid! this is the best advice I can give you!
content: I am sad to say that my issues with this bank will not stop. After so many issues, I now have a major one.I ordered a new card as the one I have is losing the color due to the bad quality of card that they provide you.A genius who ordered in the bank has deactivated my card when I have all my funds and salary on my account..I am currently in canada travelling and guess what? I am unable even to pay for my lunch or to buy anything... I have to borrow money from people because their agents are not clever enough to order a new card and allow my current card active. I am most disappointed and sad. I am going on another trip soon and I just have the feeling you managed to ruin. You lost my trust! I do not recommend N26 to anyone. They do not care about you...

name: Preeti K
title: The bank of today
content: The best part about N26 bank is, it is an online bank and everything is at the tip of the fingertip. No hassle of too many paperworks or the need to visit a physical bank. The UI of the mobile app and the desktop version is clean and you get notified about transactions in real-time, which is very useful. The markup price when you use your MasterCard in other currencies is pretty decent compared to the money exchange outlets. Most of all everything is available in English even if you hold account in non-English speaking country which makes it all the while better than the rest. I would recommend N26 bank; been a customer since 2 years and I am very much satisfied with it.
reply: Hey Myrelle,We do our best to train each of our representatives on how to properly handle our customers’ issues, including how to escalate problems that they are unable to assist with. Our Customer Service Representatives are given a set of guidelines for compensation that they are supposed to adhere to. Your concern was not handled properly, and we truly apologise for the inconvenience it caused you during your travels.  We regret that we provided with such customer experience, it is the exact opposite of what we pride ourselves on.  If you have any concerns or suggestions please do not hesitate to contact us at support@n26.comBest,Your N26 support team

name: Evelyne Avalon
title: n26 deviendra ma banque  principale …
content: n26 deviendra ma banque  principale  lorsque nous pourrons avoir 2 cartes bancaire sur un seul compte

name: Abdelmoume
title: Facilité d'utilisation et sécurité totale
content: Facilité d'utilisation, sécurité des opérations grâce à la possibilité de verrouiller et déverrouiller la carte, de limiter les plafonds de retrait et de paiement, j'ai plusieurs cartes de banques classiques ou en ligne, c'est la N26 que je préfère et que j'utilise le plus souvent

name: Damian
title: Ive been using N26 Metal for 8 months…
content: Ive been using N26 Metal for 8 months or so, it was all good up until one day money that I transferred into my N26 account vanished. It’s been nearly two months now and at first they were having some answers but now they just tell me to wait they are sorting it out. DONT TRUST N26, it’s all good up until they make a mistake and it just drags on with no resolution.

name: Patrick Curien
title: Meilleurs services clients et une bonne…
content: Meilleurs services clients et une bonne sécurité

name: Zanat Amine
title: Vous ne trouvez pas mieux que N26
content: Vous ne trouvez pas mieux que N26
reply: Hi Damian,We're sorry to hear that this has happened to you. In these situations, we recommend that you contact the sending bank so that they can initiate an official Payment Investigation to track and trace the funds, and recall them if necessary. This differs from a transfer confirmation, which simply states the funds were sent. You can email a copy of the results of the investigation to support@n26.com so that we can have a look into it, also.I hope that this has been resolved for you, but please feel free to reach out again if not.Best Regards,Your N26 Support Team.

name: Mário Santos
title: It’s all good and at the momento didn’t…
content: It’s all good and at the momento didn’t have any problem with my transactions.

name: Lisa P
title: Application rejected, useless support answers.
content: Applied for an account and got rejected for no reason. Contacted customer support several times to clarify. There is really no reason for a German bank to deny a German "model" citizen with no record or what so ever. In the last chat, they gave me auto-responses and abruptly closed the chat as I was typing. Totally useless, rude and ridiculous. Thanks for nothing Alexander S!

name: Radu P
title: I don't have great banking needs and…
content: I don't have great banking needs and for me this app fills them nicely.It is a good service and it is easy to use. Great customer care so far. I recommend it. One star removed for it is sometimes hard to manage the standing orders(direct debits). Another reason is that it is not clear that the card is not being accepted everywhere in Germany, it is widely accepted but there have been cases where I couldn't make purchases. I now always carry cash with me. They do however give you the possibility to get a free Maestro card that could be used instead of the main card to cover for this shortcoming.So, this bank is good for me and I got my spouse to use it too.

name: Raf
title: 18 days after I sent my ID and still…
content: 18 days after I sent my ID and still not approved without getting any feedback as to why.. chatted 5 times with CS, totally useless
reply: Hi Lisa,As a licensed mobile bank, we are obliged to securely verify the identity of all potential customers. On occasion, the result of our verification process will determine that you are currently ineligible for an account with us due to legal restrictions. We apologise for any disappointment caused.Best,Your N26 Support Team

name: Jc
title: Très bonne banque en ligne
content: Très bonne banque en ligne, sans frais à l'étranger.

name: Henrik Stougaard Nielsen
title: Worst customer service
content: Worst customer service. On every. Single. Attempt.
reply: Hi Henrik,Can you kindly elaborate on this so that we can advise you on your issue? You can also email us on support@n26.com or reach out to us via Twitter.Best Regards, Your N26 Support Team

name: jeremie kouvtanovitch
title: Pratique et économe.
content: Pratique et économe.J'utilise de moins en moins mon compte courant.

name: Marcelo Arts
title: Amazing service
content: Amazing service

name: Ellie
title: Shut out of newest version of N26 app
content: N26 is updating their app - making it only compatible for iOS 11 and up.  This means that I, as an iPhone 5 user, have to suddenly change banks.  Additionally, I was told I would have until September 14, 2019 to use the old app, but have also required me to verify my identity on the new app before September 3, 2019.  This moved my effective shutout date up almost two weeks - I had to really scramble last week to open my new account with Sparkasse.If you are somebody who usually has the latest phones, this won't be a problem for you.  If you're like me and have a perfectly functional phone you're not eager to replace unless absolutely necessary, this will be an issue.  Have been satisfied with my experience for simple bank functions otherwise.
reply: Hi Ellie,Your devices are most secure when they’re up to date, which is why we’ll no longer be releasing app updates for older iOS and Android versions. Updates to the N26 app are now only supported on iOS versions 11 and higher (the standard found on iPhone 5s handsets, onwards). We apologise for any inconvenience that this has caused you.Best Regards, Your N26 Support Team

name: Brahim Daddi
title: N26  synonyme de qualité
content: N26 est un choix que je n'ai jamais regretté, je recommande cette banque fortement pour celui qui veut rejoindre  un service de qualité.

name: Osman
title: Horrible
content: Horrible, rude customer service. DO NOT USE THIS APP! I would rather talk to Nazis.
reply: Hey Osman, we're sorry to learn about your experience with our customer support.Please tell us more and write us at support@n26.com .We'd love to look further into it.Have a nice day.

name: Antoine GAMELIN
title: Simple et efficace
content: Création de compte simple. Recommandé pour les voyageursL appli à besoin de quelques fonctionnalités manquante

name: Manuela
title: Continuano a non rispondermi
content: Continuano a non fornirmi alcuna valida spiegazione. Un conto bloccato con un saldo di euro 5000. Ma dove sono finiti i miei soldi. Ho chiesto un immediato trasferimento su altro conto corrente ma non ho ricevuto alcuna risposta. Vanno assolutamente fermati.
reply: Ciao  Manuela, ci dispiace apprendere del tuo feedback. N26 è una banca a tutti gli effetti con una licenza bancaria rilasciata dalla BCE.Ovviamente dobbiamo rispettare delle normative molto severe per tutelare la sicurezza dei nostri clienti e dei loro fondi.Hai ricevuto una mail con tutte le procedure da seguire nel momento in cui il tuo conto è stato bloccato.Il servizio dedicato sta esaminando il tuo caso e ti ricontatterà via email. Per ulteriori dubbi non esitare a consultare questo articolo: https://mag-it.n26.com/conto-n26-bloccato-ti-spieghiamo-perch%C3%A9-3cdb2ae50a08Buona giornata!

name: IHATEN26
title: Worst and most frustrating experience of my life
content: I have worked with many mobile banks up until now and thought to find N26 quite convenient as well - until it was not.One day, while I was trying to place a purchase which would not go through - kept getting notifications saying I will receive an e-mail.I only received the mail 2 days later - after having complained on Twitter, not the company has absorbed all my funds and I can not reach my account anymore,The customer service has not been helpful AT ALL - I have tried reaching everyone from the company but still have not hear anything, so I am escalating to file an official complaint and truly horrified that I do not have any idea on where my money is.This is completely illegal and immoral. Will keep you posted in case I have further news yet this week has been sickening due to the late rent payments and bills I have suffered in paying since N26 decided to confiscate my hard-earned funds.EDIT - I have finally received these back in my account after 10 days. I must still say that this was truly frustrating on my end and will never return to this bank again.

name: Jean-Baptiste GRAILLE
title: Expérience utilisateur top
content: Expérience utilisateur top, prise en charge support ultra réactive, gestion instantané des paiements.Pas de frais de compte avec la carte classique.Oubliez les banques françaises.Vive N26.
reply: Hi,As a licensed bank, and in accordance with European banking processes, N26 must carry out regular routine checks on user accounts. We follow these processes to ensure our user accounts are kept safe and secure. If a possible infringement of our terms and conditions is found during these checks, it is possible that a suspension will be placed on the account.We are glad to hear that this has been resolved for you, and apologise for any inconvenience caused.Best Regards,Your N26 Support Team

name: yunus
title: Simple et pratique
content: C'est bonne banque, le suivis est présent et ne nécessite pas d'investissement personnel.

name: Marianne Humblot
title: Ce service répond tt à fait à ce que j…
content: Ce service répond tt à fait à ce que j attendais. Pour l instant je suis très satisfaite, un seul petit souci pour paramétrer ma carte, très vite résolu avec le service client à l écoute et disponible de suite.

name: stéphane lecerf
title: simplicité d'ouverture du compte…
content: simplicité d'ouverture du compte réception de la carte très rapide. service tchat efficient et très attentionné je recommande à tous N26

name: César Pereira
title: Very simple and clear
content: Very simple and clear. Astonishingly responsive and interactive. A transfer from one account to another happens in seconds, even while you are already paying a bill.No charges for the back account management makes sense to me, as we all know that the funds we put at disposal of the bank will generate benefits for the bank. I don't see why i would pay to have my money in an account knowing it is used to generate profits. In that case I would go back to cash only. i think N26 understands this position, and i am thankful for that.

name: Laura Maillart Bade
title: N26, une banque élégante et intuitive
content: N26 est une banque assez autonome ! Elle donne toutes les cartes en main pour être en mesure de se gérer et gérer son argent sans avoir recours à un conseiller. Les outils mis à disposition sont très intuitifs, fluides et pratiques. J'ai eu plusieurs types de compte bancaire avec N26 et l'expérience utilisateur est nickel et les avantages proposés réels et pratiques (toujours).

name: Jérémy Cassuto
title: Aucun frais caché tout fonctionne très…
content: Aucun frais caché tout fonctionne très bien.Seul bémol, ne pas effectuer de caution avec cette cb (débit direct et prends quelques jours à se faire rembourser)

name: Italo
title: Très Très Confiable.
content: Très Très Confiable.

name: chiaramonte
title: très simple et efficace
content: très simple et efficace

name: Kayne
title: Nightmarish
content: I opened an account with N26 almost a year ago and I have to do a re-verification. However, the documents I used to initially verify my identity have not been accepted for the re-verification and I cannot access my account. The customer service is horrendously inadequate and is ineffective at communicating or solving anything. For a bank that is supposed to be easy and transparent, it has proved to be unequivocally torturous and deceptive.

name: Kremer Vincent
title: Excellente banque en ligne
content: Excellente banque en ligne
reply: Hi Kayne,We are obliged to verify our customers at regular intervals, and we apologise for any upset caused as a result of this. You will still be able to use your N26 Mastercard as normal whilst we find a resolution for your issue. Please feel free to contact us via live chat or via email at support@n26.com if we can be of any assistance.Best Regards, Your N26 Support Team

name: Lucia
title: Ho usato il servizio per circa 3 mesi. Voto 8 al sistema 0 al servizio clienti
content: Ho usato il servizio per circa 3 mesi. Ho avuto un problema con un trasferimento ed ho ricevuto risposta dal servizio clienti dopo 9 giorni!
reply: Ciao Lucia, ci dispiace per la tua esperienza.Puoi contattarci istantaneamente con la nostra chat.Siamo attivi tutti i giorni dalle 7 alle 23.Probabilmente la nostra risposta è arrivata in ritardo perché ci hai contattato per mail in un periodo particolarmente impegnato.Se hai bisogno di una risoluzione tempestiva la scelta migliore è il contatto via chat aprendo questo link: https://support.n26.com/it-it/come-iniziare/altro/come-contattare-n26Buona giornata!

name: Simone Chiantelli
title: Pessimo servizio e procedure da…
content: Pessimo servizio e procedure da medioevo per una carta ricaricabile, nemmeno fosse un american Express platino Avevo fatto richiesta della carta circa un anno fa e poi sospesi la procedura perche mi era più semplice e sbrigativo fare una Postepay Revolution con iban. Ora, passato un anno volevo richiederla perché mi serviva per altre cose online questa carta e quando ho fatto la richiesta dopo pochi passaggi non mi mandava avanti e mi diceva di contattare la assistenza. L' ho fatto, via chat non hanno numeri telefonici, ossia, c'è un numero ma non risponde nessuno e mi hanno detto che dovevamo cancellare il vecchio account per proseguire con la richiesta e ci sarebbe voluto max una settimana. Sono passati 10 giorni dopo vari tentativi per sapere a che punto erano e alla fine mi hanno chiesto la mail con cui un anno fa ho fatto la richiesta, ma non ho più quella mail e non me la ricordo assolutamente e loro mi hanno risposto che se non la ricordo non possono procedere con la cancellazione. Credo che non abbiano bisogno di venderle a questo punto sennò ci sarebbero stati mille modi per identificarmi, perché tanto tutto il problema sta lì. Pessimo, almeno per me.
reply: Ciao, Simone, grazie per il tuo feedback.Ci dispiace della tua esperienza. N26 è una banca online che vuole semplificare la burocrazia ma rimane pur sempre una banca che dà grande importanza alla sicurezza dei propri utenti e alle misure anti-phishing.Purtroppo può capitare che qualcosa non vada come previsto e che ci sia qualche intoppo.Ti ringraziamo della tua comprensione.Buona giornata.

name: Les 4 Fantastiques
title: Très satisfait de N26
content: Service client disponible, réactif et sympathique.

name: Ramiro Alves
title: Great bank
content: Great bank. The only thing separating N26 from the other main banks in the UK is the overdraft facility. N26 does not offer this service unfortunately.

name: Māthïs Hrû
title: facile a contacter
content: facile a contacter réponse clair et précise

name: Philippe Villerouge
title: La banque est très bien les virements…
content: La banque est très bien les virements très rapides. Seul problème les rib ne comportent pas le nom de la banque dessus et on ne peut pas avoir quelqu'un au téléphone

name: Molina
title: Je suis un nouveau membre et pour…
content: Je suis un nouveau membre et pour l'instant je suis très satisfait

name: Diogo Granadeiro
title: Support is amazing!
content: Support is amazing!There is however a fee of 3€ if you don't have sufficient funds in your account and a payment is processed.And with more than 5 withdrawls per month there is also a fee.But still 5*!

name: Sebastian S.
title: Was verstehen die denn unter P-Konto?
content: Ich habe ein P-Konto, bei N26. Jetzt laufe ich den DRITTEN Monat in Folge meinen Freibetrag nach. Ersten Monat wurde einfach nix gemacht, bis ich mich gemeldet habe und gebettelt habe, dass ich Miete, Strom und Sprit zu zahlen habe und sie doch bitte meinen Freibetrag freischalten sollen. Im zweiten haben sie zumindest den Grundfreibetrag freigeben, aber ich musste trotzdem zwei Wochen lang jeden Tag nachfragen was denn jetzt los sei.Heute, der dritte Monat, wieder das gleich. Grundbetrag freigegeben das wars.Also hocke ich mich wieder in den Chat frage die erste Mitarbeiterin, was denn los sei. Warum man es immer noch nicht hinbekommt. Mir wurde dann gesagt, dass das System noch am arbeiten sei und ich einfach warten soll und fertig. Nachdem ich gefragt habe wie lang ich warten darf wurde mir nur ein schöner Sonntag gewünscht und der Chat wurde beendet.Ich verstehe nicht warum man es einfach nicht hinbekommt, Konto XY hat einen Freibetrag XXXX, dieser ist ab 0.00 Uhr jeden 01. des Monats verfügbar. Nein anscheinend schaltet ein System erstmal alle Grundfreibeträge frei und anschließend macht dann ein Mitarbeiter den erhöhten Freibetrag .... sofern sie Lust und evtl. mal Zeit haben ....Man wird nur verdröstet, dass man warten soll und Geduld haben soll ... Mal schauen ob meine Verbindlichkeiten, die ich habe sich auch so einfach abspeisen lassen ... so wie ich es muss ... ZUM K****!Letzten zwei Monate schon Mahngebühren noch und nöcher zahlen müssen und diesen Monat schaut es auch nicht besser aus... Denn beteiligen tun die sich überhaupt nicht .. Gott sei Dank ist mein Vermieter nachsichtig und lässt mir ein wenig Zeit mit der Miete. Denn dreimal nicht pünkntlich Miete zahlen kann ja zum Rauswurf führen ....Kein Mitdenken, keine Empathie ... nichts ...
reply: Hey Sebastian, danke für dein ausführliche Feedback.Mastercard ist ein amerikanisches Unternehmen, dort gibt es sowas wie P-Konten nicht, daher kommt es zu Schwierigkeiten mit dem Freibetrag. Mastercard versteht die Zurücksetzung am 1. des Monats nicht, da es nicht überall P-Konten gibt, somit wird das von Mastercard nicht erkannt.N26 passt das dann gerne für betroffene Kunden an, daher ist es ja so wichtig und empfehlenswert, dass man den Support seiner Bank kontaktiert, sollte dies nicht automatisch zurück gesetzt werden.An einer automatischen Zurücksetzung arbeiten wir natürlich bereits und bitten um ein wenig Geduld für diesen Prozess.Grüße, dein N26 Support.

name: Sandra Wells
title: I'm using N26 in Spain where banks are…
content: I'm using N26 in Spain where banks are really slow and customer service is not to die for. The speed of transfers through N26 is well above that of the Spanish banks and so are their apps (both on computer and phone). The partnership with Transferwise is also a plus, as I needed to transfer money to fund property purchases and it worked quite seamlessly. One time there was a problem, but customer service was very helpful (the same person followed up to make sure it was solved) and it was sorted. Overall, the experience with N26 is well above that of the local banks, so I'm pleased to work with them.

name: Priyanka
title: An excellent app
content: An excellent app, banking is made fun. It's so cool how easy everything is and nicely presented. It's everything I wanted in a bank. More trading options in the future would be a nice addition.

name: Jérôme zeline
title: Très bon service
content: Très bon service. Service client très réactif et très professionnel

name: DC
title: I opened an account in UK
content: I opened an account in UK. Quick and easy online help was great and my card arrived within 4 days. I have a Metal account and the benefits are great! Keep up the good work N26!

name: Hugo Oshiro
title: I compare N26 with my other account in…
content: I compare N26 with my other account in an old german bank, where they send me tons of papers, the contract is all in German and to solve anything I have to call them and hope that somebody will speak English. And sometimes they are not able to solve my problem and I need to go to an agency. With n26 I can solve everything online, everything can be in English, and if things get complicated I have chat support, where they can solve everything to me without I have to leave my place.

name: BOURGOIS

content: Très Bon produit, mes commerciaux à revoir leur formation et leur volonté de travailler pour faire progresser le produit

name: diane powell
