name: Jean-Yves Aiglon
title: Application simple et efficace
content: Application simple et efficace. Une banque pour ceux qui sont capables de s'autogérer

name: Adam S
title: Excellent dans un sens général même si…
content: Excellent dans un sens général même si parfois certains agents son limité dans leurs compétences et leurs connaissances du produit

name: Bonnie74
title: Banque en ligne sans frais cachés !
content: Banque en ligne sans frais cachés !C'est une expérience un peu nouvelle car N26 propose beaucoup de services et de nombreuses rubriques. C'est très complet mais je me perds encore dans les rubriques. Grande facilité pour contacter le service client.

name: Yaya Kone
title: N26,le meilleur des meilleurs
content: Etant en vacance en afrique en cote d'Ivoire precisement,j'ai un retirer de l'espece dans un distributeur automatique de billets de banque avec ma carte master card N26,j'avoue etre tres satisfait....a conseiller vivement.

name: Ibrahim Banva
title: very good service and nice customer…
content: very good service and nice customer support i am happy with n26 bank staff and services its nice application

name: Karmveer Tanwar
title: I think you please accept other…
content: I think you please accept other countries digital secure I'D because everyone not having all necessary documents.

name: Mohit
title: Easy and best banking experience at no…
content: Easy and best banking experience at no extra cost.

name: Navil Makaille
title: Réactif et très professionnel un grand…
content: Réactif et très professionnel un grand merci

name: lionel
title: service réactif
content: service réactif , je recommande

name: Balazs
title: Very good bank - once you get through the registration process
content: Though the signup process should be easy, in reality, it can be a 40-50 minutes painful procedure getting to an agent who speaks english without severe accent and the quality of the call is sufficient for identification.But once you get through this, man, the webbank and the mobile application is super-easy to use, and it is loaded with handy features like 'spaces', automatic expence categorization etc.

name: Céline Helderlin
title: Transaction simple et rapide
content: Transaction simple et rapideNiveau relationnel c'est clair, rapide et pris en compte simplement

name: Patrick Dauvel
title: Efficacité de la banque N26
content: Efficacité de la banque N26

name: Sharon Barnes
title: Fantastic, fast, efficient
content: I'm in Portugal, I completed my online application on Monday afternoon, opted to pay for fast delivery of my card, (expected 3 to 5 days), card arrived Wednesday morning (less than 48 hours). I found it easier to activate my account using a laptop/tablet. Needed to change my phone number prior to pairing my mobile, a simple secure process. Transferred money from the UK to my N26 account, easy. I'm not techno savy so I did need a little patience to navigate my way but totally thrilled with my new account and the fact that I'll be saving £40 a month in currency exchange charges. Thank you N26

name: Aude Combes
title: Excellent
content: Cliente depuis 4 mois, je suis très satisfaite. Tout est simple, application intuitive, service client poli et performant. Seul bémol, l’IBAN allemand....

name: Pierre Costes
title: Économique
content: Économique, sécurisé, fiable, pratique, support en ligne quasi permanent, rien à redire sur ce système bancaire

name: Konstadinos Sklivanos
title: Very good service
content: Very good service. Every day 24h... I am from Greece and I have this bank account to Germany to save some money!!

name: lynzcub
title: The worst customer service
content: The worst customer service I’ve encountered in a bank. Trying to update my phone number when my card has never been sent to me has proved an impossible task, meaning I can’t access the app. After 3  chat conversations with customer service, the final one ending with the agent literally ending the call mid conversation, I give up. If this is how they treat their potential customers, imagine how they treat their existing customers.
reply: Hi,For security reasons, it is not possible to amend any account sensitive information before your card has been received, as there is a unique "token" on this card that helps to identify you as a customer, so that we can be sure we are speaking with the account holder before any information is amended.We apologise for any inconvenience that this has caused you.Best Regards,Your N26 Support Team

name: Jean Lannes
title: J'étais inquiet au départ
content: J'étais inquiet au départ, prudent j'ai testé, et il faut reconnaître que tout c'est super bien passé.  Virement on ne peut plus rapide, très réactifs, en ligne réponse à toutes mes inquiétudes, au final peu justifiées!  Alors je ne regrette rien, et pense que j'aurais dû avoir cette banque bien avant. Bref, j'ai confiance, rien jusqu'ici à lui reprocher, il ne faut pas hésiter..

name: George Too
title: No interest in customer needs
content: Customer service seem to be very helpful but the company in general seem to not have customer needs as their priority. I opened my account prior to moving to Germany expecting I would have my card ready to go when I arrived. It's been 16 days and no card. I am still using my American bank cards so I have to deal with international transaction charges and rate conversions that works against me. I discussed this with customer service and they would be willing to order another card but wait another 14 days or expedite for 20 Euros..... I'll find another bank that seem wiling and want to handle my money.
reply: Hey George,We apologise for the negative experience that you had with our customer service. Your card delivery should not take this long. You can send us an email to support@n26.com via the email address you registered your account with. We will then take it from there. You can also contact us via Twitter for further assistance! Best,Your N26 support team

name: Aurore Gervasoni
title: Banque tres reactive fonctionne très…
content: Banque tres reactive fonctionne très bien pour virement bancaire entre les comptes sont en 24h...a recommander avec carte bleue sans contact tres pratique...

name: Gustavo Vieira
title: Great international customer support
content: When I needed support it was fast, precise and efficient. I have everything I need with N26, and now I know I can trust them.

name: Brigitte Delalleau Carcaterra
title: Carte bancaire mobile simple a…
content: Carte bancaire mobile simple a utiliser....

name: Dr Kevin Woodgate
title: Epic customer service
content: Epic customer service

name: adriana attoh
title: Worst experience ever
content: Worst experience ever. After waiting 3 weeks for my ID to be verified, they sent an email stating my account cannot be opened due to legal circumstances. Which ones I do not know. Tried contacting them for clarification as I need this account for school, and they just ended the chat.
reply: Hi Adriana,As a licensed mobile bank, we are obliged to securely verify the identity of all potential customers. On occasion, the result of our verification process will determine that you are currently ineligible for an account with us due to legal restrictions. We apologise for any disappointment caused.Best Regards,Your N26 Support Team

name: Sgomer Pâl
title: Worst customer service ever
content: Absolutely terrible and useless customer service. The worst I have ever encountered. Stay away. 4 emails for them to delete personal data and still just generic copy paste answers and no resolve. Very dodgy processes. If there was 0 star rating they surely deserve it. I regret the moment I had to deal with them.
reply: Hi Sgomer,We apologise for the wait whilst we process the removal of your information. Once you have sent the request from your registered email, rest assured that it will be seen to at the earliest possible date, and you will be informed as soon as it is done.Best Regards,Your N26 Support Team

name: Leandro Sehnem Bortolotto
title: Excellent
content: Excellent, very good digital bank!

name: Sascha
title: Klappt alles super!
content: Klappt alles super!Ich bin bereits seit mehreren Jahren stolzer Kunde von N26 (Black) und freue mich über diesen Schritt.Anders als bei meinem alten örtlichen Sparkassenkonto laufen viele Prozesse besser, übersichtlicher und mit Abstand stilvoller ab. Sowohl die App als auch die Debit Mastercard sind ein Hingucker und wenn man dann mit SmartWatch oder Smartphone an der Kasse bezahlt gucken viele erstmal verblüfft. Jeder Kontakt mit dem Kundenservice (per Chat) war ein Aufwand von wenigen Minuten. Mir wurde immer kompetent und schnell geholfen. Auch Rückerstattungen mit Wartezeiten von 3-5 Werktagen waren nach einigen Sekunden erledigt.Das Konto (Basis) ist kostenfrei, und 5 Auszahlungen von Automaten sind ausreichend wenn man sich Bargeld einteilen kann. Alles in allem das beste Konto das es für mich gibt. Und keine Bank kommt an N26 ran. Weiter so!

name: Geraldine Chapat Froberger
title: ABSOLUMENT RIEN DE NEGATIF
content: depuis 6 mois je n ai eu AUCUN PB, je suis extrement satisfaite de N26 en plus la carte est est tres jolie , le service apres vente fonctionne tres bien tant avec le chat que la ligne téléphonique, mon conjoint a un compte Nickel et je peux vous dire qu entre les deux je ne regrette pas mon choixbravo N26

name: Dan T
title: Lol what a joke
content: lol their on boarding process is a joke. And kinda rude too lol. Is ok you’re not the only credit card around lol

name: Emanuela Fabbri
title: Costumer Sevice in chat terribile
content: Costumer Sevice in chat terribile. Operatori impreparati e lassisti. Ho avuto un problema con il documento caricato....il 1° operatore in chat  mi ha risolto il problema a metà, poi mi ha detto: "mi scusi ma devo chiudere la chat". E l'ha chiusa!! Sono rimasta lì come una citrulla....ho richiamato, ho spiegato l accaduto ed il 2° operatore mi ha risolto il problema fino in fondo. Da qui è partita una nuova verifica per i documenti. Mi avrebbero dovuto richiamare entro 15 giorni...aspetto da 2 mesi!! Non so se richiamare...se la carta funziona come gli operatori in chat...siamo a posto!!
reply: Hi Dan,Can you kindly elaborate so that we can assist you with this? You can reach out to us via live chat from within the N26 Support Center, from there you will be connected to an agent.Best Regards,Your N26 Support Team

name: Alain Ribere
title: Je suis très satisfait de cette banque
content: Je suis très satisfait de cette banque. J'ai eu un problème avec ma carte bancaire et elle a été changée rapidement sans difficulté.
reply: Ciao Emanuela, grazie per la segnalazione.Siamo spiacenti per l'accaduto, in quanto banca con licenza rilasciata dalla BCE N26 deve rispondere a dei controlli molto rigorosi, il che riguarda anche l'identificazione dei nostri clienti.Alle volte possiamo avere bisogno di un controllo in più o può verificarsi qualche errore.Ricontattaci in chat, saremo felici di verificare il tuo caso e aiutarti.A presto!

name: U Costinel Laurentiu
title: "occasionally" they won't open accounts for people
content: I opened an account 2 days ago, I sent them my biometric passport info along with clear photos and today I received a message stating they are unable to open an account for me because "occasionally we are unable to open accounts due these restrictions". What "restrictions" ? I never was a N26 client, my country is in your list, so based on your available countries, I'm eligible for an account with you. Why you "occasionally" just collect personal information from people for nothing?"We would like to thank you for your patience, understanding and interest in N26." Yeah, thank you for collection my personal info for nothing and thank you for wasting my time.Please delete my personal info from your server.

name: Yannick Reillib
title: Une banque au top
content: Au départ j'ai pris le compte N26 pour me servir de la carte comme d'une carte prépayée, mais maintenant cela fait trois mois que c'est devenu mon compte bancaire principal et j'en suis très satisfait, suivit des dépenses en direct, plafond de dépenses très confortable.Vraiment un vrai bonheur comparé aux banques traditionnelles.
reply: Hi Costinel,As a licensed mobile bank, we are obliged to securely verify the identity of all potential customers. On occasion, the result of our verification process will determine that you are currently ineligible for an account with us. Please contact us via an official platform, such as our email at support@n26.com about removing your information, as we cannot action this via Trustpilot.We apologise for any disappointment caused.Best Regards,Your N26 Support Team

name: Staebler Max
title: Tout ce que ma carte fait (sauf les…
content: Tout ce que ma carte fait (sauf les assurances qu'on utilise jamais) payement internet , sans contact le tout gratuit.  Seul chose a redire,  vue que c est une carte immédiate (je paye, 2 secondes après,  l application me signale un payement) donc le problème c'est au station automatique,  vue que cela demande jusqu'à 100 euros d'autorisation,  vous mettez 5 euros d'essence et vous êtes prélevé de 100 euros et remboursé pour ma part de 95euros mais 5 jours plus tard.

name: Jonathan Boon
title: Seriously, Avoid N26
content: Opened a Metal Card Account in January. And decided to close it in March (Including sending an email to the support team for account closure.). I've been talking to the chat support and they're always giving reasons such as 'System's down and they're trying their best to fix it.' stuff like that. Now its the end of August and I've just got off chat support and they've frozen my account. GREAT. The service is really just appalling and just plain BAD.Just stick to Revolut, it's way better.

name: Gc 88
title: le service est rapide tout fonctionne…
content: le service est rapide tout fonctionne correctement les RIB les cartes bancaires on peut joindre un conseiller quasiment n'importe quand tout est bien
reply: Hey Jonathan,We apologise for the negative experience that you had with our customer service. You can send us an email to support@n26.com via the email address you registered your account with. We will then take it from there. You can also contact us via Twitter so we can help.Best,Your N26 support team

name: Schwärzler Peter
title: Ich bleibe bei meiner Entscheidung!
content: Ich bleibe bei meiner Entscheidung!Nach Tage langem hin & her könnte ich endlich Klarheit über "mein Konto" bei N26 gewinnen. Mein Konto wurde gelöscht!!! Wegen Zahlungen die Auffällig gewesen wären...!? Ich habe von meinem N26 Konto Zahlungen auf ein anderes N26 Konto getätigt, um meinen Urlaub zu finanzieren!Das ist die letzte Nummer, N26 ein "NoGo"!! Spart Euch die Mühe für ein Zweitkonto.Meine Bewertung daher null Sterne....

name: Alain Escudero
title: Voilà enfin une banque à l’écoute
content: Voilà enfin une banque à l’écoute, sans avoir à appuyer sur 1, sur 2, etc, etc.....pour ne jamais avoir d’interlocuteur.Je suis très serein quant à l’utilisation de N26.
reply: Hey, danke für dein Feedback.Als vollwertige Bank muss sich N26 den geltenden Bankvorschriften unterwerfen. Diese Regelung zielt darauf ab, unsere Nutzer zu schützen.Bei der Verwendung deines Bankkontos treten keine Probleme auf, wenn du nicht gegen unsere Allgemeinen Geschäftsbedingungen verstößt.Gruß, dein N26 Team.

name: Alain Picard
title: Je recommande
content: Je recommande, les conseillers sont disponibles, le plafond de carte est plus grand que les banques traditionnelles, une MasterCard gratuit, une application facile à utiliser, paiement à l’étranger gratuit

name: Allan Guéguénou
title: Compte très simple a utiliser
content: Compte très simple a utiliser. Chaque problème est résolu rapidement. On a rapidement quelqu'un qui peut répondre à nos questions.

name: Paulo Alexandre Pinto
title: Excelent card..
content: Excelent card... Miss to obtain my 5 stars because I think it might have the option to add cards to recharge immediatly (like revolut). The exchange rate is better than revolut and is easy to use

name: ralph
title: support non-existent
content: Failure during sign-up.  Technical error during ID verification process (not error OF my verification, but technical error with the app/process itself).  Availability of support is non-existent.  Chat with support person is useless - undertrained and unempowered.  Emailed official support email (found from internet search, as its not obviously published on EU website...), but they dont answer that either.Personally, I dont need this account, as I have Schwab account with fee-free global ATM access, with no FX surcharge added to market FX rates.  And I'm happy to pay for my accounts at other traditional big banks where there are branches on every corner and staff I can call or email, whose offices I can walk in.For those who rely on this as their primary financial institution, think twice and thrice if you want your money in a place where your only means of contact is a chat box with undertrained agents?At least try the competing "digital banks", who has better ratings and far fewer problems reported here on N26.  They have the worst consumer rating here, they have by far the worst employee rating on glassdoor... is this a company you want to do busines with?

name: Ahmed Jawad
title: Lovely Bank
content: easy, flex. with tons of features.

name: Pier Paolo Viale
title: Con mio rammarico ho tentato di aprire…
content: Con mio rammarico ho tentato di aprire il conto ma non ci sono riuscito e non ho neppure capito il perché, non mi è stata fornita alcuna motivazione comprensibile. Tanta pubblicità accattivante ma poi .......
reply: Ciao, Pier Paolo, grazie per il tuo feedback.Nel caso la tua situazione si sia bloccata per motivi tecnici ti invitiamo a contattarci via chat con questo link: https://support.n26.com/it-it/come-iniziare/altro/come-contattare-n26 . Nel caso in cui ti abbiamo comunicato che non è possibile aprire un conto con noi allora fa fede la comunicazione che hai ricevuto nel momento in cui ti è arrivata.Buona giornata!

name: Lionel Spratt
title: To me it's an awesome bank. I highly recommend!
content: I read many bad reviews about this service, people saying it's a scam etc. I don't know if they use the US service or the EU service. I am using the EU service it's been nothing but perfect. I have no complaints so far. The only time I had a problem where I didn't receive my Maestro card when I ordered it, they solved my problem on the same day. I contacted support on Tuesday morning, card was shipped on the same day, and it arrived on Thursday morning.I highly recommend this bank. I hope things don't mess up when it gets too popular.

name: fabio guidetti
title: Mi trovo benissimo
content: Mi trovo benissimo, ormai ho N26 da diversi mesi e la uso ovunque. App davvero ben fatta e molto intuitiva, fluida. Possibilità di pagare tramite contactless e Google Pay via telefono. All'estero tutte le transazioni via carta non hanno costi di commissione. In Europa prelievi e pagamenti a costo 0. Quelli all'estero hanno una commissione del 1,7%. Lato assistenza non ho avuto modo di averne a che fare ma persone che conosco me ne hanno parlato molto bene.Lascio il mio codice da inserire al momento della creazione del conto grazie al quale potete guadagnare 15€ alla prima ricarica o al primo pagamento con la carta: fabiog6862

name: Anne Honsel
title: Brilliant
content: Brilliant! Set up the account in less than half an hour.

name: Lea Bernus Borinan
title: Great neo-banking service
content: Great neo-banking service! Everything you could ask from a neo-bank (online bank): efficient, fast, secure, instant notifications every time you use your account and superb customer service.So, even if you have an issue, at least know this: it will be resolved quickly.Best customer service I have seen in a while!

name: pete aldridge
title: After a few problems with identity they…
content: After a few problems with identity they solved it and now a am a proud owner of a n26 account they also told me how to use transferwise to move my money from uk pound to euros

name: Maj Štrukelj
title: Absolutely amazing!
content: Excellent banking experience and awesome support team that is quick and professional.

name: Sarah
title: Love N26
content: Really big fan of N26. I had to move to Germany from the UK as part of my degree course. It was so handy that I was able to open up a German bank account before I even moved over. Never had any problems and can keep track of my spending much easier than my other bank!

name: Paul Messian-Imbert
title: Great secondary bank
content: Easy of use, great customer service, cool cards

name: Bass
title: N26 JUSTE PARFAIT MAIS UN PROBLEME POUR BUSINESS
content: Les Service client repond rapidement , avec une appli haut de gamme aucun beug etc...) Tres réflechi juste parfait. J'enleve juste une étoile car pour le compte business et le compte personnel peut pas être dans le meme compte tous simplement dommage. Mais sinon je recommande pour les entrepreneurs ou pas de prendre cette banque superbe ne faite plus confiance au bank traditionelle c'est l'arnaque. MERCI N26 !

name: Liz Gorny
title: DO NOT BANK WITH N26
content: I tried to close my account and N26 are withholding over 1000 euros from me, and refuse to give me a date when this will be returned.
reply: Hi Liz,We're sorry that the cancellation process took longer than anticipated. Once you send the complete document via email along with details of the account you wish for the funds to be transferred to, we endeavour to reply within 2 days. We're sorry if this did not happen in your case. We recommend transferring the funds out before the cancellation is requested if possible, as this will speed up the process greatly.Best Regards, Your N26 Support Team

name: Gabrielle ATTALI
title: Appli intuitive
content: Appli intuitive, suivi en temps réel, service client réactif et soucieux de nous aider au maximum !

name: M K
title: Finger weg!
content: Achtung, wenn Geld verschwindet wird vom Kundenservice auch nach mehreren Monaten keine Lösung angeboten!
reply: Hey, danke für dein Feedback.Wir geben immer unser Bestes um Probleme zu vermeiden und möchten besser verstehen, was passiert ist. Bitte sende uns doch eine private Nachricht an unseren N26_Support Twitter Account: https://twitter.com/N26_Support?s=09 oder über unseren Facebook Account: https://www.facebook.com/N26DE/. Wir würden uns freuen dir bei dem Problem helfen zu können. Gruß, dein N26 Team

name: Lucas Lima
title: Transfer of remaining funds / account closure / re verification process
content: I was asked to re-verify my account, tried to do it but it was unsuccessfully because of my residence permit (They asked for 1 year and I only have for 4 months left). I requested the account closure on 21.08. Got the answer that it was starting on 22.08. Since then I've been waiting for N26 to transfer my remaining funds (around 1.100€), after speaking uncountable times with customer support by email, twitter and etc; n26 did transfer 37,06€ yesterday (29.08), but as said before, I had 1.100€, mostly in the "spaces" area, so I have no access to the money, as I haven't had access to the app in a week, since I started the re-verification process.Now I'm almost going crazy because I need my money to pay my bills, my rent payment will be in 3 days and other things, and also to survive! I do hope I will see my money, which was gained with countless hours of hard work, back. I get responses by the customer support by email, but all of them just asking me to wait, but I sincerely can not wait anymore. I need the money urgently. I just want this to be over.

name: Bruno M.
title: Enfin une banque qui respecte ses clients
content: Enfin une banque qui respecte ses clients, à la pointe de la technologie, sans frais.
reply: Hi Lucas,We would like to take this opportunity to apologise for any inconvenience caused by the re-verification process. We are legally obligated to verify our customers at regular intervals, and we're sorry that this process did not go smoothly for you. We encourage you to reach out to us via live chat from within the N26 support center so that an agent can advise you on transferring the funds from your Spaces. You can open a chat directly from the article "How to open my N26 account?".We apologise for the delay in response, and we hope that this issue has been resolved for you. Best Regards, Your N26 Support Team

name: Alexandra Roncevic
title: Inkompetenz pur
content: Ich habe gestern ein Firmenkonto versucht zu eröffnen , bis heute soll ich mich nach dem ganzen Video ID Prozess noch einmal identifizieren, ????? Ja wie oft muss ich das Identifikationsverfahren noch machen ?... 50 mal ? Auch die Entknüpfung mit der alten Handy Nummer zur neuen klappt überhaupt nicht. Man kann die Nummer nicht ändern. Entschuldigung aber das ist Inkompetenz pur. Ich bin Freiberuflerin und kann mir dieses Kasperletheater nicht leisten. Und vielen Dank . das man sich während des Identverfahrens über meine Behinderung lustig gemacht hat. Sehr zuvorkommend. Fazit, nie wieder und ich werde auch alles bei ihnen auflösen. Meldung und Beschwerde ergeht an die Bafin

name: Jade
title: Excellent and simple online banking
content: Excellent and simple online banking. The best :)

name: Tim
title: This bank has amazing customer service!
content: This bank has amazing customer service.  Bank of America had better hope they never come to the US,  The quality of N26’s service and their focus on customer experience -would cause many customers to switch away from BoA.  This is the best “bank customer service” I have ever experienced.
reply: Hey Alexandra, danke für dein Feedback.Bitte entschuldige, dass es bezüglich deiner Verifizierung zu Problemen gekommen ist, sodass eine erneute Verifizierung notwendig war.Gerne kannst du unseren Kundensupport im Chat fragen, in wie weit die Verifizierung fortgeschritten ist. Du kannst den Chat über diese Seite eröffnen: https://support.n26.com/de-de/erste-schritte/persoenliche-daten/wie-kann-ich-mich-ausweisenDie Verifizierungen werden von der Partnerfirma IDNow durchgeführt, welche IDNow Mitarbeiter  sind.Wir werden die Video-Verifizierung der Kollegen kontrollieren und dementsprechend handeln, sollte eine Diskriminierung stattgefunden haben.Grüße, dein N26 Support Team.

name: Emma N.
title: Excellents services
content: Excellents services. Supports au Top! Ne manque plus que la possibilité d'ouvrir un compte épargne en France. Je recommande vivement.Merci N26 de me simplifier la vie.

name: Lulu Lopez
title: I love N26
content: I love N26. It’s so easy to do banking with them. Sometimes you get little bugs, but their support team know how to resolve the matter quickly and effortlessly. I’m a huge fan as traditional banking in Germany really is archaic. Keep doing great work N26!

name: Chiavacci
title: Une banque moderne
content: Une banque moderne, ils ont tout compris, ceci est le service client qu'on doit délivrer en 2019. J'avais un problème, ils m'ont proposé La solution... Bravo, ne changez rien svp.

name: Mugnier
title: Une banque en ligne comme on en rêve
content: Une banque en ligne extrêmement simple d utilisation. Un service d aide en ligne très efficace, rapide et compétent. Je la recommande vivement.

name: Sven
title: Bank kündigt wahllos Konten ohne Aufklärung von Betrug
content: Kreditkartenbetrüger benutzten meine Kreditkartennummer, obwohl diese von mir immer gesperrt wurde und nur kurz frei geschaltet, wenn ich damit bezahlen wollte. Trotz Nachweise an die Bank, dass mein Geld durch Betrug geraubt wurde, bekam ich das Geld nicht zurück erstattet, ausser vertröstungen und Ankündigungen auf erstattung. Wohlgleich, dass die alte Kreditkarte dauerhaft gesperrt war (ich habe eine neue bekommen, die ich auch selbst bezahlen musste) wurden weitere Abbuchungen vorgenommen, die nicht von mir getätigt wurden, bis mein Konto im Minus stand. Zahlungen gingen alle an eine Autovermietung. Ich habe mit dieser Telefoniert und diese erstatten mir mein Geld von einigen Tausend Euro zurück. Fragt sich jetzt nur noch, ob die N26 das Geld nicht einfach einbehalten möchte, da diese Bank mir mehr den je als unseriös erscheint.Der Support half mir nicht, man muss sich um alles selbst kümmern und N26 kündigte sofort mein dortiges konto, da es nicht gedeckt war (ungeachtet dessen, dass es nicht in den Minus gehen kann, laut Vertrag und AGB). Jetzt bekommt diese Bank von mir eine Anzeige "falls möglich" (Betrug trotz Nachweise meiner seits geduldet, denn Unwissenheit schützt vor Strafe nicht?!), meinen Anwalt und die BaFin ins Haus.Update 02.09.19:Wie ich es befürchtet habe. Ein Teil des Geldes wurde von der Autovermietung schnellstens erstattet. Leider ist die N26 nicht in der Lage das Geld meinem Konto auch gut zu schreiben. Ich habe das Konto selbst mit meinem ersparten ausgeglichen, statt aber eine Gutschift, wurde mein Konto erneut mit dieser Gutschrift in den Minus gebracht. Minus und Plus zu unterscheiden, sollte man schon können, wenn man mit dem Geld anderer umgeht!Update 18.10.2019Ich habe gedacht, man hat Ruhe von dieser Bank, da die Bank mich ja gekündigt hat. Nun wurde von dieser Bank N26 noch eine Strafanzeige gegen mich erstellt, wegen Betruges. Ich glaube ich habe da irgend etwas verpasst, denn nicht ich bin der Betrüger, sondern die Bank selbst. Da ich alles Belegen kann, was die N26 mir an Geld unberechtigter Weise von der Kreditkkarte abbuchte und bis heute selbst nicht auf die Idee kam, es mir zu erstatten, geschweige das selbst irgend wie aufzuklären, wird es schwer für die N26 sein, diese Strafanzeige bei der Staatanwaltschaft geltend zu machen. Im Gegenzug bekommt dann die N26 von mir eine Anzeige, wegen falscher Verdächtigung/Beschuldigung und selbst eine Stafanzeige wegen Betruges, wo die N26 es dann schwer haben wird da gegen anzukämpfen. Leider wird für solche Prozesse auch wieder Geld der Kunden benutzt.Vielleicht kommt noch ein Update, da es sich wohl um eine "never ending story" handelt.
reply: Hey Sven, danke für dein Feedback.Als vollwertige Bank muss sich N26 den geltenden Bankvorschriften unterwerfen. Diese Regelung zielt darauf ab, unsere Nutzer zu schützen.Bei der Verwendung deines Bankkontos treten keine Probleme auf, wenn du nicht gegen unsere Allgemeinen Geschäftsbedingungen verstößt.Sollte dies geschehen sein, behalten wir  uns alle  Rechtlichen Schritte vor.Bis dahin bitten wir um Geduld. Gruß, dein N26 Support-Team.

name: Ulf
title: Keine Lieferung der Karte, keiner weiss etwas.
content: Seitens N26 wurde die Lieferung der Karte innerhalb von 2 Wochen zugesagt. Nach 15 Tagen den Service per Chat kontaktiert. Nichts als hinhalten. Ich sollte doch noch 2 Tage warten. Nach 4 weiteren Tagen immer noch nichts. Also wieder der Chat:Und jetzt kommts: Man kann sich nicht vorstellen das die Karte noch nicht angekommen ist!! Der Rest das gleiche wie einige Tage vorher.Hinhalten, als ich schrieb das doch jemand wissen muesste was los ist wurde der Chat von einem "Michael" abgebrochen. Verstaendlich bei so einer unerverschaemten Frage von mir.1 Stern ist zuviel, -5 Sterne waere angebracht.Die Idendifizierung per  Video hat 30 min. gedauert, Pass nach links drehen, nach rechts drehen, usw. Aber keiner weiss etwas und davon viel.Fazit Konto wieder kuendigen bevor es eroeffnet wurde.Die sind hoffnungslos ueberfoerdet die Armen.AnaisaOriginaltext:Da die Karte noch nicht angekommen ist und ich mir nicht vorstellen kann das die bis morgen noch auftaucht , prüfe bitte einmal deine Lieferadresse.Michael · 18:58
reply: Hey Ulf, danke für dein Feedback.Auf dieser Seite findest du alle Informationen, bezüglich der Sendung der Karten:  https://support.n26.com/de-de/erste-schritte/karten/wann-kommt-meine-karteSofern alle Daten überprüft worden sind und die maximale Dauer von 14 Tagen erreicht ist, bestellen wir natürlich auch eine kostenlose neue Karte aus.Wir bedauern sehr, wenn du dein Konto wieder geschlossen hast. Dies ist nicht der Kundensupport, welchen wir anbieten möchten.Wir werden diesem nachgehen, um einen besseren Support für die Zukunft anbieten zu können.Gruß, dein N26 Support Team.

name: Philippe
title: Tout et parfait convivialité
content: Tout et parfait convivialité

name: Loek
title: Very poor service
content: Very poor service, tried to confirm my identity through videochat but service guy was unkind and hung up after help of my friendjust poor, very very bad
reply: Hi Loek,We apologise for this issue you had when verifying. It is absolutely necessary that the call is done by only you so we can ensure that your verification is not tampered with, and it is just you opening the account with no outside influence or pressure. If the agent taking the call becomes aware that another person is present, they are required to end the call. Please go through the verification again by yourself.Best Regards,Your N26 Support Team

name: Dioni
title: NI se te ocurra abrir una cuenta
content: Una put* mierd*. Son 'el banco del futuro' y especiales para autónomos pero no aceptan recibir pagos en dólares. WTF!Servicio de soporte en línea un desastre, no resuelven nada.Reclamos via e-mail, ya puedes ponerte a peinar canas hasta que te contesten los típicos mensajes standard. El proceso de alta, un suplicio
reply: Buenos días.Somos un banco principalmente europeo y por el momento solo funcionamos con transferencias SEPA. Si quieres enviar o recibir dinero en una divisa diferente al euro, tendrás que operarla a través de SEPA. Para operar transferencias SWIFT puedes utilizar los servicios de nuestro socio Transferwise, integrado en la app. Puedes encontrar más información acerca de sus servicios y de las comisiones que aplican directamente en su página web: https://transferwise.com/esPuedes abrir tu cuenta en menos de 8 minutos directamente desde la página web o descargándote la app en tu móvil. Una vez hayas abierto tu cuenta, tendrás que verificar tu identidad utilizando uno de los documentos aceptados por nuestro sistema para tal fin, y podrás empezar a usar tu cuenta. Consideramos que nuestro proceso de registro es bastante sencillo en comparación con otros bancos, sin embargo cualquier sugerencia para ayudarnos a mejorarlo siempre es bien recibida. Por favor, no dudes en hacérnoslas llegar.Tenemos un Servicio de Atención al Cliente especializado que está disponible 24/7 para atender a las consultas de nuestros clientes. Si no estás satisfecho con la atención que has recibido o consideras que no ha estado a la altura de tus expectativas, te pedimos por favor que nos envíes un email a support@n26.com con más información acerca de tu caso, para que podamos investigarlo y comprobar si se ajusta a nuestros estándares de calidad.Un saludo.

name: Shima
title: I recommend N26
content: I recommend N26! User friendly banking system! I hadn’t any problem until now!

name: Aliaksandr Tsumarau
title: I am satisfied with the service
content: I am satisfied with the service. Only one question - can not print a single transaction PDF. Which is very useful when the payment is compensated by accountancy department at work.

name: Delphine Nicolas
title: Service chat très rapide et efficace je…
content: Service chat très rapide et efficace je recommande cet banque

name: M. MUKENGE Marie Kanku
title: enfin une banque easy...
content: enfin une banque easy qui ne vous prend pas de l´argent sans que vous compreniez à l´avance pourquoi. une banque en ligne cette, mais très accessible comme si vous alliez à votre guichet au coin de votre rue.À mon avis tout le monde va suivre le concept.

name: Luciana T
title: Simply stay away - BEWARE
content: Simply stay away. All goes well, until it doesn't, until they randomly decide to block your account and access to your own funds.Since August 21, 2019 my account is unlawfully blocked. Numerous attempts to contact N26's customer service, gain further insight and solve this issue remained unsuccessful. I am meanwhile seven days without any access to my account. I have to assume that payments I initiated are not processed either. I urged them to take immediate steps and, yet, the only thing their customer agents on their chat are able to say is that my query is being handled, they have no visibility on anything else, and I shall receive an email soon (no ETA). Then, they close the chat. Summary:19.08.2019 – I received an email requesting to re-verify my identity as a routine procedure that all banks have to follow, which I did straight away. In this email it stated that during the re-verification process I would be able to use my N26 card to make purchases or withdrawals, receive money, just would not be able to access my N26 app.21.08.2019 – Whilst I was trying to pay for my taxi fare, my card was declined and a message on my screen appeared: “We couldn’t process your transaction because your account has been blocked. We’ll email you with details.” I contacted your support team via chat and I was told there was nothing that could be done, my “account was seized” and they couldn’t give me more information apart from the fact that I’d be contacted soon by email. Several agents closed the chat on me without giving me any further information and refusing to escalate this issue. My funds were seized and I didn’t have access to it nor did I have any estimation of when N26 would provide an explanation or transfer my funds to another account. I promptly provided another account number for my money to be transferred.23.08.2019 – I received an email stating that I haven’t followed the request to verify my identity, resulting in my N26 account being terminated. This is probably from an incorrect template, as I had re-verified my identity on the same date as I received the 1st email (which also stated that I had until the 09.09.2019 to do so. In the same email, there was a request to provide my new account details AGAIN (3rd time) for N26 to transfer my funds.Between 21.08 and 26.08, several direct debits have been declined and as I haven’t had access to my funds, I have been unable to settle them yet. As of now, I haven’t received my funds in the alternative account number I provided.I am elsewise forced to engage legal support and file for injunctive relieve – demanding coverage of any potential costs or damage that will be caused by the unjustified seizure of my account.It's now the 28th of August and this issue is still pending.
reply: Hey Luciana,We apologise if you were not provided with a follow up regarding your case. Were you able to get your funds transferred to your alternative account? We advise you to reply directly to the email you received regarding this for further assistance. We apologise for the inconvenience this has caused you. You can contact us on Twitter or send us an email to support@n26.com via the email address you registered your account with. We will then take it from there. You can also contact our chat directly within the mobile app and webapp or from certain Support Center articles about opening an account (Available via our support center from a computer.) Best,Your N26 Support Team

name: CONSTANTIJN CRANENDONK
title: maybe the best bank ever
content: maybe the best bank ever. Their customer service or procedures needs to be improved but for the rest it is a TOP bank

name: nch
title: Ein Stern ist leider noch immer zu…
content: Ein Stern ist leider noch immer zu viel...Normalerweise ist mir meine Zeit zu schade, um Bewertungen dieser Art zu schreiben, aber vor dieser Bank muss gewarnt werden. Den Hype um dieses Unternehmen betrachte ich mittlerweile als völlig unberechtigt und Eigenschaften wie agil, flexibel und jung kann ich auch mit viel Phantasie nicht sehen.Nachdem ich mich vor einiger Zeit dort registriert hatte, den Legitimierungsprozess allerdings noch nicht abgeschlossen hatte, wollte ich dies vor einiger Zeit nachholen. In der Zwischenzeit hatte sich jedoch meine Handynummer geändert, was dazu führte, dass der Legitimierungsprozess nicht wie gewohnt vollzogen werden konnte (irgendein Code wird an die Handynummer geschickt, setzt natürlich deren Aktualität voraus). Nun denn, ich wurde während der FaceTime Sitzung freundlich darauf hingewiesen, dass ich eine Löschung meiner Daten per Mail beantragen müsse, um mich daraufhin wieder neu anmelden zu können. Die Dame sagte mir es würde maximal bis zum nächsten Tag dauern. Seitdem sind mehr als 2 Wochen vergangen. Nach mehrmaliger Rückmeldung meinerseits auf automatisch generierter E-Mails kam auch heute wieder eine. Die Löschung würde nun in Auftrag gegeben werden und ab Montag könne ich mich wieder neu anmelden. (Heute ist Dienstag) Ich habe dafür keine Worte mehr. Doch, "danke" fällt mir ein. Danke dafür, dass ich durch diesen absolut unverschämten und inkompetenten Prozess davor bewahrt wurde Kunde zu werden. Ich möchte gar nicht wissen wie dort mit bestehenden Kunden umgegangen wird, wenn potentielle Neukunden schon so behandelt werden. Und dabei verstehe ich durchaus das Prinzip einer Online-Bank und das in Sachen Kundenservice (leider) häufig ein paar Abstriche gemacht werden müssen, aber dass es nun scheinbar gar keine Betreuung mehr gibt? Das ist mir ein Rätsel. Somit: Vorsicht bei der Kontowahl. Hier darf kein Service erwartet werden.
reply: Hey, danke für dein Feedback und deine ehrlichen Worte.Für die Unannehmlichkeiten möchten wir uns bei dir entschuldigen.  Wir geben immer unser Bestes um Probleme zu vermeiden. Wir möchten dir bei deiner Kontoeröffnung weiterhelfen. Wenn du uns eine private Nachricht an unseren N26_Support Twitter Account: https://twitter.com/N26_Support?s=09 oder über unseren Facebook Account: https://www.facebook.com/N26DE/ schickst, würden wir uns freuen dir bei dem Problem helfen zu können.Gruß, dein N26 Team.

name: Bibi Osman
title: Fast and easy customer service
content: Fast and easy customer service, knew exactly what they were talking about and my problem was solved in matter of seconds. Highly suggest these lot.

name: Brent
title: Beware
content: Beware! This bank seems great. So easy to sign up, fast and efficient but this is only half the story. Behind it is a ruthless, uncaring, inefficient, and incompetent banking service. I am 61 years old and never encountered service like this in my life. They are currently holding my money, have closed my account without any good reason, blocked my card and refusing to respond to emails and help requests. I threatened the Police and they suddenly become interested, momentarily, and then reverted to nonsensical responses and now silence. I have no access to money and they refuse to tell me why saying this is 'an internal matter' and they can't tell me. How can closing my account and refusing me access to my money be an internal matter? This is absurd. It is tantamount to theft and they are behaving appallingly. This is a serious German Bank yet it feels like I am in the middle of a Nigerian scam. I am wasting days of precious time and getting nowhere. And still I have no access to my money.Next day. Great. My review has prompted a reply from N26. To N26... you have my email address, you have a bank account to transfer my money to, what is stopping you doing this now? This is absurd to be communicating with you through Trust Pilot. I have given up wanting to know why you have closed my account and blocked my access. You have established multiple times my authenticity. Now, could you please just transfer my money to me and let me know through an email when you have done this.
reply: Hi Brent,We sincerely apologise if this situation has inconvenienced you in any way. In accordance with European banking processes, N26 must carry out regular routine checks on user accounts. We follow these processes to ensure our user accounts are kept safe and secure. In the event your account is blocked, we will make contact with you via email. For this reason, our customer support team are unable to advise further on these situations via alternative communication channels.We understand your query and the concern you may have for the status of your account, but for your own security, we are unable to provide detailed information and support through here. We hope that this can be resolved for you in a timely manner, and we will continue this correspondence via email.Best Regards,Your N26 Support Team

name: Jessica
title: Worst service
content: I have tried to close my account now for 2 months and nobody has replied to my support email to their support@ email since July 22nd. I have not received my card either and they keep charging me every month. I have never used or activated the account but I keep getting charged. Chat on their website keeps auto-closing the chat so my issue can never be resolved. Will stick with Revolut.
reply: Hi Jessica,We're sorry to learn this. Please ensure that you have emailed support@n26.com from your registered email address, otherwise the email would not be linked to your account. Alternatively, you can contact us via live chat from within the N26 Support Center, and an agent can advise you further.Best Regards,Your N26 Support Team

name: Bernard
title: Tres bonne banque
content: Tres bonne banque. Support très réactif et très très bonne application.

name: Mat
title: Schlecht unverschämt und frech
content: Schlecht unverschämt und frech. Ich habe versucht Geld anzulegen. Es wird kommuniziert, dass das 2 Werktage dauert. Das Geld wird vom Konto abgebucht aber nicht angelegt. Nach einer mehr als unverschämten Kommunikation mit einem Mitarbeiter über den Chat erhielt ich keine Auskunft. Er beendete das Gespräch. Beim 2. versuch die Info, dass es mehrere Wochen dauert. Wo ist mein Geld bis dahin!!! Das ist das unprofessionelle und schlechteste was ich je gesehen habe. Ich hoffe ich komme da irgendwie wieder raus.
reply: Hey Mat, danke für dein Feedback.Sollte ein Problem mit unserer Partnerfirma Raisin aufgetreten sein oder unserer Partnerbanken, welches ein Fehler oder Wartezeiten mit sich bringt bei der Eröffnung des Savingsplan, bitten wir vielmals um Entschuldigung.Unsere Kollegen im Chat werden dies an die dementsprechende Abteilung weiterleiten, damit dies von uns in Zusammenarbeit mit den Partnern behoben werden kann.Sollte es bisher zu noch keinem Ergebnis gekommen sein, kannst du dich gerne bei  uns Privat über: https://twitter.com/N26_Support?s=09  oder https://www.facebook.com/N26DE/ melden, sodass wir dies sofort als höhere Gewalt eskalieren und beheben lassen können.Grüße, dein N26 Support.

name: Michael Bricout
title: Tout est excellent
content: Tout est excellent ! Vraiment content d'avoir ouvert un compte N26 !

name: Rabii TouTou
title: Just do it
content: Just do it, it’s really a great bank, it’s for free and most of the extra service are for free or much more cheaper than other banks (specially in germany)  they have a great service and friendly professional customer service.

name: Ibrahim Loucif
title: La meilleure Banque en ligne
content: La meilleure Banque en ligne , service client rapide et professionnel. Facilité de gestion du compte.

name: Giorgio
title: Trying to open my account for over 2…
content: Trying to open my account for over 2 weeks. Identification process and team is just useless. Contacted them few time, always the same answer : wait and we will be back to you. Shame for a bank that let you wait over 2 weeks just to open your account. Not suggested.
reply: Hi Giorgio,We apologise for the wait whilst you are trying to open your account.Our verification process should usually complete within 5 days, as we are sorry that this has not happened in your case. In the event there has been an issue with your verification, we will request that our verification department investigate this and take the necessary action to complete your account set-up. Regrettably, this can take a short while as we work through all requests. Please be assured that we will contact you via email once we have an update.Best Regards,Your N26 Support Team

name: Jean-Karl Leo
title: Support incompétent ! Passer votre chemin.....
content: BonjourJe suis client N26 depuis 8 mois. Tout allait bien jusqu'à une simple mise à jour.Je m'explique : on me demande de renvoyer une copie de ma pièce d'identité pour des raisons réglementaires et ce que je fais aussitôt (étant un bon citoyen !)Je reçois une notification de N26 m'informant que mes documents seront vérifiés sous 2 jours ouvrés. Cela fait plus d'une semaine que mon compte est bloquée alors que cela devait être réalisé en 2 jours. Plusieurs mails aux services supports et incapables de me donner une réponse claire sur le traitement, le délai de résolution, etc...J'ai pris N26 en espérant trouver un service efficace. Force est de constater que ce n'est pas le cas. Je vais supprimer cette application de mon téléphone et me faire un plaisir d'aller chez leur concurrent Revolut.
reply: Bonjour Jean-Karl,Nous sommes désolés pour cette situation. En tant qu’établissement détenteur d’une licence bancaire, N26 a l'obligation légale de vérifier l’identité de ses clients à intervalles réguliers.Chaque dossier fait l'objet d'une enquête approfondie par nos équipes : un certain délai de traitement est donc à prendre en compte. Nous sommes conscients que cette situation n’est pas évidente, mais nous pouvons vous assurer que N26 suit la législation à la lettre et travaille pour régler chaque situation au plus vite.Salutations,L'équipe N26.

name: sophistic
title: Terrible customer support.
content: Eurice from customer support is giving misleading information about how your own business works. No polite at all, wasn't able to help on a serious situtation about abnormal charges and negative(!) balance on a debit card(!) while daily transaction limit was 0. Highlight of the conversation was:-"And we can be here checking all the transactions but your negative balance will not change" that was at least very helpful from a customer support agent when you are asking for help and trying to find out whats is going on.I also asked for case number and a copy of the conversation and I never got them.
reply: Hi,Thanks for taking the time to leave your feedback.We sincerely apologise for the experience you have had with us recently. We hope to resolve our customer issues in the most effective way possible, and we regret that this has not happened for you. We will pass on your feedback for review.We are unable to discuss specific transactions via Trustpilot as we cannot view your account without some necessary verification, but a possible reason for your negative balance when your limit was 0 may be down to some previous payments you had made that were waiting for collection by the merchant. We'd be happy to have another look into this for you again, but would require that you contact us via live chat once more. You can also then request your case number and transcript, and the agent can reach out to a senior in the event they require any assistance with your case.Best Regards,Your N26 Support Team

name: Niklas Götz
title: Almost perfect.
content: Almost perfect.I've been with N26 as my main bank account since November or December of 2018 and I've been very pleased with my experience so far. Design:The transparent card is amazing, let's be honest. Also the new card designs for the subscription models look really nice. The only downside I see is that my credit card number already faded away, maybe try a different paint? App:Everything you need is in the app, which was well programmed and easy to use. Personally I love to use the 'spaces' feature for budgeting.Also using 'Cash26' (available in Germany) to deposit cash has been a great experience. By the time I'm out of the store the money has already been put into my bank account.N26 is one of the few mobile banks I know of that also has a standard web interface you can use from the PC. To me this is very important.The downsides:- only 3 (or 5 if you're under 25 or use N26 as your primary bank) free withdrawals per month- The Maestro card is NOT compatible with Apple Pay / GooglePay even though those systems can work with Maestro (please add this feature, I use my Maestro card a lot)- Customer support is really busy in peak times or when there's a problem affecting multiple users, please hire more people. But even in those hard times the support team tries resolve your problems as fast as possible.

name: George Dekermenjian
title: Excellent bank
content: Excellent bank. Top of line customer service. iPhone App is well designed. Highly recommended!

name: T. Cad
title: Conseiller par téléphone très compétent
content: Conseiller au téléphone très bien. Je reste chez eux rien que pour cela. Très compétent.

name: Monique
title: Très satisfaite de tous vos services
content: Très satisfaite de tous vos services

name: Pierre De Moissy Darancette
title: Équipe de professionnels merci
content: Équipe de professionnels merci

name: Dave Carr
title: N26 stole my money - UPDATE
content: I was asked to re verify my account with photo ID. Which I did,  5 days later I still can't access my account with £5k of funds.  Then I get an email saying my application for an account was unsuccessful.I'm very worried and had no reassurance from N26 and can't speak to a human just online chat rubbish.  I will update when I know more !!UPDATE!!!N26 replied to my review very quickly !They asked me to email my complaint and/or speak to someone online,  I have done both of those more than once 4 days ago and have heard nothing.  I'm still £5000 out of pocket,  I've now contacted the financial ombudsmen in the UK and I have completed forms which I have sent back. I will update when I hear more.
reply: Hey Dave,Thanks for your review. You can send us an email to support@n26.com via the email address you registered your account with. We will then take it from there. You can also contact our chat directly within the mobile app and webapp or from certain Support Center articles about opening an account (Available via our support center from a computer.) Please note you can also contact our Twitter Support. Best,Your N26 Support Team

title: Really bad
content: Really bad, because of the verify Identity, is more than 2 weeks I'm waiting for the checking identity. More times I spoke with the support chat and no help at all, I tried to call and the number was not available,then I sent an email complaint and still of no help. This is the only bank I have and they locked money I need for this verification. Really disappointed!!!
reply: Hey Marco, We regret to hear about your negative experience.  You can send us an email to support@n26.com via the email address you registered your account with. We will then take it from there. You can also contact our chat directly within the mobile app and webapp or from certain Support Center articles about opening an account (Available via our support center from a computer.) Please rest assured we will get back to you as soon as we can. Thank you. Best,Your N26 Support Team

name: Fellmann
title: Déjà 6 mois comme client et cela change…
content: Déjà 6 mois comme client et cela change d'une banque classique. Bonne expérience pour le moment !

name: Scott
title: I've been using N26 for 3 years now
content: I've been using N26 for 3 years now. Very easy to setup, very easy and intuitive app. No unnecessary bells and whistles. It's worked miracles in simplifying simple money transfers. Adding new benificiaries takes seconds. Confirming wire transfers is lightning fast and recipient receives in a very timely manner. Acquiring the card was a bit painful -- need to be persistent on contacting support to send to the right address. Activation of the card is delightfully simple and the card management is very effective.

name: Nazar Malyy
title: The best bank service ever!
content: The best bank service ever! Fast and secure!

name: beatriz merli
title: Changing my phone number

name: Francoise Minsili

content: J’aime la transparence dans les actions autour de N26. J’ai été conquise par la disponibilité des conseillers et la rapidité de la résolution de mon problème : moins de 5 minutes pour N26 là où les autres banques me donnent un délai de 48 heures !Merci !

name: CN
title: Inconvenience at its best
content: Twice in four months I've been asked to prove my identity. They need 5 working days to check it! Until then I can't log into my account to check my balance or chat with customer service. Definitely changing to a high street bank.
reply: Hey,We apologise for any inconvenience that has been caused by the re-verification process. As a licensed mobile bank, we are legally obliged to re-verify customers at regular intervals. Whilst we approve your documents, you will still be able to use your card and receive transfers. You can also contact us via live chat from within the N26 support center, or email us on support@n26.com.Best Regards,Your N26 Support Team

reply: Hey,danke für dein Feedback und bitte entschuldige die Unannehmlichkeiten.Wir arbeiten bereits daran unseren Kundensupport zu verbessern und werden dein Feedback weiterleiten. Wir wünschen dir einen guten Start in die Woche. Gruß,dein N26 Team

SEPA eurozone payments in and out of account as fast as home country banks.  No trouble linking and using on my paypal account. Excellent value. Appreciate the notifications on my phone confirming transactions.

name: Mario Aldayuz
title: BUYER BEWARE
content: BUYER BEWARE! GARBAGE! Embarrassing having it decline when they don’t tell you you can’t run it like a normal card.  You cannot run this card like other debit cards (as pin-less transactions at restaurants). I had this card decline at a big client dinner and it negatively impacted my reputation. They do not state anywhere obvious about the lack of functionality compared to other banks. I will be switching back to PNC due to their poor customer support and lack of clear declaration of limitations.Mind you, their customer service response she was “we will pass that feedback to our tech team.” What horrid customer service and failure to release a product that is more than just an alpha release. It’s like a land mine, you never know when it’s going to go off and not be accepted. Also the debit card is not accepted by Venmo, Cash App, PayPal............
reply: Hey Mario,We regret to learn that you encountered issues regarding your card payments. We do our best to train each of our representatives on how to properly handle our customers’ issues, including how to escalate problems that they are unable to assist with. Your case should have been escalated to our team. We apologise for any inconvenience this caused you. If you have any concerns you can contact us on Twitter or send us an email to support@n26.com via the email address you registered your account with. We will then take it from there. You can also contact our chat directly within the mobile app and webapp or from certain Support Center articles about opening an account (Available via our support center from a computer.) Best,Your N26 Support Team

name: Naji Melhaoui
title: Une solution plus que parfaite
content: Une solution plus que parfaite. La facilité d'utilisation et de contact est exceptionnelle. L'application est très bien faite.

name: Matthew Beckett
title: Tech is good but customer service is horrendous.
content: Like many others here I've had bad experiences with N26's customer service. The first time while verifying my ID the woman just hung up on me when I kindly asked her to repeat what she had just said, so I had to start a new session and do everything over again. There was no way for me to know her name or report her after, so the customer service representatives aren't held accountable for their actions.The second time, I had a Metal card which comes with "Premium" customer service, but when I needed to change my phone number, I started a support session on my phone, but had to wait about 30 minutes. During that time my screen turned off and I lost the session, so I started over again but on my computer this time. I waited for an hour, and I was 3rd in place, but it was too late in the day so they just shut down their customer service completely and I had to try again the following day. Also note for those who use Spaces and Overdraft. You will be charged for Overdraft even if you have more than enough money to cover the overdraft in your Spaces. I had more than 1k€ in spaces but got charged for my main balance going negative. That's a scam if I ever saw one. Overall the app and tech is great, but N26 still falls short in a few too many places.
reply: Hi Matthew, thanks for taking the time to let us know. We take this sort of feedback very seriously, so we will be passing this on for you. Outlining where you think we can improve helps us to prioritise where we need to improve, so we appreciate this. For any charges that were incurred,  we can get this sorted for you.  Please come on the chat so we can do this for you. This is available in:- Your N26 App: in the Service section within your control center - support - Live Chat- The N26 Web App: https://my.n26.com/, after you logged in- ​​​​​​​The N26 Support Center. Scroll to the bottom of the page and you will see "Open a chat" in a green box: https://support.n26.com/en-gb/getting-started/other/how-do-i-contact-n26Best,Your N26 support team.

name: Marco Di Berardino
title: Rifiuto apertura conto n26
content: La mia recensione non può che essere negativa in quanto mi è stato rifiutata l'apertura del conto; in un primo momento il rifiuto è avvenuto in fase di registrazione dopodiché caricando il passaporto anziché la carta di identità ed un numero di telefono diverso riesco ad andare avanti nella registrazione e ricevo la carta. Dopo il tentativo di associare il numero di telefono iniziale alla carta mi viene ribadito il rifiuto senza naturalmente dare spiegazioni dettagliate per motivi "legali". Capisco il rispetto delle norme ma, in quanto consumatore, ritengo che una volta dato il mio consenso abbia diritto a conoscere il motivo del rifiuto.
reply: Ciao Marco, ti ringraziamo per il tuo feedback.Ci dispiace davvero molto non avere potuto aprire un conto corrente con te, nel tuo caso non possiamo fornirti informazioni supplementari a riguardo.Ci dispiace non potere darti approfondimenti come ci hai richiesto, ma ci tenevamo almeno a risponderti e dirti che siamo spiacenti.Buona giornata.

name: Emanuel-Petre Eni
title: Worst customer experience ever.
content: This was by far the worst customer experience ever. Tomorrow I'm leaving for holiday and today I got an email saying that due to a leake  from Mastercard they are going to block my card starting tomorrow. I tried contacting customer support, but you have to go through a stupid chat, where their operators disconnect for no reason and just send scripted Messeges without any connection to your questions.I've dbeentrying to talk to them since 19:00 and now it's 23:00 and their chat hours are gone. I was really considering doing more business with them, but with such a horible customer service where's the point. They might have a cool app, but they failed at being a bank and being reachable.No customer prefers chats when important stuff is happening.Adios N26
reply: Hi Emanuel,We apologise for any inconvenience or stress caused in relation to the recent Mastercard leak. On that night, we experienced a high volume of inbound requests, which regrettably caused a wait to speak to an agent via live chat. This has been taken into consideration for any future incidents, so as to prevent it from happening again.Please reach out to us via live chat or email at support@n26.com if we can be of any assistance to you.Best Regards,Your N26 Support Team

name: Lars
title: Chargeback Prozess mangelhaft
content: Ich hatte eine falsche Zahlung für ein rechtzeitig storniertes Hotelzimmer per Chargeback beanstandet. Leider wurden sämtliche mir vorliegenden Nachweise nicht akzeptiert, sodass es mir nicht möglich war das Geld zurückzufordern.Da bleibe ich lieber bei der DKB, gleiche Konditionen und vernünftiger Kundenservice.
reply: Hey Lars, danke für dein Feedback.Das Chargeback von uns folgt allen Regeln von Mastercard, welche dieses abwickelt, akzeptiert oder ablehnt.Demnach können wir ein Chargeback nur akzeptieren, wenn dies einen der Regeln des Chargeback-Formulars entspricht.Sollte ein Zimmer vorzeitig storniert worden sein, muss dies auch vom Hotel erstattet werden, wenn alles richtig war.In unserem Fall können wir dies nur über das Chargeback zurückzahlen, wenn alles den Rechtlinien entspricht.Grüße, dein N26 Support.

name: Daniel O'Connell
title: BEWARE N26......
content: Had been on the waitlist in the USA to open this account ...n26 sent me an invitation to open an account in July of 2019 I was excited about the opportunity however once I provided all of my personal data including social security number .home address Etc.. n26 said they cannot open the account at this time please call an 800 number.I can easily open any account in the USA with any brokerage account or any bank account this never should have happened I actually felt scammed by n26 I called them several times waited on line for over an hour I gave up and called a couple of weeks later.... I got a representative who clearly lacked any empathy or customer service professionalism and couldn't care less about my problem they were more than happy to close out the account which is ironic since I was never offered an account .  ..my real issue is they now have access to all of my personal information and I am not a client.For those of you in the USA you are much better off with a Schwab Bank account it gives you free ATM access worldwide for free..... BEWARE OF N26

name: Pertti Kovero
title: The mere fact that almost 20% of…
content: Strong avoid!The mere fact that almost 20% of reviews here are 1-star should raise alarms in every rationally thinking person. They have millions of customers but on the other hand they block tens of thousands of accounts daily - due to their faulty algorithms which flag transactions for no reason. Furthermore, because of the high volume of blocks and complaints relating to them the customer service is paralyzed. My experience is as follows: opened an account, transferred money into it, started using the app and card, used it for three weeks, nothing suspicious nothing illegal. Then one day when I had been using VPN to access television app from my home country, and had forgotten VPN "on" on my phone I opened the N26 app. It instantly asked to verify my Face-ID again, which I did. I also closed my VPN and logged successfully in again. Three hours from that I received an email that my account is going to be closed based on the very same terms which have been covered here in almost every review. My assumption is that N26 algorithms flagged my account because based on the IP-addresses it seemed that my account was accessed from two different countries within one minute. This would most likely also explain why a lot of N26 customers have been stranded at airports when all of the sudden their accounts are not working. In my case I was lucky. N26 gave me 14 days to empty my account and kept my app and card working. Not everyone is so lucky though. There seems to be three kinds of scenarios. Mine already mentioned, second where all transactions are blocked but the person is paradoxically being asked to empty the account, and third where the account is entirely blocked on the spot.Good luck with N26 account. I wouldn't trust them. I'm back using old fashioned banks where there's customer service who know what they're talking about and are able to provide a lot more than an apologetic spam letter which is soon sent out as an answer to this review, too.
reply: Hey,As a fully-fledged bank, N26 must submit itself to banking regulations in place. Said regulation is aimed at protecting our users. You won't encounter issues when using your bank account if you don't breach our terms and conditions. If you have any concerns we advise you to reply directly to the email you received regarding this matter. Best,Your N26 support team

There is absolutely no costumer service except for a chat that answers you with automated answers, and if you end up chatting with an actual human, they'll give an even less helpful service than a robot. reply: Hi Leonardo,As a licensed mobile bank, we are legally obliged to run routine checks on user accounts and transactions. The majority of the time, these checks are done very quickly, without you being able to see them. On occasion this takes longer, as we may have to reach out to you for some necessary information.We apologise for the experience you had with our customer service. We hope to offer the most efficient customer experience on every occasion, and we regret that this has not happened for you, and would like to learn from this. Please feel free to send an email to support@n26.com if you have any further feedback or require any assistance.Best Regards,Your N26 Support Team

name: Justin Clark
title: Having real problems with N26.
content: Having real problems with N26.Been a loyal customer for a good while - suddenly had a strange and rather large amount of money removed from my account that I knew nothing about, unauthorized. Then was asked to re-verify my account, tried to do so, was informed that I couldn't. I then received an email the following morning saying my account had been permanently blocked and my card was swallowed up in an ATM after receiving a previous email saying I could still use it to draw cash out.....??!!What on earth is going on? ZERO help from anyone on the chat. No phone contact to talk to human. N26 have took my money and savings!!!
reply: Hi Justin,Thanks for taking the time to let us know. We take this sort of feedback very seriously, so we will be passing this on for you.We would be happy to help you if you contact us via the Live Chat from within the app or web app, or on our Twitter Support. An agent will be glad to help out.Best,Your N26 support team.

name: Denis Grahl
title: N26 Lügt und betrügt!
content: Neues Update 3.09.2019Ihr könnt alle die Antwort lesen von N26!Die Bank ist nur am lügen, es ist seit deren Antwort das Geld ist am nächsten Tag drauf, bereits 14 Tage vergangen und mein Geld ist immer noch nicht auf meinem Konto.Die Bank erzählt eine Geschichte nach der anderen. Erst schreiben sie mir es dauert 12 Tage, bis das Geld wieder auf meinem Konto gutgeschrieben wird. Hier bei Trustpilot schreiben sie es ist bereits einen Tag später auf meinem Konto.Jetzt zur Wahrheit, ich habe mein Geld was mir von der N26 geklaut worden ist immer noch nicht zurück erhalten. Ich gehe jetzt nur noch zur Polizei und zur Verbraucherzentrale. Ich weiß einfach nicht mehr weiter.Antwort von N26 hier ist gelogen und ist so nicht passiert, dass Geld ist immer noch nicht auf meinem Konto eingetroffen.So wie es so hilfreich, hier von der N26 beantwortet wird! Ich erhalte einfach keine Hilfe von der Bank.Seit Monaten hat mir die Bank einfach Geld geklaut. Es wurde ein Betrag von einem Kauf zurück erstattet und nein der Verkäufer hat den Betrag nicht eine Woche später nochmal abgebucht sonder die Bank N26, die es sogar selbst bestätigt hat. Es war angeblich ein technischer Fehler.Ich sollte dann daraufhin mehrer Dokumente ausfüllen und einreichen, alles getan.  Dann nach vier Wochen erhalte ich eine Antwort es war ein Kreuz Zuviel angegeben und habe es sofort neu eingereicht. Wieder vier Wochen am warten keine Antwort erhalten. Über den Chat Support will ich garnicht erst anfangen jeder gibt eine andere Antwort und jeder redet bzw. Schreibt andere tatschen die nicht stimmen und absolut gelogen sind. Die Nachweise habe ich alle und es ist wirklich mehr als unverschämt, ich bin jetzt über die Verbraucherzentrale gegangen und über die Öffentlichkeit. Die Bank gibt mir keine Antwort ich verdiene im Monat 1250€ und die haben mir 120€ einfach weggenommen was für mich wirklich lebensnotwendig war und ist. Ich hab privat dadurch nur Probleme gehabt.
reply: Hey Denis, danke für deine Mitteilung.Bei einem Chargeback kann es vorkommen, dass der Händler auf ein 2nd PT zurückgreift, wenn dieser die Rückauszahlung anfechten möchte.In Zusammenarbeit mit Mastercard vermitteln wir an den Händler und sammeln alle Dokumente mit dem Händler, um herauszufinden, ob der Kunde oder der Händler im Recht ist.In deinem Fall wurde bereits gestern herausgefunden, dass der Händler im Unrecht ist und dein Geld bereits gestern an dich überwiesen wurde.Dies sollte bis spätestens morgen auf deinem Konto ersichtlich sein.Wir senden dir diesbezüglich ebenfalls nochmal eine Email als Bestätigung.Dein N26 Support-Team.

name: Carl
title: The most easy experience I have had!
content: The most easy experience I have had!! Support are great and could not recommend more

name: Patrick
title: I cannot make online purchases
content: I cannot make online purchases with my n26 card. If i try, I need to confirm the purchase with the n26 app. However, everytime the app indicates it cannot connect to the server. The customer service department wasn't able to help, ultimately suggesting that it's because I have a Chinese phone (an Oppo). I don't experience such issues with other banks.
reply: Hey Patrick,Thanks for taking the time to let us know. We take this sort of feedback very seriously, so we will be passing this on for you.We would be happy to help you if you can come to Twitter Support. An agent will be glad to help out.Best,Your N26 support team.

name: CHARROUX Lydie
title: simple
content: Très pratique , simple

name: Yas
title: AVOID COMPLETELY!!!
content: To add insult to injury N26 have now blocked my account, with my money in it, because of the damaging review I previously wrote!This unprofessional and vindictive bank asked me to re verify my identity, a very strange thing indeed, but I proceeded to do so.The process was not simple, their system is flawed, and I was locked out of the app before re submitting my ID. I then had to delete and re install the app. After submitting my ID I got an email saying N26 could not open a NEW account for me, obviously I was not applying for a new account, just trying to re submit my ID! I was informed, at the start of the inefficient and flawed process, that my card would be working and I could receive money into my account and spend it, but the app would not be working during the re verification process. The app stopped working before that and I wrote a damaging review of my terrible experience. After that N26 blocked my account and now I can not access my own money!This is a terrible, unprofessional, flawed and incompetent bank.AVOID COMPLETELY!!!
reply: Hey,Thanks for taking the time to let us know. We take this sort of feedback very seriously, so we will be passing this on for you.We would be happy to look in to this with you, on our Twitter Support. An agent will be glad to help out.Best,Your N26 support team.

name: Jessica Burns
title: I CURRENTLY HAVE NO ACCESS TO MY MONEY
content: I CURRENTLY HAVE NO ACCESS TO MY MONEY This is the most appalling customer service I have ever experience. I have spent over 3+ hours today contacting customer support. I can currently not log into the app on my phone because I need to change my phone. I have contacted customer support 3 times about this, which is only a chat - there is no other option.The same thing happens each time. They verify my identity - ask for number on card, number of personal identity card and details of 5th last transaction. They then ask me for my new number and provide me with a code and inform me that I will recieve a phone call within 1 hr.So I don't get a call, I contact customer service AGAIN. I do the same identity verification AGAIN. I am told that they did infact try to call me 3 times. I had not 1 missed call!!! They tried to contact me on my old number(which I do not have) and then my new number,... but odly enough I did not have any notification of a missed call.The employee offers no explanation. Everything is clearly written from a book, unpersonalised and unable to thing for himself. He then GUARANTEES me 100 PER CENT. That all information is now correct and I will receive a phone call within 1 hour.I RECEIVE NO PHONE CALL.So as you can imagine by this stage I am fairly frustrated, after hearing lots of bad stories about N26 Customer support I recently decided to take a leap of faith and make N26 my main account.SO I CURRENTLY HAVE NO ACCESS TO MY MONEY SO I contact customer service again. Chat window ops up. SAME VERIFICATION PROCESS. Only to then be informed that "no sorry this phone number is being used with a different account you cannot use it"after I assured the employe that, that was in fact my telephone number....it turns out she 'had made a small mistake'.Then much to my frustration she completely disconnects the chat without further support. THIS IS DISGUSTING!!After this issue is resolved, I am leaving N26 and encouraging any friend or contact to do the same. This is about 12hr now since I have had no access to my account.SO I try a 4th attemptSAME PROCESSSAME VERIFICATIONI ask if I could possibly chat with someone higher up as obviously something with the callback process not working and it is quite important I gain access to my account as I need to pay a few urgent bills. The only response I receive is that It will work this time, without doubt!When I try to express my concern again the employeeFOR THE 4TH TIME DISCONNECTS THE CHAT!!!!!!!!!!!I AM COMPLETELY AT MY WITS END. WHAT A JOKE FOR A COMPANY. WHAT A JOKE FOR CUSTOMER SERVICEPLEASE LEARN FROM MY MISTAKE AND DO NOT TRUST THIS INCOMPETENT COMPANY WITH YOUR MONEY!during this whole process, I did as for a case or reference number. i was informed there was not one. I also asked for email confirmation that they did in fact call me. I was also informed that they could not provide me with this information either!!!!!!!

name: Joe
title: Excellent bank
content: Excellent bank, easy to use, awesome customer service if you need help ! Highly recommend.
reply: Hey Jessica,We're sorry for the negative experience that you had with our customer service. We understand your disappointment. We apologise that there was a mistake made on our side whilst updating your number in our system. Were you able to get this changed? You can contact us on Twitter or send us an email to support@n26.com via the email address you registered your account with. We will then take it from there. You can also contact our chat directly within the mobile app and webapp or from certain Support Center articles about opening an account (Available via our support center from a computer.) Best,Your N26 Support Team

name: Richard Hughes
title: N26 Metal…- Application Failed " Due to legal constraints".
content: Just tried to apply for an N26 Metal card but for some reason my application has failed "Due to legal constraints".....whatever that means. I tried to query this with N26 Customer Services but they refused to even discuss the issue with me, whatever it is. So I am completely in the dark as to the reason why. I used my driving licencd to verify my identity and I have heard that this can sometimes not work, but Idon't know because no one at N26 will tell me. So this seems to be a complete farce to me and something to do with the way in which  N26 verify your identity. Never had a problem with any UK bank or credit card company  in 40 years. So I guess I will never know!
