reply: Hey Richard,Thank you for your interest in opening an account with N26. As a bank, we have to follow strict legal requirements for every account we open. Unfortunately, occasionally this means we are not able to open accounts due to these restrictions. We apologise for the inconvenience. Best,Your N26 support team

name: wioletta
title: Super konto
content: Super konto, założenie bezproblemowe, kartę otrzymałam po 5 dniach. Środki na koncie bezpieczne, ponieważ mają gwarancje bankowe. A najważniejsze, komornik nie ruszy pieniędzy. Mogę spłacać dług na moich warunkach i korzystać z konta jak chcę. Polecam z kodem - wiolettt5449, ja dostaję 15 euro i Ty również :) Super account, easy to set up, I received the card after 5 days. The funds on your account are safe because they have bank guarantees. And most importantly, the bailiff will not move money. I can pay the debt on my terms and use the account as I want. I recommend with the code - wiolettt5449, I get 15 euros and you also :)

name: Sam Exton
title: Partner was unable to open account
content: Partner has great credit history and has multiple accounts elsewhere, with no problems getting on board, however was told that due to "banking and legal" reasons, she's not going to be offered an account. Absolute rubbish. Don't know why they are advertising all over London but don't actually want customers who keeps accounts in good standing - better digital alternatives out there.

name: CC Bite
title: Best Bank Ever
content: They helped me find some documents for PayPal in less than 3 minutes it was done and the rest that they had to send via e-mail, in less than 48h I had it

name: Mika Aalto
title: Overall pretty good functionality
content: Overall pretty good functionality. In the beginning there was little stumbling which is normal when starting new banking services. Now I'm pretty satisfied at service. Reliability is a better, also possibility to download bank statement from the web sites is good function and customer care is quick and multi-channelled I will give a 8/10p.

name: Julian Vargas-Cabrera
title: Electronic piggy bank
content: Electronic piggy bank. DO NOT OPEN AN ACCOUNT WITH THEM! They are not a bank.  I have been expecting a transfer since the beginning of the month and it has still failed to enter my account. I need to pay rent and cannot. They keep telling me to ask the sender but the sender has given me verification that it has been sent.I have spoken to some representatives and they are rude and of little help. They may just be part time university kids but I need to get my money.
reply: Hi Julian,We're sorry to learn of the issues you have had receiving a transfer. If the sending bank has already initiated an official Payment Investigation (this differs from a Transfer Confirmation, which simply states the transfer was initiated) please kindly request a copy of this and email it to support@n26.com so we can investigate further. We are unable to view incoming transfers into your account, as we are the recipient bank, but we can investigate with the result of this investigation.Best Regards,Your N26 Support Team

name: Abdel Merabet
title: La meilleure banque au monde pour moi…
content: La meilleure banque au monde pour moi une banque en ligne avec de léger progrès a faire pour vraiment surpasser les autres banques

name: Olaf
title: Kundenservice schlecht, technische Probleme nicht ausgeräumt
content: Zeitraubende Chats statt Telefonischer Support (Die Sachbearbeiter/innen, mit meist indisch klingendem Vornamen, chatten offensichtlich mit mehreren Kunden gleichzeitig, das führt zu langen Wartezeiten bei jeder Antwort, bis hin zum Verbindungsabbruch wg. zu langer Inaktivität), Daueraufträge verschwinden kurz vor der Überweisung in der Vorschau, Usability der App verbesserungswürdig (insbesondere beim Löschen und Neuverknüpfen mit Smartphone), Kreditkarte nicht überall akzeptiert (ist keine EC/Girocard), Apple-Pay funktioniert oft nicht.
reply: Vielen Dank für dein Feedback. Für alle Unannehmlichkeiten möchten wir uns entschuldigen. Unsere Hotline ist nur für den absoluten Notfall und für Metalkunden gedacht. Wir arbeiten bereits auch daran unseren Kundensupport und unsere App zu verbessern und werden dein Feedback weiterleiten.

name: Keina Hous
title: Très bonne banque en ligne
content: Très bonne banque en ligne, près de ces clients,

name: jonathan durbridge
title: Steer well clear
content: Steer well clear. I had been a customer for about 9 months, using the metal account at £14.99 a month. Never missed a payment, never made dodgy payments, never received dodgy payments.Out of the blue my account is blocked and banned, along with hundreds of others.Al money taken. All of my bills that used this card are failing. I cannot access a statement. I dont know what has been paid and what hasnt, but more importantly I cannot get the funds that are legally mine.The support is laughable, and the response has been "we dont know when, but you will get an email explaining this at some point in the future"Please - I beg you all to find somewhere else to bank
reply: Hi Jonathan, We apologise for any inconvenience or upset that has been caused. As a licensed bank, we are legally obliged to verify customers are regular intervals. This is a procedure that is required to be followed by all banks.We understand your query and the concern you may have for the status of your account, but for your own security, we are unable to provide detailed information and support through here. We will continue this correspondence via your registered email address.Best Regards,Your N26 Support Team

name: Guillaume
title: Refus d'ouverture de compte sans plus d'explication.
content: Refus d'ouverture de compte sans plus d'explication:En tant qu’établissement bancaire, nous devons suivre des réglementations légales strictes pour chaque ouverture de compte.Nous sommes pour le moment dans l’impossibilité de vous donner plus d’informations à ce sujet pour des raisons légales et notre Service Client ne ne sera pas en mesure de vous aider davantage.
reply: Bonjour Guillaume, merci de votre retour !Nous sommes navrés de ne pouvoir vous proposer de compte pour le moment. Afin d'avoir plus d'informations, nous vous invitons à vérifier les Conditions Générales d'ouverture de compte ici : https://n26.com/fr-fr/legal-documents/compte-courant Si la situation vient à changer, nous ne manquerons pas de vous tenir informé.Salutations,Votre équipe N26.

name: Ray Fallon
title: Innovative service for free
content: N26 is a very customer friendly bank that operates for free (with paid-for options). In a world where banks are introducing or increasing fees, N26 offers better banking services that are very innovative and easy to use for free. Great cross border foreign exchange rates with no commission. Instantly informed of when transactions are recorded on their system (usually immediately) and other great security features like blocking the use of online transactions and ATM withdrawls as well as the ability to change your pin in the app make it very secure too. Integrations with all major mobile payment systems.

Le bot a vite compris que c’était trop particulier, un agent a pris la main sur le case très rapidement et a été à l’écoute et très agréable pour une résolution en très efficace. Je recommande !

name: Conrath Sacha

content: Service client super rapide!

name: Quadiyr
title: Had issues pairing my phone
content: This has been the worst bank I have ever dealt with in my life!
reply: Hi Quadiyr,We're sorry to learn you have had some issues with pairing your device. Can you kindly elaborate on this so we can resolve it for you? Alternatively, you can reach out to an agent via live chat to be connected immediately. Just access https://app.n26.com/login from a desktop and select "Support Chat" once you log in.You can also check out our support center which contains articles detailing how to pair your device: https://support.n26.com/en-eu/getting-startedBest Regards, Your N26 Support Team

name: Gaurav
title: Kontogesperrt mit Inkassodrohung
content: Unglaublich Frech!Vor einigen Monaten habe ich mir ein N26 Konto erstellt und habe nach Erhalt dieser Karte ausversehen die Black Karte bestellt.Diese Black Mitgliedschaft habe ich sofort widerrufen, da es ja auch ein versehen war und darauf hin wurde mir vom Support mitgeteilt, dass ich die 10€ was die Mitgliedschaft kostet, wieder komplett erstattet bekommen werde. Alles schön und gut, habe mir nichts dabei gedacht.Monate danach kriege ich immer noch täglich E-Mails etc, dass ich doch bitte mal meinen Kontostand ausgleichen soll, wo es sich IMMER NOCH um die 10€ von der Mitgliedschaft handelt.Nun soll mir mal bitte einer erklären, wieso soll ich bitte diese Mitgliedschaftsgebühr zahlen soll, wenn ich es am selben Tag wo ich diese Mitgliedschaft versehentlich abgeschlossen habe, direkt widerrufen habe.Daraufhin wurde mein Fall von N26 an deren Inkasso Unternehmen weitergegeben, wo ich auch briefe erhalten habe, dass ich doch diese Gebühr bezahlen soll, zusätzlich noch die Inkasse kosten.Ich werde sicherlich NIEMALS diese ganzen Gebühren zahlen, da es nicht meine Schuld ist, dass mein Konto seitens N26 NIEMALS ausgeglichen wurde, stattdessen wurde mir gesagt, dass ich das alles überweisen soll.OBWOHL ICH DEN VERTRAG FRISTGERECHT AM SELBEN TAG, DA MAN JA 14 TAGE ZEIT HAT, WIDERRUFEN HABE.Heute wollte ich noch einmal N26 ne Chance geben und ein neues Business Konto erstellt, aber nun kriege ich bei der Kontoerstellung nur dieses beschissene N26 Flex Konto zur Auswahl, was nur Kunden zur Verfügung steht die eine schlechte Bonität aufweisen und lt. N26 die Mindestanforderungen für ein normales N26 nicht erfüllen.Und diese schlechte Bonität habe ich nicht wegen mein verschulden, sondern wegen N26, da diese so Dreist sind und mir sagen, ich soll für etwas bezahlen, wofür ich keine Leistungen in Anspruch angenommen habe und das alles sofort widerrufen habe.Ich werde jeden nur von dieser "sehr innovativen" Bank abraten!
reply: Hey Gaurav,Danke für deine ehrlichen Worte. Wir möchten uns für alle Unannehmlichkeiten bei dir entschuldigen. Gerne schauen wir uns das für dich an. Bitte sende uns doch eine private Nachricht an unseren N26_Support Twitter Account: https://twitter.com/N26_Support?s=09 oder über unseren Facebook Account: https://www.facebook.com/N26DE/. Wir würden uns freuen dir bei dem Problem helfen zu können.Gruß, dein N26 Support Team

name: vivi

title: Using N26 and living aboard
content: Using N26 since a year now and living aboard. Extremely satisfied about how easy it is to manage my account online. Just switched to N26 You as it is more interested for me to don’t have fees while withdrawing money at the atm. I do recommend. I just had one issue, when I ordered my first N26 You card: after 3 weeks still didn’t receive it. Have contacted them via the chat or the operator directly offered me the same new card for free in express shipment.

title: Rapide simple pas de fioritures et de…
content: Rapide simple pas de fioritures et de questions à la française

name: Walter Brandão
title: I opened my account via the Internet…
content: I opened my account via the Internet using only my passport copy.  The procedure was very simple, because even being in another country, there were no complications.During one year of account, I had no problem with my account.  Therefore, I recommend Bank N26.I've used the Black card at Euronet ATMs to raise money without any problems, plus I've used it outside of Europe, in a Brazilian grocery store to pay for purchases and everything worked as expected.

name: William Amavi
title: Un bonne banque
content: Je me suis inscrit ya pas longtemps mais je trouve que elle me satisfait beaucoup déjà au niveau des tarifs qui son très attractif et aussi pour l'inscrire  ultra simple et rapide.

name: Humberto Rodrigues
title: Estou muito contente com a N26
content: Foi extremamente fácil criar a conta e a utilização é muito intuítiva.Agora posso usar o meu smartphone como se fosse a minha carteira.Excelente seria se também pudessemos usar bitcoin.

name: Robert Bailey
title: HOW CAN I GET THE MONEY IN MY N26 ACCOUNT TRANSFER TO NIGERIA ACCOUNT DIRECTLY AFTER MY N26 ACCOUNT IS CLOSED
content: if my account is close how do i get my money from the account when ido not have another IBAN because im a Nigeria, can N26 transfer thefunds on my account to my Nigeria fidelity bank account directly ??awaits your immediate answer

name: James Crawford
title: Company is holding my money
content: Company is holding my money. Won’t tell me why just hide behind ‘reverification’. Said wait for an email but wouldn’t talk to me about it. Then emailed saying they couldn’t offer an account but I already have one!? No one knows why that email was sent but when I speak to them on the phone they won’t tell me why I can’t access my money. This is all my savings in the world (over £10,000) and I’m going to lose a house I need to put a deposit on. I hope it’s not true but I think this is another Northern Rock. They will not let me get to my money.
reply: Hi James,We apologise for any inconvenience or upset that you have faced as a result of our re-verification process. We are legally obligated to verify our customers at regular intervals. Rest assured that this is a routine procedure that all banks have to follow. Please be assured that we will contact you to advise you further as soon as possible, so that we can resolve this situation for you.Best Regards,Your N26 Support Team

name: Anna
title: Katastrophaler Kundenservice !
content: Katastrophaler Kundenservice !Bin seit drei Jahren Kunde. Bis dato weitgehend zufrieden. Lediglich die nicht ausreichend gegebene Akzeptanz der Karten von N26  hatte mich bislang geärgert. Nun habe ich mein Mobiltelefon gewechselt und soll zur Legitimation die Nummer meines Reisepasses hinterlegen. „Leider“ bin ich zur Zeit in Urlaub und habe meinen Reisepass nicht dabei. Allerdings reise ich mit Personalausweis. Dieser genügt nach Auskunft im Chat jedoch nicht um mich zu legitimieren. Nun kann ich die kommenden zwei Wochen nicht über mein Konto verfügen !Kritik:* Eine Begründung warum der Personalausweis in Verbindung mit einer VideoIdentifikation nicht genügt, wurde nicht gegeben !* Alle Chats wurden abgebrochen mit dem Hinweis, dass ich nicht identifiziert werden könne. Eine Begründung wurde nicht gegeben.* Meiner Bitte um telefonischen Rückruf (gemäß Bandansage von N26 in dringenden Fällen möglich, wenn im Chat angefragt) wurde kommentarlos nicht entsprochen !* Meine Bitte um Zusendung des Chatverlaufs des heutigen Tages wurde - kommentarlos - nicht entsprochen.* Auch mein Hinweis, dass ich mich an die Beschwerdestelle des Bankenverbandes bzw das BaFIN (Finanzaufsicht) wenden werde, führte leider zu keiner Klärung / vernünftigen Antwort (Screenshots des Chats vorhanden)Entweder ist die „Bank“ völlig überfordert und/oder nicht ausreichend qualifiziert. Wie auch immer - ich bin entsetzt !Fazit:Sofern N26 nicht kurzfristig eine Antwort auf dieses Thema gibt, werde ich diese Bankverbindung beenden.(Siehe auch diverse aktuelle Artikel im Netz; z.B.: Spiegel N26
reply: Hey Anna, danke für dein Feedback.Der Grund dafür, warum wir die Nummer deines Reisepasses benötigen ist, dass du dich damals mit deinem Reisepass bei uns angemeldet hast.Wir haben deine Daten deines Personalausweises nicht und können diesen daher nicht zur Verifizierung deiner Person verwenden.Einen Rückruf tätigen wir natürlich im Notfall, wenn etwa ein Konto übernommen worden ist, durch Phishing oder Preisgabe der Daten etc.Ein Rückruf, wegen Nicht-Verifizierung vom Kundensupport, würde ebenfalls nicht  helfen, dass das  falsche Dokument ausgewählt worden ist.Der Chatverlauf, kann nach ende de s Gesprächs, am Anfang des Chats  durch einen  Button gedownloadet werden. Dafür kannst du dann nach oben scrollen und dieses tätigen.Wir hoffen, dass du die erneute Verifizierung inzwischen durchführen konntest.Grüße, dein N26 Support-Team.

name: Riza Sari
title: Was soll das ???
content: War eigentlich immer zufrieden, aber mein Konto wurde vor ein paar tagen gesperrt und daraufhin habe ich den Support angeschrieben die mir gesagt haben das ich auf eine Mail warten soll.Bis heute habe ich die Mail nicht bekommen und habe den Support nochmal angeschrieben und wieder sagt sie mir ich solle auf die Mail warten. Ich kann weder Rechnungen oder sonstiges zahlen, ich bin quasi im Moment obdachlos.
reply: Hey Riza,Als vollwertige Bank muss sich N26 den geltenden Bankvorschriften unterwerfen. Diese Regelung zielt darauf ab, unsere Nutzer zu schützen.Bei der Verwendung deines Bankkontos treten keine Probleme auf, wenn du nicht gegen unsere Allgemeinen Geschäftsbedingungen verstößt.Dein N26 Support Team

name: Diaka Thiam
title: Très bon service je recommande…
content: Très bon service je recommande pleinement.Les virements sont rapides, le service clientèle est au top et la carte est belle et originale.

name: Loïc Turmel
title: Mauvais début d'expérience …
content: J'ai essayé d'ouvrir un compte N26. Les instructions sur leur site internet sont claires et simples à suivre jusqu'au moment de la prise de photos du passeport …Etant belge, nos passeports n'ont pas les mêmes sécurités que ceux français et du coup, pour prendre les deux photos, ça ne correspondait pas aux instructions.J'ai pris contact avec le service client et à la demande de l'employé N26 avec lequel je communiquais, j'ai envoyé par mail, des photos de mon passeport afin qu'il me renseigne sur la manière de prendre mon passeport en photo via l'application. J'ai suivi ses explications.Me voilà maintenant, avec un mail de refus m'expliquant qu'ils ne peuvent pas m'ouvrir un compte N26.J'ai contacté le service client afin d'en savoir un peu et surtout, afin de résoudre mon problème.Comme noté dans le mail, le service client n'est pas compétent pour me donner plus de renseignement mais il n'y a PAS MOYEN d'avoir un mail d'un service compétent ou d'une personne responsable qui pourrait m'aider à résoudre ce malentendu …Tous les employés du service client me clôture les fenêtres chat sans même essayé de m'aider ni de me diriger. Et par mail, on me répond que le service client N26 ne peut rien faire mais on ne me communique aucun autre moyen pour régler ce soucis.C'est dommage …N26 propose un super produit mais le service client est inefficace …
reply: Bonjour, merci d'avoir pris le temps d'écrire ce commentaire.Nous sommes sincèrement navrés de vous lire. Lorsque l'ouverture d'un compte N26 ne vous est pas autorisée, le mieux est de vous référer aux Conditions Générales d'Utilisation d'un compte, que vous trouverez ici : https://n26.com/fr-fr/legal-documents/compte-courantNous ne serons de notre côté pas disposés à vous exposer la nature du rejet de manière publique. Nous en sommes navrés et vous remercions de votre compréhension. Salutations,Votre équipe N26

name: Karim Fayed
title: Facile d'utilisation en France et…
content: Facile d'utilisation en France et rapide service accessible rapidement utilisable comme un compte français sans frais caché

name: Kees
title: Slecht
content: Slecht. je wordt constant bestookt met mailtjes, reageren gaat niet. Ik ben op vakantie in het buitenland en geen gelegenheid om de N26 kaart te activeren want die ligt in mijn brievenbus thuis. 3x een mail naar support gestuurd maar geen antwoord. Maar de mailtjes blijven maar binnenkomen, heel irritant. Eindelijk via support contact en die vinden het heel normaal dat je niet kunt reageren, ze willen geen contact met de klant. Via N26 chat praat je met een robot? Nu al meerdere mailtjes verstuurd op de kaart op te zeggen en krijg steeds een auto reply dat ze het druk hebben en niet kunnen reageren. wat een slecht bedrijf. Wil ik niks mee te maken hebben.------------------N26, And thats exactly why N26 sucks, disqualified by your own reply, not having a clue of what your'e doing.
reply: Hey Kees, thanks for your message.N26 operates in five languages: English, German, French, Italian and Spanish. Could you please repeat your review in one of these mentioned languages again? This way you will help us understand from where you disappointment comes. Many thanks in advance!The customer support within your app will help with all your problems!Cheers, your N26 Support-Team.

name: Fatiha
title: Je recommande N26 à 100%
content: Je recommande N26 à 100% ! Mon frère m'a recommandé votre banque en ligne, et je ne suis pas du tout déçue, j'ai eu un peu de mal au début, mais grâce à votre superbe service client, toujours disponible, et très rapide, j'ai réussi à comprendre très facilement comment fonctionnait N26. Le seul inconvénient je dirais, c'est qu'à cause de l'IBAN avec un code pays allemand, toutes les entreprises françaises n'acceptent pas notre IBAN, ce qui est bête, car comme me l'a expliqué l'agent N26, mon IBAN devrait être accepté dans tous les pays SEPA !

name: Olivier
title: Bon service

name: Mary Esho
title: Excellent Banking
content: Excellent Banking

name: Christophe
title: La meilleure des banques virtuelles !
content: Pour avoir testé les principales banques virtuelles, N26 est pour moi au-dessus des autres ! l'interface est plus ergonomique et épurée, le petit plus qui fait aussi la différence avec certaines des autres banques, c'est l'accès à son compte depuis un PC via une interface web tout aussi intuitive que sur smartphone. Quand au live chat il est efficace, très rapide pour avoir un conseiller qui de plus est votre écoute. C'est tout ce qu'on attend d'une néo banque et ils le font très bien sans parler des futures services pratiques qu'ils mettent en place...

name: Claude
title: Absolutely horrendous! Stay away!
content: Firstlythey can shut down your card without letting you know. its happened to me three times1. in a taxi2. at a bar3. at tescoeach time you call they say theres an issue and they will fix within minutes and you should try again in a few minutes. it takes days or weeks.SecondlyI got a free upgrade to the metal for my worries (above) for 6 months, on the second month they shut down your account with no explanation claiming some nonsense about legal requirements. any funds you have within is swallowed and you are unable to reach them.Thirdlytheir customer service is really really bad. You would think this is a really great bank/app but truly its an under staffed company with a lot of great ideas but lack the resources to put these through.For all of you posting great reviews. a few months more and you would be wanting to rip those reviews off and post bad ones! end off! A word to the wise is enough!
reply: Hey Claude,Thanks for taking the time to let us know. We take this sort of feedback very seriously, so we will be passing this on for you. We apologise for the negative experience that you had with our customer service. We pride ourselves on giving our 100% every day to ensure that our customers’ needs are being met. We do our best to train each of our agents on how to properly handle our customers’ issues, including how to escalate problems that they are unable to assist with.Best,Your N26 support team.

content: Malheureusement, souvent lorsque vous devez faire un paiement important, quand le livreur est là, les cartes ne fonctionnent pas. Le support client nécessite un chat d'une heure, ce que les livreurs n'acceptent pas. J'ai eu des problèmes 4 fois déjà.
reply: Bonjour,Nous sommes désolés pour les difficultés de paiement que vous avez rencontré avec votre carte N26. Nous vous invitons à consulter les limites de votre carte dans l'application N26 > Mon compte > Paramètres de votre carte > Plafonds.  Vous avez alors la possibilité de mettre des limites de paiement et de retrait par jour, cela pourrait expliquer pourquoi votre carte bloque lors d'un paiement trop important.Par ailleurs, notre LiveChat est disponible tous les jours, de 7h à 23h. Si vous observez une attente trop importante dans la journée, n'hésitez pas à les contacter plus tard dans la journée. Sachez que nous restons à votre écoute sur nos pages Facebook et Twitter ainsi que sur support@n26.com.Salutations,L'équipe N26.

name: belfastjim
title: BEST CARD I HAVE EVER HAD...
content: N26 is the best banking I have every been with , I have the N26 Black which cost 9.90 euros a month , but is well worth it if you travel as there is no commission to pay on foreign currencies ,you get the exact exchange rate and no limits on how many times you withdraw from an ATM machine or purchases you make using your card.The N26 Black card also comes with many benefits. if you have a problem with anything , the customer services are excellent , and handle your query or dispute in a very friendly and professional manner..I am very happy with the support I have had in the past , they cannot do enough to help you.I would never go anywhere without my card.

name: dk
title: Rejected without any good explanation
content: "You cannot open an account with us due to legal requirements" No further explanation given. Wow! I never had any issues opening an account with a bank or credit card company before. Thank you for wasting my time.

name: Robert Heywood
title: What rubbish this is
content: What rubbish this is. 0 stars. Signed up for metal card where you get holiday insurance, but good luck getting use of that insurance. You had to have paid EVERYTHING for that holiday through the metal card with proof, otherwise they refuse.So that was mildly annoying but I can live with it. BUT they suspended my account for 4 MONTHS after i sent a large payment from another bank account so that it actually had some funds in it. They suspended on suspicious activity and I had no access to any of the money in it. After back and forth with the awful support team who just said "we cannot give you any information regarding your account" I left it and gave up. 4 months later I get an email saying your account is now unlocked. HANeedless to say I have cancelled the subscription and will not be using this ever. Awful communication, service, etc, etcMonzo is 1,000,000,000 x better

I spent over 2 hours yesterday going in circles from their online chat to my email, ping-ponging back and forth. Like all the recent negative reviews, my issue was with the re-verification. They have locked me out of my account. Two stars because up until now it's been fine and easy to use. But my account is frozen and they refuse to help. Incredibly frustrating and hopeless.
reply: Hey,As a licenced bank, we’re legally obligated to request customers to verify their identity at regular intervals. name: Max
title: Second time asking for identification
content: Second time asking for identification, My account is placed on ''hold'' while They do ID checks. I have money in my account and they have locked it just to see my ID which Ive already uploaded 6 months ago! Awful company please dont go anywhere near this poor excuse for an online account.
reply: Hi Max, N26 is legally obligated to verify our customers at regular intervals. Rest assured that this is a routine procedure that all banks have to follow. Once you have provided your documents for approval, you will be able to use your account as normal whilst we review them. You can receive money, use your N26 debit card for purchases and withdrawals, receive transfers, perform direct debits and avail of any benefits you may have with the account, such as insurance or overdraft. Whilst the re-verification is taking place, you will be unable to initiate a debit transfer, but this will be reinstated as soon as you have been re-verified. We apologise for any inconvenience this has caused.Best Regards, Your N26 Support Team

name: Maxence Raballand
title: C'est une banque facile d'utilisation

name: P M
title: Ich kann mich den schlechten…
content: Ich kann mich den schlechten Bewertungen nicht anschließen. Bin total begeistert von N26 um ehrlich zu sein, weil ich zum ersten Mal in meinem Leben einen Überblick bzgl meines Geldes habe und das liegt nicht nur an den ganzen Unterkonten, die ich machen kann und in Echtzeit Geld hin und herschieben, Sparziele festlegen kann, etc.Alles ist total einfach navigiert, man kann alles einstellen und ändern und muss dazu nicht permanent irgendwo anrufen oder zu einem Mitarbeiter. Und wenn ich mal doch was nicht verstehe, ist sofort jemand im Chat da, der meine Fragen beantwortet.Desweiteren hinaus gehen Überweisungen schneller ein und aus als bei meiner vorigen Bank, deren Online Banking übrigens total kompliziert und null überschaubar war.Das einzige, was ich zu bemängeln habe, ist die Geldabhebung. Kann man nur in irgendwelchen Lidls und Rewes und ab 100 Euro gebührenpflichtig. Das sollte sich ändern.

name: Client
title: un bon début
content: content du service, facile a prendre en main.

name: donal
title: I'm using N26 for a year now and so far…
content: I'm using N26 for a year now and so far I'm very happy with it!! All my small daily transactions at supermarkets, coffee shops etc are now paid with N26 I also use it for restaurants and hotels. Its great at giving me a complete listing of all my transactions, the only quibble that I have is that it doesn't link my transactions to gps which can be useful when I'm trying to remember which supermarket I used on a particular day. Apart from that Its also great for transferring money to family members who also use the app. I've also noticed that they give a very good conversion rate when I use the app in the UK

Le compte et très bien gérer en temps réel, possibilité de faire des « sous-comptes » également pratique pour mettre l’argent de côté . Et les frais ne sont absolument pas excessif . name: Jack
title: Awful service and support
content: Awful service and support. I have been using N26 for around 9 months paying money every month for their 'Metal' service. 3 days ago I got locked out of my account and separated from my funds with no warning. The lock out was due to an apparent 'reverification', a check that they state is routine yet my documents have been denied despite them being the very same ones that I signed up with.  To make matters worse all of the customer service reps I have spoken to via livechat have said that they can't do anything and don't know when I will be able to access my money again. Robbery of my funds with no answer as to when or how I get my money out. I strongly urge anybody that is thinking about using N26 to reconsider as behind all of the nice modern branding is an awful service with an even worse customer service department. Don't be fooled by the fake 5 star reviews.

This card is useful when we travel but if we cant put more £2000 without have investigation, I prefer don't take a risk of find me without money at other side of the world.
reply: Hey Madeline, danke für dein Feedback.Dokumente zu bearbeiten und zu ändern dauert in der Regel 3-5 Werktage, welche unseren Kunden mitgeteilt werden.Sollte es diese Zeit überschreiten, kann man dies eskalieren lassen, sodass dies sofort erledigt wird.Dafür haben wir unsere Beschwerdestelle und Social Media Plattformen um dies anzusprechen, sodass wir dies eskalieren und priorisieren können.Dein N26 Support Team.

name: Jennifer zenou
title: DES VOLEURS A FUIR COMME LA PESTE !!!!!!
content: DES VOLEURS A FUIR COMME LA PESTE !!!!!!
reply: Hey Victoria, We have the responsibility to run routine checks on transactions (see GwG § 10). These checks are based on individual transactions and are automatically initiated by our systems. As a result, we may ask you to verify the origin or source of your funds. If you receive such a request, just send the requested documents via email. There are no exceptions or bypasses for such checks. And in cases of non-compliance, your account may be seized and cancelled.Both the process and the result are confidential and handled internally. This practice ensures the safety of our customers and their transactions. The sooner we received the required documentation the faster the checks are done. Here are some tips to speed up the process:You can provide any receipt, bill, invoice, contract, or similar document that makes it possible for us to clearly identify the transaction in question and its origin and purpose. You can send us scanned documents, pictures, or screenshots (as long as the original content of the document is easily readable).Be precise in your answers, details, and documents. If your documents don't clearly support your statements or you miss details, we may have to ask you again. Reply as soon as possible but within 14 days at the latest. Use the email you received from N26 to reply and send attachments. Our Customer Support doesn’t have any additional information on this subject. All the best,Your N26 Support Team

name: Mohadib
title: Très très bonne banque
content: Très très bonne banque, cela fait plusieurs mois que je l'utilise au quotidien, que de la satisfaction, carte et compte ultra réactif, service client top, suivi du budget longitudinale sans difficulté...Top, et gratuite, I Love N26

When I describe the issue they just close the chat window. I still have no access to my account and have no access to finish re-verification. no one explained me anything.

The process is short and is completed within a few minutes. Please reach out to us via live chat if you are having any issues with re-verification.Best Regards,Your N26 Support Team

name: Greg Lopez

name: Sébastien Lacroix
title: Very ease to get started as a non-EU…
content: Very ease to get started as a non-EU citizen living in Europe for a short while.Kind and competent employees ready to help when need be.

reply: Hey Rabi, danke für dein Feedback.Manche unserer Konten haben eine monatliche Gebühr, welche vor der Eröffnung 2x angezeigt und bestätigt werden mussten.Sofern solch ein Konto eröffnet wurde, muss diese Gebühr bezahlt werden.Sollte dies nicht geschehen müssen wir ein Konto nach gewisser Zeit kündigen.Bitte kontrolliere deine Emails, dort findest du weitere Informationen dazu von uns.

content: Superb customer service

name: andre meijer
title: Ich bin seit 3 Jahren Kunde nun soll…
content: Ich bin seit 3 Jahren Kunde nun soll ich mich erneut verifizieren alles gut soweit da mein Ausweis aber beschädigt is sagen die es geht nicht und ich solle einen neuen beantragen allerdings wird zum Ende des Monats das Konto geschlossen wenn ich es nicht schaffe den neuen Ausweis bis dahin zu bekommen ich habe auch Kernbereich Zugriff mehr auf mein Konto seit ich die Verifizierung schief ging. Und sehr schlechter Support
reply: Hey Andre, danke für dein Feedback.Als lizenzierte Bank sind wir dazu verpflichtet, unsere Kunden darum zu bitten, ihre Identität in regelmäßigen Abständen zu verifizieren.Zwar können wir dein geschlossen Konto nicht wieder öffnen, aber du kannst dich stattdessen wieder registrieren und einfach ein neues N26 Konto eröffnen.Wenn du möchtest, reiche ich dein Anliegen intern als Beschwerde ein.Ich kann kein bestimmtes Ergebnis versprechen, doch einer meiner Kollegen aus der entsprechenden Abteilung wird sich in Kürze bei dir melden, um die Dinge weiter mit dir zu klären.Dein N26 Support Team

name: Akram Soifirou

name: Merouane Nadir
title: La banque éclair
content: Deux comptes N26, un business pour mon auto entreprise et un perso pour ma compagne. Sur le business zéro soucis. Sur celui de ma compagne, elle n'avait pas pu recevoir sa carte à l'ouverture du compte (il y a 8 mois) on a fait une demande de nouvelle carte sur le live chat, reçu en 4 jours gratuit sans aucun frais. Les virements et paiement pris en compte immédiatement ou le lendemain au plus tard. Avec une banque traditionnel, je recevais les paiements des factures envoyés à mes clients en 7 jours, maintenant j'arrive à me verser mon salaire suite aux factures en seulement 48h après l'émission de la facture... juste parfait.

name: DRISSI Youness
title: N26 et pour moi une superbe innovation
content: N26 et pour moi une superbe innovation. Il m'est plus facile de contacter le service que d'autre banque standard comme par exemple la banque postal qui pour ma part est une déception. Mais pas que la poste d'autre banque sont pour moi dans le même lot et je sais de quoi je parle. J'aurais pu mettre 5 étoiles (N26 l'ai mérite) mais je n'en mets que 4 car j'aurais bien aimé avoir un Iban en FR pour pouvoir faire certains prélèvements automatiques. Dommage !

name: Simone Attrix
title: Sì trattengono in mie soldi illecitamente
content: Dopo pochi giorni dall'apertura di un conto business e circa 2000 euro di fondi entrati dalla mia attività commerciale online hanno deciso di bloccare il conto, ovviamente con tutti i soldi sopra che ora sono bloccati.Ora sono 3 giorni che gli ho mandato la documentazione richiesta, compresa di fatture e visura camerale, ma ancora non mi rispondono e non so a che titolo si stanno tenendo i miei soldi.Se decidete di bloccare il conto per i vostri controlli almeno datemi prima la possibilità di spostare i miei soldi.Pessima esperienza, intanto ho dovuto fermare la mi attività e cambiare conto. Sicuramente li citerò per danni.
reply: Ciao  Simone,, grazie per averci scritto. In quanto banca con effettiva licenza bancaria europea (BCE) N26 è soggetta alle normative bancarie in vigore. Lo scopo di queste norme è quello di garantire la protezione dei clienti.Se il tuo conto N26 è bloccato, hai ricevuto di certo una mail con le informazioni e la procedura da seguire. Il servizio dedicato sta esaminando il tuo caso e ti ricontatterà via email. Per ulteriori dubbi non esitare a consultare questo articolo: https://mag-it.n26.com/conto-n26-bloccato-ti-spieghiamo-perch%C3%A9-3cdb2ae50a08

title: Attention, c'est risqué
content: Attention, N26 est une banque allemande, il faut la déclarer dans votre déclaration fiscale comme banque étrangère et surtout elle de droit allemand.Entre autres particularités, vous vous engagez par périodes de 1 an ce qui en droit français n'est pas possible

name: Julian Domanski - Baena
title: Easy
content: Easy, fast and safe. Last month only using N26 to pay, buy and transfer my salary. So recommend.
reply: Bonjour, merci de votre retour.N26 Bank détient une licence bancaire européenne et est entièrement réglementée par le régulateur financier allemand. Le droit allemand exige une protection statutaire de 100 000 € par déposant présent dans tous les états membres de l'UE. Cette assurance des dépôts s'applique quel que soit le pays de résidence du titulaire du compte.Nous espérons que cette réponse vous a été utile. Salutations,Votre équipe N26.

name: Andrei
title: It is really easy get account in N26
content: It is really easy get account in N26. Application has a really nice looking UI and you also have access to desktop version of the site. You also get Apple Pay integration and can use your phone/watch for purchases.Everything works fine until you suddenly get email stating you have "substantial violation", while the only purchases you did were in groceries and several times online. You feel sad that this happened and decide to get in contact with customer support. And then you understand the full headache of having N26 account. Customer support does not give you any explanation on what you did wrong instead they close chat. You get angry and decide to fully close your account and delete your personal data. However, it turns out that customer support does not even allow you to close your account earlier. And you end with account you cannot use and support that cannot answer you anything.Maybe someone will have better experience that me, but personally I will never recommend N26 to no-one.[UPDATED] Unfortunately I cannot answer anything to N26 reply. Both email and online chat did not want to give any explanation, this is understandable. Though still after dozens of emails I cannot request my account to be closed earlier without any proper reason. All questions asking why this cannot be done lead to no email reply or online chat closes. Overall customer support experience is really bad.

name: David Lee-Warner
title: Nobody should want to repeat our…
content: Nobody will want to repeat our experience with N26, 2018-2019N26 closed account unilaterally within 90 days!Pre-paid N26 Black account opened online in early August 2018.Account unilaterally closed by N26 Bank, with fourteen days email advance notice to account-holder, in early November 2018.Account credit balance on date of forced closure was €4,125.52N26 gave no reply nor refund despite all contact attempts from Nov. 2018 to Feb. 2019 by the account-holder to secure refund of his balance until he, a UK citizen resident in Spain, complained to the ombudsman’s office of Deutsche Bundesbank (German central bank in Frankfurt) with a log of this banking relationship until April 2019.On May 24, 2019, N26 repaid the exact balance amount following a brief apology for their six-month delay.This fast, free, straightforward service by the German central bank for legitimate complaints is outstanding.I strongly recommend any N26 Bank customer suffering a similar clear-cut case of non-existent or unhelpful customer service from N26 Bank to document their complaint – in meticulous chronological detail – by email to the ombudsman’s office at:schlichtung@bundesbank dot deSchlichtungsstelle bei der Deutschen Bundesbank GeschäftsstelleMY PUBLIC DISCLOSUREThe above facts transpired from August 2018 to May 2019 between N26 Bank GmbH, Klosterstraße 62, D-10179 Berlin, and a close relative of mine following my personal recommendation to try N26 Bank August 2018.I no longer recommend N26 Bank to anyone, anywhere.August 9, 2019 – UPDATEThe German central bank, Deutsche Bundesbank, kindly sent my close relative – by mail – a copy of the N26 Bank letter signed by a new N26 managing director on May 27, 2019, explaining N26’s handling of this balance refund. I was stunned to discover a blatant untruth in the N26 response.N26 stated they telephoned the customer on May 23, 2019, for his bank account because they received no response to their May 15 email requesting his bank details when my relative had responded May 16, 2019, with full Spanish bank documentation – May 15 is a bank holiday in Spain. Email server logs May 15 & 16, 2019, at backoffice.support@n26 dot com bear witness to this fact.ConclusionIf N26 Bank is capable of making inaccurate statements to Germany’s central bank then what level of service can any customer expect from upstart N26 Bank?This adds credibility to Trustpilot’s 18% bad reviews.
reply: Hi Andrei,We apologise for the inconvenience this has caused you. In accordance with European banking processes, N26 must carry out regular routine checks on user accounts. In cases of violation, these checks may indicate that our business relationship must be terminated. This is enacted by a dedicated internal department, and for this reason, customer support cannot advise further.We understand your query and the concern you may have for the status of your account, but for your own security, we are unable to provide detailed information and support through here. We kindly ask that you respond to the email you would have received from us with any queries you may have.

name: Cynthia Tribeau
title: Excellent
content: Excellent et pratique
reply: Hi David,In accordance with European banking processes, N26 is obliged to carry out regular routine checks on user accounts and transactions. We follow these processes to ensure that our user accounts are kept secure. We understand your query and the concern you may have for the status of your account, but for your own security, we are unable to provide detailed information and support through here. We kindly ask that you respond to the email you would have received from us with any queries you may have.Best Regards,Your N26 Support Team

title: Molto buona!
content: Mi sono trovato molto bene con N26 per molti motivi: 1) Zero commissioni, anche per prelevare ed effettuare bonifici2) I soldi da una N26 all'altra arrivano immediatamente 3) Ho potuto aprire il conto, che necessitavo per vivere in Germania, da casa mia in Italia4) La procedura per l'apertura del conto e' stata molto semplice e non ho avuto alcun ostacolo aggiuntivo per il fatto di essere extracomunitario, cosa che invece e' accaduta per aprire conti presso altre banche L'unica pecca che ho trovato sta nel fatto che non posso caricarla con contanti presso gli sportelliCodice: danielag9039

name: Aida Rosdi
title: I did every requirement they asked me…
content: I did every requirement they asked me to, did the verification process, showed my passport and at the end received and successfully keyed in the code. When I checked back the app, the "Verify Identity" button was loading. So I can't move forward. But I waited a few days then only contacted customer service, they said they will investigate and email me. Waited and waited still no news from them. Contacted them again after a day or two. They checked my account again and the guy said he was not able to tell me what's wrong, bid me farewell and he exited the chat right away. Even if they cannot open my account they could have replied in a less robotic and cold way. All I can say is, what a waste of time and effort.
reply: Hey Aida,We apologise for the negative experience that you had with our customer service. We pride ourselves on giving our 100% every day to ensure that our customers’ needs are being met. We do our best to train each of our agents on how to properly handle our customers’ issues, including how to escalate problems that they are unable to assist with.Thanks for taking the time to let us know. We take this sort of feedback very seriously, so we will be passing this on for you.Best,Your N26 support team.

name: Tamás Majoros
title: You should be really careful with N26.
content: You should be really careful with N26.I have an account there for more than 3 years. They initiated a 're-verification' process some days ago, which failed because their system did not much my phone number. Since then, I cannot access my account, my money, my direct debits are failing. It's unbelievable. No phone support, they only have 'chat' support. I spent like a day chatting with at last 5 different support people. Some of them were incompetent, some of them were rude, some of them were nice, but I still have no access. That's insane.
reply: Hey Tamás,We apologise for the negative experience that you had with our customer service. We pride ourselves on giving our 100% every day to ensure that our customers’ needs are being met. We do our best to train each of our agents on how to properly handle our customers’ issues, including how to escalate problems that they are unable to assist with.Thanks for taking the time to let us know. We take this sort of feedback very seriously, so we will be passing this on for you.Best,Your N26 support team.

name: MS D
title: They are a pretty straightforward bank
content: They are a pretty straightforward bank. Easy to use and they keep the promotional crap to a minimum. The banking app is easy to use.

name: Erwin
title: Awesome banking service
content: The banking service, my black metal card and the app are awesome. Love that when I pay at the register, the app essentially confirms the payment even before the terminal does. Also, SEPA transfers in both directions are very fast.The only problem is the quality of the support. While they managed to solve my issue (payment authorisation not refunded within the 12 day maximum limit), I really had to argue my case and was told to just wait another week. That isn't really an acceptable answer.However, I see that as a symptom of the rapid expansion of the services, so time will tell. Meanwhile, I would still very much recommend N26. At the very least as a secondary account.

name: Druppy

name: Harun Cuban

name: MATRULLO
title: Compte bancaire clair et lisible avec…
content: Compte bancaire clair et lisible avec l'ensemble des transactions effectuées.Informations, par sms, quasi en temps réel des paiements et retraits effectués.Je recommande.Petit bémol, les cartes sont des cartes de débit et non de crédit ce qui rend impossible d'effectuer une réservation en ligne d'un hôtel ou le paiement en 3 ou 4 fois.

content: Au debut j'était sceptique mais franchement je kiff cette banque. Facile a ouvrir.des conseilles toujours la pour nous repondre❤

name: Nadia Massari
title: N26 is by far the best service I use!
content: N26 is by far the best service I use. All info or services I need are in the App, which is extremely easy to use. It really just makes life easier!Once I forgot my wallet at home, but thanks to the Cash26 functionality I could get cash at a grocery store in few easy steps. This is just one example, but I have many more cases where I really thought “wow, THIS is a good service!”.I can only recommend it.

name: Jaz Singh
title: Don’t waste your time, or give them your info
content: Was denied an account, despite meeting every criteria. I’ve signed up effortlessly to Monzo and Starling in the past, so I’m not sure what kind of hidden requirements I’m not meeting here. The best part is that N26 refuse to disclose why I was denied. Oh well, sticking to reliable, trustworthy app based banks for the time being!
reply: Hey Jaz,Thanks for taking the time to let us know. We take this sort of feedback very seriously, so we will be passing this on for you. As a fully-fledged bank, N26 must submit itself to banking regulations in place. Said regulation is aimed at protecting our users. We apologise for not being able to offer you an account at this time.Best,Your N26 support team.

content: Overall I am more than satisfied with N26's services and customer support. The 'metal' program seems to be a bit overpriced for the services and benefits one gets in return.

name: Hantrais
title: N26 tuera votre banque « tradi » et c’est tant mieux !
content: Je rêverais que ma banque « traditionnelle » comprenne aussi bien que N26 ce dont j’ai besoin ! Je pense que les dernières générations n’attendent qu’une banque comme celle-ci : modernité, hyper réactivité, efficacité, pratique, simple ! Parfait ! Le fonctionnement est clair, tant au niveau de l’appli, que de la carte, que la relation avec les « agents » tout est vraiment simple et fluide, une vraie révolution ! 👌🏻

name: Quentin Diafouka
title: Bonjour il viennent de me bloqué mon…
content: Bonjour il viennent de me bloqué mon compte un virement qui s'est jamais arrivé 1400 EUR j'aimerai savoir s'ils rembourser et combien de temps ca prendra
reply: Bonjour Quentin,Nous sommes désolés pour cette mauvaise expérience que vous avez connu avec nos services.N26 est soumis à la réglementation bancaire en vigueur qui a notamment pour objectif d’assurer la protection des clients et de leurs économies. En cas d'activité inhabituelle, le compte peut se retrouver suspendu le temps que notre service dédié analyse et regularise la situation. Merci de consulter notre article dédié pour plus d'informations : Pour plus d'informations : https://mag-fr.n26.com/compte-n26-bloqu%C3%A9-nous-vous-expliquons-pourquoi-ef27470083ca?gi=dcb928774a25Salutations.L'équipe N26.

Gehts noch?Und die APP läuft nicht auf Android 4.4 (ich brauche keine Belehrung, wie ich die Android-Version rausfinden kann, ich frage mich: sollen hunderttausende nun ihr smartphone entsorgen, weil es für N26 nicht reicht? Wie ökologisch ist das denn?!)
reply: Danke für dein Feedback und bitte entschuldige die Unannehmlichkeiten. Unsere Hotline ist nur für den absoluten Notfall und für Metalkunden gedacht. Wenn du ein Metalkunde bist, dann findest du die Hotline Nummer in deiner Mobile App. Du kannst jederzeit den Chat unten auf dieser Seite öffnen:https://support.n26.com/de-de/erste-schritte/persoenliche-daten/wie-kann-ich-mich-ausweisen.Die Mindestanforderungen für Android sind Android 6.0 oder höher. Du findest deine Android-Version unter Einstellungen > Über dein Gerät. Mehr Infos dazu findest du hier: https://support.n26.com/de-de/erste-schritte/konto/kann-ich-die-n26-app-auf-mein-smartphone-herunterladen.

name: Daniel C.
title: My Experience with the Mobile Bank N26
content: All in all, I couldn’t be happier with our N26 bank account and credit cards after using them for 2 years. I love using the modern app, the instant notification when we paid for something via one of my two cards, the fast wire transfers, the free Euro cash withdrawals at ATMs and paying no exchange fee when using N26 for payments in other foreign currencies.The built-in auto-categorization of my spendings also makes tracking expenses a lot easier and save me some time. I highly recommend testing out N26, if you’re looking for a free, modern bank account with tons of useful features and free payments in any currency.

name: COULONT
title: Fiable et novateur
content: Nous avons 2 comptes N26 dans la famille: un compte gratuit et un compte Black a 6€ par mois.Aucun soucis, super fiable.La carte Black a été utilisée de façon intensive à l’étranger (environ 150 débits et prélèvements sur 30 jours): zéro problème. Même le sans contact dans un coin pommé de la Colombie fonctionne si le terminal du commerçant est équipé.J’enlève une étoile car N26 n’offre pas tous les services d’une vrais banque de proximité, toutefois ces dernières devraient s’inspirer de cette petite banque novatrice.J’apprécie tout particulièrement les notifications en temps réel des dépenses et les virements instantanés sur les autres comptes N26, TOP !

name: Pata Fix
title: ECCELLENTE!
content: Ho fatto N26 un mesetto fa. La sto utilizzando per fare pagamenti online e anche con il contactless. Attualmente mi trovo benissimo. Per l'apertura del conto ci sono voluti solo 2 giorni lavorativi, e dopo 5-6gg lavorativi è anche arrivata la carta. La straconsiglio perchè non ha costi di gestione, è possibile prelevare in tutta Europa con 0 costi di commissione, in tutto il mondo i costi sono 1.7% sull'importo prelevato. Invece pagando direttamente con la carta le commissioni sono PARI a 0! Vi lascio il mio codice da inserire al momento dell'iscrizione per ottenere 15€ IN REGALO al momento del primo pagamento! : fabiog6862

name: Saifeddine DINAR
title: La banque du futur !
content: Les services bancaires proposé par N26 sont parmis les plus concurrents du marché. Pas de frais de tenue de compte, pas de frais de carte sur l'offre gratuit, les cinq premiers retrait du mois sont gratuits en zone euro (bien suffisant), les plafonds sont modifiables depuis l'application, et d'ailleurs tout le reste aussi. En parlant de l'appli, elle est d'une fluidité impressionnante, tout se fait rapidement et sans problème. Toutes les opérations de compte sont affichés en temps réel en plus de recevoir la notif. Bref que du plus à part le Chat Live avec des opérateurs un peu mou qui comprennent pas trop ce qu'on leur demande mais vous n'en aurez pas besoin a moins de vouloir modifier vos données perso par exemple (mon cas ^^')Bref N26 à recommander absolument, et d'ailleurs vous gagner 15€ a chaque fois que quelqu'un utilise votre code référence en s'inscrivant et qu'il dépense 15€ avec sa carte !(Le mien est là si jamais ^^ --> saifeddd1727)

name: m_dmeyer
title: -Excellent way to verify every purchase…
content: -Excellent way to verify every purchase you make through the app.-Love the colors to choose from for your N26 MasterCard, wish there were even more brighter ones to choose from.-direct chat customer service is through the app is absolutely indispensable at this day and age.

name: Daniel Schandl Christiansen
title: I have been using N26 for several…
content: I have been using N26 for several years, from an early onset when the app first appeared. I was at first, and for quite some time, satisfied with their services.They have, however, changed a lot since then. Firstly, client service disappeared and it is now not possible to talk to any assitant - a service now sold in their "Metal" package!The App shows weaknesses when it comes to synchronising and transactions, on many occasions, remain 'hung' or pending in the app, practically 'freezing' funds for a minimum of 1 week. (The app's livechat support asked me to wait this long).International transactions now have to be done from Transferwise from a computer... not much of a tech feat...

name: Jo Nic
title: La banque 3.0
content: La banque 3.0 ! Services excellents, agent professionnel, application à la pointe !
reply: Hi Daniel, thank you very much for your review. We are sorry to hear you had some difficulties to reach out to us, we understand this can be frustrating.Our customer service is available on phone for all metal account owners, however all our customers can still contact us via live chat 24/7 in English. You can find more options on how to contact us in the following link: https://support.n26.com/en-eu/getting-started/other/how-to-contact-n26.About synchronizing the app, the issue you mentioned seems to be a technical one. Usually in order to fix it you can follow this procedure: -unpair you device-uninstall the app -switch it off for a couple of minutes -install the app-repair the phoneAt this point you should be able to cancel the pending transactions.We are working to improve Transferwise experience and we are aware that at the moment it might take more time to send a transfer than it does in the App.We thank you for your understanding and collaboration. Your N26 Support team

name: Mario López Batres
title: Worst customer service
content: Worst customer service. When I tried to validate my idententy in the other side was a rude and stressed out woman who did not show any kind of respect. She just wanted to finish everything in one second in order to go to the next customer. At the end I had to finish the call not being able to validate it cause she did not want to wait 1 min until I activate the simcard.Stressed out woman who stress the rest of costumer. Instead of validating your customers you should validate your employees. I ll go for another bank. That's for sure.

name: Karl Noise
title: Bonjour,
content: Bonjour,Tout va bien dans le meilleur des mondes jusqu'au jour ou je pars en vacance, loue un scooter électrique et l'on me demande ma carte bancaire pour faire office de caution. Je donne ma carte et l'on m’explique que l'argent va sortir puis re-rentrer dans mon compte dans la même journée (400€). Cinq jours plus tard je n'ai toujours pas l'argent sur mon compte ayant bien sûr vérifié avec la boutique qu'il ai annulé la transaction (caution). Le merveilleux support N26 m'explique que la transaction est "en attente d'annulation" hors le boutique l'a bien annulé le jour même et qu'il est possible d'attendre jusqu’à 12 jours (pifomètre arbitraire pour te rendre ton argent) Mais alors ou est cette fameuse somme d'argent? entrain de flotter dans les airs ou bien sur un des comptes principaux de N26 à des fins spéculatives?Mon frère qui est dans une banque concurrente française et qui à fait la même chose que moi n'a même pas été débité et n'a pas de trace de la transaction.Bref N26 est une banque magique et je suis le seul mal chanceux n'est-ce pas..
reply: Hey Mario,Thanks for taking the time to let us know. We take this sort of feedback very seriously, so we will be passing this on for you. We apologise for the negative experience that you had with our customer service. We pride ourselves on giving our 100% every day to ensure that our customers’ needs are being met. We do our best to train each of our agents on how to properly handle our customers’ issues, including how to escalate problems that they are unable to assist with.Best,Your N26 support team.

name: D Sweens
title: I was carefull when I found a bank..
content: I was carefull when I found a bank online.And I was worried because my mastercard should have been delivered a few days back.Instead of charging me €25,- for a new pass he waived the charge and send me a new mastercard.This level of service is unbelievable and N26 has for sure kept a customer loyal.
reply: Bonjour Karl,Nous sommes navrés pour la mauvaise expérience rencontrée avec nos services et pour la gêne occasionnée par ce débit important. Comme vous l'ont certainement expliqué vos agents du LiveChat, le commerçant a effectué une empreinte bancaire (caution) lors de votre location. Cette somme sera automatiquement reversée sur votre compte sous 12 jours. Si toutefois vous n'avez pas été crédité de la somme passé ce délai, nous vous invitons à vérifier auprès du commerçant que la caution a bien été rendue. Puis joindre à nouveau nos agents du LiveChat qui seront en mesure d'identifier le problème et de régulariser la situation.Nous vous remercions pour votre compréhension.Salutations,L'équipe N26

name: Alexandra RC
title: Worst Bank I have ever banked with,Ive…
content: Worst Bank I have ever banked with,Ive had to take them to court stay clear ! Over £800 missing I’ve sent them the reciepts the transaction ID the APR number everything they need to trace a payment yet they are telling me they are unable to trace money.So basically you can send money to your own bank account and they can keep it because “they cannot trace funds” you pay £15.00 a month for what exactly? The staff are rude,and laugh at your expense,they are also based in Germany so any issues with your money you have to contact a cross border claims court which is ridiculous and takes weeks ! Any Normal bank would trace the funds and open a payment investigation yet N26 refuse to do this,I’ve been in tears and had staff laugh at me and have cracked jokes which I have kept proof of,I am mortified at the ordeal I have been through just to get my own money back.I’ve involved lawyers and contacted the financial Ombudsman Service who have also told me the same,the money has been sent to my account therefore it’s N26s responsibility to find where this is.Transfers take weeks,refunds also can take upto a month,there is no contact number to phone them if any problem (as they are based in Germany) which costs you 60p a minute calling from the U.K.I have asked numerous times to speak to a manager or some kind of point of help and I’ve been point blank refused.All I want is my money,I feel mentally and physically drained after trying my very hardest to resolve this and I’ve never in my life experienced anything so disgusting from a bank you are supposed to trust with your money.It’s one big scam beware ... there are other banks like think money and monzo who I have banked with who are amazing.

name: Castaldi
title: Je débute auprès de N26
content: Je débute auprès de N26, mais ma fille qui me l'a conseillée est très satisfaite. Je dois dire que je prends le même chemin
reply: Hey Alexandra,If you have not received an incoming transfer to your N26 account you need to contact the sending bank. They will do a payment investigation on their side in order to trace your funds. Please note that we only accept transfers in GBP (no SWIFT transfers). If you have a Metal membership you benefit phone service, there is no charge.  If you need any further assistance you can send us an email to support@n26.com via the email address you registered your account with. We will then take it from there. You can also contact our chat directly within the mobile app and webapp or from certain Support Center articles about opening an account (Available via our support center from a computer.) Best,Your N26 Support Team

reply: Danke für dein Feedback. Wir möchten uns dafür entschuldigen, dass du keine gute Erfahrung mit uns hattest. Es wird mit Hochdruck an Verbesserungen gearbeitet, damit wir unseren Kunden den bestmöglichen Kundenservice liefern können. Ein N26 Bankkonto ist kostenlos.* Je nach Region können aber zusätzliche Gebühren anfallen. Alle Infos dazu findest du hier: https://support.n26.com/de-de/erste-schritte/gebuehren/wie-viel-kostet-ein-n26-konto.

title: N26 - l'essayer c'est l'adopter.....
content: N26 - Nous avons souscrit une carte N26 l'année dernière pour un voyage au Canada - Le site est bien fait - la carte est arrivée rapidement - l'application est bien faite et intuitive - nous la réutilisons régulièrement pour nos vacances à l'étranger - Ce n'est pas notre banque principale car nous avons conservé un compte dans une banque traditionnelle (prêt immo etc.…). title: Five stars
content: Five stars. So far I am satisfied with all bits and pieces of offered service. Even customer support is responsive and somewhat skilled.Reason for four stars - I am a user in unsupported country and currently no Apple Pay is available. In a way it’s logical. But from my point of view - if I can still use the service and support is cut for new customers only, I would want to see full set of features. Knowing the reason for cut support of main service, Apple Pay availability should not change a thing.

name: Stefano Rossi
title: Ho cercato di ottenere la carta n26 ma…
content: Ho cercato di ottenere la carta n26 ma dopo aver seguito tutta la procedura inviato la foto del passaporto, l mia foto ecc dopo 2 giorni mi hanno detto di non potermi rilasciare la carta senza nessuna motivazione. Mi aspettavo di capire qualcosa ma niente!!
reply: Ciao Stefano,  in quanto banca con effettiva licenza bancaria europea (BCE) N26 è soggetta alle normative bancarie in vigore. Lo scopo di queste norme è quello di garantire la protezione dei clienti.Per motivi di privacy non possiamo fornire informazioni più specifiche riguardo al tuo caso.Il team N26

name: Hammad Abdul-Rasool
title: N26 frozen account
content: N26 was brilliant at first but then my account was suddenly frozen with no explanation. I make regular payments into the account as I use it for everyday spending. The reason I ordered the N26 metal was to use it through Europe on my travels without being charged I am travelling today with my travel money now frozen. I have phoned costumer services and was rushed of the phone with the staff laughing in the background very unprofessional.I think this bank is a joke and will now return to using my main bank account. Waste of money paying £14.99 a month to be treated like this.3 weeks on still no explanation or even a courtesy call or email
reply: Hey,As a bank we must comply with all legal and regulatory obligations. Following these regulatory processes, we periodically conduct reviews of our accounts. We have the responsibility to run routine checks on transactions (see GwG § 10). These checks are based on individual transactions and are automatically initiated by our systems. Unfortunately, these obligations may also prevent us from disclosing any detail around such checks. Rest assured, once the review on your account is complete, an agent will contact you. We’re sorry that this is causing an inconvenience on your side and aim to complete this review as soon as possible.Best,Your N26 Support Team.

name: Walch
title: Hände Weg von dieser online Bank
content: Bloß nicht. Kundenservice so gut wie keiner vorhanden. Telefonnummer zur schnellen Klärung keine vorhanden. Man kann per Chat und per Mail Kontakt aufnehmen. Macht man das, wird man vom Chat zum E-Mail Kontakt gebeten und andersrum. Also nur ein hin und her und keiner hat da irgendeine Ahnung von dem was sie da machen. Wenn man per Chat Kontakt aufnimmt bekommt man nicht mal die vollständigen Namen der Mitarbeiter genannt sondern nur die Vornamen. ( und dieses werden sicherlich auch nicht korrekt sein) Zum 3. mal hatte ich jetzt das Problem das ich mein regelmäßiges Gehalt erwartet habe. Dieses kommt jeden Monat pünktlich. Zum 3. mal habe ich 4 Tage lange auf mein Geld gewartet immer wieder Kontakt aufgenommen wo mein Geld bleibt. Es konnte mir keine Auskunft gegeben werden. Am 5 Tag erhielt ich Auskunft von meinen Arbeitgeber das das Geld zurück überwiesen wurde. Die Bank hielt mir also mein Geld 4 Tage lang zurück machte ihr Geld und überwies es dann einfach wieder an den Absender zurück. Das ganze schon zum dritten Mal. Das ist Betrug und wie ich nach Recherche der Bewertungen lies bin ich auch nicht die einzige Betroffene. Auf Anfrage warum das wieder passiert ist erhielt ich nur eine kurze knappe Antwort wir können leider nichts sehen. Dieses Bank ist eine betrüger Bank. Bitte einfach nur Finger weg. Außerdem rutschte ich durch diese Bank auch einmal unverschuldet ins Minus. Ich habe bei der Bank weder einen dispo noch habe ich einen beantragt. Auf Anfrage erhielt ich dann die Antwort das ich einen unsichtbaren dispo erhalten habe durch einen Systemfehler. Große Klasse. Jede Woche wurden mit Gebühren berechnet. Also diese Bank ich keines Wegs empfehlen. Wer schlau ist lässt die Finger von dieser Bank. Ich selbst habe mein Konto dort aufgelöst.
reply: Hey Walch, danke für dein Feedback!Hier findest du Informationen darüber, warum dir monatliche Gebühren berechnet wurden: https://support.n26.com/de-de/erste-schritte/konto/was-ist-ein-n26-flex-kontoGeld was zu einer Bank unterwegs ist, kann niemals von der Empfängerbank gesehen werden.Einzig und alleine deine Senderbank könnte einen Nachforschungsauftrag erstellen . um herauszufinden, warum es diesbezüglich Probleme gab.Schätzungsweise liegt es daran, dass der Empfängername und Sendername nicht übereingestimmt haben. Der N26 Kundensupport kann dir darüber mehr Informationen geben, wenn du eine Email an Support@n26.com sendest.Grüße, dein N26 Support Team.

We will then take it from there. You can also contact our chat directly within the mobile app and webapp or from certain Support Center articles about opening an account (Available via our support center from a computer.) Best,Your N26 Support Team
