name: Simon Graf von Brühl
title: Absolut keine Alternative zu einer…
content: Absolut keine Alternative zu einer Bank. Die App funktioniert meist nicht. Ein angepriesener Chat ist von mobilen Geräten gar nicht erreichbar. Der Verifikationsprozess, der notwendig ist, kostet 3-6 Stunden Wartezeit und dann bricht die Verbindung ab. Der Support antwortet auf schriftliche Anfragen gar nicht. Eine Telefonnummer existiert nicht. Ich kann nur dringend vor solch dubiosen „Banken“ warnen.
reply: Danke für deine ehrlichen Worte. Für die Unannehmlichkeiten möchten wir uns entschuldigen. Die meisten Verifikationen scheitern aufgrund einer schwachen Internetverbindung oder schlechter Bildqualität (z.B. zu verschwommen oder unterbelichtet). Alle Tipps zur Verifikation findest du hier: https://support.n26.com/de-de/probleme-beheben/persoenliche-daten/warum-funktioniert-meine-video-verifizierung-nicht.Unsere Hotline ist nur für den absoluten Notfall und für Metalkunden gedacht. Wenn du ein Metalkunde bist, dann findest du die Hotline Nummer in deiner Mobile App. Bitte sende uns doch eine private Nachricht an unseren N26_Support Twitter Account: https://twitter.com/N26_Support?s=09oder über unseren Facebook Account: https://www.facebook.com/N26DE/. Wir würden uns freuen dir bei dem Problem helfen zu können.Du kannst sonst den Chat jederzeit unten auf dieser Seite öffnen:https://support.n26.com/de-de/erste-schritte/persoenliche-daten/wie-kann-ich-mich-ausweisen

name: Alban PACREAU
title: Digital experience
content: Simple, efficace, tout digital

name: David Vox
title: Customer service is an absolute mess
content: Customer service is an absolute mess, but the application and bank works and is great.Talking to customer service is not a pleasant surprise. They told me they "lost" or "could not find" the document I reg. for my account with.Asking them about this matter, nobody replied to me - nobody tried to answer my questions,I screenshotted this mess, as a warning to others dealing with the bank. There is not any help to get from the customer service, it seems to be absolute chaos internally. If you send your sensitive documents to this bank, it might go "missing" And they don't know how or why...
reply: Hey David,We regret to hear that you were provided with such customer experience, it is the exact opposite of what we pride ourselves on. We’re very committed to making it right. You can reach out to our Live Chat Support within the Mobile App and WebApp or from certain Support Center articles about opening an account. Best,Your N26 Support Team

name: Stefan Trost
title: Kein Service vorhanden
content: Die App, das Konto und die Bank ist in Ordnung solange alles funktioniert. Sobald aber ein Problem auftritt hat man verloren. Der Kundenservice ist Faktisch nicht vorhanden und der Kunde wird mit seinen Problemen alleine gelassen. Ich konnte so mein Konto monatelang nicht nutzen, weil niemand bereit war mir weiter zu helfen. Nun versuche ich seit über 3 Wochen mein Konto dort zu kündigen und mein dort blockiertes Geld auf ein anderes Konto umbuchen zu lassen. Auch hier stoße ich auf taube Ohren. Absolut unseriös und nur abzuraten
reply: Hey Stefan, danke für dein Feedback.Als vollwertige Bank muss sich N26 den geltenden Bankvorschriften unterwerfen. Diese Regelung zielt darauf ab, unsere Nutzer zu schützen.Bei der Verwendung deines Bankkontos treten keine Probleme auf, wenn du nicht gegen unsere Allgemeinen Geschäftsbedingungen verstößt.Sollte dies geschehen sein, werden wir dich kontaktieren, um weiteres vorgehen zu besprechen und dir auch dein Restgeld auszuzahlen.Bitte beachte, dass der Kundensupport und das Social Media Team in diesem Fall nicht aushelfen kann, da dies von einer Fachabteilung betraut wird. Bis dahin bitten wir um Geduld.Gruß, dein N26 Support Team

name: Emmanuel Galerne
title: une banque génial les produits son bien…
content: une banque génial les produits son bien il suffit encore de spécifier certain produit par pays comme l épargne mais je suis très content dans l ensemble

name: Bruno Royant
title: Rapide  simple et efficace
content: Rapide  simple et efficace

name: drive up
title: C’est tout simplement une merveille
content: C’est tout simplement une merveille, ultrarapide, ultra compétitifs, ultra simple, et tout ça gratuitement.Je vous conseille cette banque elle est tout simplement parfaite

name: Nicolas
title: La banque de son temps
content: La banque de son temps: le vrai pouvoir sur sa carte, vision de ses dépenses, service client présent en cas de besoin.

name: William Boydie Crawford
title: Has made my life so much easier
content: Has made my life so much easier, highly recommended.

name: Isabella
title: Literally the worst experience I've…
content: Literally the worst experience I've ever had with anything. I opened my account almost two months ago and still haven't received my card. A lot of N26 is tied to their mobile app which you can't access without having received the card. The first card was 'undeliverable' (?), and so I opened up a support chat and was told that they would order me a new one. I paid to have the card sent express as I have over 4000 euros in my account and need to pay rent! Turns out the absolute imbecile I talked to never actually ordered my card, so I was told another one would be ordered and express shipped free of charge. The next day I was yet to receive any confirmation (which I was told I should expect to receive) so I went to the support chat for (literally) the 10th time to find out more. I was assured that it had been ordered, but they offered to help me transfer money out of my n26 account into an account I hold with a REAL bank. An hour later, after taking photos of my passport and entering details upon details about anything and everything, I got to the final step:"Enter the ten digits on the back of your n26 card"I'm absolutely livid. The customer service rep simply apologised saying he 'was so focused on the problem at hand that [he]'d forgotten that [I] hadn't received a card yet'. If I could give n26 negative stars I would. A bunch of complete imbeciles trying to convince people they know what they're doing with a pretty website. STAY AWAY!!!!
reply: Hey,Thanks for taking the time to let us know. We take this sort of feedback very seriously, so we will be passing this on for you. We apologise for the negative experience that you had with our customer service. We pride ourselves on giving our 100% every day to ensure that our customers’ needs are being met. We do our best to train each of our agents on how to properly handle our customers’ issues, including how to escalate problems that they are unable to assist with.Best,Your N26 support team.

name: MiniGatzer Kelanight
title: Superbe banque
content: Superbe banque. Virement interne rapide. Gestion du budgets clair.

name: Craig
title: Freeze your account for no reason been 3 months !!!
content: Account has been under review for 3 months !!! Had a email today from the complaint department saying they can’t carry on my complaint and that it’s still under review I’ve sent everything they have asked !!!! It does not take 3 months to review a account just close my god dam account and give me my money back !!!!!!
reply: Hey Craig,As a bank we must comply with all legal and regulatory obligations. Following these regulatory processes, we periodically conduct reviews of our accounts. We have the responsibility to run routine checks on transactions (see GwG § 10). These checks are based on individual transactions and are automatically initiated by our systems. Unfortunately, these obligations may also prevent us from disclosing any detail around such checks. Rest assured, once the review on your account is complete, an agent will contact you. Please respond to the email you will have received for further instructions on what to do.Best,Your N26 support team.

name: Elvira Varga
title: Not a five star yet because i’m waiting…
content: Not a five star yet because i’m waiting for my name change on my bank pass, but as soon as that was done correctly it will be a five star rate!

name: Demob Diaby
title: N26 the love of my life (the best mobile bank ever)
content: Waw!! The best online bank ever, my family, friends and relatives need to know about N26.So amazing, henceforth N26 is gonna be my main bank, because it's international.I wish I can give multiple 5 stars*****, the customer services is so amazing.N26 my first love, thanks for making banking system so easy for me..The world need to know about your service,N26 🙌🏾💕🙌🏾If you are reading this please download and enjoy the best banking service ever.N26 my forever love🤩😍❤❤  I can't stop smiling😊😊😊😊😁 love my bank so much

name: Romário Ferreira
title: Accessibilité
content: Malgré le fait qu'il n'y ait pas une structure physique où je vis, la banque est très accessible via le chat en ligne et par messagerie.

name: Tony kenechukwu
title: Fantastic Service ,
content: Fantastic Service ,Fabulous in every aspect.My Favourite Bank due to there ability to have a Very best team of support available at every min to assist in different issues.

name: Linn
title: Amazing customer service
content: Amazing customer service, very quick resolution time even on basic membership!

name: Adil
title: One of the worst
content: They are one of the worst bankThey want to take your moneyThey took my money by charging me for failed transactions
reply: Hey Adil,As a bank we must comply with all legal and regulatory obligations. Following these regulatory processes, we periodically conduct reviews of our accounts. We have the responsibility to run routine checks on transactions (see GwG § 10). These checks are based on individual transactions and are automatically initiated by our systems. Unfortunately, these obligations may also prevent us from disclosing any detail around such checks. Rest assured, once the review on your account is complete, an agent will contact you. We’re sorry that this is causing an inconvenience on your side and aim to complete this review as soon as possible.You can read more about our pricing list on our support center, here is the link: https://support.n26.com/en-gb/getting-started/account/how-much-does-an-n26-account-costBest,Your N26 Support Team

name: j van mourik
title: The customer support has me very…
content: The customer support has me very friendly and patient. I still don't have that much say, because I am not so very long customer.

name: Ralf G
title: Leider gibt es massive…
content: Leider gibt es massive Sicherheitslücken UND diese werden mangelhaft aufgearbeitet. Ganz miese Bank. Betrüger nutzen diese Sisherheitslücken für Machenschaften auf ebay kleinanzeigen. Vorsicht vor dieser Bank, nicht empfehlenswert
reply: Hey Ralf, danke für dein Feedback.Sollte ein Mitmensch auf einen Identitätsdiebstahl hereingefallen sein und Betrügern den Zugang zu einem Konto eröffnen, werden wir dies natürlich sofort unterbinden, sofern wir dies erfahren.Bitte sende uns doch eine Email an Support@n26.com, sodass wir dahingehend recherchieren und dies verhindern können.Gruß, Dein N26 Support Team.

name: Antonio - SiniGest
title: Da evitare
content: Offre ottimi servizi, peccato che di punto in bianco decide di chiuderti il conto senza dare spiegazioni accusandoti di aver commesso gravi violazioni, ed il personale a cui chiedi spiegazioni altamente incompetente non ti risponde. Da evitare ottima banca ma con personale incapace che muove accuse infondate senza capire cosa fa.
reply: Ciao, Antonio, grazie per averci scritto. In quanto banca con effettiva licenza bancaria europea (BCE) N26 è soggetta alle normative bancarie in vigore. Lo scopo di queste norme è quello di garantire la protezione dei clienti.Se il tuo conto N26 è bloccato, hai ricevuto di certo una mail con le informazioni e la procedura da seguire. Il servizio dedicato sta esaminando il tuo caso e ti ricontatterà via email. Per ulteriori dubbi non esitare a consultare questo articolo: https://mag-it.n26.com/conto-n26-bloccato-ti-spieghiamo-perch%C3%A9-3cdb2ae50a08Buona giornata.

name: Andreea
title: As easy as it can get.
content: As easy as it can get.Best way to run your monthly finances.

name: Danny Burns
title: I would avoid this bank at all costs.
content: I would avoid this bank at all costs.At first I thought it was a good bank but the cracks started to appear. First you cannot make payments to o2 and several other companies due to address issues. I tried to make several purchases online which get declined but the payment is taken and you have to wait up to 10 days to get the money back. I cancelled a direct debit but it was still taken and when I contacted them they said it would take at most 2 days to get my money back, it took a week. I raised a query as to why I couldn’t make payments to o2 and no one has ever bothered replying. I had to find out myself that it’s due to the way the bank stores your address details and why I spoke to an agent on chat I was told that if I want to order things online I need to contact the company prior and change the address format first in order for the payment not to decline. What started off so promising has turned into an absolute nightmare and over the last few months I’ve spent most of the time trying to get my own money back or having to get other people to make my payments or order things for me.
reply: Hey Danny,Thanks for taking the time to let us know. We take this sort of feedback very seriously, so we will be passing this on for you. Outlining where you think we can improve helps us to prioritise where we need to improve, so we appreciate this.We apologise for the negative experience that you had with our customer service. We pride ourselves on giving our 100% every day to ensure that our customers’ needs are being met. We do our best to train each of our agents on how to properly handle our customers’ issues, including how to escalate problems that they are unable to assist with.Best,Your N26 support team.

name: Carl Johan Törnell
title: Simple and fast
content: Simple and fast. The new way of banking.

name: Scottie Law
title: Now my main bank account
content: Fantastic customer service although it's all online but has always helped me.Great bank, I still have my own account with another bank but I've reduced that to a cash account and using N26 as my main account. Wages, bills etc all paid into it. Cant ask more much more tbh

name: Azevedo Santos
title: Great bank.No fees
content: Great bank.No fees, no unknown charges...like it!

name: Spyros Papailias
title: These guys want to call themselves “bank”.
content: I have £290 actually in my account and guess what???I can’t use them because this kind of bank wants to check some information.I was all the afternoon explain them that I need that money and the answer was:We have to comply with regulations.What kind of regulation? With my money?OMG.7 hours now and still waiting.Stay away from this kind of bank if you don’t want to loose your money.My first review ever. There are plenty services with terrible customer service but these guys are top.
reply: Hi Spyros,In accordance with European banking processes, we must carry out regular routine checks on user accounts. We follow these processes to ensure our user accounts are kept safe and secure. The majority of the time, these checks are done very quickly, without you being able to see them. On occasion this takes longer, as we may have to reach out to you for some necessary information.We understand your query and the concern you may have for the status of your account, but for your own security, we are unable to provide detailed information and support through here. We kindly ask that you respond to the email you would have received from us with any queries you may have.Best Regards,Your N26 Support Team

name: Rob Ert
title: Ich wollte auf Empfehlung eines…
content: Ich wollte auf Empfehlung eines Arbeitskollegen ein N26-Konto eröffnen, da er nur gutes erzählte. Leider kam es bei mir nicht besonders weit, da das Video-Ident nicht funktionieren wollte. Ständig die Fehlermeldung, mein WLAN sei zu schwach (ich probierte es mit einer 50tausender Leitung). Schade, dass es nach einer Woche voller fehlgeschlagener Versuche nicht geklappt hat. App ist wieder gelöscht. Ich hab nun mal auch andere Dinge zu tun, als jeden Feierabend stillsitzend auf die Verfikation zu warten, welche technisch einfach nicht durchgehen möchte.
reply: Hey Rob, danke für dein Feedback.Bitte entschuldige die Unannehmlichkeiten.Falls du es noch einmal probieren solltest, haben wir hier Tipps für dich:Es gibt zwei Faktoren, die du unter Kontrolle hast: Die Internetanbindung sowie dein Smartphone. Bitte versuche zunächst den einen und dann den anderen Faktor zu ändern. Das Gerät mit dem du die Verifikation durchführst und das Gerät, dass du später verwenden möchtest, müssen nicht identisch sein.https://support.n26.com/de-de/erste-schritte/konto/wie-kann-ich-mich-ausweisenGruß, dein N26 Support Team

name: Jakub D
title: Bad customer service and support
content: Before I opened account I asked If the account will act the same way in Ireland as in Germany as I was planning to move. I was told yes but when I tried to open saving account I was told its not possible in Ireland so I wanted to downgrade my account from N26 YOU to the free one as for time in Ireland I'll be still using my Irish account.I was told I can do it but can't upgrade back to N26 YOU afterwards!? Apparently business rules.No other solution offered from support Just keep repeating them self.Really disappointed from this approach.I wrote them with canceling request again the issue with that I still would like to keep the account but they simply cancelled it so there is probably no retention team either.
reply: Hey Jakub,Thanks for taking the time to leave your feedback, and we regret to learn that you did not have a positive experience with N26.We do not offer N26 Savings in Ireland at this time, and it is correct that currently, when you downgrade from one of our premium offerings, it is not possible to upgrade in future due to the previous cancellation.We do have a dedicated cancellation team that work on these requests, and we apologise that your request to keep the account as standard was not noticed. Provided your account has been closed and you have received notification of this, it is possible to sign up again.Best Regards,Your N26 Support Team

name: Arthur Lemaire
title: La seule vraie banque qui vit avec son temps !
content: Très fluide et facile d'utilisation, N26 offre la meilleure expérience pour un étudiant ou un jeune dynamique. Instantanée sur les dépenses et en pleine expansion de ses offres, l'usage au quotidien de l'application est des plus optimales!Je recommande vivement.

name: Jess Ica
title: WORST BANK EVER
content: WORST BANK EVER! Only chat bots available. I sent a request for a name change and after one year still no one worked on it. Absolutely the most incompetent bank I ever had!!!
reply: Hey Jess,Thanks for taking the time to let us know. We take this sort of feedback very seriously, so we will be passing this on for you. We would be happy to help you if you contact us via the Live Chat from within the app or web app. An agent will be glad to help out. Best,Your N26 support team.

name: bahaa eldin Salim
title: It makes life easier in Europe
content: It makes life easier in Europe

name: Ansel Himmler
title: Carte mai arrivate!!!
content: Decido di aprire un conto N26. Dopo un paio di mesi che non mi arrivava la carta a casa ho contattato l'assistenza che ha provveduto al reinvio della stessa. Seconda carta mai arrivata!!! Mi sono ritrovato con l'addebito sul conto per le due carte. Poi continui messaggi da parte loro per caricare il conto in modo tale da ripagare il costo delle carte. IO NON PAGO PER COSE NON RICEVUTE. Nella loro ultima mail mi informano di avermi chiuso il conto e che probabilmente avrebbero passato tutto ad una agenzia per il recupero crediti. Carissimi signori, il disservizio che mi avete cagionato non merita nessun pagamento da parte mia. Si paga per beni ricevuti non per cose fantasma. Detto questo mi aspetto almeno delle scuse formali che vi darebbero un po' di credibilità.

name: Alex Cruz
title: Horrible Customer Service:
content: Horrible Customer Service - I opened up a premium account with this bank. After never receiving my card I get an email saying I owe them money. I was told to chat with a bot service after explaining the situation via email to customer support. Who sends customers to chat after an email exchange? I have never used my card and am now asked to pay over £70 to this bank. Profit > People = N26 .... Avoid at all cost!!! This horrible customer service can be seen in the same copy and pasted replies left in the comments from N26 in these reviews.
reply: Ciao Ansel, grazie per averci contattato.Siamo spiacenti per la tua esperienza, vorremmo approfondire sull'accaduto ma avremmo bisogno di avere più informazioni su di te.Contattaci alla mail support@n26.com , saremo felici di risolvere la tua situazione.Buona giornata.

name: Thibault Vian
title: Très bonne banque
content: Très bonne banque, peu chère. Excellente appli.
reply: Hey Alex,We apologise for the negative experience that you had with our customer service. We pride ourselves on giving our 100% every day to ensure that our customers’ needs are being met. We do our best to train each of our representatives on how to properly handle our customers’ issues, including how to escalate problems that they are unable to assist with.We would be more than happy to take a closer look into your documents with you. You can send us an email to support@n26.com via the email address you registered your account with. We will then take it from there. You can also contact our chat directly within the mobile app and webapp or from certain Support Center articles about opening an account (Available via our support center from a computer.) Best,Your N26 Support Team

name: Abderrahmane Hadj Slimane

content: Le service est extrement bon et d'une facilité déconcertante.Cependant 2 aspects devraient être améliorés:- pouvoir faire des dépôts d'argent liquide- le plastique des cartes mastercard se dégradent très vite et les lettres s'effacent vite puisqu'elle sont simplement imprimées et non pas en relief

name: Anshuman Dwivedi

name: Belkis

content: La meilleure banque en ligne. Transferts minute.Pas de frais cachés.Paiement par carte sans frais partout dans le monde. Transactions visibles immédiatement sur l’application. Bref tout ce que je recherche.

title: Très bien...! Mais pas de découvert

title: super service

content: Service efficace, compétent, banque qui répond à un vrai besoin - épargner du temps et éviter les commissions quand on paie en dehors de la zone euro. A recommander

title: Jusqu'à présent un sans faute
content: Jusqu'à présent un sans faute, mais là paf accident industriel, aucune analyse de la demande formulée, incapacité à donner un réponse claire, d'où ies 4*

name: Lee
title: I'm happy and the only reason for my 4…
content: I'm happy and the only reason for my 4 stars is that you can only have one account with N26. I wanted one in Spain and in the uk but this is not possible. There online chat is great have resolved my problems such as when i changed mobile number and forgot to update the app with it / got locked out.

name: Leon Schulz
title: Best Bank in Germany
content: Very good bank in general but compared to the competition I. Germany, miles ahead. Some minor issues that are standard with such a modern strategy.

name: Mr Brian Banks
title: So far so good!
content: So far so good!I'm a recent new customer, and so far everything is working very well with the bank. I'm also proud to have my account with a relatively new bank who think differently and do everything I need with minimum of fuss and hassle, rather than the bureaucratic nonsense of some of the bricks and mortar old guard banks. Very pleased indeed with N26.

name: Eleytherios Athanasiadis
title: all good very fine!
content: all good very fine!

name: Lee Licayan
title: It's cool like Starbucks, but scary too
content: I personally love it so far but I fear the horror stories coming to fruition with my account so I'm only keeping a small amount (€100) in it for now. Functionality-wise, it's a lot better than your brick and mortar banks and their bare bones apps. As a college student, it fills that area of sleek, trendy, efficient and minimalist online banking that I crave for. I represent a college sports club which was approached with an N26 sponsorship but we rejected their offer due to the bad press they have received. Irrelevant story, I know, but I hope to approach them if I find that I truly support the product.

name: Kyle
title: It all comes down to trust...
content: I personally love using N26 and I've only had good experiences. I use my N26 card often BUT...I've heard many horror stories of peoples accounts being frozen for months. It's the only reason I haven't switched completely to N26 with all of my finances. The instant chat is good but there is no phone number advertised. If they had a more robust platform to communicate and resolve issues instantly, I would have switched without hesitation. It's a German bank with no branch and you can't call them...not the best way to win customers trust when you think about it.@N26 Trust is key and you have a problem. The problem being the bad reviews on this site will hit the news one day. Copy and Paste responses don't help. Find a solution to gain trust! I want to see this bank become number 1 not 26th.

name: Echata Ishaka
title: Meilleur compte en ligne!
content: Meilleur compte en ligne!
reply: Thanks for taking the time to let us know. We take this sort of feedback very seriously, so we will be passing this on for you. Outlining where you think we can improve helps us to prioritise our upcoming projects, so we appreciate this. Best,Your N26 support team.

name: Vesna Vujinovic
title: I choose this bank since there is no monthly fee for keeping your account active.
content: I choose this bank since there is no fee for the basic account which makes it so easy, also no fees for the first 5 taking money on ATM machine. I love the online support that you can easily access via mobile application and they are really helpful.Really satisfying.

name: Dan Pipiche
title: N26: Passez votre chemin, il y a beaucoup mieux et sérieux!
content: Banque vraiment nulle, j'ai passé une heure à faire les formalités et 2 jours après j'ai une réponse négative, sans aucune explication et impossible de répondre au mail noreply at n26.comj'ai mis une étoile car on ne peut pas mettre 0 mais ça vaut 0, ne perdez pas votre temps et allez voir ailleurs!Edit le 30/07Voir la réponse de N26 en bas, ils répètent toujours la même chose et parlent de la réglementation en vigueur sans donner de détails mais ils continuent à faire leur pub!Bonjour Axxxxxx,Nous sommes désolés mais nous ne pouvons malheureusement pas vous proposer un compte N26. En tant qu’établissement bancaire, nous devons suivre des réglementations légales strictes pour chaque ouverture de compte. Nous sommes pour le moment dans l’impossibilité de vous donner plus d’informations à ce sujet pour des raisons légales et notre Service Client ne ne sera pas en mesure de vous aider davantage.Nous vous remercions pour votre compréhension et pour votre intérêt pour N26.L’équipe N26

name: hubert
title: satisfaite de N26
content: retrait facile, paiement carte sans problème. j'ai reçu ma carte métal et l'emballage et vraiment jolie ainsi que la carte. petit bémol sur les dépôt d’espèce et le découvert non possible en France
reply: Bonjour,Nous sommes désolés de ne pouvoir vous compter parmi nos clients. Nous sommes tenus de respecter la réglementation bancaire en vigueur et nous ne manquerons pas de vous tenir informé si la situation était amenée à évoluer.Salutations,L'équipe N26

name: Marcos III Perez
title: Amazing no-nonsense Bank that is Customer-Friendly
content: Amazing bank. I had my doubts at first because everyone was saying it is better to have a physical branch. What I immediately noticed is that they communicate well in English and the account was easy to set up. The mastercard came in only a few days later as well.No appointments and lining up at the bank needed. I opened my account at the office kitchen, during lunch break. That's how easy it is. Customer service representative was great.Of course, the app is very user-friendly and you get notifications per transaction, without fail so far. I also like the concept of "spaces" so you can set aside and lock money from your urge to spend it. Customer support is also easy to reach and they are very polite. All in all, amazing banking experience. Keep it up!

name: Alan Walker
title: Excellent simple bank account
content: Excellent simple bank account. It's even easier to load the card onto the ApplePay wallet using the N26 app than Apple's own wallet app. OutApples Apple.It doesn't have all the bells n whistles but it does what it does and does it well. Spaces, for example, is a super-easy way to ring-fence money for certain things so that you cannot spend that money on something else with your card. I created spaces for my holiday, one for the hotel, one for spending. I can then drag the money back to the main space when I need to.

name: Kerri
title: So far so good
content: I’ve had a very positive experience with N26 so far. The account was set up very fast and I received my card in a few days. However, I have had no issues with the bank, so I’m not sure what their customer help services are like. The app is so fuss-free, you can set and change your PIN on the app and, best of all, you get push notifications exactly as and when money has entered or left your account, I personally love it at this moment in time.

name: Raquel Brasileiro
title: Love it!
content: Amazing digital solution in a surprisingly analogical country. N26 helped a lot my landing in Germany. Great Customer Service and design.

name: Baiba Freimane
title: Good service
content: Good service, very good card and a nice, easy to use app. I am happy to use this card. Works very well in EU and also outside as well as for transfers and saving up money. I would only wish free withdrawals outside EU but i understand that this is a free card so that's a bit too much to ask. Otherwise, very happy to use the great N26 mastercard and application! Thank you!

name: KRS aL
title: So far I have a great experience with…
content: So far I have a great experience with the app, customer service, exchange rate to foreign currencies! Probably there are issues I have been going through yet, but for those mentioned about so far, it has been great, comparing to conventional Banking services!

name: Davide Signoretti
title: Ottimo servizio
content: Ho aperto il conto 4 giorni fa e oggi ho ricevuto la master card.Applicazione offre diverse soluzioni. Sono soddisfatto. Grazie e buon lavoro

name: Vorraphob Junburanasiri
title: They have nice customer services
content: They have nice customer services. I actually appreciate that for helping me with useful information.

name: Mattia Maccarone
title: N26 é davvero ottima
content: N26 é davvero ottima, sono già diversi mesi che la utilizzo, il poter prelevare in qulasiasi banca senza preoccuparsi che ti prendano commissioni è favoloso! Fino ad ora non ho mai riscontrato problemi, facile intuitiva e fa bene il suo dovere, consigliatissima.Ho anche potuto provare il trasferimento istantaneo tra carte N26 davvero utilissimo! questo é il codice amico " mattiam6931 " per partire con un bonus!! Grazie

name: RICHARD BALOGUN
title: In withdraw money from my PayPal into…
content: In withdraw money from my PayPal into N26 , they have my money suddenly they said the money was send to Barclays who will credit my PayPal, I contact PayPal with the code they couldn’t find the money , I contact Barclays they told me no such payment go back to N26 to find the money .. They can’t even contact Barclays , why should I contact Barclays ?why is the payment send to 3rd parties why not credit my N26 or send to PayPal... Fishy they trying to steal my money but this timeI will get my money backI promise ...I will take this to next legalAction
reply: Hey Richard,You can send us an email to support@n26.com via the email address you registered your account with. We will then take it from there. You can also contact our chat directly within the mobile app and webapp or from certain Support Center articles about opening an account (Available via our support center from a computer.)We apologise for the negative experience that you had with our customer service. We pride ourselves on giving our 100% every day to ensure that our customers’ needs are being met. We do our best to train each of our representatives on how to properly handle our customers’ issues, including how to escalate problems that they are unable to assist with.Best,Your N26 support team.

name: GERARD
title: Client N26 Black satisfait depuis 2 ans
content: Client N26 Black depuis mai 2017, jamais eu un souci. Les virements sont très rapides (émis par exemple d'Orange Bank le matin, reçu sur le compte N26 en milieu d'après-midi). Les plafonds élevés de la carte permettent des achats de sommes importantes par internet. Ce dernier point peut paraître sans intérêt mais quand on commence a réserver ses vacances par internet, des billets d'avions pour 3000 euros ou des réservations d'hôtels pour 1500 euros, on se rend compte qu'avec une Visa ou Mastercard classique, cela ne passerait pas même si l'on dispose des fonds.J'ai souscris à N26 Black du temps où l'offre était proposée à 5,90 euros par mois mais malgré deux augmentations (passage à 7,90 puis à 9,90 euros) mon tarif n'a jamais changé, et je bénéficie en plus des nouvelles fonctionnalités comme par exemple Spaces, très pratique !Seul bémol, le RIB allemand. Même si l'Union Européenne oblige l'acceptation de n'importe quel RIB de l'UE pour le virement du salaire ou pour des prélèvements, dans la réalité, on essuie pas mal de refus, parfois seulement pour raison technique, car les RIB allemands sont plus courts que les RIB français.Mon seul (gros) regret : la suppression de Black pour le passage à You. Les offres sont semblables (You est même mieux que Black pour le même prix) mais j'ai toujours ma carte Black avec son logo argenté Mastercard issue de la World Elite. L'offre You semble retourner sur une Mastercard classique avec son logo jaune et rouge. C'est un regret purement esthétique, mais la carte Black me plaisait beaucoup !

name: Petteri Bergius
title: Good services, but SWIFT omission bad idea
content: I was very happy with the bank and it's services until I learned that it doesn't support SWIFT payments. That's a glaring omission in modern banking world. There is a wide world outside of SEPA. That's why only 4 stars.

name: Client
title: Une banque en ligne avec des tarifs…
content: Une banque en ligne avec des tarifs très intéressant et un service client très rapide je recommande fortement

All of a Sudden you get a message without any advanced notice that your account will close, the law requires 2 months in my case 10 days. you keep send them email and ask them for opening the account for 1 day so I can transfer (Pairing Issue).  no one responds to you.  these people are fraud and embezzlers.This will happen randomly to you. Go on and work with your brick and mortar bank,  you are safe there.Does any one knows what happens to your money when their artificial time comes and they cancel the account?

name: Jordan
title: Une honte, fuyez loin de cette banque.
content: Une honte, Au début tout est beau, tout est magnifique quand vous ouvrez votre compte car c'est très rapide, en effet. Par contre, attendez un peu et vous aller pleurer. Fuyez, n'ouvrez surtout pas un compte chez eux ! Cela fait 15 jours que j'ai créer mon compte, je n'ai toujours pas reçu ma carte, c'est abusif, dans le sens ou ils ne savent rien du tout de où est-ce qu'elle est ni rien !!! Au final une fois le contact client contacté, on me dit qu'il faut recommander une carte et attendre encore 15 jours.Aujourd'hui je décide de porter plainte contre eux, car il séquestre mon argent et je ne peux rien y faire. J'ai donc de l'argent chez eux, et aucune possibilité de pouvoir le bouger car il faut recevoir la carte avant de faire la oinService client pas à la hauteur, fuis les questions, réponds toujours de façon générale et sans aide particulière. Chat très lent et qualité de service pas à la hauteur pour une carte Metal à 17€ par mois !La résponse du service client ci-dessous est totalement fausse :- La carte Metal ne peut pas être livré en Express  et ne possède pas de lien de suivi. - j'ai bien pu faire un virement entrant, mais non Sortant ,car il faut recevoir la carte avant de faire un virement sortant... Tout n'est au tissus de mensonge, on ne peut pas avoir confiance en cette banque.. aui est toujours à côté de la plaque.

name: Mickael Cousin
title: Une application intuitivemais surtout…
content: Une application intuitivemais surtout une banque en ligne pratique,fluide rapide avec un service client performant.Des notification de dépense en direct ce qui permet une gestion des dépenses bien plus pratique.
reply: Bonjour Jordan,Nous sommes désolés que vous soyez toujours en attente de votre carte N26 Metal. La carte est automatiquement envoyée après la validation de votre identité et vous la recevez sous 14 jours. La livraison de votre carte est prise en charge par les services postaux nationaux (tels que La Poste) et nous n'avons pas la main sur leurs services : c'est pourquoi nous ne pouvons savoir où se trouve votre carte si jamais elle est perdue.Sachez que nous proposons la livraison Express à 25€ : livraison en 2 jours, prise en charge par un transporteur privé qui fournit un numéro de tracking.Par ailleurs, vous gardez la main sur votre argent. Si vous êtes parvenu à faire un virement entrant pour alimenter votre compte N26, vous êtes en mesure de faire un virement sortant.Nos agents se tiennent à disposition par LiveChat ou téléphone (puisque vous êtes client Metal) si vous souhaitez commander une nouvelle carte.Salutations,Votre équipe N26.

Contacted them numerous times via chat for updates, but to no avail. Was looking to use them for myself and my employees, but they didn't care....useless

content: Paying £14.90 a month for nothingCustomer service does not exist Insurance only valid if you pay for flights on card which is not a credit card so who would do that. reply: Hi Clive,Thanks for taking the time to leave your feedback.Customer service is available via live chat daily from 7:00 - 23:00. If you can kindly give us feedback as to the lounges in which you experienced this, we would be more than happy to follow up on this for you.Best,Your N26 Support Team.

J'apprécie particulièrement les solutions pour l'international, le pack Business également.  En ce qui concerne le SAP, c'est très pro, très réactif. name: Sebastian
title: Gute Erfahrung seit Start der Bank
content: Ich bin seit Marktstart also dem 04.11.2016 zm genau zu sein Kunde bei N26 vormals Number26 und kann die schlechten Bewertungen nicht nachvollziehen.Zum Thema Support sei gesagt das ich in den nun fast 3 Jahren in welchen ich mein Konto nun schon bei N26 habe keinerlei Support gebraucht habe da man alles was idr. anfällt selber erledigen kann. Andere Bewertungen beschweren sich über den Support wobei ich mich dabei Fragen muss warum? 95% der Leute welche Probleme vorweisen, haben es selbst verbockt und benutzen ein "kostenloses" Konto und erwarten 24/7 Top-Support am Telefon. Da frage ich mich dann schon was solche Leute erwarten?Wer telefonischen Support haben möchte, solle sich doch bitte für das entsprechende Konto entscheiden und für die Leistung bezahlen. Ich denke nämlich kaum das die Personen, welche genau das Bemängeln selber nur einen Finger kostenlos bewegen würden.Das einzige, was man bemängeln könnte ist das Ident verfahren welches durch einen externen Dienstleister abgehandelt wird welcher wirklich die lustlosesten Mitarbeiter dieser Erde beschäftigt. Vielleicht sollte N26 hierbei versuchen einen anderen Dienstleister hierfür zu finden oder die Kontoverifizierung über den elektronischen Personalausweis ermöglichen.Zu einigen anderen Bewertungen hier möchte ich sagen WTF? Was ist mit euch los? Wenn sich Personen hier beschweren das ihr Konto gesperrt wurde, weil es ins Minus gebracht wurde ohne das N26 zuvor ein Dispo eingeräumt hat, muss ich mich schon Fragen, ob diese Personen mit Geld umgehen können?Zu Guter Letzt sei gesagt, wenn man N26 ein bisschen mehr Zeit gibt und diese ihren Kundensupport aufstocken ist es eine gute Bank. Um nun einige Leute zum Nachdenken zu bringen hier noch eine Frage: Möchtet ihr lieber ein Call Center in Deutschland mit Leuten die Deutsch sprechen können und verstehen was ihr wollt oder ein Call Center in Indien welches zwar schnell mit Kundenwachstum mithalten kann aber qualitätstechnisch zum Kotz*en ist?Btw ich habe auch eines Kostenloses Konto da ich ebenfalls finde, dass die Premium Konten kein Mehrwert für mich haben. Lieber die "Flugverspätung und Reiserücktrittsversicherung" uns solchen Schmarrn weglassen und den telefonischen Support auch Kunden unterhalb von N26 Metal ermöglichen.

name: Peter Magyar
title: For about 6months I was using the free…
content: For about 6months I was using the free account. The registration, the delivery was easy, quick, and the daily use of the card also pretty simple and convinient. I never had to call the support, because everything was working well. Since few days I decided to be metal user. By this reason I had to call the support once. The service was extremely friendly, professional, and useful. I'm sure, N26 is already the greatest banking solution for privates. Can't wait to extend the business options, and change immediately, because is not a question for me, I will bring my Biotech company there.

name: Amanda
title: Too difficult to become a customer
content: You get a response from customer service chat fast, which I really appreciate.However, they were not able to help me and after talking with them twice, my case was escalated to the “verification team”.The problem is, N26 allows only 16 characters for the ID card number, where as a Swedish ID card has 19. In their FAQ and according to customer service, they do accept Swedish ID cards as a form of identification but nonetheless I’m unable to fill the full details (that they ask after the photos) and have been rejected twice.Now I got an email without any explanation stating simply “For more information on what documents to use, please use the following link: ” and the link takes you to the page that lists a Swedish ID card as a valid form of identification.It’s simply too hard to become a customer and escalating the case gave me only worse customer service than the chat originally did.

name: Jimmy O' Toole
title: Great idea and service
content: I have to say, I have had a great experience with N26 compared to the gangsters in suits of the Irish Banks, I would recommend them to everyone.
reply: Thanks for taking the time to let us know. We take this sort of feedback very seriously, so we will be passing this on for you. Outlining where you think we can improve helps us to prioritise our upcoming projects, so we appreciate this. Best,Your N26 support team.

reply: Hello Fred, thanks for contacting us and thanks for your feedback.We are sorry we cannot offer you a bank account for the moment.We are a bank and we need to abide to strict regulations concerning the safety of our customers.Some documents issued by some countries do not meet the security standards we require to operate as a bank.You can find more information here on this link: https://support.n26.com/en-eu/getting-started/account/how-to-prove-my-identityYou might want to check this link from time to time as we are constantly working to include more documents among the ones we already accept.Have a nice day!

name: Geschädigter Fremdkunde
title: Legitimationsprüfung Fehlanzeige
content: Ich habe durch diese Bank das Vertrauen in das deutsche Bankensystem komplett verloren.Ich kann nicht nachvollziehen, wie die BAFIN eine Banklizenz vergibt, ohne deren Sicherheitsmechanismen gegen Betrüger bei Kontoeröffnungen auf Herz und Nieren zu prüfen.Es gibt auch keine Bankenhaftung, so dass diese Bank nicht für Ihre Kunden bürgen muss.Man kann da sehr viel Geld verlieren, wenn man einer Bank vertraut, deren Legitimationsprüfungen nicht ausreichen um Betrüger an einer Kontoeröffnung zu hindern.Dadurch wird man als Fremdkunde sehr schnell geschädigt. Ich kann nur alle davor warnen Geld an irgendein Konto auf dieser Bank zu überweisen, deren Inhaber Sie nicht persönlich kennen.Er besteht die Möglichkeit, dass ein Betrüger ein Konto eröffnet hat.
reply: Hey! Danke für dein Feedback.Sollte ein Mitmensch auf einen Identitätsdiebstahl hereingefallen sein und Betrügern den Zugang zu einem Konto eröffnen, werden wir dies natürlich sofort unterbinden, sofern wir dies erfahren.Bitte sende uns doch eine Email an Support@n26.com, sodass wir dahingehend recherchieren und dies verhindern können.Gruß, Dein N26 Support Team.

title: From my experience
content: From my experience, a simple solution to money. It just works. Issues are dealt with quickly, no silly telephone ping pong to be answered by inadequately trained staff that have to esculate the smallest thing. Thank you, common sence in motion.

content: Bonjour j'ai ouvert un compte N26 depuis peu et j'en suis super contente 😊 surtout par rapport à un compte similaire que j'avais jusqu'à présent je dirais pas le nom je pense que vous avez compris loool 🙄😁le personnel du tchat sont super sympa,aimables et mon problème à été résolu vite et bien.. En plus il est facile à géré autant professionnelle que personnel je le recommande à tous ceux qui veulent en ouvrir un et qui on peur😱 ou sont retissant je vous rassure c'est très bien foncé sans problème !! 👍😉(surtout au gens qui sont interdit bancaire 💳) moi j'en suis super contente 😊 mon concubin va en ouvrir un des qu'il rentre..autant le faire en famille 👪 merci N26 c super d'avoir des banques comme vous🏦 pour des personnes comme nous 🤭..!! Super sympa je recommande à 💯%..!!!

name: Richard
title: declined despite good credit rating
content: Attempted to open an account but was declined. Have great credit rating, so can't be that. Opened a chat with customer service, but was told it was declined for 'legal requirements' No further explanation, and was told customer service could not help any further, or make an exception! I was not asking for an exception, I was simply asking for a reason. I have since opened with Monzo and they're great so far.
reply: Thanks for taking the time to let us know. We take this sort of feedback very seriously, so we will be passing this on for you. As a fully-fledged bank, N26 must submit itself to banking regulations in place. Said regulation is aimed at protecting our users. We do apologise for the lack of empathy you received during this process. Best,Your N26 Team

name: Lud
title: Très bonne banque que j'utilise depuis…
content: Très bonne banque que j'utilise depuis 4 ans environ.Tant que l'on n'a pas besoin du service client pas de soucis,  celui-ci a refusé de m'aider lorsque j'étais à l'étranger parce que je n'avais pas le numéro de ma carte d'identité que j'avais utilisé lors de l'inscription, à ce moment-là je me suis dit que ça ne serait jamais ma banque principale.Cela fait aussi quelques mois qu'il m'arrive d'avoir un double prélèvement, ce qui selon le montant peut être délicat (Air France, boutique en ligne...) Il faut aussi savoir que systématiquement en paiement anticipé en station-service environ 140 € sont prélevés automatiquement et restitués quelques jours plus tard ce qui peut également poser souci...
reply: Bonjour Lud et merci pour votre commentaire.Par mesure de sécurité, nos agents du LiveChat sont tenus de vérifier votre identité pour accéder à votre compte. Nous sommes sincèrement navrés qu'ils n'aient pu vous venir en aide lors de votre voyage à l'étranger.Le double prélèvement que vous mentionnez est dû au fait que nous offrons une vision de votre compte en temps réel : cela induit une autorisation dans un premier temps, puis le débit. Dans tous les cas, le montant est automatiquement crédité sur le compte dans un délai de 12 jours. Nous expliquons tout cela en détail dans l'article suivant : https://support.n26.com/fr-fr/resoudre-un-probleme/paiements-et-virements/pourquoi-ai-je-ete-debite-deux-foisDans le cas de pompes à essence automatiques, le commerçant bloque la somme maximale - généralement autour de 140€ - et vous reverse la différence sous 12 jours également.Nous espérons avoir apporté les informations complémentaires à vos questions.Salutations,Votre équipe N26.

name: Semih Akalin
title: N26 ist das letzte
content: N26 ist das letzte. Solange man mit dem Support nichts zutun hat, OK. Sollte es jedoch mal ein Problem mit dem Konto geben solltet Ihr euch auf mehrere Wochen einstellen. Es gibt nichtmal eine Telefon Hotline nur einen Chat wo es nur Standard Antwort gibt und man nur hingehalten wird.Diese Bank ist einfach überfordert und lässt es seine Kunden spüren. Nie wieder!
reply: Danke für dein Feedback. Unsere Hotline ist nur für den absoluten Notfall und für Metalkunden gedacht. Wenn du ein Metalkunde bist, dann findest du die Hotline Nummer in deiner Mobile App. Wir arbeiten mit Hochdruck an Verbesserungen, damit wir unseren Kunden den bestmöglichen Kundenservice liefern können. Wir leiten dein Feedback für dich weiter.

Je recommande beaucoup au gens de rejoindre N26 une banque moderne et agréable sans aucun risque de découvert au frais limités. sur une note de 0 à 10 je donne la note de 10 ... Christophe

Senza spiegazioni.è legale selezionare i clienti in italia?oppure si accede a informazioni dei clienti prima di poter aprire i conti? non mi fido per niente.
reply: Ciao Luna! Grazie per averci contattato.Siamo spiacenti per l'accaduto, vogliamo risponderti più precisamente, ma abbiamo bisogno di più dettagli per capire meglio la tua situazione. Apri questo link e scorri in fondo alla pagina per aprire una chat con il nostro Supporto Clienti: https://support.n26.com/it-it/come-iniziare/altro/come-contattare-n26 .Buona giornata

name: David Owen
title: Ordered the bank card in January as I…
content: Ordered the bank card in January as I was going travelling and thought the free withdrawals would be useful.  Left without it as it didn't turn up.  The card arrived in May once I had returned and immediately started charging so now I am left paying the monthly fee for a card I no longer need.  The customer service is particularly poor and they are quite confrontational, particularly the person I spoke to on the live chat.
reply: Hey David,We are sorry to hear you did not receive your card in time. We apologise for the negative experience that you had with our customer service. We pride ourselves on giving our 100% every day to ensure that our customers’ needs are being met. We do our best to train each of our representatives on how to properly handle our customers’ issues, including how to escalate problems that they are unable to assist with.We understand your disappointment, and apologize for any inconvenience that this may have caused you. We would be more than happy to take a closer look with you. You can send us an email to support@n26.com via the email address you registered your account with. We will then take it from there. You can also contact our chat directly within the mobile app and webapp or from certain Support Center articles about opening an account (Available via our support center from a computer.) Best,Your N26 Support Team

title: Cette banque en ligne est incroyable!!
content: Cette banque en ligne est incroyable!!Les paiements sont rapide simple et sécurisé, pareil pour les virements qui eux sont instantané d’un compter N26 a un autre compte N26.Je l’utilise pour passer tous mes achats sur ma boutique en ligne de Elitebijoux.fr ,  pour les commerçants comme moi c’est génial vous pouvez payer jusqu’à 5000 € de commande par jour peu de cartes sent capable de le faire.Leur service clients est efficace et rapide.Tout le monde à la maison aujourd’hui  utilise la banque le N26.Très pratique si vous avez des enfants avec les virements instantané. Vos enfants vous appelle le midi pour vous dire qu’ils n’ont rien à manger.  « papa est-ce que tu peux me virer de l’argent sur ma carte » , et hop en un clic c’est fait instantanément.Merci

title: RUBBISH BANK
content: Rubbish and crap !!! Worst financial institution in the world. What the wrong person gave bank license for those mentally disabled oligophrènes? They opening accounts for some third world countries, but refusing GOLD BILLION PASSPORTS!!! Wow, that really must be nominated by Darwin Award. Stupid imbeciles. MUST BE CLOSED AND LOOSE BANK LICENSE AS SOON AS POSSIBLE !!! People, NEVER EVER open an account at this peace of garbage and you will be more secure !!!
reply: Hey,We cannot accept all Passports nor National ID cards. This is purely down to the lack of security features that appear on some documents. We are constantly seeking to add documents to our list of supported documents.  You can check via this link if your document is supported: https://support.n26.com/en-gb/getting-started/account/how-to-prove-my-identityYou can follow our @N26 blog and social media accounts to stay up-to-date as all updates will be released there.Best,Your N26 Support Team

name: Monot
title: N26 DISCRIMINATION A L IBAN
content: N26 DISCRIMINATION A L IBAN, en effet N26 viole la loi européenne du 01/02/2016 (art 9 de la directive européenne n°260/2012), ils ont bloqué mon compte N26 et n'acceptent pas mon RIB « la condition de l'IBAN n'est pas suffisant » pourtant c'est bien un compte FR … alors même qu'ils sont les 1er à se dire victime de se genre de discrimination. Veuillez me rembourser. Dossier 05467204.
reply: Bonjour,Nous sommes désolés pour cette situation. En tant que banque à part entière, N26 doit se conformer à la réglementation bancaire en vigueur. Nous sommes particulièrement conscients de la loi européenne du 1er Février 2016 que vous mentionnez et nous mettons à point d'honneur à la respecter.Il est possible que l'IBAN que vous nous avez envoyé soit au mauvais format, par exemple un numéro oublié. Pourriez-vous mettre à jour votre message en nous indiquant le numéro du dossier ? Nous serons alors en mesure de revenir vers vous par email.Salutations,Votre équipe N26.

name: Garry Klinner
title: Stranger keeps you safer than your bank.
content: Found someone's card in the street and thought I would phone it in to cancel it before disposing of.Phone lines closed before 5pm.Tried number on the card and found online.Used online chat and explained the situation.No response. Tried again. Waited, eventually told to destroy the card. They take no action. Summary,Please use a bank that wants to protect you.
reply: Hey Garry,Thanks for reporting this. We are sorry if you were unable to reach us. You can send us an email to support@n26.com . We will then take it from there. You can also contact our chat within the mobile app and webapp or from certain Support Center articles about opening an account (Available via our support center from a computer.) Best,Your N26 Support Team

name: Denis NÉRÉ
title: Une banque en ligne au top
content: Une banque en ligne au top. Même en difficulté, après un mauvais réveil matinal ou je confondais mon solde bancaire avec un autre chiffre erroné, j'ai pu être aidé très rapidement via messagerie en ligne sans aucunes discriminations ou jugements par un Vincent parlant parfaitement ma langue et connaissant même les dictons français. Ce fut vraiment agréable de rigoler avec mon banquier en ligne, pour cette petite gourde de ma part.

name: Nicole Keir
title: Rude. Took my money. Closing my account for no reason!
content: Absolute nightmare! Whilst on holiday I tried to withdraw some money using my N26 card from an atm then decided to cancel the transaction as the withdrawal charge was ridiculous so I decided to try a different atm to see that my card was rejected to insufficient funds and I thought that was odd I have money on the card so tried again again rejected to checked the app to find that the money had been taken off my account! Called the atm company and was told to contact my bank. I gave the atm company all the details I had from the withdrawal and contacted N26. My goodness what an absolute nightmare it’s been! Being told I have to do this and that which I did several times and it didn’t work. Got to the point where I had to fill in a form for a cash back refund or whatever. I was told once the form was sent off they would keep me updated with what was happening and they didn’t have a specific time frame for this. A couple of weeks had passed and hadn’t heard anything so gave them a quick email asking if there were any updates and I got the most blunt and rude reply. Telling me to be patient and they will update when they see any info and there’s no time frame for this. Couple more weeks passed.... nothing. Emailed again saying I was sorry for the bother and asked on the progress and was told that they will get in contact when they can and that it could take up to 36 days from when they send the form off to get the money back. Finally got an email saying that I would receive the credit in my account within the next 12 days. This was 4 days ago. Woke up to an email from them today saying they were closing my account for no apparent reason. I emailed asking why and waiting to hear back. Honestly such a bloody joke!
reply: Hey,We apologise for the negative experience that you had with our customer service. We pride ourselves on giving our 100% every day to ensure that our customers’ needs are being met. We do our best to train each of our representatives on how to properly handle our customers’ issues, including how to escalate problems that they are unable to assist with.If you do not receive your funds from the ATM this does not necessarily mean the money has been taken from your account. It is ''blocked'' and not taken from your account, it takes up to 12 days for the money to get back to the account. If after 12 days the money does no return to your account you will need to send an email with the charge back form filled. Please note that we need a hand written signature. You can send it to support@n26.comVia this link you will find our charge back form: https://support.n26.com/en-gb/fixing-an-issue/cards/how-to-get-my-money-back-in-case-of-fraud Here is some additional info:https://docs.n26.com/cs/Support+Center/chargeback_required_docs_EN.pdfWe would be more than happy to look into this with you. You can send us an email to support@n26.com via the email address you registered your account with. We will then take it from there. You can also contact our chat directly within the mobile app and webapp or from certain Support Center articles about opening an account (Available via our support center from a computer.) Regarding your account closure we kindly ask you to reply to the email you received for any further assistance. Best,Your N26 Support Team

name: Hanna
title: Bankowość z N26 to najlepsza decyzja!
content: Bankowość z N26 to najlepsza decyzja!Jestem użytkowniczką N26 od pół roku - więc korzystałam z konta i karty bardzo często na co dzień, w różnych sytuacjach. Obsługa konta jest bardzo przyjemna, możemy kategoryzować wpływy i wydatki, oznaczać tagami dla lepszego wyszukiwania. Świetnym rozwiązaniem są Spaces, dzięki którym mamy pełną kontrolę nad oszczędnościami, które faktycznie są nie do ruszenia (gdy uruchomimy tę opcję). Oprócz tego, mamy ułatwione ściąganie pieniędzy, gdy płacimy za kogoś, albo organizujemy zrzutkę - aplikacja zapewnia nam odpowiednie narzędzie do Apple Watch i iMessage. Bank również współpracuje z Apple Pay, co dla wielu osób może być istotne.Pełna kontrola na każdym kroku: powiadomienia przychodzą natychmiast, tak więc gdyby ktoś niepowołany bez naszej wiedzy próbował użyć karty, od razu się o tym dowiemy. Dodatkowo, samo założenie konta jest banalnie proste! Mając tam środki, wiem że są bezpieczne. Umowa jest przejrzysta, a działania banku transparentne, co jest ważne przy bankowości online. Najlepsze na koniec: przy zakładaniu konta, po wpisaniu poniższego kodu referencyjnego, na start możesz otrzymać 15 euro.Mój kod to: hannag5442

name: Adrian NP
title: Use now for over 7 months grate future…
content: Use now for over 7 months grate future and fast customer service , a good competitor on the new digital money market and free banking

name: CLAUDIO
title: Hanno un pessimo servizio clienti, la peggior banca che abbia mai utilizzato
content: Hanno un pessimo servizio clienti fatto di ragzzini mal pagati e che non sanno proprio niente di banche. ti chiudono il conto e non ti danno spiegazioni ti bloccano i soldi e non ti dicono come riceverli. Sto per fargli sceivere al mio avvocato o da un ente che possa aiutarmi a fare queste cose. Ragazzi e' un servzio pessimo che non raccomando a nessuno. Ti fanno aprire un conto in germania e quando vuoi riprnedere i tuoi soldi dopo averti chiuso il conto senza spiegazioni ed ora non me li rimandono indietro e rispondono alle mail dopo settimane. siete il peggio del peggio
reply: Ciao  Claudio, grazie per averci scritto. In quanto banca con effettiva licenza bancaria europea (BCE) N26 è soggetta alle normative bancarie in vigore. Lo scopo di queste norme è quello di garantire la protezione dei clienti.Se il tuo conto N26 è bloccato, hai ricevuto di certo una mail con le informazioni e la procedura da seguire. Il servizio dedicato sta esaminando il tuo caso e ti ricontatterà via email. Per ulteriori dubbi non esitare a consultare questo articolo: https://mag-it.n26.com/conto-n26-bloccato-ti-spieghiamo-perch%C3%A9-3cdb2ae50a08Buona giornata.

name: Jamal Shaikh
title: A good fast banking system and metal…
content: A good fast banking system and metal card is awesome

name: Antonia Fürstauer
title: Ich warte seit über 10 Tagen auf meine…
content: Ich warte seit über 10 Tagen auf meine Karte (auf die ich dummerweise schon Geld überwiesen habe)Jedes mal wenn ich mit einem Mitarbeiter im Chat sprach, bekam ich einen anderen Lösungsvorschläg für mein Problem.Meine ersten 5 Beschwerden über meine nicht angekommene Karte wurden anscheinend nicht einmal weitergeleitet. Ich habe auch nie eine Bestätigungsmail über die Versendung der Karte bekommen. obwohl mir jeder Mitarbeiter gesagt hat er hat die Karte jetzt erneut bestellt.Darauf sagte mir ein Mitarbeiter: Wir schicken keine Bestätigungsmails. (Eine Kolegin von mir bekamm jedoch eine)Der nächste sagte mir ich erhalte gleich eine Bestätigungsmail.Gestern bei Mitarbeiter Nr. 7 oder 8 wurde mir endlich weitergeholfen und eine Karte per Express bestellt und versendet (mit Bestätigungsmail). Ich hoffe sie auch kommt an.Probleme mit dem "ausweisen"Man muss das Datum der Anmeldemail sagen können. Wenn nicht soll man in den Kontoauszügen nachsehen.Mitarbeiter Nr. 1 sagte mir: das Datum stimmt nicht aber ich helfe Ihnen trozdem weiter(tat er nicht).Mitarbeiter Nr. 2: Ja das Datum ist korrekt.Ich habe beiden das selbe Datum geschrieben(das aus meinen Kontoauszügen)Probleme im Chat in der AppSobald ein Mitarbeiter länger braucht und sich die Bildschirmsperre aktiviert oder man einen Anruf bekommt, kann es sein, dass man aus dem Chat geschmissen wird. Dann muss man dem nächsten zugewiesenen alles erneut erklären.Telefonservicegibt es keinen, nicht mal für solche fälle wo man im chat mit dem Mitarbeitern nicht weiterkommt und man einfach nicht an sein eigenes geld kommt.Da muss man wohl drauf hoffen, dass man irgendwann einen Servicemitarbeiter bekommt der sich auskennt.Ich werde (sobald meine Karte endlich angekommen ist) mein Geld zurücküberweisen. dieses konto schließen und jedem von dieser bank abraten!
reply: Hey Antonia, danke für dein Feedback.Wir leiten dies an die Kollegen für Qualität des Chats weiter.Gruß, dein N26 Support Team.

name: Abdulla Ahmad
title: Total uprofessionelt virksomhed som…
content: Total uprofessionelt virksomhed som ikke tager deres kunder seriøst - Jeg oprettet mig selv med ID og dagen efter bliver jeg afvist uden en grund selvom jeg opfylder alle krav. Jeg kontaktede derfor deres support som lover at undersøge sagen og vende tilbage til mig. Jeg har fortsat ikke hørt fra dem. Hold jer væk. Jeg har fortrudt at ansøge hos N26 da de nu er i besiddelse en kopi af mit pas!
reply: Hey,N26 operates in five languages: English, German, French, Italian and Spanish. Could you please repeat this in one of these mentioned languages again? Many thanks in advance!	Best,Your N26 Support Team

name: Helena Thieme
title: I would give 0 stars but here we go
content: I would give 0  stars but here we go: N26 IS SCAM. They froze the accounts of hundreds of people right now due to “compliance checks” and we can’t access OUR MONEY. They don’t give us any explanation and costumer support is basically non existent (it’s a robot answering) they don’t even answer to my LAWYER. I’m at court with this case, because I can’t access my money which is quite a lot (over $100,000). I can’t pay my bills because they literally TOOK AWAY MY MONEY. I was happy with the bank but now I realized it’s a horrible “bank”. Not even a bank. It’s literally a bunch of hipster kids doing bank business. scandalous. All I can say. please please don’t become a victim of them and don’t open an account with N26. If you want to read more go to @N26failure on Twitter where you can see the problem. Thank you and I hope you can learn from my mistake. Hey btw N26 if you read this, just wait until you do something like this in the USA. You have been warned.. and don’t even respond to this. You would have a better reputation if you would answer to my ACTUAL EMAILS, Instead of reviews.

name: Martin Horvat
title: Not recommending
content: I just had a terrible experience with the bank in total. Application process was full of flaws, the support is never available and when they answer the phone, I dont get the help I need. There is a limited amount of times you can take out money for free and the master card credit card, is not really a credit card. I would not recommend this bank at all. There are other alternatives, which are way more reliable.
reply: Hey Martin,Thanks for your review. We only offer debit cards. We're sorry that your verification did not work as expected. To ensure quality photos and a successful verification process, please make sure to check your lighting, consider switching mobile devices, or switching your connection from WiFi to your phone's network. If there are several devices connected to your WiFi it may impact your connection. Here is a helpful link regarding photo verification:  https://support.n26.com/read/000001446?locale=enIf you have a Metal membership you benefit phone service. We’ve found that the majority of our customers prefer to contact our customer service via live chat in the N26 app or on our website.  In our experience this channel offers the fastest and most satisfying assistance.If you need any further assistance you can send us an email to support@n26.com via the email address you registered your account with. We will then take it from there. You can also contact our chat directly within the mobile app and webapp or from certain Support Center articles about opening an account (Available via our support center from a computer.) Best,Your N26 Support Team.

name: Ximena Berdejo
title: I like the convenience of getting this…
content: I like the convenience of getting this card. No need to go to a place and wait got get service. I really like the fact that no fees are charged to use it and we have 5 ATM withdrawals for free.

name: Judith ann skinner
title: Application process
content: Application process, was not the simplist. Photo part, was very frustrating indeed. I had to attempt, the photo (selfie) on 5 occasions, before it passed the necessary requirements.  Could be made simpler, am sure.  Did get passed eventually, much to my relief. Was quite a stressful procedure.
reply: Hey Judith, thanks for your feedback.We are sorry to learn that you found our identification process longer than we intended it to be.Of course there is always room for improvement and to make things easier and quicker, however we need to point out that we at N26 are a bank, and we need to abide very strict regulations and standards concerning our customer's security.As a result simplifying our registration process could require more effort than one could think.But rest assured! We're willing to walk the extra mile and make things even more convenient for our clients.Anyway, we are glad that in the end you managed to join us!Have a nice day!

name: Dionysius Simeon
title: Great online bank
content: Its a fully fledged online bank, security in transactions and information about the account actions are sent as a notification to the connected phones so you can be up to speed with whatever is happening to it.

name: Daniel Vittu
title: carte gratuite
content: carte gratuite, frais plus que réduits, service après vente à l'écoute et rapide à contacter par chat. J'ai la carte depuis un an et je suis très satisfait.

name: Raven
title: Nicht vertrauenswürdig
content: Nachdem ich beim zweiten Anrufversuch (20 Min. und 10 Min), endlich eine Mitarbeiterin zum Ident-Verfahren erreichte, brabbelte diese sehr schnell Ihren Text herunter, viel zu schnell. Sie stellte mir mehrere seltsam dämliche Fragen, machte Bilder von meinem Ausweis und fragte dann auch noch einmal nach meinen Geburtsdaten und Perso-Nummer. Achja, und dann noch eine Aufzeichnung? Wozu?!Damit fühle ich mich schon gleich am Anfang völlig verarscht und verunsichert.Sprechen Sie gefälligst langsamer und sehen Sie die Daten von meinem Onlibe-Antrag und Perso zuerst ein, bevor Sie alles zwei Mal fragen. Das war unprofessionell.Ich bevorzuge das Post-Ident-Verfahren. Diese Möglichkeit wurde mir bei Kontoeröffnung nicht angeboten. Schade.Ich bin kein Roboter und ich möchte gerne auch alles klar und deutlich verstehen, was gesagt wird. Ja, manchmal brauche ich Zeit zum Reagieren. Ich hab keine Energie für "Stress" dieser Art.Ich bin Kunde und möchte mit Respekt behandelt werden.Wenn ich mir all die Erfahrungsberichte durchlese, dann bereue ich es, dorthin gewechselt zu haben. Ich habe kein Vertrauen in diese "Smartphone-Bank" und werde wieder kündigen...zu meiner eigenen Sicherheit.N26 wirft Kunden offenbar wahllos hinaus und behält deren Geld ein, auch gibt es keinen wirklichen Support bei Problemen. Kunden werden einfach im Stich gelassen.
reply: Hallo Raven, danke für dein Feedback.Ein Postident-Verfahren bieten wir nicht an, die beiden Möglichkeiten für eine Anmeldung sind Video-Verfahren und Foto-Verifizierung, welche beide in unserer App durchgeführt werden.Wir entschuldigen uns dafür, dass die Kollegen der Firma IDNow, welche die Video-Verifizierungen für uns durchführen, einen schlechten ersten Eindruck vermittelt haben.Wir werden dein Feedback an richtiger Stelle weiterleiten, damit man sich deinen Fall anschauen und besagte Mitarbeiter/in dies hingehend schult. Wir entschuldigen uns für diese Unannehmlichkeiten.Als vollwertige Bank muss sich N26 den geltenden Bankvorschriften unterwerfen. Diese Regelung zielt darauf ab, unsere Nutzer zu schützen.Bei der Verwendung deines Bankkontos treten keine Probleme auf, wenn du nicht gegen unsere Allgemeinen Geschäftsbedingungen verstößt.Solltest du dennoch eine Kontokündigung in Betracht ziehen, kannst du dies im Kundensupport-Chat deiner N26 App erwähnen oder dies hier durchführen: https://support.n26.com/de-de/probleme-beheben/konto/wie-kann-ich-mein-konto-schliessenWir wünschen dir weiterhin alles Gute. Grüße, dein N26 Team.

name: Ferrini Luca
title: Buongiorno a tutti
content: Buongiorno a tutti, ho letto la risposta pubblicata da N26 e li ringrazio per questo. Comunque dopo oltre due mesi a me non interessa sapere i motivi per cui mi hanno chiuso il conto, io voglio soltanto avere i MIEI SOLDI che la banca N26 sta trattenendo adducendo motivi incomprensibili. Volevo comunicare ai vari utenti che BAFIN dopo la segnalazione mi ha già risposto assegnando un riferimento alla pratica al quale devo inviare il modulo privacy da firmato e i documenti che devo fornire. Oltretutto mi hanno inviato il nome del funzionario che segue la pratica con relativo numero di telefono. Tutto questo dopo tre giorni dall'invio della mia e-mail. Grazie
reply: Ciao, Luca.Stiamo lavorando sodo per sbloccare la tua situazione.Come vedi siamo a tua disposizione per fornirti tutte le indicazioni possibili sull'accaduto.Buona giornata.

content: J’ai la carte gratuite qui propose le minimum des services. Elle est incroyable, elle est belle, et efficace. Les transactions sont immédiate, et le lien avec l’application est instantané. J’étais retissante avec le service client persuadé qu’il n’y en avait pas pour une carte qui ne m’en coute rien du tout, et finalement lorsque je me suis trompée de code pin 3 fois et que ma carte c’est bloquée, j’ai eu recours au service client. Le problème a été résolu en 10 minute alors que j’étais à l’autre bout du monde. Contrôle d’identité et vérification faites, ma carte a immédiatement été débloquée. Je valide et conseille à 100%.

title: I would love to give N26 my banking but...
content: I would love to give N26 my banking business as well as 5 stars. But unfortunately due to conflicting/unclear information in the FAQs I was not able to open my account. Primarily because N26 stopped using the PostIdent service that is available through Deutsche Post. There is no longer a way to do an identity verification in person. The documents I have are official Deutsch papers that I use for all identity verification needs here in Deutschland. But apparently there is not a way to use these with N26. I would hope that N26 perhaps restores the PostIdent service or finds another means to accomplish the same task.

reply: Hey,Could you please elaborate regarding this?  This will allow us to improve our operations and services.Best,Your N26 Support Team

name: Ludovic Van den Bergen
title: Terrible banque
content: Terrible banque. Je suis un jeune professionnel qui ait souscrit à cette banque pensant participer au progrès. Grande déception. Après 3 semaines sans avertissement mon compte est fermé. Je demande pourquoi ils me raccrochent au nez ou me disent qu’ils ne peuvent pas me dire. Très long délai pour récupérer l’argent sur le compte.
reply: Bonjour Ludovic,Nous sommes désolés pour cette mauvaise expérience que vous avez connu avec nos services.Un compte peut se retrouver suspendu en cas d'activité inhabituelle, le temps que notre service dédié analyse et regularise la situation. Nous avertissons automatiquement nos clients par email lorsqu'une mise à jour est effectuée sur le compte.En tant que banque disposant d'une licence Européenne, nous ne pouvons en aucun cas fermer les comptes de nos clients sans raison valable. Si vous disposiez d'un compte Standard à des fins professionnelles, cela peut être une raison entraînant la fermeture d'un compte. C'est pourquoi nous proposons le compte N26 Business, adapté aux professionnels. Salutations,Votre équipe N26.

Wir entschuldigen uns für die Unannehmlichkeiten.Bei unserem neuen Invest Produkt werden solche Fehler nicht wieder geschehen.Grüße, dein N26 Support Team.

name: Wesley Marques
title: Parfait
content: Une banque simple, gratuite (j'ai l'offre classique) et très bien faite.Petits bémols : - mobilité bancaire non disponible en France. - pas de dépôt d'espèces possible - pas de dépôt de chèque - pas de possibilité d'arrondir l'achat pour forcer à mettre de côté. Bon après aujourd'hui, les dépôts de chèques sont rares. Je conseille de garder un compte courant à côté (j'ai Boursorama par exemples, avec les frais gratuit), pour le dépôt des chèques justement. Je m'en sers depuis 1 an de N26, et c'est devenu ma banque principale. Je suis tranquille, sans frais, avec un debit instantané, une carte que je gère comme je veux et sans découvert. Plus qu'à essayer le crédit.

content: Ich habe heute eine E-Mail erhalten, indem drin stand das mein Konto gekündigt wurden ist. der Grund wie bei den meisten schon "erheblichen Verstoß.." darauf hin habe ich den Supporter kontaktier, der direkt das Chat verlassen hat. reply: Hey Marek,We regret to hear about your negative customer experience. We pride ourselves on giving our 100% every day to ensure that our customers’ needs are being met. We do our best to train each of our representatives on how to properly handle our customers’ issues, including how to escalate problems that they are unable to assist with.You can send us an email to support@n26.com via the email address you registered your account with. We will then take it from there. name: Armando Romero M. Guasp

content: It just works like charm.... The only down side is that there is no personalized contract  provided. Just a generic one....
reply: Hey,As a bank we must comply with all legal and regulatory obligations. Following these regulatory processes, we periodically conduct reviews of our accounts. We have the responsibility to run routine checks on transactions (see GwG § 10). These checks are based on individual transactions and are automatically initiated by our systems. Rest assured, once the review on your account is complete, an agent will contact you. Best,Your N26 Support Team

name: Dubart
title: Extra

name: Cordula Böck (C. Meriadoc)
title: Seit mehr als 8 Tagen keine Überweisungen möglich
content: Leider muss ich mein Anfangs positives Feedback zu N26 zurückziehen. Ich will euch auch den Grund nennen. Obwohl ich mit meinem Konto im Plus bin,  ist es seit 8 Tagen nicht möglich,  eine Überweisung zu machen. Ständig erhalte ich eine Fehlermeldung, dass die Überweisung weder durchgeführt noch abgebrochen werden kann. Und das nennt sich dann modernes Online Banking.
reply: Hey Repp, danke für dein Feedback.Bitte sende uns doch eine Email an Support@n26.com oder sende uns eine private Nachricht an unseren Facebook N26 Account oder an unseren Twitter N26_Support Account, sodass wir verstehen können woher die schlechte Erfahrung mit uns kommt und herauszufinden, wie wir dir bei deinem Problem helfen können.Grüße dein N26 Support Team.

name: Elodie Dodard
title: super banque

reply: Bonjour Bernard,Nous sommes désolés pour cette mauvaise expérience rencontrée avec nos services.N26 est soumis à la réglementation bancaire en vigueur qui a notamment pour objectif d’assurer la protection des clients et de leurs économies. En cas d'activité inhabituelle, le compte peut se retrouver suspendu le temps que notre service dédié analyse et regularise la situation. Par ailleurs nous avertissons automatiquement nos clients par email lorsqu'une mise à jour est effectuée sur le compte. Nous sommes conscients que cette situation n’est pas évidente, mais nous pouvons vous assurer que N26 travaille pour régler chaque situation au plus vite.Nous vous invitons à consulter cet article pour davantage d'informations : https://mag-fr.n26.com/compte-n26-bloqu%C3%A9-nous-vous-expliquons-pourquoi-ef27470083ca?gi=dcb928774a25Salutations,Votre équipe N26.
