name: Giovanni
title: rifiuto apertura conto senza spiegazioni
content: Ho chiesto l’apertura del conto e dopo aver inviato i documenti per la verifica identità ricevo questa risposta:Ciao XXX,grazie per il tuo interesse in N26. Purtroppo ci dispiace comunicarti che non possiamo aprire un conto N26 per te.Come banca dobbiamo rispettare severi requisiti legali per ogni conto che apriamo. Purtroppo, in alcune occasioni questo ci impedisce di aprire determinati conti correnti a causa di specifiche restrizioni. Per motivi legali, non possiamo darti ulteriori informazioni al riguardo.Grazie ancora per l’interesse e la pazienza dimostrata verso N26.Il tuo team N26A questo punto vorrei proprio capire quali sono i motivi che impediscono l’apertura del conto e mi lascia basito che questi non diano informazioni CHE MI RIGUARDANO in tal senso. Cosa avrò mai fatto? Boh. SCONSIGLIATO!

name: Rodney C.
title: -260.35€ "vanished" from my account.
content: -260.35€ "vanished" from my account.DON'T BE FOOLED!!! Works fine until there's an issue...I have spent +20 hours over the past 6 weeks trying to fix an issue they created. Endless support calls/emails, having to transition all my accounts over to Revolut (works WAY better) with a huge amount of inconvenience and stress.The merchant (AirBNB) has no record of the transaction when I request ARN codes from N26 they are unable to provide it yet they are unwilling to remove the charge.My account balance is currently at -260.35€ (how is this possible if they don´t offer credit??)I am now also being hit with overdraft charges which I will have to go through the whole process of fighting all over again.What annoys me the most is that this is 100% a bug on their end (I have a friend that is a lead engineer at N26 and he is appalled at how bad it is internally). Best case scenario for me they finally realise/admit the issue and cancel the incorrect charge, meanwhile, I have wasted countless time and energy dealing with their BS.UPDATE: I was just reimbursed for the full amount (still have to fight the overdraft fees). I have also asked them what they are able to offer in the way of compensation for having wasted +20 hours of my time.
reply: Ciao, Giovanni,Ancora una volta ti ringraziamo per l’interesse che hai dimostrato verso N26.Ci teniamo a ripetere che ci dispiace, ma al momento non è possibile aprire un conto N26.Come abbiamo già specificato nella tua mail, per motivi legali non possiamo darti ulteriori informazioni a riguardo, soprattutto su di una piattaforma pubblica come Trustpilot.Ti auguriamo una buona giornata.

reply: Hey,We regret to learn this. We regret to hear that you were provided with such customer experience, it is the exact opposite of what we pride ourselves on. We apologise for the negative experience that you had with our customer service. We pride ourselves on giving our 100% every day to ensure that our customers’ needs are being met. We do our best to train each of our representatives on how to properly handle our customers’ issues, including how to escalate problems that they are unable to assist with. We’re very committed to making it right. You can send us an email to support@n26.com via the email address you registered your account with. We will then take it from there. You can also contact our chat directly within the mobile app and webapp or from certain Support Center articles about opening an account (Available via our support center from a computer.) name: Otet Gabriel
title: The services that it offers are great.
content: The services that it offers are great.I'm a customer now for almost two years and I had no problem so far on using it.Basic account is free and comes with an IBAN, a pretty cool application where you can split your money into spaces, an instant information about any payment, a very good exchange rate for foreign currencies (is very convenient especially going on vacation or for me as my familly is not living in euro area), google pay (I suppose also apple pay but I'm not a user of apple).The big minus that I see at the moment is credit card- it has a good and powerful debit card which can help you in every situation except renting a car (for that I must have an account to another bank and using the card just for it). Also, it doesn't have an EC card which in Germany is wide spread and important to have.

Aber wehe es gibt einmal ein Problem, dann gibt es absolut keinen Support. Dieser wurde immer mehr zurückgefahren in den letzten Jahren. Die Sicherheit des Kontos lässt zu wünschen übrig. Das sollte man wissen, wenn man sich die guten Konditionen vor Augen führt. Es gibt also noch viel Potenzial, was die Bank/das Startup N26 in Zukunft ausschöpfen kann.

name: Christopher Klix (Ceekae)
title: N26 is a very innovative and modern banking solution
content: N26 is a very innovative and modern banking solution. If you are interested in having that kind of a bank to your side, then this is definitely the bank to go. Mobile payment with Google Pay and Apple Pay, direct feedback via a very well designed mobile app and web-app and a super advanced chatbot that can pretty much answer and solve half of your concerns without even needing to talk to a real human. But if you need to, all agents I work with so far have been very competent, polite and super helpful.But let me say that you really should want to support and ride the train of digital banking to be content with N26. It is not the best bank in the world, at least for now. It is on a very good path towards becoming it. But based on the fact that the basic account costs you literally 0$, so it's FREE, I can't tell you a reason not to create an account there and just give it a try yourself. And their Mastercards are looking pretty cool. I am very happy with my decision to use N26 as my primary bank account but it's not my one and only. Maybe in the near future.

title: Moi je suis totalement satisfait des…
content: Moi je suis totalement satisfait des services de N26 je recommande à 100 % je n'ai rien à redire je ne vois plus des qualités actuellement peut-être juste un tout petit truc mais je n'ai jamais posé la question non plus donc c'est peut-être pour ça que je dis ça concernant les chèques je ne sais pas où je dois les envoyer et si je peux les déposer dans une banque quelque part en France mais aussi non je n'ai rien à redire du tout c'est une manque génial simple d'utilisation on a des réponses avec le chat rapide et clair je recommande à 100 % cette banque

name: Fabio Guidetti
title: Per il momento tutto ok
content: Per il momento tutto ok, estremamente veloci nella creazione del conto ( neanche 10minuti) , l'applicazione è molto ben fatta e intuitiva. Anche il sito. Rispetto alle altre, a parer mio, ha il vantaggio che all'estero tutte le transazioni via carta non hanno costi di commissione. Ovviamente in tutta Europa prelievi e pagamenti a costo 0. I prelievi all'estero, invece, hanno una commissione del 1,7% (che è fin poco). Inoltre è possibile caricare fino a 50000€. Ricordatevi che se superate i 5000€ di giacenza media pagherete l'imposta di bollo da 35€!Se vi interessa vi lascio il mio codice da inserire al momento della creazione del conto che vi farebbe guadagnare 15€ alla prima ricarica: fabiog6862

My own bank didn't offer this service with their basic account package. My account with N26 was set up in minutes and I had my card a few days later, honestly I'm impressed. All that is missing is the option of other features such as an overdraft or other facilities that are accessible to most.

The payment was declined by NS&I yet N26 went ahead and unlawfully deducted the sum of £100 from my account.They are now saying that I will have to wait 12 days, (as a minimum), for a refund. This despite the fact I have sent them an email outlining the reason why NS&I declined the payment. Quite rightly NS&I have clearly stated that as the payment was declined the money is not being held by them.I just want my £100 so I can get rid of this rubbish bank

Mi arriva una mail che mi chiudono il conto entro pochi giorni e di spostare i fondi rimasti. Assistenza ZERO, via Mail risposta evasiva. Bravi. Complimenti. Peccato che diopo sto comportamento da beoti teutonici di bassa lkega vi beccherete tante recensioni negative. Imparate almeno a comunicare con la gente senza rifugiarvi dietro a chatbot insulse e inutili. Vergogna!

name: andrea
title: Devo recuperare la pubblicità positiva…
content: Devo recuperare la pubblicità positiva che vi avevo fatto. Non potete, o meglio, non mi sembra un comportamento da "banca modello" chiudere un conto senza motivazioni. Usare n26 per pagare online è un comportamento che non vi piace? Perchè non mettere dei limiti allora? Se mi dai la possibilità di pagare fino a 20000 al mese e poi mi chiudi il conto perchè non ti sta bene, vuol dire che non sapete neanche voi quello che vi sta bene. Preferisco allora altre card che mi mettono dei limiti. Sempre parlato bene di N26 comunque.Risposta al commento di n26. Non ho il conto bloccato, avete rescisso unilateralmente e non ho neanche ricevuto spiegazioni sulle motivazioni, anche se ovviamente non siete tenuti a fornirle sarebbe indice di serietà.
reply: Ciao, Andrea,  grazie per averci scritto. In quanto banca con effettiva licenza bancaria europea (BCE) N26 è soggetta alle normative bancarie in vigore. Lo scopo di queste norme è quello di garantire la protezione dei clienti.Se il tuo conto N26 è bloccato, hai ricevuto di certo una mail con le informazioni e la procedura da seguire. Il servizio dedicato sta esaminando il tuo caso e ti ricontatterà via email. Per ulteriori dubbi non esitare a consultare questo articolo: https://mag-it.n26.com/conto-n26-bloccato-ti-spieghiamo-perch%C3%A9-3cdb2ae50a08

I have had other parallel accounts for 10 years (all accounts well maintained) and never had to pay any fees, neither for withdrawals or maintaining an account. Was enough to recommend them to my friends and social media followers!!! And that for an online bank that has only chat bots and email as a form of communication. Phone contacts is simply non-existent. #notwithmymoney #mymoneymyrules #n26I would not recommend them after this experience.

content: N26 is the best banking experience I've ever seen. Simple to setup and use, clean design, nothing is hidden, language is direct, and the feature set is great. title: I  have had positive experience using…
content: I  have had positive experience using N26 basic account. It is fully managed by me. It is fast to move money into and out of. There are plenty of safety features. The App sends notification text messages for all activities within the account. I have the option to block cash withdraws, online and international purchases. Even though it's a basic account the card is contactless. When I've needed help I've used the online chat, which has been fairly responsive even at nights and early hours of the money.  I gave 4 stars because it takes time to get used to the account.

name: Nelson Hsieh
title: I just wanted to relink my new phone…
content: I just wanted to relink my new phone and it's not working at all.I just don't get the SMS-Verification Code. Wrote them and someone will call back in 15-30min. They called the next day and gave me a code that doesn't work. That's really simple explained, I have to go back to the SMS-Code field to enter it, but it will automatically resend a new code. So the code they gave me is invalid.So wrote again and it took 20min... he just said just wait 24h again and retry it... Got a 24h ban... Thanks for nothing and wasting my time again and again.So will need to wait 24h and Chat again and wait again for the call... so it will take another 48h to get anything and maybe it will work next time...
reply: Ciao Sara,come abbiamo già anticipato nella tua recensione precedente, N26 è una banca con licenza della Banca Centrale Europea (BCE) e dobbiamo operare in rispetto delle normative di legge in vigore.A volte esaminare un caso può richiedere diversi giorni per garantire la tutela dei diritti dei nostri clienti e la loro sicurezza.Ti ringraziamo per la comprensione.Buona giornata.

name: Gène
title: Probablement la meilleure néo-banque…
content: Probablement la meilleure néo-banque actuellement.Disponibilité des conseillers, expertise et conseils.En ajoutant l'absence quasi totale de frais de gestion, je ne vois pas pourquoi je resterais dans un établissement traditionnel, avec au moins quelques Euros mensuels pour simplement consulter ses comptes en ligne.Vive N26 ;-)
reply: Hey Nelson,Thanks for your feedback! We regret to hear that you were provided with such customer experience.A paired smartphone is required to use the N26 account. If you didn’t receive this code via SMS for whatever reason, you can request a new one up to five times in the mobile app. Please wait 30 seconds before requesting a new one.If all five codes are requested and pairing is still unsuccessful, then for security reasons you’ll be blocked from making further requests for 24 hours. If this happens, you can either wait or contact our Customer Support via chat - who would be happy to help you.If your country code is outside of the EU, it’s likely that you’ll need to contact us to receive a pairing code.You can find out more about the pairing process and the app itself by reading this Support Center article: https://support.n26.com/en-eu/fixing-an-issue/account/why-didnt-i-receive-my-pairing-code-via-smsBest regards,Your N26 Support Team

name: Thomas
title: N26 Kündigt auch bei mir Konto…
content: N26 Kündigt auch bei mir Konto unerwartet und ohne Angabe von GründenN26 hat ganz plötzlich und unerwartet mein Konto gekündigt. Ich habe es mehrere Jahre benutzt, sogar darüber hinweg gesehen, dass mir durch N26s unzulängliche Absicherung Geld gestohlen wurde Als Spiel Konto ganz nett, aber benutzt das Konto keinesfalls wenn ihr das Geld wieder haben wollt. Und SEPA Lastachriften zu ändern nachdem euch dann N26 irgendwann das Konto kündigt ist auch keine Freude.Edit: Die Antwort hier von N26 ist eine glatte Lüge!N26 hat absolut nichts mit mir besprochen, noch habe ich gegen igrendwelche ABGs verstoßen. Ich hatte das Konto seitdem es N26 gab - und nun plötzlich tut N26 so, als ob ich was illegales getan hätte? Das it nur für die Aussenwirkung. N26 konnte mir nicht mal benennen wie ich gegen die AGBs verstoßen haben sollte.
reply: Hey Thomas, danke für dein Feedback.Als vollwertige Bank muss sich N26 den geltenden Bankvorschriften unterwerfen. Diese Regelung zielt darauf ab, unsere Nutzer zu schützen.Bei der Verwendung deines Bankkontos treten keine Probleme auf, wenn du nicht gegen unsere Allgemeinen Geschäftsbedingungen verstößt.Falls dies geschieht kontaktieren wir immer unsere Kunden, um weiteres Vorgehen zu besprechen.Gruß, dein N26 Support Team.

name: Cornovaglia Gal
title: I can’t even open an account
content: Well I wasn’t even able to open an account! I had a few initial problems uploading my documents and had to repeat the process a number of times. When I didn’t receive an email telling me there was a further problem I assumed they’d finally gone through. The app kept telling me that my documents were being verified which could take up to 5 business days. Nearly 3 weeks and several chats with their support team later I was told the selfie wasn’t good enough. Ok, can I submit another? No, I was told I’d need to wait for the original agent to which I had originally enquired to contact me to tell me my application had been unsuccessful. Ridiculous! So now I’m looking for another bank so I can start all over again. Thanks N26, if I’d known 3 weeks ago what I know now I’d probably have an account already.*In reply to your response, you have completely misunderstood what I have said. I wasn’t complaining that you have to present ID, I was complaining that until today I wasn’t told that there was an issue with my documents, despite speaking to a number of you customer service agents before. In fact, it’s only due to my dogged determination to try to resolve the issue that I eventually found an agent who was able to supply me with the reason for the delay. Furthermore, why wasn’t I able to simply re-submit my documents today? Why would I have to wait another x weeks to be told “oh you can’t have an account because we can’t clearly make out your ID”? Your system is flawed in this regard and unless you fix it you will lose customers.

name: Suresh
title: Great experience so far.
content: Great experience so far.
reply: Hey,We regret to learn you were provided with such experience. To ensure quality photos and a successful verification process, please make sure to check your lighting, consider switching mobile devices, or switching your connection from WiFi to your phone's network. If there are several devices connected to your WiFi it may impact your connection. Maybe you have a friend or family member who could lend you their phone for this process?As a bank, we need to know who you are. That’s why you have to prove your identity with a supported passport or ID card, when you open an account. There are several security features on these documents, if these are not visible in the photos, for security purposes we need to reset your verification and kindly ask you to go through verification again.Here is a helpful link regarding photo verification: https://support.n26.com/read/000001446?locale=enHere is also a guide regarding verification: https://docs.n26.com/cs/Support+Center/Verification/photoverification_bestpractice_en.pdfBest,Your N26 Support Team

title: Mature, professional, tech-savy banking with excellent customer support

name: Valerie
title: Ce n'est pas une banque mais un groupe de bouffons incompétents ! Fuyez !
content: Bonjour,Ne vous laissez pas avoir par ces arnaqueurs. Cela fait 3 semaines que j'essaie de faire valider mon compte mais ils me refusent mon adresse postale.Raison ? Ils prétendent que cette adresse est commerciale et non résidentielle alors que c'est ma maison.Leur source de vérification ? Google ! Je vous le jure, j'ai la copie des chats.Malgré leur avoir fourni mon contrat de bail, carte identité, factures, impôts,... toute preuve complètement officielle, ils prétendent qu'elle n'est pas correcte. Mon adresse est acceptée exactement comme je leur ai renseignée par toutes les administrations officielles du pays... mais eux décident que non parce que google leur a dit.Est-ce la caméra cachée ?J'écris à leur service "litige" qui me réponds (endéans les 3 heures alors que j'attends toujours une réponses à mes emails envoyés au support depuis 10 jours) exactement la même chose que les crétins que j'ai eus par emails/chat. "afin de pouvoir valider votre compte je vous invite à vérifier les détails de l'adresse renseignée en suivant les instructions de l'application et modifiant votre adresse résidentielle, celle-ci ne doit pas être commerciale mais privée et personnelle."Un agent m'a même dit "vous n'avez qu'à renseigner une autre adresse" !! Ben voyons !!Bref, je suis et idiote et menteuse.Et bien qu'ils la gardent leur soi-disant banque !!Si leur pseudo service client est aussi catastrophiquement lamentable juste pour une vérification d'adresse, je n'ose imaginer en cas de problème majeur.Je vais ouvrir mon compte chez de véritables professionnels quitte à ce que je doive payer quelques frais. Au moins, j'aurai un service client et bancaire digne de ce nom.Bonne soiréeMise à jour du 16/07/2019Suit à ma plainte, ils sont revenus vers moi me proposant de recommencer le processus de vérification et que "vous serez dirigée vers une vérification via vidéo".Sérieusement ? Ils sont incapables de valider mon adresse officielle reconnue par le gouvernement et toutes les instances officielles et ils me proposent de la vérifier "via vidéo" ?Sur quelle planète est-on ? FUYEZ !!! FUYEZ !!!

name: Iyad sol
title: Love the app and their customer support
content: Love the app and their customer support
reply: Bonjour Valérie,Nous sommes navrés de cette mauvaise expérience.En tant que Banque en ligne, nos processus de sécurité se doivent d'être stricts. Il est obligatoire d'activer la géolocalisation pour que notre application situe votre adresse. Si celle-ci n'est pas assez précise, comme dans votre cas, alors nous vous proposons simplement d'annoter une autre adresse que la votre, afin de passer la vérification de votre identité.Une fois cette dernière complétée, vous aurez évidemment la possibilité de modifier l'adresse pour votre résidence actuelle. Nous espérons que ce message vous aura aidé.Salutations,Votre équipe N26.

content: Ich bin seit ca. 2/3 Jahren Kunde bei N26 und nutze es als Zweitkonto. Da bei Überweisungen in der App häufig Fehlermeldungen auftreten und auch alle anderen Angebote eher sehr instabil laufen - würde ich N26 auf keinen Fall zu meinem Hauptkonto machen. Auch das Angebot des Fondssparens über N26-Invest wurde 2 Monate nach Abschluss wieder eingestellt - nicht gerade vertrauenerweckend. Die Abwicklung von Supportanfragen über die App haben ich mehrmals in Anspruch genommen - dabei ist es jedes Mal zu Abbrüchen der Verbindung gekommen - sodass ich mit einem neuen Mitarbeiter des Kundenservices verbunden wurde und mein Anliegen noch einmal erklären musste.
reply: Hey Markus, danke für dein Feedback.Nach Jahren der Zusammenarbeit haben wir uns lediglich dazu entschieden den Anbieter unseres Invest zu ändern, weshalb alle laufenden Invest Verträge geschlossen werden mussten.Sobald wir ein neues Produkt anbieten können, werden wir unsere Kunden darüber informieren.Auch arbeiten wir bereits an der Verbesserung der Stabilität unseres Chats und hoffen, dass dieses schon sehr bald implementiert ist. Gerne kannst du weiteres Feedback zu Verbesserungen an Ideas@n26.com senden.Grüße , dein N26 Support Team.

title: Une banque en ligne des plus simple
content: Simple, efficace et très fiable. J'ai pu utiliser ma carte en Angleterre pendant une année sans avoir a payer d'intérêts. S'il n'y a plus d'argent sur le compte, on ne peut dépasser le montant, donc aucun agio perçu. Tout est facile d'accès, transparent, et facile d'utilisation avec l'application. Les agents sont disponibles et répondent aux attentes de façon professionnelle et amicale à la fois.

name: Miguel Lim
title: Cant access my account cos N26 refused to let me correct tye wrong foreign number attached to my acc
content: Stupidest bank to add a default german number to my account.  I am not allowed to change it on app. Useless app since cant access with their german phone number assigned as my own! Cant unpair my phone using Chrome.  ZERO SUPPORT online after log in. So i resort to twitter for help.Ask me to uninstall & reinstall app. Clear cookies on Chrome. Assuming all their customers are internet noobs. When all fail. Throw me a support email so i have to rewrite the whole troubles N26 created. Hellish time verifying to open account.Then they forced a unknown number on your acc so U cant access it!Prefer to be able attach picture proof to shame the hell out of these parasites call support staffs.
reply: Hey Miguel,First of all we apologise for the inconvenience this may have caused you. If you need to update your mobile number we kindly ask you to reach out to our live chat support so an agent can update this in our system. Once your number has been updated you will be able to pair your mobile device. You can contact our chat within the mobile app and webapp or from certain Support Center articles about opening an account. You can read more about our phone pairing on our support center:https://support.n26.com/en-eu/getting-started/security/how-to-connect-or-disconnect-my-smartphone-to-my-accounthttps://support.n26.com/en-eu/fixing-an-issue/account/why-didnt-i-receive-my-pairing-code-via-smsBest,Your N26 Support Team

I had other current accounts with major high street banks fo over 10 years, never had to do that. 6 month on with N26 and they ask re-verify my ID. I could do it, but its a nonsense to me, therefore I have taken all the money out and will let them close the account.

If you need any assistance, then please come on the chat so we can verify you and get this sorted for you straight away. Scroll to the bottom of the page and you will see "Open a chat" in a green box: https://support.n26.com/en-gb/getting-started/other/how-do-i-contact-n26Best, Your N26 support team.

name: TommyH
title: N26 carte métal
content: Je suis client chez N26 d'une carte métal depuis octobre 2018, je n'ai aucun soucis pour les virements ou les retraits par rapport à mon compte. Vous pouvez avoir n'importe quels fonds du moment que cela provient de votre compte principal qui a été contrôlé depuis le début.Si votre compte se bloque, c'est que vos virements proviennent d'une personne tiers ou source inconnue. Mon avis en toute transparence  Les points positifs : Un service client qui est super réactif et éfficace. Le delai d'attente est raisonnable selon le moment de la journée.Une application au top qui n'a rien à envier à vos concurrents. Super intuitifs et facile à utiliser.Aucun soucis de paiement ni de blocage dans les pays où j'ai utilisé la carte N26.Les points négatifs : Je trouve dommage qu'on nous facture quand même des frais de retrait à l'étranger alors que l'offre stipule 5 retraits gratuits à linternational.Vous pourrez être facturé à un distributeur si celui-ci n'est pas partenaire n26.J'ai voyagé au Cambodge et en Thaïlande (facturation de frais de retrait dans les deux pays)Je trouve dommage qu'on n'ait pas un service client joignable par ligne directe uniquement pour ceux qui ont l'abonnement métal. Le prix de la carte métal qui est chère par rapport à son concurrent.Une world elite qui n'a pas de pass lounge dans les aéroports du monde.Un rechargement par carte bancaire serait un plus. Je trouve la qualité de la carte métal un peu cheap, c'est un métal plastique pliable.Aujourd'hui je me dirige vers votre concurrent qui propose une offre moins chère avec plus de services.

title: Truffa!!!!
content: mia moglie ha avuto una brutta esperienza con n26. Le sono state addebitate 2 transazioni non fatte da lei. Tramite il modulo di denuncia di N26 è riuscita a scoprire che le transazioni sono partite dalla Germania e addebitate utilizzando la sua carta di debito, ma l’intestatario era un certo Peter jacoby.  Chiaramente una truffa, ma N26 non le ha spiegato come mai le Transazioni sono andate a buon fine nonostante L’ intestatario della cartaera una persona diversa da quella reale è scritta sulla carta di debito.È ancora in attesa di recuperare questi soldi tolti dal conto in modo illecito e fraudolento.State attenti !!!!
reply: Hey K! Danke für dein Feedback.Bitte sende uns doch eine Email an Support@N26.com und schildere uns was passiert ist, sodass wir deine Verärgerung verstehen und dir weiterhelfen können.Gruß, dein N26 Support Team.

title: Une offre efficace et presque parfaite
content: Le service est efficace et correspond à peu près à ce que je cherchais en adhérant à cette néobanque.J'apprécie particulièrement la sobriété de l’application Android qui s'ouvre très vite : pas de fioritures, on va rapidement à l'essentiel.L'accès en parallèle à mon compte depuis l'ordinateur est pour moi un plus par rapport à certains concurrents.Pour la cinquième étoile, signe de la perfection, il me faudrait la possibilité de créer une CB virtuelle depuis l'application (pour un paiement plus sécurisé sur le web) ainsi qu'un service de virements instantanés.
reply: Gentile Giovanni,grazie per il tuo feedback.Ovviamente siamo a tua disposizione per assisterti ed aiutarti a recuperare i tuoi fondi. Contatta il nostro supporto clienti seguendo le indicazioni di questo articolo: https://support.n26.com/it-it/risolvi-un-problema/carte/come-contestare-una-transazione Buona giornata.

Nous cherchons continuellement à améliorer la qualité de nos services et notamment du service client. Si vous avez la moindre question, nous nous ferons un plaisir de vous répondre et d'assurer une bonne compréhension.Salutations,Votre équipe N26.

Первая карта и обслуживание счета бесплатно, IBAN в комплекте. Используйте мой реферальный код sergeyp4135 для получения €15 после регистрации и первого платежа на эту сумму. The ideal remote bank for the eurozone.  Unfortunately, it does not send the card out of its borders, but it works with clients from almost all countries.  First card and account maintenance free of charge, IBAN included.  Use my referral code sergeyp4135 to receive € 15 after registering and making the first payment for this amount.

My old bank has hidden fees on almost every thing.Next week I will go on a trip abroad and I will use the N26 card more frequently, but I think it will work just fine.

name: Gre Tek
title: Do not do business with them!
content: Do not do business with them. They will close your account with no reason and they will not provide any information whatsoever. Support is just horrible. Just use a regular bank instead of this BS.The reply from N26 from below is nothing but BS and a flat out lie. I have done nothing that would breach their terms of use yet they have gathered personal information about me that will probably be sold to third parties. I guess I was the sucker, thinking that a supposed bank from Germany would be legit!
reply: Hey,As a bank we must comply with all legal and regulatory obligations. Following these regulatory processes, we periodically conduct reviews of our accounts. We have the responsibility to run routine checks on transactions (see GwG § 10). These checks are based on individual transactions and are automatically initiated by our systems. Unfortunately, these obligations may also prevent us from disclosing any detail around such checks. As a fully-fledged bank, N26 must submit itself to banking regulations in place. Said regulation is aimed at protecting our users. You won't encounter issues when using your bank account if you don't breach our terms and conditions.Best,Your N26 support team

name: Adriano Jose Rodrigues De Oliveira
title: Really unhappy with N26
content: Really unhappy with N26, first it was looking like the best option for all this boring bank things going around, after 3 months months trying it's more of the same or worst. Made my black super cool Card, i was trying it for two months but it's just a poor support costumer service and not so much of what they are trying to sell. Went to Dominican Republic and was paying for cash machine raise money, again very poor customer service, no reply to e-mails, lying on costumer reply aswers. One bank that looks like this hispters in the coffee shops, alot to show without any kind of content. Be careful with your black cards, after one month of using it you will pay till for 1 year and it's bad or the same like the normal cards. Good luck for your 'amazing' experience :) bad one for me but it could be worst. Don't make it your primary bank account btwAdriano
reply: Hey Adriano,Thanks for taking the time to leave your review, and we're sorry to learn that you haven't enjoyed your experience with us thus far.All of our customer service agents are trained in the same manner and to the highest quality. Our agents are also offered follow-up training and support to ensure they are always knowledgeable and up to date with all new processes and topics that they will need to assist our customers with. In the event an agent is unsure on a topic they are assisting a customer with, they can reach out to senior support for help. You can also refer to our useful support center, which answers a lot of Frequently Asked Questions: https://support.n26.com/en-eu/getting-startedIt is correct that our Black account has a contract of one year which is stated upon signing up. It is possible to cancel the account without a fee within the legal 14 day revocation period, but once this time has passed, the agreed upon fees must be paid for the remainder of the contract. You can cancel the auto renewal of the Black account in your mobile app by going to My Account > N26 Black > N26 Black ID > Cancel Membership. This must be done at least 30 days before the end of the current contract, and will cancel the subscription for the next year - not the current contract.Best Regards, Your N26 Support Team.

title: Not the best
content: I have read about many customers who complained that they found the account closed for no real reason, losing money or having to wait months before recovering it.I recommend choosing a bank based in your country or more widely used.Ho letto di molti clienti che si lamentavano del fatto di essersi trovati il conto chiuso senza un vero motivo, perdendo soldi o comunque dovendo aspettare mesi prima di recuperarli.Meglio scegliere una banca con sede nel proprio paese o comunque più utilizzata.
reply: Hey Luca,As a fully-fledged bank, N26 must submit itself to banking regulations in place. Said regulation is aimed at protecting our users. You won't encounter issues when using your bank account if you don't breach our terms and conditions.Best,Your N26 Team.

name: Sabrina
title: En attendant de recevoir ma carte

name: Linda N.
title: Achtung!!
content: Jetzt wird man auch schon bei der Bank diskriminiert, wenn man eine in Teilzeit arbeitende Mama ist, die scheinbar nicht den gewünschten Gehaltsvorstellungen entspricht, um diesen Konto würdig zu sein. Stattdessen wird der Vertrag fristlos gekündigt mit der Begründung es würde eine "wesentliche Verschlechterung" der Vermögensverhältnisse bestehen. Mein Einkommen ist absolut gesichert. Los ging es mit der Sperrung meines Kontos ohne Vorwarnung an einem Freitag! Servicemitarbeiter konnten mir keinerlei Infos geben, warum es gesperrt wurde und wie lange es gesperrt bleiben würde. Nun ist eine Woche vergangen und mein Konto ist nach wie vor gesperrt für jegliche Zahlungen. Ich kann meine Miete nicht zahlen, kein Essen kaufen oder tanken gehen. Ich hab ein Kind zu versorgen!!Auf Nachfrage wurde ich vom Service aus der Leitung geworfen, das Gespräch sei beendet.Ich bin extrem enttäuscht und WARNE VOR DIESER WILLKÜR EINER BANK!!
reply: Danke für dein Feedback und deine ehrlichen Worte. Bei der Verwendung deines Bankkontos treten keine Probleme auf, wenn du nicht gegen unsere Allgemeinen Geschäftsbedingungen verstößt. Bitte schicke uns eine E-Mail an support@n26.com, damit wir uns das genauer für dich anschauen können.

name: Münzer
title: N26 froze my account for no reason! Service is lying to me
content: That "bank" is an absolute joke! Without warning, my account was simply blocked. On a friday! I had no chance to buy food. Or to refuel my car. Iam a father and have kids! N26 is unqualified and I do not recommend this bank. To date, I have not received any feedback as to why my account was ever blocked. ITS 7 DAYS ago! I need to pay my bills and can not do this! That's a catastrophe. The "service" can not help me and throw me out of the chat every time. This company is a shame for every online bank out there! I will ask my lawyer about this situation.Diese Bank ist ein absoluter Witz! Ohne Vorwarnung wurde mein Konto einfach gelöscht! Gemerkt habe ich es an der Tankstelle. Als die Karte nicht akzeptiert wurde! Was um alles in der Welt ist das Problem den Kunden zu informieren? An einem FREITAG wurde die Karte gesperrt. Seit einer Woche kann ich auf mein Geld nicht mehr zugreifen! Ich habe Kinder zu versorgen und muss einkaufen und tanken! Ich bin schockiert über diese Willkür ich kann diese "Bank" keinem Menschen auf der Welt empfehlen! Lastschriften werden nicht eingezogen! Man bekommt Probleme mit der Miete! Das ist unglaublich wie inkompetent diese Bank ist! Der Service ist unfreundlich und unter aller Würde! Ich werde immer aus der Leitung geworfen! Ich habe noch immer keine Ahnung WIESO ich gesperrt bin und WIESO mein Geld gesperrt ist! Wenn das noch eine Woche so andauert, werde ich meinen Anwalt einschalten!Service: 1/10Trust: 1/10Safety: 1/10EDIT: 3 Wochen sind mittlerweile vergangen. Das Konto wurde nun endgültig gelöscht. Mein Geld habe ich noch immer nicht erhalten. Diese "moderne" Bank schafft es innerhalb von 3 Wochen nicht mir mein Geld auf ein anderes Konto zu schicken. Es ist einfach unglaublich. Die Antwort ist lächerlich - copy and paste. "Diese Regelung zielt darauf ab, unsere Nutzer zu schützen." - gebt mir mein Geld zurück, ihr Verbrecher! Eine Überweisung dauert 1 Tag. Vor was bitte schützt ihr mich hier, indem ihr mein Geld 3 Wochen einfriert? Hier müssen mich andere Vereine vor EUCH schützen!"werden wir dich kontaktieren" Seit 3 WOCHEN! Warte ich auf mein Geld. Schickt mir mein Geld zurück, ihr Verbrecher. "Bis dahin bitten wir um Geduld." Nach 3 WOCHEN ohne konkrete Information ist mein Geduld am Ende. Verzichte du mal auf ein ganzes Monatsgehalt und dein ganzes Geld, wer auch immer mir geantwortet hat.
reply: Hey Münzer, danke für dein Feedback.Als vollwertige Bank muss sich N26 den geltenden Bankvorschriften unterwerfen. Diese Regelung zielt darauf ab, unsere Nutzer zu schützen.Bei der Verwendung deines Bankkontos treten keine Probleme auf, wenn du nicht gegen unsere Allgemeinen Geschäftsbedingungen verstößt.Sollte dies geschehen sein, werden wir dich kontaktieren, um weiteres vorgehen zu besprechen und dir auch dein Restgeld auszuzahlen.Bis dahin bitten wir um Geduld. -Das N26 Team.

name: Adedeji
title: Very shocking service
content: Very shocking service . They froze my account over a month ago , shortly after I received a transfer of £1050 from a sender who has sent me money multiple times over the last few months . They asked me for all sorts of documentation , including 3 months of the sender’s bank details . As well as asking about a transfer I made from another personal account of mine . I provided information about the transfers , only for them to ask about further transactions from months ago , again asking for bank statements . What happens when I provide those ? They ask about more transactions ? If they have issues with the money coming in I have asked them to contact Barclays . Customer service is unhelpful and they take days to reply to emails . They just sit on your money and gain interest . I wish I read the negative reviews before opening . I plan on taking this up with financial ombudsman .
reply: Hey Adedeji,We have the responsibility to run routine checks on transactions (see GwG § 10). These checks are based on individual transactions and are automatically initiated by our systems.As a result, we may ask you to verify the origin or source of your funds. If you receive such a request, just send the requested documents via email. There are no exceptions or bypasses for such checks. And in cases of non-compliance, your account may be seized and cancelled.Both the process and the result are confidential and handled internally. This practice ensures the safety of our customers and their transactions. The sooner we received the required documentation the faster the checks are done. Best,Your N26 Team

title: I don't have an account with N26 but i…
content: I don't have an account with N26 but i would love to have it as a student here in Germany.

name: William Ellingham
title: An outstanding modern banking alternative
content: N26 as it stands is most of what a contemporary bank should be, and its innovations and usefulness are expanding daily.As an American expatriate living in Italy, I enjoy the alternative of maintaining a German account for its efficiency and international usefulness. It was also acceptably simple to open, which is hardly the case with traditional banks here.Big pluses are the lack of fees for maintaining the account and universal ATM use. I travel alot and this is considerably useful to me. I have also found my funds immediately accessibile upon transfer from TransferWise. The dynamic of this blows any conventional banking relationship away.Customer service is good but could be improved beyond the current navigation for support and their preferred online chat. That has been my single frustration to date though on the two occasions I had problems to resolve they were ultimately satisfied properly.I highly recommend N26.I am quite happy I discovered them.

title: Good experience in  1,5 year.
content: I have this account 1,5 year, and basic functionality is grate.

name: Luiz Fernando Xavier
title: It feels safe enough, modern enough
content: I live in Ireland and I suffer with the outdated banks here, essentially Irish brands only. My bank particularly doesn’t have Apple Pay, the security measures seem insecure (only a 6 digit pin code to access the app) and so on. So when I found about N26 I didn’t hesitate because it feels much safer, as I can do most of the control online (e.g. block my card if lost). The customer service is fine, and while not the friendliest out there, they do the job of supporting.

name: Zoë Langton
title: N26 is awesome!
content: I love banking with N26. I love using the app and having everything easy to find, especially when I need support. The only thing that annoys me is that you can’t have a joint account with your spouse. That’s pretty frustrating, although having the immediate Money Beam option slightly makes up for that. But I’d still like a joint account option!

name: Nikhil B
title: The services that they offer are…
content: The services that they offer are fantastic, but like many reviewers here, I had a terrible experience with their customer service. After that, I kept the card because the customer service got better so I gave them a second chance. Now, it has been 19 days since there has been a fraudulent transaction on my account. Cherry on the cake: I am temporarily abroad. They told me to wait for 12 days and explained why. I complied. I send them the dispute forms with the police complaint after the said 12 days. It has been more than a week now and still no response. I want to give them another chance, but how many times am I going to keep doing that? A great innovative banking idea, but very poor execution. Sadly, I will not recommend this bank just based on the fact that they do not take the unauthorized transactions seriously and are not able to reassure the client. I hope my unauthorized transaction will be re-credited back soon. Still waiting...Update: I was reimbursed 3.5 weeks after the initial unauthorised payment, so changed my rating from a one-star. So it took a while but they came through.

name: Gregor
title: Réactivité du Livechat et l'agent a su…
content: Réactivité du Livechat et l'agent a su cerner mon problème immédiatement en me donnant les informations nécessaire
reply: Hey Nikhil,We apologise for keeping you waiting. If you don’t recognize a transaction or you’re sure you didn’t authorize it, blocking your card won’t be enough. In these cases you should immediately:Order a new card and mark your current one as stolen. Destroy your card by cutting it with scissors or a shredder. The chip, NFC antenna, and the magnetic strip should all be cut into pieces and disposed of separately. Complete a dispute form (EU or UK). We’ll take it from there and do our best to get your money back.Could you please reach out to our live chat support so we can take a closer look and provide you with an update? Best,Your N26 Support Team

name: Kwame
title: AVOID AVOID AVOID!! SCAMMERS!
content: AVOID AVOID AVOID!!! SCAMMERS! They closed my account in March for no reason, they advised if My account has a positive balance email them with my account details. I sent an email on March 15th with my bank details however it is now the end of June and I still haven’t received my funds, they have blocked my number from calling them, webchat closes the chat as soon as I tell them my info, they have also blocked my number from calling them. They respond to my emails weeks later and just advise the case has been transferred to colleagues in charge and we will get back to you soon. ABSOLUTELY TERRIBLE! PLEASE AVOID!

name: Lasse Jensen
title: N26. So much more than just a bank!!
content: I first learned about N26 from my good friend, that has moved to france, so are now using Them as his prime bank. He told me about the advantages, and invited me to be a user. I downloded the app immediatly, and got my transparent Master debit card, with in 4 days. And then i just learned all the features while using the app and card, and never have i ever bin so glad for a online bank, it is easy to use, it has a lot of advantages, the design on card and app i amazing. And not to forget the N26 bank support, you can allways connect to a well service minded imployee, that quickly can answer all the questions i had.Amazing bank, that makes the enonomy better.

name: Tiffany Brockhouse
title: Absolute rubbish I had not been able t…
content: Absolute rubbish I had not been able t login to my account for four months I had problems resetting my password when: my post code it kept saying it was wrong soci gave up and tried four months later to have sorted the issue out from ONE helpful customer service representative. How ever that was short lived I received a payment which has caused my account to be blocked now for three weeks with no help or information at all what so ever! I have family who use N26 and friends who I want to tell to avoid your company due to my funds being blocked how do you expect people to survive and pay bills and rent when we can’t touch OUR own money?!  I understand checks may need to take place but three weeks is disgusting no real help from the app chat seems like one joke who just want to steal your money or cause you inconvenience I never had this with a high street bank I may be better off going back to bat west these guys are heartless and will tell you the same excuse I have had one of there app chat reps tell me a ticket was created and after speaking to 30 different agents in the app chat no one else mentioned a ticket and that there’s no email to notify me of a ticket created or even the fact you blocked my account that’s just disgusting no notifications I asked to speak to a manager or superior just a waste of breathe NOTHING BUT EXCUSES NOW GIVE ME MY MONEY YOU CROOKS OF A SO CALLED BANK THEY DONT CARE ABOUT ANYONE BUT THEMSELFS THIEFS .... AVOID will speak to the financial ombudsman and complain requesting compensation!

title: Fantastic in what they do but still some way to go
content: The services offered are excellent! It is banking like it should be! I still wish they could offer all their services in all locations. Savings accounts and credit cards still missing outside of Germany. Also their support is a bit on the dumb side while super friendly and willing to help. Feels like they can’t do much other then sharing their support article knowledge but nothing beyond that.That said, I highly recommend N26 to anyone. Either as their main account or as a second budget account

name: Paul
title: Had frozen my account for no reason…
content: Had frozen my account for no reason whatsoever and with absolutely no email or communication, checked my emails, last one from the bank was 8 months ago and nothing in junk folders etc, I have just spoke to customer support via live chat and just flogged off with compliance checks they are checking on the account??Have almost £1000 in the account which is frozen, it has been frozen for a week now, people have been paying me, I have no access to any transactions so I dont know who has and hasnt paid me, causing me terrible problems, we are 100% above board legally and see know reason for this block, no doubt the reply to this will be the same as every other reply to a negative review below??As a bank we must comply with all legal and regulatory obligations. Following these regulatory processes, we periodically conduct reviews of our accounts. We have the responsibility to run routine checks on transactions (see GwG § 10). These checks are based on individual transactions and are automatically initiated by our systems. Rest assured, once the review on your account is complete, an agent will contact you.After reading other reviews I am thinking this bank is just scamming people and has absolutely no care for their customers, they just hide behind BS wording regarding banking regulations!!

reply: Hey Paul,As a licensed bank, there are strict laws and regulations that govern these compliance checks and specifically prevent us from giving out detailed information about them. We promise you that it is being worked on as quickly as possible and we’ll endeavour to update you as soon as we can.Once the review is complete, someone will get in touch regarding your access to your account and the money on it. Please be assured that we are working hard to complete these checks as soon as possible. We appreciate your patience and apologise for the inconvenience.Best,Your N26 Team.

name: Matthieu
title: MEFIEZ VOUS DE N26
content: Si vous ouvrez un compte chez N26, sachez que vous prenez le risque de voir votre compte bloqué sans aucune raison valable ou compréhensible. Mais au-delà de ce blocage inadmissible, ils vont encore plus loin ! ils converseront vos fonds durant des mois, pour certains cela fait 1 an qu’ils n’ont pas pu les récupérer ! Et bien sûr, si l’on poste ici un message, ils vont répondre avec leurs habituels refrain en mettant un lien concernant un article qu’ils ont fait pour soit disant expliquer pourquoi des comptes sont fermés et bloqués chez eux, alors que cet article n’explique rien de concret.De plus, même si certains comptes sont bloqués car des personnes n'avaient pas encore renseigné leurs numéros fiscal (Et je re précise que ce n'est pas l'unique MOTIF de compte bloqués !! ), la logique serait d'envoyer aux clients un mail leurs expliquant qu'ils ont 1 mois pour mettre cela à jour ; plutôt que bloquer subitement le client en le laissant dans une grande problématique sachant que pour certains N26 était devenu le compte principal. Votre façon de procéder est scandaleuse, c'est une honte de voir un tel établissement continuer avec de telles pratiques dans un pays comme l'Allemagne.
reply: Bonjour,Nous sommes désolés pour cette mauvaise expérience que vous avez connu avec nos services.N26 est soumis à la réglementation bancaire en vigueur qui a notamment pour objectif d’assurer la protection des clients et de leurs économies. En cas d'activité inhabituelle, le compte peut se retrouver suspendu le temps que notre service dédié analyse et regularise la situation. En tant que banque disposant d'une licence Européenne, nous ne pouvons en aucun cas fermer les comptes de nos clients sans raison valable.Concernant le numéro fiscal, nous envoyons un email préventif dans le cas ou vous ne l'auriez pas entré dans l'application afin de vous rappeler que cela est impératif.Par ailleurs nous avertissons automatiquement nos clients par email lorsqu'une mise à jour est effectuée sur le compte. Nous sommes conscients que cette situation n’est pas évidente, mais nous pouvons vous assurer que N26 suit la législation à la lettre et travaille pour régler chaque situation au plus vite.Salutations,Votre équipe N26

name: Florian Russell
title: Wenn ein Mitarbeiter von N26 mit einem…
content: Wenn ein Mitarbeiter von N26 mit einem neuen Kunden (bei der Pass und Gesichtskontrolle) wie ein Wasserfall spricht, der Angestellte spricht zwar deutsch, aber mit einem prägnanten ausländischen Accent, der Kunde auch Ausländer war, was kann er von dem rapiden bla, bla bla verstehen?  Unhöflich, ohne kohärenter Argumentation, der Angestellte von N26 nennt dem neuen Kunden irgend ein Gesetz, und nervös erinnert den Sprechpartner, ich kann nicht weiter, andere Kunden warten auf mich! Punkt! Wir sind Aussiedler, mein Mann spricht perfekt deutsch, ich dagegen habe oft Schwierigkeiten etwas offizielles zu formulieren, Die dunkel Heutige Frau, den Namen habe ich nicht verstanden, sprach schnell  wie ein Automat - ich nichts verstanden, war plötzlich in Eile weil ich bei Ihre Revolver Frage, nicht reagieren konnte und auf die Konfirmation von mein Mann gewartet habe was ich antworten musste. Wir haben satt ständig nur von Rassismus oder Intoleranz zu hören, wir erwarten in Deutschland auch einmal gehöret zu werden. Es ist ganz menschlich eine Frau aus Afrika zu einzustellen, sie soll doch zu erst auch menschlich mit den unbeholfenen Kunden umgehen! Nachdem wir fast 20 Minuten gewartet haben, darf sie nicht uns nach nicht einmal zwei Minuten sagen, es warten anderen Kunden, dann ein Gesetz Zahl nennen, was ihr wahrscheinlich das Recht gab, den Kunden mit den Füssen zu treten, Schliesslich ist die Card von N26 eine Debit-Card, ich arbeite als Schriftstellerin, also brauchte ich ein Card mit einer begrenzten Summe für meine Zahlungen in Ausland. Leider sind die Bedienung in Deutschland bald schlimmer als in Afrika Länder. Lernen Sie besser ihren Angestellte mit Menschen menschlich zu sprechen. Roboter haben wir genug! Diana Russell

name: Patrick Hoff
title: Unterstützt offensichtlich Betrug
content: Unterstützt offensichtlich Betrug und behindert Polizeiarbeit und Anfragen. Sowas sollte verboten werden.

name: Andreas Gradert
title: Grundlose Kündigung, hoher Betrag seit 7 Monaten einbehalten
content: Am 18.11.2018 wurde mir mein Konto gekündigt, ohne Begründung, nur mit dem Verweis, dass die Bank das könne, den Restbetrag solle ich mir auf ein anderes Konto zurück überweisen - aber auch das Banking wurde gesperrt, sehr sinnig. Seit nunmehr sieben Monaten versuche ich einen mehrfach vierstelligen Betrag zurückzubekommen,  kein Kontakt, keine Erreichbarkeit, keine Chatmöglichkeit, einfach Null Kontakt zu dieser Bank.Ich werde nun Strafanzeige wegen Unterschlagung stellen.
reply: Als vollwertige Bank muss sich N26 den geltenden Bankvorschriften unterwerfen. Diese Regelung zielt darauf ab, unsere Nutzer zu schützen.Bei der Verwendung deines Bankkontos treten keine Probleme auf, wenn du nicht gegen unsere Allgemeinen Geschäftsbedingungen verstößt.Falls du uns noch keine IBAN per Email zugeschickt hast, damit wir den Restbetrag überweisen können, bitte tue dies.

name: painter 77
title: Salve a tutti sono stato due giorni…
content: Salve a tutti sono stato due giorni senza poter prelevare e pagare con la carta per un loro problema non avevo liquidità, immaginate voi, l'operatore mi chiedeva di pazientare.. Ho tolto tutti i soldi non sono seri!!!!!!!
reply: Ciao, grazie per il feedback.Siamo spiacenti per la situazione in cui ti sei trovato.Le rare volte in cui dovesse capitare un evento simile ti invitiamo a contattare il nostro customer support.Siamo disponibili tutti i giorni dalle 7 alle 23 per darti aggiornamenti sul nostro servizio.Ci teniamo a scusarci ancora per l'avvenuto.Buona giornata.

name: luke hornak
title: Got scammed while travelling in Japan…AVOID FROM FAR !!!
content: Got scammed while travelling in Japan by over 2000 Euro and they refused to even look at my case properly, their argument was that the PIN code was used (of course but not by myself as it was somehow stolen)...  pure SCAM, security is a joke too i.e. you don't get timed out at all while you're on desktop whilst on the app it kicks u out constantly... Waste of time, money and energy
reply: Hey Luke,We understand this is not the desired outcome however if the personal PIN was used, there are no chargeback rights and we are not able to provide a refund. Here is a link to our terms and conditions on this issue for your convenience: https://docs.n26.com/legal/06+EU/01+Account/en/07account-terms-cards-mastercard-en.pdf- point 10 ("The Cardholder‘s Duties): "The Cardholder is under an obligation to keep the PIN absolutely secret. The PIN may not be kept together with the Card, noted on the Card or written down, nor may it be made possible for third parties to obtain the PIN through similar deliberate acts on the part of the Cardholder."- point 11.1 (The Cardholder‘s Liability up Until Receipt of the Card-Blocking Notice): "The Cardholder must pay for the loss caused by any unauthorized use prior to the Card-Blocking Notice in full if the Cardholder has intentionally or grossly negligently breached his/her duties of care under these terms and conditions or has acted with fraudulent intent. It shall constitute a case of gross negligence if the Cardholder intentionally or negligently fails to report any loss, theft or fraudulent use of the Card with a Card-Blocking Notice without undue delay, has noted the PIN on the Card or has kept it together with the Card or if the PIN has been disclosed to anyone else.Best,Your N26 Support Team

name: claude-valérie kouassi
title: N26 has made of life an hell
content: Hi, I am totally devastated. I am using N26 since Mars. Since more than 25days now, N26 have frozen my funds to carry endless routine checks. I am 20 days late for my rent. All my directs debit get cancelled. I am single and move on my own in the UK. One my work colleague borrow me £500 to eat and go to work, time for my account to be released. They have asked me to provide information and documents to explain some transactions. What I did in a delay of 48hours. I am calling every day and emailing everyday. I get one email back saying “you need to be patiente” and same answer on the phone. I am totally desperate. And wish to solve it out. Any testimonials ???? I am feeling depressed
reply: Hey,As a bank we must comply with all legal and regulatory obligations. Following these regulatory processes, we periodically conduct reviews of our accounts. We have the responsibility to run routine checks on transactions (see GwG § 10). These checks are based on individual transactions and are automatically initiated by our systems. Unfortunately, these obligations may also prevent us from disclosing any detail around such checks. Rest assured, once the review on your account is complete, an agent will contact you. We’re sorry that this is causing an inconvenience on your side and aim to complete this review as soon as possible. Best,Your N26 Support Team

name: Moritz
title: Kündigung ohne Grund!!
content: Kündigung ohne Grund! Das Konto wurde mir Heute völlig aus dem Blauen heraus gekündigt. Ich habe jeden Monat über 60.000EUR über dieses Konto laufen lassen. Angeblich- wie viele andere hier- wegen eines "erheblichen" Verstosses gegen die AGB's. Wer dachte, dass N26 nur keine Lust auf Kleingeld Kunden hat, hat sich vertan: scheinbar auch auf Kunden, die mehr umsetzen!!Bei telefonischer Nachfrage, kann man keine Antwort geben. Bei Chatnachfrage (TOBIAS) wird der Chat direkt geschlossen. Ein absolut unseriöser Amateurverein! Trotz einiger Probleme mit Karten etc. habe ich N26- gerade für die unkomplizierte Art- gerne genutzt. Allerdings ist die Aufkündigung eines Kontos ohne Angabe eines Grundes völlig irre und steht in keinem Rechtsverhältnis!Ich werde die BaFin informieren!!
reply: Vielen Dank für dein Feedback. Als vollwertige Bank muss sich N26 den geltenden Bankvorschriften unterwerfen. Diese Regelung zielt darauf ab, unsere Nutzer zu schützen.Bei der Verwendung deines Bankkontos treten keine Probleme auf, wenn du nicht gegen unsere Allgemeinen Geschäftsbedingungen verstößt.

name: Sara Dora
title: I really like the design makes the user…
content: I really like the design makes the user experience really great. However, fancy is not always useful. I ran into a lot of problems not being able to receive USD payment. I think this future would be needed for a company that advertises themselves as global, for young people, mobile etc... This is really annoying and I will probably will go back to my other banks as I often receive payments in different currencies. And nobody has a single clue what the hell "transferwise" is tbh...Yeah but nobody who sents me money would download transferwise. and tbh i would not either.
reply: Hey Sara,Thanks for your feedback. According to our Terms & Conditions we do not accept incoming SWIFT transfers. We only support SEPA transfers in Euros. It is possible to send money in other currencies using an exchange service, such as that offered by our partner Transferwise. You would need to register to Transferwise. Here is the link: https://transferwise.comYou can read more about this on our support center: https://support.n26.com/en-eu/getting-started/payments-and-transfers/how-to-make-transfers-in-foreign-currenciesBest,Your N26 Team

name: martijn turksema
title: n26 illegally holding my funds
content: Started with a N26 because of low costs to withdrawal money in exterior (I had the black paid card). In less then 6 weeks N26 froze the account (I did receive crypto payments on it). I got an email saying: we cannot continue offering you an account, your account will be closed in 2 weeks. In those 2 weeks you have time to withdrawal your remaining funds. Not true, I was not able to make any payment/transfer nor to withdrawal in cash. Endlessly contacted support and chat but no response (chat actually mentioned all time the same: we refer to the mail we have send you, I will close the chat now). Received the mail they will close my account on the 13th of may. 27th of May will be day that the account is officially closed. Now, on June 15 I’m still waiting for N26 to send me the funds that are still in my account (several hundreds of euros). They promote with service, technology etc etc but to be honest it is just a scam... holding illegally some persons money for over a month now. I send them one last mail (as a holy Mary) begging to send me the money (provided them with alternative Iban account on my name) but still no response. If they don’t solve it the next week, I feel forced to go to court, I’m sure there are more people out there with the same experience (reading different fora) so feel free to join me.

name: Patrick
title: Impossible to pay in Brazil currency
content: The bank is good, fast, the app is great. OK.I just chose this bank for a specific reason, Sometimes I need to pay products from Brazil and pay in BRL / Brazilian reais (local currency). It worked for some time and then, never worked again. I asked the website and they told me my bank blocked it. I now it's true because I tried with another bank and.. it worked !I need now to reuse my old classic bank credit card and pay extra fee for foreign currency... That's precisely the reason I chose N26 at the first place.I contacted N26 via livechat 2 times and they told me they will look into it. Never heard from them, it's been like 2 mounths now.Following N26 official staff answer > it has never been about transfering, it was a credit card payment , it worked with my N26 card at the begining and then not anymore.. N26 should work with every currency for credit card, isn't that right ?

title: Perfect bank
content: Mobile app is easy to use and working perfect! Customer service is really nice and professional. It was really easy to open the bank account, I received my card very fast and since then everything is working properly. I really like the idea, if I am spending my money (net shopping, transfer, shopping in a mall) it will immediately disappear from my account (at least I see only the amount of the money which is available) which is really good as in germany most of the cases at all other banks, they need 2-5 days till you book the already spent money, so you can think that you have enough money, and after that suddenly you realize that no.

name: PatriciaSR
title: Buggy app and terrible customer service
content: I really liked the idea of a bank catering to travelers and expats. So it is utterly incomprehensible to me that they are doing a terrible job at exactly that! I have wasted 5 hours attempting to pair my phone to the app WHILE ON VACATION IN BALI and the issue has still not been solved! All the emails, chats and calls for nothing! This is the third issue now within a couple months and I am seriously considering to close my account ASAP. I feel completely let down by them, but better to find out now before I invest more time in this banking relationship.They really don't seem to get the business is about relationships and trust - especially when it comes to money! You guys have definitely lost mine.

reply: Hey Christian, Thank you for your feedback. We do not offer account switching services at the moment, so we are unable to alter the country of your Terms & Conditions, as this pertains to the country you opened the account in.  We do hope to offer this service in future. We can change your legal address, but this will not alter the country in which your terms and conditions are based.It is possible to move between supported countries and use your account as normal - it is not necessary to close your account if you are simply moving to another country in which we operate, however there are certain features and services that are not available across all countries currently.We apologise for any inconvenience.Best Regards,Your N26 Support Team

name: Lilia Queresma
title: Bonne et mauvaise banque à la fois
content: Bonne banque avec de bons services, cependant déçu par la fermeture de mon compte sans aucune raison valable. Si, je me suis fais un virement de 3000€ de mon compte BNP à mon compte N26 ce virement a été bloqué et on m’a demandé de justifier que le compte émetteur du virement (BNP) été bien le miens, ce que j’ai fais en envoyant les documents demandés. Un mail plus tard on m’annonce la fermeture de mon compte. Ridicule, et très navrant. Dommage car je commencée à bien aimer cette banque. J’espère pouvoir ouvrir à nouveau un compte un autre jour, à voir si le service c’est amélioré. Et attention, le service client est plutôt bien. Certain conseiller sont désagréables c’est vrai mais pas tous, d’autres sont très professionnels ! En conclusion, si vous ouvrez un compte N26 n’en faite pas votre compte principal car si ils ferment votre compte vous allez être vraiment pénalisé !

name: Maël Trappeniers
title: Une banque en ligne parfaite mais...
content: Une banque en ligne digne des grandes enseignes. Le seul défaut que je peux reprocher à l’heure actuelle serait l’IBAN allemand qui pause des problèmes assez récurrents en France.
reply: Bonjour Lilia, merci d'avoir pris le temps d'écrire ce message.Nous sommes sincèrement navrés de lire votre retour sur expérience. N26 est soumise à la réglementation bancaire en vigueur. Cette dernière a notamment pour objectif d’assurer la protection des clients. Comme vous le savez probablement, N26 a une licence bancaire européenne. Nos équipes sont dans l’obligation de suivre les mêmes procédures que l’ensemble des autres banques de l'UE. Un compte n’est jamais bloqué sans raison, et nos agents du Service Client n’ont pas d’informations sur ce sujet, celui-ci étant traité par un autre département et le contact se fait exclusivement par email. Dans tous les cas, si la possibilité d'ouvrir un compte se présente à nouveau, nous ne manquerons pas de vous tenir informée.Nous espérons que cette réponse vous a été utile.Salutations,Votre équipe N26.

The majority of the time, checks are done very quickly, without you being able to see them. In some cases, we may need longer to investigate. We understand the concern you have for the status of your account and the remaining funds,  but we are unable to discuss sensitive information relating to your N26 account via this platform. We will continue this correspondence via email. We hope this can be resolved for you in a timely manner and apologise for any inconvenience.Best Regards,Your N26 Support Team

name: Ines
title: Ich bin soweit zufrieden
content: Hi Zusammen,also ich muss zuerst sagen, dass mich das negative Feedback der Wochen auch stark verunsichert, ebenso finde ich das Social Media Team hier auf der Seite grottig. Auch ich habe die 15€ Freundesbonus noch nicht bekommen, andere mir bekannte Nutzer jedoch schon. Deshalb der Stern Abzug. (zum Thema Social Media: Leute, copy und Paste bei so einer Seite? Das kann eigentlich nicht euer Ernst sein, wenn ihr gerade so dermaßen in der Kreide steht. Das lernt man doch im ersten Semester Marketing wie man auf solche Negativbewertungen einzugehen hat?!...)Jetzt kommt jedoch mein "aber":Ich hatte noch nie Probleme mit den regulären Bankfunktionen von N26. Ich kann problemlos und unkompliziert Geld einzahlen und abheben, Überweisungen funktionieren wahnsinnig schnell.Die Integration mit ApplePay klappt 1A. Ich weiß es zu schätzen, dass ich im Einzelhandel "nebenher" auch meine Bankgeschäfte mitabwickeln kann - z.Bsp. durch Einzahlungen bei DM.Auch bei den 2 Fällen in denen ich Support gebraucht habe, war der Service via Chat gut zu erreichen und hilfreich. Als mir im Urlaub die Karte kopiert wurde, hat die Sperrung der Karte innerhalb kürzester Zeit - auch mit Hilfe des Chats - funktioniert und ich habe rückwirkend das gestohlene Geld zurückerhalten.Von dem her kann ich persönlich die negativen Bewertungen nicht unterschreiben (wenn auch nachvollziehen) und werde vorerst Kunde von N26 bleiben. Mein Alternativkonto bei einer anderen regulären Bank werde ich jedoch sicherheitshalber behalten, bis sich die Service Thematik in der Breite beruhigt hat.

name: Chris
title: Terrible Experience Not Just For Myself
content: There's plenty of people that have had their accounts locked away from them, whilst it hasn't happened to me yet I've now deleted the app and no longer use this bank. I tried to stop the annual Black card membership before it started but they took a few days to reply and since it was past the point of cancellation, they said I could either keep paying it monthly or pay the whole lot off. So that means I am unable close my account! Now I've received an email saying that I have a negative balance (which is the monthlymmembership) and that the email they sent to me would cost £3 which is ridiculous! They'll also suspend my account within 2 months if I don't pay it off. Go ahead! I won't be using you thiefs again.AVOID THEM AT ALL COSTS!!
reply: Hey Chris, thank you for your message.We apologise if you had a bad experience. Your N26 Black contract lasts 12 months, with a revocation period of 14 days.In order to close your account, you must pay the remaining monthly fees. Once this is done, we'll be happy to proceed with your cancellation. You can find all these informations in your legal documents : https://n26.com/en-eu/legal-documents/blackWe hope this message was useful for you.Regards,Your N26 Team.

name: Jean
title: Run away is a cardboard bank.
content: Run away is a cardboard bank.Your money is not safe and they're bullshitting you.They remove bad comments on facebook.SOS, I contacted the bundesbank and associations we are hundreds with our money blocked.And no customer service except a poor email that never answers...I have been a client with them since June 2017, account opened as a Frenchman but having its tax residence in Morocco.I declared these elements when I opened the account on the first day.And since then I haven't had any problems and I've been using my account regularly for 2 years.Except last night I received an email like hundreds of other people"Subject: Cancellation of your accountWe have recently identified a material breach of our terms and conditions of use on your account. Therefore, we are obliged to close your N26 account, in accordance with Article 19 (3) of our General Terms and Conditions of Use on an extraordinary basis.The closure of your account will take effect on:21.06.2019Your account remains operational until the date indicated. After termination, the use of the account, the application and the accompanying card will no longer be possible."Example of the bank's customers who received the same email:Search on Google : 60 Millions de consomateurs N26 comptes ferméI can understand that a bank wants to close its bank relationship, but I do not understand that it does not respect the notice they gave me in their emails, since they told me that I have until June 21 and that my account remains functional.Currently my account and card are not functional.24416.01€ are totaly block without any delay ...I find myself on the eve of a long weekend with:- A non-existent customer service that systematically refers us to the email and explains that it is two different services that manage the situation.- My account is blocked and my assets are frozen.- I can no longer use my card to pay online, make withdrawals or transfer money.I am stuck  with no money, no customer service and no one to turn to.And the bank is unreachable and can't actually answer me when they give me back my money.Customer service by chat, tells us to see the service by email and cuts the conversation.Great experience with a cardboard bank.Even in North Korea, I'm sure we'd have someone answering our phones after blocking our money...And this is a German bank????I wonder how Germany, which is so rigorous, can give banking licenses to people like that.SOS we're in a nightmareMessage for the community manager, no need to give us your copy/paste liest: As a bank we must comply with all legal and regulatory obligations. Following these regulatory processes, we periodically conduct reviews of our accounts. We have the responsibility to run routine checks on transactions (see GwG § 10). These checks are based on individual transactions and are automatically initiated by our systems. Rest assured, once the review on your account is complete, an agent will contact you.Already it is necessary to answer the customer by the customer service.I haven't received a message from you in two years.No phone calls, no emails, no text messages.And the BANG 24'416.01€ of blocked.And the worst thing is that you write to me in black and white that my account, my card and my application will remain functional until June 21.Except that's not true, everything's already blocked and I don't have access to my money anymore.I have tuition fees to pay to AEFE next week for my son. How do I do that?????I have to renew health insurance and I had planned to go on holiday in July.How do I do it?????I begged customer service to let me at least get €500 out of the €24,416.01Answer we can make no exception.But that's my money right there. But of course you don't care, it's a routine thing and you hide behind conditions that mean everything and nothing.I have already answered your email, I have already provided my bank details.An urgent SWIFT transfer is done within the same day.So there is a problem in your cardboard bank or should I say in your paper bank?Unless you're a shadow bank????????Hundreds of people complain on the French forums about having money blocked for weeks and months.You play with our money on trading programs?What exactly do you do with the money from your piegons?I don't even dare to write customer anymore, we are piegons.And I think the good comments are written by a community manager with fakes profiles.##### UPDATE 12 JUNE 2019 ####In any case, my message here has had an effect.I have finally been contacted and I hope to receive my transfer soon.The only downside is that they force me to receive my funds on my French account, but it's okay, fortunately I didn't close it.As soon as I receive my funds, I will delete this post.
reply: Hi Jean,As a licensed bank, we are obliged to abide by European banking processes. We are therefore evolving in a strictly regulated environment. Our teams are obliged to follow the same procedures as all other European banks. This includes carrying out routine checks on user accounts and transactions. We don't close accounts without reason, and we do our best to prevent bad situations for the people affected. We endeavour to contact you as soon as possible to inform you of our decision and advise you on the next steps.We understand the concern you have for the status of your account and the remaining funds, but we are unable to discuss sensitive information relating to your N26 account via this platform. We will continue this correspondence via email. We hope this can be resolved for you in a timely manner.Best Regards,Your N26 Support Team

name: Pat
title: Verdict Useless
content: I started to use N26 about a month ago everything up until today was fine. The card was declined in the supermarket and in the pharmacy. I contacted N26 through the chat on the app. Support was useless, no information or help provided. I was told the card was reset. I tried to use the card again however it was again declined. I tried to contact N26 but was unable. I tried to get a phone number so I could speak with someone but none are available.I will now close the account. Verdict Useless
reply: Hi Pat,N26 cards are accepted worldwide with all merchants who accept Mastercard. We're sorry to hear of the issues you have had with your card recently. We have the ability to reset your card in these cases, although we understand this did not correct your issue -  we would be happy to reorder a card for you if you would be so kind as to contact us again via chat.We apologise for any inconvenience caused.Best Regards,Your N26 Support Team

Have you thought that THEY should be paying you since YOU are the person lending the money?When you see startups like n26 doing a great job, being fair with you by not charging you by the service, providing you top class support, great app, online banking, and so on, you should, at least, give it a try. Think about it.

reply: Hey Prash, As a bank we must comply with all legal and regulatory obligations. Following these regulatory processes, we periodically conduct reviews of our accounts. name: Rififille
title: Ravie depuis septembre 2017
content: Cliente depuis septembre 2017 avec un compte standard qui me coûte 0€ je n'ai encore jamais été déçue. Grâce à N26 en compte secondaire j'économise les 42€ par an de la carte bleue (résiliée) du compte principal Français. Les virements, les paiements, les retraits (5 gratuits par mois) tout fonctionne à merveille. Si je n'avais pas un crédit immobilier en cours je quitterais ma banque Française sans aucune hésitation pour faire de N26 mon compte principal. Les seuls inconvénients pour le moment sont : de faire accepter sans difficultés les RIB N26 pour des prélèvements, le refus n'étant pourtant absolument pas légal (Union Européenne) et d'avoir à déclarer chaque année aux impôts un compte à l'étranger. Maintenant reste à voir dans la durée si les conditions N26 resteront toujours aussi favorables.
