title: DO NOT TRUST THIS BANK WITH YOUR MONEY
content: DO NOT TRUST THIS BANK WITH YOUR MONEY! I transferred my hole monthly wage to this bank of more than £1,000 nearly 2 months ago now and I still haven’t received my money! Now I recieve an email this morning stating my account is closed with no reason or any notice what so ever! But no talk about my missing money! Even pay pal have done a payment investigation that shows my wages are with N26 but they have kept them! It’s disgsuting! Do not open a bank account with N26 I am now going to be taking legal action and sew them as I have waited 2 months for my money and they still haven’t contacted me to give it back ! Disgusting do not use !!!!!!!
reply: Hey Saffron,As a bank we must comply with all legal and regulatory obligations. Following these regulatory processes, we periodically conduct reviews of our accounts. We have the responsibility to run routine checks on transactions (see GwG § 10). These checks are based on individual transactions and are automatically initiated by our systems. There are strict laws and regulations that govern these compliance checks and specifically prevent us from giving out detailed information about them. We promise you that it is being worked on as quickly as possible and we’ll endeavour to update you as soon as we can. Rest assured, once the review on your account is complete, an agent will contact you.Best,Your N26 Support Team

content: Ayant pratiqué d'autres banques, traditionnelles ou en ligne, N26 est une solution simple et efficace. Je dispose d'un compte de premier niveau. Lors de la perte de ma carte bancaire j'ai pu effectué un verrouillage. Après l'avoir retrouvé, je l'ai déverrouillée et me suis assuré que tout se passait bien sur mon compte le mois suivant. Pour mon compte traditionnel : opposition, 10 jours avant d'avoir une nouvelle carte et des frais ! Ce n'est qu'un exemple mais au quotidien, avec des outils de gestion diversifiés, une ergonomie simple et intuitive, je suis satisfait de mon choix.

reply: Hey Rehan,As a bank we must comply with all legal and regulatory obligations. Following these regulatory processes, we periodically conduct reviews of our accounts. We have the responsibility to run routine checks on transactions (see GwG § 10). These checks are based on individual transactions and are automatically initiated by our systems. name: Chris de Jong
title: Very good bank
content: N26 is a very good alternative to most banks, giving you a free debit Mastercard which can be used with no conversion fees abroad which is a big improvement. On setup, the system could, for some reason, not send me an SMS with a code to pair my phone to my account. It meant I had to wait until my card arrived (quicker than expected) so support could handle the job, and they did! I'm very happy to be able to use it and for future travels I can only imagine how easy and cheap it is going to be!

content: A tutti coloro che hanno problemi con conti correnti bloccati N26, contattate con fiducia plus@ilsole24ore-"punto"-com.Vi spiegheranno tutto l'iter da intraprendere senza cacciare un centesimo.Grandi professionisti e persone cortesissime.

name: Devendra Kumar
title: Its Easy - To FRUSTRATE you - not for banking
content: I had a simple issue to add my phone number to my account. Without which i can not even transact anything online ( Basically useless account online ). Just for the basic issue which any bank in the world would take a few minutes, N26 has not been able to resolve it since 2 weeks. I mean seriously, it is the level of your online banking. How could you be sure about the security of it when the data executives take 2 weeks to add a phone number. I am frustrated to tell this thing to every customer care executive and in the end i get a message that the isue is escalated and nothing happens after even 2 weeks. Now the money would be blocked as i cant transfer any money without my phone number linked to my phone. You can not even talk verbally to any customer care executive unless you have their paid account of Black card. You cant even chat to them 24x7. To be honest my friend uses a DKB and its just way way beyond N26. In my experience if you want an example where you should not have an account is N26. Avoid it the best you can. Seriously Dissapointed.

name: Chiraz
title: Remboursement sans explication
content: Enfin mes sous me sont rendus ! Pour rappel compte bloqué le 6 mai, clôturé le 20.J ai envoyé CDI, Rib à mon nom et numéro fiscal.Remboursement effectué le 4.6.2019.Seul point noir qui reste, aucune explication CLAIR n'est FOURNI... mise à part l'article 19.3 que je ne comprends....
reply: Ciao Domenico, grazie per il feedback.N26 è una banca: come tale dobbiamo attenerci alle normative internazionali e esaminare e chiudere dei conti bancari nel momento in cui ci siano delle violazioni nei termini d'utilizzo.Abbiamo inoltre bisogno di qualche tempo per terminare tutte le verifiche necessarie a norma di legge.Nel caso ci fossero dubbi non esitare a contattarci.Buona giornata.

name: Gordon Ryan
title: Excellent
content: Excellent! Quick and easy Banking. Easy account set up. Set up my account on my phone, in less than 10 mins I had a new bank account. All the functions you'd expect, plus new ones I'm still exploring on the app. Had my Debit card in 8 days, had my BIC and IBAN within the 1st hour, was able to change all my direct debits once I had this. I'm still amazed how quick transactions are, I always know how much is in my account, No waiting days for Irish banks to update transactions, I get notifications as I walk out of shops for purchases I've just made. I recently paid a bill online and got a notification form N26 before the companies website confirmation page came up, its that quick. Customer service is very German quick and efficient, can't complain about that.I'm still finding new stuff to try but so far I'm delighted with them.

name: Sarah
title: Very easy to open an account
content: Very easy to open an account. Friendly advice when needed. Easy to navigate round the app & website. Who needs high street banks?
reply: Hey Devendra,Thanks for getting in touch! We are sorry to hear this issue has not been resolved yet.  We are very committed in making this right! We have sent you an email. Could you please take a look? Thank you. Best,Your N26 Team

name: ogundiran titilayo
title: Banking made easy.

name: Keeyan Nejad
title: Doesn't support the most basic functions
content: I really wanted to like N26 and to be able to use it as my primary account but it's just not possible.It doesn't support the most basic banking functions which I would expect on any bank account (this is all for UK accounts as of 2019-06-03):* Direct debit is not supported* No overdraft* No standing orders* Cannot save recipient details: This shocked me. It's such an easy feature to add. When I send money to a friend I expect it to be able to remember the contact details so I can use them again in the future.Finally the big selling point for me was that they supposedly had a fully functional website which I could use to send money and view my transaction history (most challenger banks for some reason don't have this). It turns out this isn't completely true. To send a transaction you still need to confirm on your phone which makes it quite pointless since the reason I want a website is for when I don't have access to my phone.To end on a positive note: The set up was fast and easy and the support is good. Their app looks pretty as well (although feature wise it could also use quite a bit of improvement).I will look at N26 again next year and I hope they have fixed all of these issues. If they have then I will gladly give them another try. Oh well, back to a traditional bank for now it seems :(EDIT: Reply to N26When I contacted your support I was told that direct debit was not supported (about a month ago). Well I guess that's one less thing stopping me from using N26.As for the security of paired devices; a phone is not necessary more secure than a computer. Most banks are fine with using a computer without the phone, I see no reason why N26 should be any different. Also if you want extra security you could use a standard like OTP (e.g. with Google Authenticator) that way it is up to the customers if they want to have the app installed on their phone and if they want to have the OTP credentials on other devices like their computers.

title: Great card for holidays
content: This card is brill if travelling to non euro destinations. Great exchange rates and no flat minimum fees for withdrawing cash in USA or U.K. I simply put my holiday cash on this account and withdraw as needed - saves having to get currency in advance. Rates are very fair. ( I bring a credit card or two as well just in case. !) finally I like that you get an immediate notification to your phone/ipad on any spends. There really is no downside - well maybe one - you can only have one card per account.

Only issue is that some ATM’s won’t accept the cards nor will Pay at the pumps facility in petrol stations     Recently Sainsburys decided to exclude N26 cards for no apparent reason    Overall I’m very happy with N26

reply: Hey Giuseppe,Thanks for your feedback.All domestic and international SEPA transfers are completed within one banking day. However, due to the opening times of the participating banks, one banking day may stretch to two working days. Keep in mind that if a transfer has been made right before a weekend or bank holiday, the time frame will be extended.  Regarding our insurance offer. You can read more here: https://n26.com/en-eu/legal-documents/blackIf you have any further queries you can contact our insurance partner Allianz directly. They will be more than happy to help!You can find our pricing list on our support center. Here is the link: https://support.n26.com/read/000001252?locale=en We pride ourselves on our service, and are always looking to improve it. We value our customers and understand how important it is to offer exceptional service. Best,Your N26 Team

name: Emanuelle Morris
title: Stolen money from cancer patient
content: The customer service know I suffer from stage 4 cancer , the thing with stage 4 cancer to note is there isn't a stage 5. I had sold some belongings on eBay , transferred the money into my new account from PayPal  to find it never arrived . N26 see it and keep giving me excuse after excuse , I've been waiting 6 weeks and really need the money. The customer service personal are useless. If indeed its not AI.They are using our money as cashflow for the business , how do I know, my son used to work for them. Totally disgusted and have reported them to police and I am also taking out a legal action against them. I have it on good advice their UK division will be shut down in the next few weeks , if you have money in this bank get it out quick.They are very bad people , the 2 directors are dishonest men, I hope you sleep well in your beds , soon it will be a prison cell.Isn't it amazing that after a negative review , they post some crap that there service is amazing from first time posters , again proof that this company is just a Fraud and a front for something much more sinister.Lets get together and send a message that this will not be tolerated .If they will steal what little money I have with my health, they will steal and screw anyone over .......you have been warned....................Eman xx
reply: Hey Emanuelle. Thanks for taking the time to pass on your feedback. We appreciate that this is an extremely challenging  situation. We are taking your message very seriously.  We pride ourselves on giving our 100% every day to ensure that our customers’ needs are being met. We do our best to train each of our representatives on how to properly handle our customers’ issues, including how to escalate problems that they are unable to assist with. We are committed to making this right. Could you please reach out to us via our Live Chat Support? You can do this directly within the mobile app and WebApp or from certain Support Center articles about opening an account. An agent will be glad to help out!Best, Your N26 Support Team

reply: Bonjour,Sur un support public tel que TrustPilot, nous ne pouvons vous communiquer d'informations personnelles sur votre compte pour des raisons de protection de vos données. Nous envoyons donc ce lien relatant les raisons pour lesquelles un compte bancaire peut être fermé. Si votre compte est bloqué, alors vous avez reçu un email comprenant des instructions que nous vous invitons à suivre. Le Service Client ne pourra pas vous communiquer plus d'informations et la communication s'effectuera désormais par le biais de cet email. Nous vous remercions de votre compréhension sur ce point.Salutations,Votre équipe N26.

name: Marc

content: J'avais des ÉNORMES doutes a propos de n26. J'ai hésité a ouvrir un compte mais au final je ne regrette pas. Un système d'identification rapide. Cela a pris 5 minute un samedi soir et un service live chat tout aussi rapide. Je connais pas beaucoup de livechat dispo le samediCarte reçu en 3 jours Ma plus grande crainte était sur ces fameux blocage de compte mais après de longues recherche je suis plus serein. La plupart des comptes bloqué son du a une non déclaration du compte au impôt ou a des transferts d'argent froduleux (transféré 10000 euro pour acheter une voiture au pays bas quand on est français c'est assez louche) ou des gens qui utilisait leur compte personnel pour leur entrepriseOn peut s'en servir comme banque courante si on a un faible revenu sans soucis. Mais je pense que pour des plus gros revenu une banque traditionnelle reste meilleure

name: Emi
title: Bardzo szybkie założenie konta
content: Bardzo szybkie założenie konta, bez znajomości języka każdy sobie poradzi. Weryfikacja poprzez zdjęcie dowodu osobistego. Konto bezpieczne od zajęć egzekucyjnych. Przy założeniu warto wpisać kod promocyjny :miroslag3671a można otrzymać kilka euro na start

name: Simon
title: N26 has been the easiest bank to sign…
content: N26 has been the easiest bank to sign up to, to use and to talk to without waiting in queues, answers are always clear and while I would not recommend to all, I would say explore more, its a great bank for me. It's an easy to use system that I see other banks adopting parts of and for my business purposes, they are No 1. I'll continue to use use them through thick and thin while they still support me. I know they had some issues; but haven't all the banks back in the UK (PPI) costing them billions, I think N26 is still evolving and as long as my money is secure and I don't do anything stupid it will always be a service that I will bank with (N26) and promote to whom I believe it would be relevant and of benefit to. They are backed by the government and covered like back in the UK under the FSCA so unless you have millions what have you got to lose?

name: Shoseph Stoppa
title: Good. Not yet great.
content: Been using the black service for a few months now and the functionality is almost perfect.The text alerts and the ability to create several savings pots are awesome.And the benefits received are beyond what the high street banks would offer.Would be 5 stars if they focused more on features like savings payees rather than apple pay.

name: S Sewell
title: Useless for the UK
content: Same experience as Rokas.Not possible to have an IBAN if you live in the UK. I'm annoyed because they don't make it clear and online chat people don't know about it so I wasted my time applying. Found getting help pretty painful too.
reply: Hey S,We do not offer an IBAN with UK accounts, as we opted to use an account number and sort code for transfers. If you need to send or receive money in a currency other than GBP, we recommend using TransferWise to do so: https://transferwise.com/This is a feature which is integrated into our European app for simple foreign currency transfers, and we hope to extend this to the UK in future.Best Regards,Your N26 Support Team

name: Simon  Morozov
title: Super
content: Super  et très pratique

name: Rokas Lučinskas
title: Only good if you have the 'right' nationality. *cough* racist *cough*
content: I wanted to create a Spanish account and was asked to share personal data (including my nationality) and was asked to download the app to only find out that I am not eligible for the bank account.I have an EU passport, UK settled status, UK driving license, Spanish social security number and NIE.I am shocked that I could not open an account with this 'future of banking' app. It feels like only some 'correct' and 'right' nationalities are supported which is total nonsense - if it's EU supported, it's EU supported. Lithuanian passports are up with the most secure international documents as well as UK driving license is.On top of all this the technology makes no sense if it makes you to waste time fill in all the personal data and then tells you, 'sorry you can't use me'. When i spoke to customer service they couldn't even find my account and said that I do not exist as a customerI hope all my personal data is handled well and will be deleted immediately as per new GDPR regulations.P.S. customer service representative was very helpful and apologetic, it's unfair to put your employees in such situations.
reply: Hey Rokas,We regret to learn you feel this way. As a bank, we need to know who you are. That’s why you have to prove your identity with a supported passport or ID card. At this time your documents are not supported for verification. We cannot accept all Passports nor National ID cards. This may be due to the lack of security features that appear on some documents or that the document is not accepted for verification at this time. We are constantly seeking to add documents to our verification list of supported documents. You can check via this link if your document is supported: https://support.n26.com/en-gb/getting-started/account/how-to-prove-my-identityYou can send us an email or contact us via our live chat support so we can delete your sign up attempt. Best Regards,Your N26 Support Team

name: Federico Greco
title: Servizio Fenomenale
content: Ho N26 Metal, servizio sempre al Top. L'assistenza è sempre pronta ad aiutarti

name: Rodrigo Ferrari
title: Good service
content: Good service, its a perfect system that cares about your money, very high technology and easy.

name: Alexandre Stephan
title: Compte N26 avec carte N26 métal je…
content: Compte N26 avec carte N26 métal je recommande pas cher pour toutes l’es assurance comprise, numéros de téléphone dédier. C’est un vrai plaisir  et la MasterCard métal très très chic

name: Andrew
title: Account closing without no reason
content: One day, out of nowhere, you will receive an email that we are terminating your account without any reasons. Customer support has no real human, all are handled by bots, so no real help. bots keep on repeating the same line.And if you think I did something. So, they are terminating my account, it's wrong, I know more than 10 people who account has been terminated on the same day with the same email. I am pretty sure this reply is also from bot.
reply: Hi Andrew,As a licensed bank, we are obliged to abide by European banking processes. This means we must carry out regular checks on user accounts and transactions. Sometimes, the result of these checks mean that we must end our business relationship with you. In the event this happens, we aim to contact you as soon as possible to inform you of the decision we have made.When you are connected to a customer support agent, you are speaking with a human in live-time rather than a bot. As these checks are carried out by a dedicated internal department, customer support are unable to advise further on the topic for this reason. We kindly ask you to reply to the email you would have received from us with any questions you may have.Best Regards,Your N26 Support Team

name: Audrey Jean-baptiste
title: Ça commence à être du n'importe quoi…
content: Ça commence à être du n'importe quoi chez eux tu peux plus parler à un conseiller au téléphone ils te renvoient sur le live chat ou la communication est mauvaise.Les remboursement n'apparaissent pas sur le compte. C'est dommage en peux de temps le service se dégrade Chez eux.Ce n'est plus ce que c'était avant
reply: Bonjour, merci d'avoir pris le temps d'écrire un commentaire.Nous sommes navrés que le LiveChat ne vous convienne pas. Nos clients ont choisi ce canal de communication comme étant leur moyen favori de nous joindre. La ligne téléphonique est réservée aux comptes Metal.Concernant les remboursement, ces derniers figurent tout le temps (dans un délai de 12 jours) dans vos relevés bancaires. Afin d'accéder à ces derniers, rendez vous dans votre application et cliquez sur votre solde. Vous pourrez en suite télécharger vos relevés par mois correspondants. Nous espérons que cette réponse vous a aidé.Salutations,Votre équipe N26.

name: Efthymios
title: Excellent Help desk
content: Excellent Help desk, very convenient app interface. Thank you very much

name: Frederico Maia Arantes
title: Awesome app
content: Awesome app, great customer service. The best bank I ever had.

name: Colin Klijmij
title: Bank of the Future
content: I have had this bank for just over a year now. It has changed the way I do my shopping, both locally and online. Because it is originally a German bank, it works with a lot of international products and services that my native (Dutch) banks don't generally support.Overall a great, simple bank with a very good totally free service without hidden fees, and great options for a more premium experience, if that is what you desire.

name: Younes Dabouz
title: Sincèrement c'est la meilleure banque…
content: Sincèrement c'est la meilleure banque en ligne avec un service de conseil rapide et présent mieux qu'une banque traditionnelle, bravo l'équipe

name: Bruno Huerta
title: Disappointing
content: Disappointing - Lots of hidden fees (new card 6€, of course, a cheap poor quality card will break at some point - others bank issue a second card for free)- 3 € for a return debt (my home bank where I get my sallary charges only 0,68 €)- Once a SEPA is done you can't cancel it, even if it is a few minutes after it is done. Again, my home bank would do it in a few minutes without any hassle. - No real customer service. Agents have no clue what they are doing and most understand nothing about banking For a second account great. Never as a main bank account. It is an account to play with, not to suit your daily needs.
reply: HI Bruno, thanks for taking the time to let us know. We take this sort of feedback very seriously, so we will be passing this on for you. Outlining where you think we can improve helps us to prioritise where we need to improve, so we appreciate this. Best,Your N26 support team.

name: Loc6M3
title: Meilleure banque en ligne.
content: N26 est franchement une très bonne banque.Il font tout ce qui est annoncé, ni plus ni moins. J'apprécie particulièrement le fait de pouvoir régler le plafond de ma carte bancaire directement depuis mon téléphone et sans délais. 'Sans délais', c'est aussi comme ça que je qualifierais mes transaction avec cette banque. Je suis titulaire d'un compte dans une banque traditionnelle et mes transactions (entrantes ou sortantes) mettent toujours du temps à s'afficher sur mon compte alors qu'avec N26, quand je paye en carte, le lecteur de carte ne m'autorise pas encore à retirer ma carte que j'ai déjà reçu la notification de payement (c'est véridique). Pareil pour les virements entrants, je les reçois considérablement (1 à 2 jours en avance selon jours ouvrables) plus vite avec N26 qu'avec mon autre banque.N26 ne sera jamais ma banque "d'épargne", et ce n'est pas leur ambition), cependant pour les opérations courantes, je pense ne jamais revenir à mon autre banque. Aussi je précise, je n'ait jamais (ô grand jamais) déboursé un seul centimes pour quelque service que ce soit (la carte est gratuite, pas de frais de compte) et je suis client depuis plus de deux ans.

name: Simone
title: Best mobile bank
content: Best mobile bank, N26 will replace traditional bank completely soon, for everyone.

name: Fadhel Guedri
title: True Mobile Bank Account Experience
content: True Mobile Bank Account Experiencethe verification process went smoothlythe customer service are easy to reach and very helpfulHighly recommendedThank you

name: Mark Little
title: By far the easiest and most thorough…
content: By far the easiest and most thorough bank I have dealt with

name: Agate Nicolò
title: Mi hanno chiuso il conto senza un…
content: Mi hanno chiuso il conto senza un motivo preciso, perlomeno non lo dicono in più ti danno pochi giorni per rientrare in possesso dei fondi, ma qui arriva il bello, il conto è bloccato e non puoi fare nulla, non rispondono alle mail di sollecito e non so più cosa fare, chi è nella stessa situazione?
reply: Ciao, ci spiace per l'inconveniente causato dalla chiusura del conto. in quanto banca con effettiva licenza bancaria europea (BCE) N26 è soggetta alle normative bancarie in vigore. Lo scopo di queste norme è quello di garantire la protezione dei clienti.Se il tuo account N26 è bloccato, hai ricevuto di certo una mail con le informazioni e la procedura da seguire. Per ulteriori dubbi non esitare a consultare questo articolo: https://mag-it.n26.com/conto-n26-bloccato-ti-spieghiamo.Per motivi di privacy non ci è possibile fornire informazioni aggiuntive o relative ai differenti casi.

name: Philippe Maitre
title: J'ai utilisé la carte pour la première…
content: J'ai utilisé la carte pour la première fois pour un déplacement pro à Singapour, tout a fonctionné parfaitement. Chaque paiement était disponible instantanément sur le compte avec les conversions SGD->EUR, ça m'a donné envie de l'utiliser plus souvent !

name: Mariam BelAmi
title: Banque fiable
content: J'utilise ce compte pour virer mon salaire j'utilise ma carte au quotidien er je n'y ai jamais eu aucun souci et si j'en rencontre un, un agent via le chat m'aide à le régler très rapidement, merci à vous!

name: flavio

name: Moosavi Keywan
title: N26 à FUIR! une catastrophe
content: 0 sur toute la ligne!quand je lis les autres avis négatifs, je comprends mieux.3 semaines et toujours aucunes réponse de N26.. on est loin des "2 jours ouvrés maximum annoncé".publicité mensongère, dire que c'est ça qui gère notre argent!A FUIR de toute urgence !
reply: Bonjour, votre demande a déjà été remontée au département des vérifications.La vérification de vos documents d'identité prend plus de temps en raison de l'afflux de nouveaux utilisateurs. Nous vous prions de nous excuser pour le délai supplémentaire. Vous serez notifié depuis l'application N26 lorsque ce sera fini.Salutations,Votre équipe N26.

name: Disgruntled Customer

content: My two negative experience:1) N26 does not work on INGENIUE shop/petrol payment processor. I'd an an embarrassing incident whereby I could not pay for my fuel as the transaction kept saying declining, giving the message "Transaction Void" on the receipt.Humiliating and stress you do not need.2)Recently, N26 has become autonomous and decides when it feels like giving you access to your cash when using the ATM. You may get your cash or pay not get declined as if you have insufficient fund.Not my cup of tea. Putting it to the side for now.

name: Wouter Zijlstra

name: MR
title: Great banking experience
content: The app works great and life chat tends to answer within less than a minute.

name: Pol Smith
title: Money blocked for crypto, they won't give money back
content: Hi,This is a warning for people wanting to open an account with N26.I am Pol Smith. My N26 Credit Card ID is XXXMy IBAN is XXXMy date of birth XXX (information removed due to N26 security issues)My account has been cancelled in an extremely unfair way. I don't know exactly why N26 decided my account to be cancelled, but I think it must be due to having transferred funds to Coinbase (cryptocurrencies exchange), which was the last wire transfer I tried to do. This transfer was intended to do on 15.05.2019 for the amount of 1,366.27 EUR, and it bounced back the same day. 2 days later, on 17.05.2019, my N26 bank account was blocked and I haven't had access to my money since then.N26 says they run a "routine check" on accounts to "keep accounts secure". However, they never end the "investigation" while they keeping the money unaccessible on the account.In any case - according to this Cancellation Email, my account will remain functional up until 31.05.2019, so I should move my full balance before that. Here is an extract from this email:---This termination is effective as of: 31.05.2019 Your account remains functional until the stated date. After termination, usage of the account, the app, as well as the card issued with it, is no longer possible. We would like to make sure your remaining funds get transfered to you. Please transfer your funds to an alternative bank account before the date of termination. ---Contrary to what the Cancellation Email says, my N26 account and my N26 credit card have not been functional since then, and therefore I haven't been able to withdraw nor use or transfer my money out of the N26 account.After having told this issue to N26 several times by email, live chat, Facebook, Twitter and Instagram, now N26 are not doing anything in order to give me my money back. They don't let me transfer my money out, the credit card and the account are totally blocked (note it's note 31.05.2019 yet) and N26 email support is not transferring my funds to an alternative bank account even though I sent them the IBAN, BIC and an official proof for my alternative bank account to be mine. I sent these document 7 days ago and about 5 times since then, and still no reply.Live chat has told me my account is "under investigation" and "being worked on by the appropriate department". However, there is no estimated date, days pass by and there is no estimated day, not even an email or update.I followed the steps mentioned on the page "How to file a Complaint" from N26 website, but that doesn't seem to make N26 really work on my case or resolve the case either.N26 say "we must close an account after these checks have been completed". In reality, what N26 does is not answering any emails and keep saying they are "investigating my case". Seems this "investigation process" will never end.N26 say they are "regulated and licensed bank, we are obliged to adhere to European banking processes. We don't close accounts without a good reason". However, real and non-fraudulent banks don't cancel accounts for trying to make a transfer to a cryptocurrency exchange like Coinbase, like it happened to me. N26: is trying to make a transfer to Coinbase a really good reason for which a bank should cancel and block all access to the money from a user, not letting the customer transfer it out?N26 says "We endeavour to contact you as soon as possible to inform you of our decision". However, in reality they have no phone number to contact, they don't reply emails and by live chat they just say to have "no further information" and just close the chat. Whenever I messaged N26 that this was very urgent as I needed my full balance (2,366.27 EUR) in my account as soon as possible, they either didn't reply or said I should wait to get an email (which never arrives).I think the only way to make N26 reply to me might be writing this review (at least, I might get an automated reply as they do with all Trustpilot reviews). Or better, maybe the only and "real" solution to get money back might be contacting Ombudsmand, Bafin, etc.EDIT #1: N26 did reply to this review. According to their reply, I removed sensitive information (Credit card Id,  IBAN and date of birth) of my N26 account in this review. They also mentioned they cant provide further information in here. However, they are not providing information on any channel either,  since I am not being answered by email either.EDIT #2: (27.05.2019) I just received an email from N26 with the following text:---Hey Pol,Thanks for getting in touch!I can confirm that we have received your document with your bank details and we already have a dedicated Team handling it now. We will contact you as soon as we have completed this process.We will try to be as brief as possible, we appreciate your patience.---EDIT #3 (28.05.2019) I just received an email from N26 with the following text:---Dear Pol, Thank you for your emails. Please be assured we continue to work on your case. As this is a complicated and complex process, it will take time for us to resolve. Nevertheless, we have requested this case to be prioritised and will update you as soon as we have more information. I sincerely appreciate your continued patience. We will be in touch again soon. Kindest Regards,N26 Complaints Management---EDIT #4 (31.05.2019)My account has been fully cancelled. I cannot log into my account anymore, it says "Bad Credentials" now.I still haven't received a reply from N26 by email.Live chat says they have "no further information". They cannot even tell me who should I contact or if my case is being worked on: they just close the chat.I sent another email to N26 (I already sent Support, VIP and Complaints department team about 20 emails).---I will keep updating this review until I receive my money back

name: WEIDONG REN
title: Convenient and speedy.
content: The account opening is speedy.Services are kind, fast and efficient.
reply: Hi Pol,We kindly ask that you remove the sensitive account and card information that you have included in your review, in the interest of security. This review is publicly viewable and it is not secure to include details such as these in your post.We understand the concern you have for the status of your account and the remaining funds, but we are unable to discuss sensitive information relating to your N26 account via this platform.Best Regards,Your N26 Support Team

name: Hermann Anago

content: Bonjour Je veux juste savoir si un compte N26 est clôturé  et que sans le savoir je lance un virement sur le compte quel serait la situation de cette translation ?

name: R.

name: El Riccson
title: Schlechteste Bank
content: Schlechteste Bank, welche es hier gibt!- Karten funktionieren oft nicht bzw. werden nicht erkannt- Rückrufe erfolgen nicht, obwohl Sie versprochen wurden (an denjenigen, der hier Bewertungen beantwortet: Es bringt dann auch nichts bzw. RR erfolgen nicht, wenn der Support mehrfach darauf angesprochen wird!)- Kunden werden offensichtlich angelogen und auch darauf keine Reaktion Das ganze Verhalten ist selbstverständlich bei der BaFin gemeldet.Fazit: Bank kündigt Konten lieber als auf Probleme einzugehen.Lasst die Finger von dieser Bank!!!!!!!

name: Fatma
title: Easy banking, cool team
content: The team has always been helpful when I needed them. The app, however, could be improved. Maybe because I don't use the newest phone confirming a payment is sometimes an issue.

name: Dora
title: Betrug -sperrt Konto Support gibt keine Auskunft
content: Mir ist es ähnlich ergangen wie bereits sehr vielen hier auch. Der Support ist unterirdisch schlecht. Mitarbeiter geben oder können keine Auskunft erteilen man wird vertröstet und es heißt die Fachabteilung meldet sich, doch das passiert leider nicht. Mein Konto wurde im Januar eingefroren und auch bereits aufgelöst. Doch mein Guthaben habe ich bis heute nicht erhalten vier stellig. War beim Anwalt und unter hoher verscheinlichkeit hat die Bank eine verdachtsanzeige erstattet. So und nun heißt es warten.....

name: Andreea Zhao
title: not good when relocating to another…
content: not good when relocating to another country as you have to end your account and start another one in that county's currency

name: Jorge
title: Excelente
content: Simples, fácil e seguro!
reply: Hey Andreea, We offer our accounts throughout Europe: in Germany, Austria, Ireland, France, Spain, Italy, the Netherlands, Belgium, Portugal, Finland, Luxembourg, Slovenia, Estonia, Greece, Slovakia, the UK, Poland, Sweden, Denmark, Norway, Liechtenstein and Iceland. If you were to have a Euro account and move permanently to the UK you will not be able to keep your Euro account. You would need to sign up for a GBP account. Thank you for your understanding. Best,Your N26 Support Team

name: Lola75
title: Meilleure banque en ligne !
content: Meilleure banque en ligne !Disponibilité des agents, peu de frais à l étranger, carte valable partout et tout se fait en ligne ! Zéro bug: Bravo !

name: A M
title: They closed my account after 1 year with no exchuse
content: They kept my money and do not tell me the reason they closed my account! A bunch of thieves!

name: Valentin
title: Trust the negative reviews
content: If you’re reading this please don’t open an account with them. It’s true that the app is beautiful and making an account is (way too) easy. But it just happened to me like so many other people here that they cancelled my account for no reason. No answering to my emails, no answers on the chat, no numbers to call. I had a black account where I bought things that I could get insurance for and now I can’t get an extra insurance because too much time passed since the moment of buying them. DO NOT GET AN ACCOUNT. Consider yourselves warned, they don’t care about any of their clients (and I had a black account, so not even the paying ones)
reply: Hi,As a bank we must comply with all legal and regulatory obligations.  Following these regulatory processes, we periodically conduct reviews of our accounts. We have the responsibility to run routine checks on transactions (see GwG § 10). These checks are based on individual transactions and are automatically initiated by our systems. Once the review is complete an agent will contact you regarding your access to the account. Best,Your N26 Team

name: Cornelis Kleinbloesem
title: nightmare bank, with glossy tech look
content: They just block your account and are not able to give you any reason.Trying to get my money back but this seems to be a hard job. Customer service is not able to help and email correspondence is one way traffic, they don’t answer.....Avoid this bank if you can, theoretically everything is great, in practice it is a nightmare, Ps now we are 2 more weeks ahead, still no response on email, no money returned NOTHING They are very fast to respond on trustpilot with standard phrases, meaning nothing and just sentences from the Textbook of diplomacy.....
reply: Hi Valentin,N26 is obliged to carry out regular routine checks on user accounts and transactions. We follow these processes to ensure that our user accounts are kept secure. In some cases, we must close an account after these checks have been completed. As a regulated and licensed bank, we are obliged to adhere to European banking processes. We don't close accounts without a good reason, and we do our best to prevent bad situations for the people affected. We endeavour to contact you as soon as possible to inform you of our decision.We understand your query and the concern you may have for the status of your account, but for your own security, we are unable to provide detailed information and support through here. We hope this can be resolved for you in a timely manner.Best Regards,Your N26 Support Team

name: Stefan Vidakovic
title: GENERAL REVIEW
content: Registration and opening of account was a bit difficult. Some of "identification experts" are arrogant, but there are polite ones too. I would recommend that they have some kind of identification in front of them (number or a name) so that we can send a feedback about their performance. I tried to use CASH26 option to deposit some cash on my account in one of DM stores in Germany. Salesman had no idea what I am talking about. I presume that it takes a bit of time until all N26 partners are accustomed to this. I contacted a support service ones and I was satisfied with informations they provided for me. Overall, I would say that this bank is promising. However, there is a space for improvement.
reply: Hi Cornelis,We apologise for any inconvenience that you have faced in relation to our decision to close your account. In accordance with European banking processes, we are obliged to carry out routine checks on accounts. Sometimes, the result of these checks show that an account must be closed.  An account is never blocked for no reason, and we aim to contact you as soon as possible to inform you of our decision and to advise you on the next steps.We understand the concern you may have for the status of your account, but for your own security, we are unable to provide detailed information and support through here. We kindly ask that you respond to the email you would have received from us with any queries you may have.Best Regards,Your N26 Support Team

name: Michael
title: Vorsicht! N26 Konten willkürlich ohne Grundangabe gesperrt! 2019
content: Vorsicht bei N26!!! Ich hatte mein Konto dort knapp 2 Jahre ohne grössere Probleme. Allerdings nur als Backup und als Kleingeldkonto. Kaum habe ich einen Betrag von 5000.- überwiesen, wurde mein Konto gesperrt, das Guthaben eingefroren und natürlich gab es keine Info dazu wo das Problem liegt. Der Kundenservice verweist auf eine E-Mail die nie ankam und beendet den Chat ohne weiteren Kommentar. Nach stundenlangem Chat Mitarbeiter nerven dass ich mich so nicht abspeissen lasse, wurde mir irgendwann zugesichert, das ich innerhalb einer Woche möglicherweise eine Information bekommen sollte. Für mich ist N26 gestorben. Die haben ja wohl einen Vogel - entweder habe ich zugriff auf mein Geld oder ich will im gleichen Moment wissen warum nicht und was ich fur Möglichkeiten habe das Problem zu lösen. Alles dazwischen gehört nicht zur Etikette einer seriösen Bank. Wer sein Geld gerne behalten möchte sollte die Finger von dem Verein lassen!Edit:Kurz darauf wurde das Konto meines Partners gekündigt mit dem selben E-Mail welches schon in mehreren Reviews erwähnt wurde. Da wurde angeblich ein erheblicher Verstoss gegen die AGBs festgestellt und das wars an erklärung seitens N26. Ich währe nicht besonders überascht wenn sich herausstellt, dass die Obersten die Kundengelder in Bitcoin verpacken und mit den Codes durchbrennen. Sieht alles so aus als ob die grad am Spenden einsammeln sind. Jedenfalls häufen sich die Meldungen.

name: Fernanda Elena Annetta
title: The best bank ever
content: The best bank ever. The app is really great and modern, it is easy for you to manage your account. Very friendly. Also the customer service is always there to help you in anything.

name: marian
title: Always get an answer by questions
content: Always get an answer by questions, people are friendly and helpful, transfers are mostly received the same day.Only negative is that some functions in the app are not good or easy to find still N26 works a lot better then the regular bank I used before.

name: customer
title: Génial a l'écoute des reponses a nos…
content: Génial a l'écoute des reponses a nos questions je le recommande a des amies douvrire un compte

name: Keywan MOOSAVI
title: Nul à tous les points de vue / bonne chance aux futurs clients !
content: Nul à tous les points de vue.cela fait presque 3 semaines que j'ai tenté d'ouvrir un compte chez N26.j'ai téléchargé l'application, envoyé les documents demandés et depuis plus rien!J'ai contacté le service client 3 fois, ils ne servent vraiment rien. ils ont un message type qui nous informe que le service est surchargé, et que le traitement est en cours...  et que le service concerné va revenir vers moi rapidement.1fois je veux bien, 2 fois je bien mais à chaque fois le même disque en boucle.Quand je vois ça, je les remercient juste de ne pas avoir ouvert mon compte, car je me dis que si un jour si j'ai un problème le service client ne me servira pas plus que ça, ils sont juste la pour brasser du vent!!! (même pas sur que le service soit en France)il y a d'autres Neo Banques qui je pense sont plus sérieuses et plus réactives avec je l'espère un service client digne d'une banque !Bonne chance aux futurs clients accrochez-vous, j’espère que vous n'aurez pas besoin du service client en cas de problèmes :-DMOOSAVI Keywan

name: Eric Pridz
title: Deleted my account without give me a…
content: Deleted my account without give me a reason.
reply: Bonjour, merci de votre retour.En raison d'un afflux de nouvelles inscription plus important que d'habitude, ouvrir un compte prend un peu plus de temps. Le Service Client a pourtant fait remonter votre demande dès que vous l'avez demandé. Dans le cas ou vous voudriez toujours ouvrir votre compte, vous recevrez un email informatif dès le processus terminé.Merci de votre compréhension.Salutations,Votre équipe N26.

name: William Oshinyemi
title: N26 are FRAUDS!
content: N26 has withheld my student loan for the past month with no good reasonsing! I have informed them and provided them with multiple screen shots and pdf file bank statements showing clearly that the money in question was received from Student Finance England, they have continued to have extremely poor response times and when they do respond, give no progress update, but say your documents are under review. Realistically how long does it take to read a bank statement, definitely not 1 month.This bank is a FRAUD!They have left me without any funds to pay my rent at university, making me have to rely on my parents for basic living expenses, even though there is an allocated amount of funds set aside for me by the government to live, but n26 think they should have the money. I have reported them to the Financial Ombudsman as my parents cannot give me money forever and I am a student living far from home with no financial stability as n26 has confiscated it from me.I just want my student loan back
reply: Hi Eric,Since N26 is a full-fledged banking institution, holding a European banking license since 2016, we must carry out regular routine checks on accounts. In some cases, these checks will indicate that the account must be closed. An account is never blocked for no reason, and we aim to contact you as soon as possible to inform you of our decision and advise you on the next steps.We apologise for any disappointment caused.Best Regards,Your N26 Support Team

name: Houachmi
title: J ai toujours été satisfait juste qu a…
content: J ai toujours été satisfait juste qu a ce jour j ai un problème qui n a pa ete régler et j ai aucune info et tous les jours j atends le problème c est que c est l argent que je perçois des allocations familiales le  RSA et je vous de mande s il vous plait de m aider merci
reply: Hi William,As a registered and licensed bank, holding a European banking license since 2016, we must abide by European banking processes when it comes to user accounts. Due to this, routine compliance checks are carried out on user accounts and transactions. The majority of the time, these checks are done very quickly, without you being able to see them. In some cases, we may require proof of origin for a transaction, and we are obliged to request this. We endeavour to contact you immediately, in the interest of resolving the issue in a timely manner. We apologise if this has not happened in your case.In the interest of account security, we are unable to provide detailed information and support through this channel. We hope that this can be resolved for you soon, and we will continue this correspondence via email.Best Regards,Your N26 Support Team

name: Larbi Zennaki
title: Parfaite banque .service client tout juste moyen
content: Le sytème que N26 fonctionne avec est exceptionnel.transfere IN/OUT rapide .tres bonne application  .securite .gratuité des services .avec une mastercard agréable avec des limites vraiment extraordinaires.L’etoile Qui manque en raison du service client .il est très loin derrière d’autres banques concurrentes .

name: Lucas Rios Rocha

content: Car avec la carte Mastercar est très utile dans les besoins de retraits des grosse sommes, tendis que chez les autres banques les plafonds de retrait sont limités pour une période de 7 jours, alors que chez N26 on a droit a 5 gros retrait dans le mois.

name: James Condon
title: Love it
content: Love it. Analytics.  Bots. Customer service.  It's all there

name: José Fco. González R.
title: Tengo 3 semanas intentando cerrar mi…
content: Tengo 3 semanas intentando cerrar mi cuenta en N26 y hasta hoy, no me han transferido el dinero a la cuenta que les he suministrado. El departamento de atención al cliente vía CHAT; no resuelve nada, si mandas email, te responden siempre lo mismo y no me dejan mas alternativas que hacer publica mi situación para ver si de alguna manera, logro me devuelvan los 1575€ que permanecen bloqueados en el banco. Jamás pensé que se pudiera tratar tan mal a un buen cliente que sencillamente pedía hacer una transferencia urgente de parte de “Mi dinero” y no hubo un solo funcionario de N26 que me solucionara el problema, obligándome indirectamente a cerrar la cuenta. Ahora sigo sin poder cumplir mi compromiso pendiente y con mi dinero bloqueado. En definitiva, UN DESASTRE!!!

name: Rehan Farooqui
title: They hold my wages asked invoices and…
content: They hold my wages asked invoices and utilities bill which I submitted every time my wages goes to account asked for invoices blocked my account send lots email no response chat was useless they know nothing robotic people my hard working wages still blocked. I will be contacting police this is my wages, very disappointing and very upsetting God help me
reply: Hi Rehan,We apologise for any upset this situation has caused you.We are obliged to conduct routine compliance checks on user accounts and transactions in accordance with European banking processes. In the event we require proof of its origin, we endeavour to contact you immediately to inform you of this, so as not to delay proceedings. This process is carried out by a dedicated internal department, and for this reason, customer service are unable to advise further.We understand the concern you may have for the status of your account, but we are unable to advise on account specifics via this channel. We will continue this correspondence via your registered email.Best Regards,Your N26 Support Team

name: Sandeep Golechha
title: A new banking solution
content: I like to solution to banking. They have a simple to use app and most things can be solved by customer service who do want to listen to you. There are a few things which they need to add to the service to get a higher rating and make them easier, which I have ben told baby customer service are coming:1) Saving the payment data and the reference - for regular payments it is a problem to keep putting in bank info. You want to be able to save it and then make the payment. Especially if this is a regular payment, such as a credit card or rent payment, which are typically larger value payments. I often send a small amount and then a larger amount once I know the funds have been received. It can be quite scary not being able to do this.2) Payments to large corporates - It would be good when making a transfer if the large corporate information could be searched so you don't have to go and put it in yourself. some banks have this info and I'm sure N26 could get that as well.3) Statements - a facility to get monthly statements emailed would be helpful as again I cant see how that can be done. This is important as bank statements become a proof of address as well.I believe this service is still new but the banking is very good and easy to setup and use. I recommend this to everyone but believe it will be much better once the above are done.

name: Jean-Michel Renault
title: Inscription très facile ( un peu plus…
content: Inscription très facile ( un peu plus des 8 minutes annoncées mais très rapide quand même) un service client très réactif dans le livechat pour le moment que du positif. À voir à l'usage mais je recommande N26

name: Moe Kawji
title: I love everything about this bank
content: I love everything about this bank. from the multifunctional card which is a debit card and a Visa card at the same time. customer support is easy and fast to reach. the only down thing is that not all people from multiple nationalities can open an n26 bank account. i got lucky i opened the account before it was mainstream but all my friends and family could not cause it has something to do with certain nationalities.

name: Shain Padmajan
title: It took me exactly 5 minutes to open…
content: It took me exactly 5 minutes to open and verify my account. The verification agent clearly explained his process and opening the account was a breeze. The app is user friendly and useful and the UX is just great. The customer service was just amazing!Everything about N26 was perfect except for their transaction time which is slightly more than other banks.

name: Nick Brown
title: Wouldn't allow me to open an account
content: Wouldn't allow me to open an account and no explanation given why... Customer service was very rude and unhelpful. Probably best not to open an account anyway with all the bad press I have just seen. ***AVOID***

name: Sylvain VISTE
title: Très bonne banque
content: Très bonne banque. Dans mon cas, il ne manque plus qu'avoir la possibilité d'avoir mes 2 comptes (perso et pro) chez eux, séparés comme le stipule la loi française pour les auto entrepreneur.

Si vous éte encore chez eux et qu’il vous est arrivé retiré tous vos sous avant d’etre Bloquer conseil de client !

title: You will loose your money!!!
content: its a joke of a bank. Think some rich kids are having a laugh.. they have done the app well. but that about it.poor customer servicepoor response timepoor checks / actions Having locked my account for over 2 months after chasing them for weeks I get an email ( a very generic email) asking for bank statement from where the payment was made from and statement of people I paid. Now I don't have to a genius to figure out I cant get other peoples bank statements so god knows what they are thinking.the customer service don't seem to have a clue to most answers they say someone will email you. I wouldn't use this bank again just trying to get my money out for the last 3 months.
reply: Hi Arsalan,We apologise for any inconvenience this situation has caused you. As a licensed bank, we are obliged to abide by European banking processes. This includes routine compliance checks on user accounts and transactions. In the event a transaction has been flagged in our system, and we require proof of its origin, we endeavour to contact you immediately to inform you of the next steps. This is carried out by a dedicated internal department, and for this reason, customer service are unable to advise further.You can learn more about our routine checks via our support center: https://support.n26.com/en-eu/getting-started/security/why-does-n26-do-checks-on-transactionsWe hope that this can be resolved for you in a timely manner.Best Regards,Your N26 Support Team

name: cedric vercruysse
title: Manque une étoile pour la publicité mensongère.
content: Recu la carte en 3 jours, les messages en temps réel lors de transactions, la gratuité et la rapidité du sav était extrêmement agréable. Toutefois, je suis très déçu de la publicité mensongère « payez avec Apple Pay partout ». Soit, la phrase est correcte, mais ne pas mentionner qu’il n’y a que quelques pays compatible était très décevant. Notamment luxembourg, y étant résident, il met impossible de configurer Apple Pay.

name: Bernard DURIEUX
title: Attention lors des locations de véhicules à l'étranger
content: Les informations tant en euros qu'en devises sans excellentes et immédiates. Le seul problème rencontré est que lors de "ventes à distance" 'ainsi sont qualifiées les locations de véhicules, le loueur peut débiter le montant de son choix sans besoin de mentionner aucun code (code PIN ou autre.......) Cela pose problème lorsque le montant excède celui que vous aviez négocié ! Il faut que N26 revoit ce procédé qui est vraiment frustrant surtout lorsque la location a eu lieu à 17 000 km de chez soit et que vous n'avez pas toutes les coordonnées ni l'avantage de parler couramment la langue du pays pour vous expliquer.

name: Lucas Lombard
title: It's one of the best banks for Euro accounts
content: I've been using N26 since 2016, and I have to say... It's one of the best banks for Euro accounts. The instant transaction history and balance is the top feature. I would recommand to anyone that is comfortable not having a physical location or does not need someone to talk to about finances. For me it's perfect. I hate having to deal with people telling me how to (not) spend my money, and N26 doesn't care at all about what I'm buying.

name: Vicente Junior Sombrelion
title: Je recommande
content: Pour être honnête je déteste les banques , mais là .. le service réponds vite , les transactions sont facile et efficace. Tout est simple et surtout pas de mauvaise surprise

title: user friendly
content: user friendly, card came fast, no issues with app or online banking, love the Spaces feature

name: schweiz
title: Konto wegen Überprüfung von Transaktionen gesperrt
content: am Donnerstag den 09.05. habe ich eine Mail erhalten, dass Sie mein Konto bzgl Überprüfung von Transaktionen gesperrt wurde. Dazu sei die Bank gesetzlich verpflichtet und in der Regel würde innerhalb 3 Tagen die Prüfung abgeschlossen.Heute haben wir den 21.05. und das Konto ist immer noch gesperrt. Ich habe Ihnen bereits 2 mal auf die Mail geantwortet und höre überhaupt nichts.Den Kontakt über die Chatfunktion könnten sie eigentlich direkt abstellen, hier gibt es 0,0 Hilfe. Ich weiß ja nicht, ob schon einmal einer der Mitarbeiter dort 2 Wochen ohne Konto auskommen musste? Hierbei sind mehrfach Zahlungen abgewiesen worden, weshalb mir Mahngebühren angefallen sind. Wer zahlt diese ???Und hierfür erhalte ich in 12 Tagen nicht einmal eine kurze Info wie der aktuelle Stand ist ?Ganz schwacher Service und absolut nicht empfehlenswert

name: Leonardo Mancini
title: Banca assolutamente da evitare

name: Rahem rezkeddine
title: ARNAQUE 26
content: ARNAQUE 26 - SUPPORT ZÉRO, BANQUE DOUBLE ZÉROelle va pas tarder a être licencier puis fermer cette soit disant banque , vu les plainte déposer contre elle.Aucun professionnalisme et surtout aucun respect du clientPlus de 7 requête sans réponsedès que tu laisse un commentaire qui ne leur plait il trouve un truc comme quoi sa vient du client l'erreur, WAW la parfaite banquesur le live chat il coupe direct sans te répondre.ils clôture les compte des gens sans raisons concrète puis il te disent de voir l'article 19- 3 ... ok t'assume l'annulation du compteils te demandent de leur envoyer un RIB au même nom pour viré les fonds puis ils donnent pas de réponse des semaine et des semaine , vous pouvez envoyer tant de requêtes a leur support sans réponseils font ce qu'il veulent , quand il veulent , il s'en foutent de la situation de leur clients.
reply: Bonjour, nous vous remercions d'avoir pris le temps d'écrire un commentaire.Dans l'email de fermeture que vous avez reçu, il vous est demandé d'envoyer un RIB à votre nom. Une fois ceci effectué, nous procéderons au transfert des fonds restants sur votre compte N26.Salutations,Votre équipe N26.

name: Emirio Ichigo
title: N26 super banque mais de mauvaise fois et service déplorable et honteux
content: N26 super banque mais de mauvaise fois! Pendant plus de 6 mois la gestion du compte était top jusqu’à jour où je reçois un mail de fermeture de compte et du coup impossible d’avoir accès ou même de récupérer les fonds!!!! Pire encore j’ai fournis tout un tas de documents prouvent que les revenues ne sont pas frauduleux ils m’envoient un mail avec un numéro de dossier et jamais de réponse. J’ai échanger sur le chat via internet et non pas l’applica La réponse c’est d’envoyer un RiB à mon nom, chose étant faite dès suite à cette échange je reçois encore un numéro de confirmation 05159169 et puis toujours rien j’ai plus de 2000€ qui on ne sait pas si je les reverrais un jour j’ai un loyer à payer une voiture et ses frais en locations et je me retrouve dans une situation très compromettante. Une honte à cette banque pour qui j’ai fait du bouche à oreille et parrainer des proches.
reply: Bonjour Rezkeddine,En tant que banque de plein exercice, N26 est soumise à la réglementation bancaire en vigueur. Cette dernière a notamment pour objectif d’assurer la protection des clients.Si vous respectez les conditions d’utilisation, vous ne rencontrerez aucun problème dans l’utilisation de votre compte N26.Vous pourrez davantage vous documenter en lisant cet article du Mag N26 :https://mag-fr.n26.com/compte-n26-bloqu%C3%A9-nous-vous-expliquons-pourquoi-ef27470083caSalutations,Votre équipe N26.

name: William Rabel
title: N26 en compte principale!?
content: L'ouverture du compte est très facile, vous avez la carte livré par Ups. Après l'interface de l'application est facile à prendre en main. A la base c'est pour un départ en Asie parce que c'est une carte très intéressante pour les paiements et retraits à l'étranger, actuellement au Japon et pour l'avoir utilisé il y a eu aucune surprise quand à des frais supplémentaires. J'ai eu un problème avec un prélèvement non autorisé sur mon compte et avec les personnes par chat ont à pu trouver une solution avec beaucoup de réactivité. Manque plus que quelques services pour changer de compte pour N26.

name: Benjamin Rotar

name: Francois
title: Great bank if you value speed and simplicity
content: Great bank if you value the philosophy that secure banking does not have to mean annoying-to-use  and slow banking. The web interface, as well as the app are clean, simple and easy to use. No ridiculously annoying procedures with little extra calculators you have to carry around. Biometrics is enough! No intervention of the bank needed for every little thing. International transfers are done and handled the same as local transfers and take 24h at the most within the SEPA domain.Support staff is easy and fast to reach through the chat function, but they can be a bit impatient sometimes and don't let you finish your question. Better type up your question before and then cut& past it in the chat window.I would recommend this bank to anybody living somewhere in the European Union and moves around a lot. No permanent residence address needed, just a valid passport or EU ID card.

name: Teresa Teresa
title: Straightforward
content: Full mobile, simple and easy, no fees, international transfers with Transferwise - which means cheaper than my regular bank, great user experience in the app and straightforward requests handling.

name: Damien Bonte
title: Excellent
content: Excellent, réactivité et simplicité !

name: Craig Buzzard
title: Great features and brilliant customer…
content: Great features and brilliant customer support.

name: Marcos Gennaro
title: Best bank ever

title: unzuverlässiger "Bank" mit erbärmlichem Support
content: Mir wurde mein Konto geschlossen, ohne mir einen Grund zu nennen, dies wurde schlicht per Mail 14 Tagen vor der Auflösung mitgeteilt. Ich vermute, dass ich eig. Opfer von einer der unzähligen Hackerangriffe bin, was mir aber nicht klar dargestellt wurde (in der Mitteilung steht, dass sie "einen erheblichen Verstoß gegen der Allgemeinen Geschäftsbedingungen festgestellt" haben). Die Geschäftsbedingungen hab ich mir ganz genau gelesen und ich es besteht einfach keine Möglichkeit, dass ich was dagegen getan habe.Somit wurde mir einfach den Zugang gesperrt, kein Support hat mir Auskunft gegeben, und die wissen nicht mal, wie sie mit meinem nächsten Gehalt und meinen Rechnungen umgehen werden (da es so spät war, konnte ich nicht alles rechtzeitig zu einem neuen Konto bei einer respektablen Bank umbuchen lassen).Spart euch den Stress und Unzuverlässigkeit dieser Bank und geht zu einer vernüftigen Bank.

name: Valerio
title: Rifiuto apertura conto e passi da cattivo pagatore?
content: Invito mia mamma con un codice amico su n26. Fa tutta la procedura (documenti foto etc etc). Risposta? Ciao XXX,grazie per il tuo interesse in N26. Purtroppo ci dispiace comunicarti che non possiamo aprire un conto N26 per te.Come banca dobbiamo rispettare severi requisiti legali per ogni conto che apriamo. Purtroppo, in alcune occasioni questo ci impedisce di aprire determinati conti correnti a causa di specifiche restrizioni. Per motivi legali, non possiamo darti ulteriori informazioni al riguardo.Grazie ancora per l’interesse e la pazienza dimostrata verso N26.Il tuo team N26Boh finito cosi. Una comunicazione dove ti dicono che per "motivi legali" non te lo aprono e nota bene "non possiamo dirti di più".Ma come? Non mi apri il conto e non mi dici il perché? Io il perché lo voglio sapere e devo poterlo sapere.N.b.: no protesti, pagato sempre tutte le rate mai in ritardo, etc etc quindi nessun problema al crif e ti trattano così.Ovviamente sono dei crucchi cosa potevamo aspettarci?

name: Nemoditur
title: Pas si mal
content: Pour info @Trustpilot, N26 incite ses clients qui les notent bien via les sondages à les noter ici...Il est vrai que le blocage de compte, auquel je n'ai (encore ?) pas eu à faire, a l'air fort problématique. Et le pire, c'est la réponse de N26 ici : j'ai lu votre article, je m'attendais à de vrais réponses, mais au final on n'y apprend rien (évitez de répondre avec ce lien, sérieusement ça joue en votre défaveur).D'un autre côté, je pense sincèrement que ceux qui ont ce genre de problèmes ont fait des choses pas nettes (faux compte, pas de déclaration fiscale, etc.). Il n'est pas possible pour la banque de résilier sans motif compris dans le contrat (il en existe 3), et en cas d'irrespect des normes européennes, vous pouvez les mettre en demeure puis les assigner en justice. Il ne faut clairement pas hésiter, ni même avoir peur d'un tel géant, qui doit se soumettre à la législation EU/FR.Sinon, n'hésitez pas à vous tournez vers Max. L'interface et la navigation est clairement + pourrie, pas de site internet, mais au moins vous bénéficiez d'assurances (aucune sur N26 malgré la mastercard) et d'aucun frais de retrait au DAB à l'étranger.Mais le gros intérêt pour les petits malins : pas de déclaration fiscale.Il faut savoir que N26 est une vraie banque, elle est donc soumise à certaines contraintes auxquelles elle aimerait bien échapper, et c'est pour ça qu'elle prend parfois des décisions préventives de clôture de comptes.Défauts chez N26 : pas possible d'émettre des chèques ni d'en encaisser ; carte de débit (et non de crédit) à autorisation systématique ; assistances mêmes les + minimales (telles que le rapatriement) inexistantes avec la carte gratuite.Sinon, bon support qui explique bien les choses et est assez patient, interface très propre, informations assez faciles d'accès. Tout se fait assez rapidement, pas de délais poussifs (par exemple lors de l'ajout de bénéficiaires) comme avec Boursorama, Caisse d'épargne, etc.

name: Pezzini Claudio
title: Conto bloccato senza motivo e preavviso n26 scam
content: Conto bloccato senza motivo e preavvisoScrivo in merito alla chiusura del mio conto senza alcun preavviso e spiegazione da parte di N26.Ho ricevuto una mail ieri sera nella quale mi comunicano la chiusura del mio conto in quanto ha violato l'articolo 12.2 del contratto. Me lo sono letto e non capisco il motivo........ Nella stessa mail mi hanno comunicato che avrei dovuto trasferire entro il 28 i fondi su un'altro conto. Bene! mi sono detto.... Purtroppo alla da fare in quanto il conto essendo bloccato non mi permette alcun movimento. Per di più aspettavo alcuni accrediti che sono stati accreditati sul conto bloccato. Mi chiedo! far uscire i miei SOLDI NO ma accreditare SI così si terranno del capitale chissà per quanto tempo.In ogni modo contattando la chat (premetto ci lavora solo gente che non dà alcun modo tipo su supporto e invita a leggersi le condizioni contrattuali. Peccato che non c'è scritto da nessuna parte che possono RUBARE I SOLDI DEI MAL CAPTATI!Adesso non mi rimane altro che aspettare la fatidica risposta.Se qualcuno di voi dovesse avere dei consigli oppure è incappato nella stessa situazione vi prego di contattarmi al riccardo@odeoutletpuntocom. Ho scritto così altrimenti non me lo fa fare.Vi terrò aggiornati Modifica Elimina Condividi
reply: Ciao Claudio, grazie per averci scritto! In quanto banca con effettiva licenza bancaria europea (BCE) N26 è soggetta alle normative bancarie in vigore. Lo scopo di queste norme è quello di garantire la protezione dei clienti.Se il tuo account N26 è bloccato, hai ricevuto di certo una mail con le informazioni e la procedura da seguire.  Per ulteriori dubbi non esitare a consultare questo articolo:https://mag-it.n26.com/conto-n26-bloccato-ti-spieghiamo-perch%C3%A9-3cdb2ae50a08.  Cordialmente, Il team di N26

content: Et encore dommage qu'on ne puisse pas choisir 0 étoile comme décrit juste en dessous tous vos avis positif c'est le début de votre relation avec N26 car vous ne connaissez pas encore l'article 19. 3 qui n'explique rien mais qui fait qu'il clôture votre compte sans raison comme écrit encore ci-dessous je n'ai parfait de paiement bizarre ni de reçu de virement frauduleux simplement pour des achats internet assuré vu que c'est pour ça qu'on est tous chez n26 aujourd'hui je n'arrête pas de me plaindre service client qui me rétorque sans hésiter que ce n'est pas le service client qui qui peut gérer ça mais ils ne disent pas qui ils ne vous transmettre aucun lien rien pour pouvoir contacter la personne en question et à force de persévérance on m'a carrément bloqué l'accès au chat donc là si je me connecte sur le chat on m'a dit suite à un problème momentané nous ne pouvons pas vous connecter au live chat lol voleur escroc petit bandit même pas de grande envergure petit bandit ne surtout pas ouvrir un compte je ne surtout pas même les noter positivement mon compte en banque est positif mais on me le clôture quand même d'ici une semaine sans aucune explication j'ai parlé à 13 conseillers avant d'être bloqué les 13 conseillers m'ont envoyé le même message automatique qui nous disait je vous invite à lire attentivement le mail reçu aujourd'hui et nos conditions générales mais à force de l'Irlande conditions générales on en sait même plus que et quand vous commencez à développer il vous bloque

name: fardeau
title: N26 Clôture bloque votre compte et cela…
content: N26 Clôture bloque votre compte et cela en bloquant toutes tentatives d'explication par mail ou supports client.En fait un jour ou l'autre sans aucun motif reel et fondé, N26 bloque votre compte et aucune explication n'est fourni, multipliant ainsi les illégalités sur la règlementation européenne bancaire. Il vous demande qu'il vont solder votre compte et de leur fournir un IBAN FRANCAIS,  alors que avez le droit légal de leur fournir un IBAN de n'importe qu'elle banque européenne. le comble c'est que N26 elle meme produit un article en ligne sur la discrimination européenne relative à l'IBAN!!!!!!ceci démontre clairement comment ces néo banques utilisent votre argent illégalement. ......alors plaintes ........ un parcours du combattant devant ces néo banques dignes du grand banditisme.Il vous disent que c est pour la réglementation bancaire en fait il n en est rien c est une parade , dont ils se servent pour séquestres votre argent . Le pire c est que N26 fait paraître  sur le Net un article disant clairement que le fait de demander un IBAN FRANÇAIS pour solder un compte est une infraction à la législation européenne. En effet aucune banque ne peut exiger de son client IBAN de son pays de résidence au N 26 exige pour solder un compte IBAN français.Je détiens les preuves de ses écrits. Pourtant N26 aujourd’hui détient toujours mes fonds et ne répond à aucune réclamation c’est une association de malfaiteurs. Je réponds au dernier message en date reçu de N 26 :« Nous vous remercions pour votre retour. Nous demandons un compte français afin de nous assurer qu'il vous appartient. Nous échangeons avec la banque réceptrice qui nous confirme alors que vous détenez celui-ci. Nous vous prions de nous excuser pour le désagrément.« Reponse:  est-ce que N26 se rend compte de l’énormité de leurs propos !Mesdames et Messieurs De N26 Si je vous communique un Iban de mon compte ouvert en Europe c’est forcément qu’il m’appartient puisqu’ils figurent dessus mon nom et mon prénom.!!!!!Du délire !!!  Concernant vos autres propos, depuis quand traitez-vous avec la banque réceptrice et laquelle d’ailleurs ? puisque je n’ai pas d Iban français je vous ai adressé un Iban de mon compte en Europe ce qui est tout à fait légal. D’ailleurs j’ai un témoin , ancien client français de N26 pour lequel là aussi vous avez clôturé son compte sans aucun motif avec toujours la même parade fallacieuse et mensongère , et après une plainte de ce client vous avez clôturé son compte transférant alors son argent sur un Iban hors France . je détiens là aussi les documents que je pourrais publier. Je confirme et je peux prouver documents à l appui que vous êtes une association de malfaiteurs .

reply: Hey Abdul,Thanks for your feedback! We regret to hear that you were provided such a poor customer experience.	Most transactions are authorizations made by the merchant. They are there to test whether your card data is valid and whether the transaction can go through. The amount is simply blocked and should be automatically credited back onto your account within ten working days.You can read more about this by heading over to this article from our Support Center: https://support.n26.com/en-de/fixing-an-issue/payments-and-transfer/why-was-i-charged-twiceBest regards,Your N26 Support Team

content: When I was trying to withdraw the cash from an ATM, the transaction was suddenly cancelled and I did not received the cash. However I noticed that the amount of cash I wanted to withdraw was destructed from my account. I quickly contacted to the support team via robot chat. It gave me good and easy instructions to solve the problem. As they instructed, I waited my statements to be updated, and then as soon as it was done I filled up the form and sent it to the support team. Now everything is fine. The most amazed parts were about that the problematic transaction was not written on the statements and that the statements are updated quite fast so that I can check them time to time. Perhaps it is normal for this kind of business. However, in this situation, I was so relieved because it was an actual proof for the case. Thank you for your works everyone.

name: Dennis
title: N26 - Die Moderne Steinzeitbank
content: Der Support ist absolut unterirdisch. Er kommt fast an den Klarna Support ran, aber so schlimm ist er dann doch nicht. Einen Freund geworben und nach 2 Jahren noch keine Prämie erhalten. Support wollte die Angelegenheit vor einem Jahr klären und mir eine E-Mail zukommen lassen. (Natürlich kam nichts.) Das war mir aber auch klar. Das kenne ich ja schon vom Klarna Support. Die gute alte "Wir schicken dir bald mehr Infos per E-Mail" Taktik um den Kunden schnellstmöglich los zu werden und dann drauf hoffen, dass der Kunde die Angelegenheit vergisst. Einzahlungsmöglichkeiten SEHR begrenzt. Bei schnellen Fällen z.B anstehenden Lastschriften muss man sofort handeln, da N26 einem erst Tagesgleich bekannt gibt, dass eine Lastschrift ansteht. (Natürlich nur, da es Gesetzlich vorgeschrieben ist, ansonsten würde N26 einen voll in die Rücklastschrift laufen lassen.) Nun kriegt man also um 10 Uhr morgens eine schöne E-mail, dass man bis 18 Uhr Zeit hat das Konto aufzuladen und man muss sich von seinem Hauptkonto Geld abheben und zu Rewe fahren um es (mit Gebühren) einzuzahlen. Instant Überweisungen, Paypal, Kreditkarten einzahlung, Sofort Überweisung, unterstützt N26, die modernste Bank Deutschlands natürlich nicht und so sind Überweisungen tagesgleich natürlich auch nicht möglich. Wieso auch, der Barzahlen Service, der schon 3 mal  Offline war und Gebühren zieht ist natürlich die bessere Variante.Auf einen Telefon Support wurde aus Kostengründen natürlich sofort verzichtet, wenn man sich keinen Premium Rang kauft.
reply: Hey Dennis, danke für dein Feedback.Wir entschuldigen uns für diese Unannehmlichkeiten.Wir sind hier um dir zu helfen und um deine versprochene Belohnung für das einladen von anderen N26 Kunden zu erhalten. Sende uns doch bitte eine private Nachricht an unseren Twitter N26 Support Account oder eine direkte Nachricht an unseren Facebook N26DE Account.Wir wären Glücklich dir helfen zu können.Grüße, dein N26 Support Team.

name: Stefan B.
title: No way back
content: Hab vor 5 Monaten meine Black-Brdtellumg widerrufen.Wollte vergangenen Monat mein Konto in Metal umwandeln.Dies ist laut Support nicht möglich.Auch bei mir hieß es:Wer Premium kündigt oder widerruft, kann nicht mehr zu Premium oder Metal zurück.Wie bei vielen Dingen bei N26 erfährt man keine Begründung oder sonstwas.Dies ist nicht möglich scheint inzwischen ein Standardsatz bei N26 zu sein.

name: ZDL
title: Good until I had an issue with a transaction
content: Had so far a great experience with them; very easy and fast account opening process. The MasterCard arrived two days later. Account and card do what they are meant to do and their App design and functionality are fab. Sadly, I ran into a spot of trouble with them, when I asked for a direct debit to be reversed. The original message was, that I should see the funds back, “shortly”, then four days later it was within “the next 48 hours”. This did not happen either, and now the communication around the re-credit has become rather elusive. “Real soon” is the best I get. Given that I was so happy with them, this is rather disappointing: As a bank and financial institution their communicated timelines need to be dependable, as I am making representations on the back of those. As always in finance there are repercussions, if I need to backtrack on my promises.Checking the news, though, it appears, that I am not the only one with this concern as the German BaFin appears to have unearthed similar issues. Hopefully they manage to improve around this area, as I can otherwise recommend N26.

name: Sam Cairns
title: First class customer service and a…
