name: helder
title: The people with good reviews on this… DON'T DO IT!
content: The people with good reviews on this online bank are obviously working for them or are robots. Terrible customer service, they sell it as £0.00 Monthly fee but actually if you want the metal card you pay a month fee that lock you up for a year without they being clear about it. so be careful. No company should lock you up for any term. If they believe in their value they wouldn't be so fearful and wanting to force you to stay. and if you cancel you must pay the remaining of the contract even if you have not used the card or their services.. to me they are coming with the same same same old banking bs.. they give you nothing for a lot!!! I wouldn't be surprise if their stay in business just how high tariffs will go up!!! Really regret signing up with this people. I have never received the card, and was being charged for 2 months without my knowledge and then after requesting to cancel it they offered to refund me the amount and yet took another 3 weeks for my card to arrive. finally I had enough and wanted to just cancel and they are making all attempts to delay it and very difficult for me to do so. Goodluck

name: Alan Roberto Negrao
title: Excellent service
content: Excellent service. Good costumer service. Efficient!
reply: Hi Helder,Thank you for your feedback.There is a monthly fee of £14.90 for our premium metal account which is listed upon signing up for your account, if you choose to opt for premium. In accordance with the terms and conditions of our metal account, there is a 30-day revocation period in which a customer is free to revoke their premium account without incurring any charge from us. Once this 30 day period has passed, the remainder of the contract which was agreed upon must be completed. The choice we give all customers is either to utilise the metal account and its benefits for the period of the contract, or to cancel your account and pay the remainder of the agreed fees for the remaining period.We are sorry to hear that the delivery of your card was delayed, and we hope you have had no issue with the card since. Please reach out to us if there are any further issues.Best Regards,Your N26 Support Team

name: Biplab Das
title: The best online banking system in Germany
content: (+) Customer support is very prompt and helpful. (+) Ease of opening bank account at N26. Takes few minutes. (+) Blocking cards and restricting use in foreign/domestic stores is a very helpful feature. (+) Spaces (along with main account) helps keep savings away from unwanted expenditure.(+) Instant transfer between N26 accounts. (-) Over draft feature does not work for most cases. (-) Not sure if you can apply for loan or even receive loans. (-) Limits on free ATM withdrawal is very less(2 for most).

name: Xoraitis Giorgos
title: THANK YOU FOR ALL.
content: THANK YOU FOR ALL.

name: Pierre
title: Avoid it
content: avoid it ... i feel sorry to leave a bad review. It started well but you guys are not doing anything at all now. I told you i can not make payment online because your confirmation pop up do not properly works. This is absolutely crap for a supposedly online bank.... I have been patient enough but nothing is done from your side and no communication at all. Really bad. Avoid...
reply: Hi Pierre,Thanks for taking the time to give us your much appreciated feedback. We're sorry to learn that the payment confirmation feature is not working as it should on your mobile device. We recommend carrying out some quick troubleshooting on your mobile device if you have not already done so, and we would advise contacting us via live chat so we can talk you through this. You can access the live chat feature in your mobile app via My Account > Help > Support Chat.Provided this is reported to us within the app via your registered email address, we can assure you that it will be investigated accordingly so that this can be resolved as soon as possible.Best Regards,Your N26 Support Team

content: best banking online service

name: Sans Souci
title: Avoid N26
content: I'm not someone who'd usually write a review. However on this occasion I feel obliged so that should someone else do their due diligence in the future and read this, they might think twice. As I should have done myself but was hooked in with the modern marketing.Like others have experienced, notification of account closure was given without reason after the source of a transaction was required to be proven. The source statement was provided, and then notification of closure notice was given. No explanation.A Large sum of money was held in escrow which prevented me from honouring my commitments during this checking process costing me tensions in relationships I've worked hard to develop as a freelancer over the years as well as additional money to settle the original commitments.Customer service is appalling and stressful. This business has no future even if Valentin Stalf believe's otherwise. As a business owner myself, the customer care & communication is everything.
reply: Hi Sans,Thank you for your feedback.As you may know, N26 has held a European banking license since July 2016, and thus, we are obliged to act in accordance with European banking processes. We are obliged to carry out regular routine checks on user accounts. Sometimes, the result of these checks show that an account must be closed. In the event this happens, we endeavour to contact you to advise you of the decision with 48 hours.We apologise for any inconvenience or stress that this decision may have caused you. In the interest of account security, we are unable to provide detailed information and support through this channel. We will continue this correspondence through your registered email address.Best Regards, Your N26 Support Team

title: Perfect, except only one currency is possible
content: Everything just works really well. I only wish I could have an account in GBP and EUR

name: Gio C
title: Conto N26 bloccato arbitrariamente
content: Mi hanno perso un bonifico verso coinbase. In più bloccato il conto. Non ti dicono i motivi. Non ti danno nemmeno possibilità di recuperare i soldi.Qualcuno ha dei suggerimenti?

name: João Neto Barreto

content: Easy to use. No hidden fees and even free if not premium account is chosen. Easy to access the support team with a functional chat system.

name: Gabriel IONITA
title: Bien pour l'instant
content: Simple, efficace, bien ciblé. Je suis tout au début en tant que client. Il faut me questionner d'ici quelque temps quand la relation banque - client aura plus de substance.

name: Melissa Kabakci
title: Great service
content: Great service. Intuitive app. Sending and receiving money has never been easier.

name: Sherieffe
title: Transfer
content: The app is great and easy to use it’s just one issue which was about my card being lost and I wanted to order another one and I was told checks were being done on my account and I did not know how procedure takes and I need my money
reply: Hey Sherieffe,Thanks for taking the time to provide us with your feedback! We have the responsibility to run routine checks on transactions. These checks are based on individual transactions and are automatically initiated by our systems. As a result, we may ask you to verify the origin or source of your funds. If you receive such a request, just send the requested documents via email. There are no exceptions or bypasses for such checks. You will be contacted by email. Best Regards,Your N26 Support Team

name: Brandon Wyles
title: Absolute joke of a Bank, do not recommend!
content: Been using N26 for about a year now as a bills account. I make monthly transfers from my personal account on a once or twice monthly basis, never gone over 10 transactions a month.This month is where N26 has really let me down; I'm moving in with the other half, and we both transferred deposit and first month payment into the account (10th May) totalling £1000 into the account. My payment went through fine, and the other half's not so lucky.My account has been in review since with the other halfs payment missing from the account completely. We are supposed to be moving in this Friday (17th May), but with no signs of the money being in the account this has caused a lot of stress between us.I contacted customer services on Saturday (11th May) who informed me the money would be in by Monday (13th May) - didn't happen. Contacted customer services on Tuesday (14th May) Where I was told my account is under investigation and couldn't provide further details.When this is resolved, I have no doubts at all I'll be closing the account, and won't look back. No sense of urgency in resolving my account issue.EDIT #1: N26 emailed me 2 mins after posting this review (11:47am), asking to provide addition information. I responded with additional information at 12:01pm. Still no sign of Friday nights transfer within my account after providing screenshots of the transaction from each account - now being asked of proof we're moving house. To which I've provided a screenshot of our application and an email between me and my estate agents confirming contact/move in is on the 17th May. Was this needed, even after providing proof of where the money came from? Eagerly awaiting a further response.EDIT #2: N26 emailed to confirm they've sent the information over the the relative department (1:44PM) - Still missing payment from the other half, from Friday 10th. The closer it gets to Friday 17th the more stress we are feeling, all from an issue many others have previously talked about. Surely a phone call about this matter would have been far more sufficient if the case is this critical - alike a regular bank?EDIT #3: N26 emailed again (2:57PM) saying they have completed 'routine checks' and everything should be back as normal. But the payment from the other half is still missing. Very disappointing so far, The response time has defiantly increased since leaving a negative review, yet the underlying problem has yet been resolved - and shouldn't take a bad review to jump on a problem.EDIT #4: As end of the day draws near (4:15pm), I contacted customer support via the live chat asking if I could have further clarification on where my money was. To be honest the support agent was probably the most helpful agent so far - by providing me with the complaints email and advised the case had in fact not been completed - even after saying I could use my account as normal.EDIT #5: 5:15pm now, with no further correspondence, or notice when we will receive our money. Formal complaint has been sent to the complaints address now.EDIT #6: Sent another email as its now the last day until me and the other half move in together (16th at 9:45am), Still missing a £400 payment - Not acceptable.EDIT #7: We've received a letter from Lloyds Bank (the other half's bank) as they have also investigated and tracked the payment  Confirming N26 have the funds, I've provided everything required and N26 has confirmed everything has been sorted with my account. So, Where is our money? Can't believe it's quicker to investigate and track down the payment rather N26 Just release our money...EDIT #8: This is getting very long winded, I've had to leave work early due to the stress of moving tomorrow with no money in my account. Are N26 going to cover my losses for today? Doubtful. We are so stresses and is causing tension between me and the other half. Was told via live chat the money could have been refunded - REFUNDED? Imagine if i just sold my car to someone, and the had a car and their money back - you simply can't do that?! I highly suggest N26 give us our money now, a call would be nice about now explaining whats going on.EDIT #9 (Conclusion): I Finally received my money back on Thursday 16th May at around 4pm. The sheer stress this has caused is beyond belief. I'm still without an explanation and formal apology for the whole fiasco. Will be tying the account up and closing the account in the coming few days.To be completely honest, N26 does have potential, the app is easy to use and the interface is good, just a shame about customer experience is abysmal.
reply: Hi Brandon,In accordance with certain European banking processes, we are legally obliged to carry out regular routine checks on user accounts and transactions. In the event we require proof of the origin of a transaction, we endeavour to reach out to the affected customer as soon as possible, so as to not delay the process.It is possible in some cases that a transfer may also fail for a number of reasons. In the event this happens, only the sending bank can track the funds. They need to do this through an official Payment Investigation rather than a Transfer Confirmation, as this will only prove that the transaction has left the sending account, rather than tracking its precise whereabouts. In the event an official Payment Investigation is carried out and states that the funds are with N26, we encourage you email it to us to be reviewed.We would like to apologise for any stress this situation has put you under. For security reasons, we are unable to provide detailed information and support through this channel. We hope that this can be resolved in a timely manner, and will continue this correspondence via your registered email address.Best,Your N26 Support Team

name: Niels Bauman
title: Tired of shady banks
content: Tired of shady banks that only promote dirt in the baking environment. Improve your Customer service and we can start talking!
reply: Hi Niels,Thank you for your feedback.We regret to learn that your experience with us has not been positive thus far. All of our Customer Service agents are trained in the same manner and to the highest quality. Our agents are also offered follow-up training and support to ensure they are always knowledgeable and up to date with all new processes and topics that they will need to assist our customers with. In the event an agent is unsure on a topic they are assisting a customer with, they can reach out to senior support for help.We hope that we have the opportunity to make amends for you in future.Best Regards, Your N26 Support Team.

name: Gazingburg Myllanzy
title: Try N26 for a secure online banking service
content: I never actually trusted online banking services until I came across an advertisement of an ongoing promo of N26 in an a fitness app I am using. I decided to give it a shot and trust me, I am more than satisfied with the services provided by N26. I have absolute control of my bank account; I can do anything from sending and receiving funds to deactivating and reactivating my debit card on the N26 android app on my phone without bothering to go to the bank. All thanks to N26. I can boldly recommend N26's services to every individual i know

name: Aus meiner Erfahrung heraus ...
title: Internet-Betrug über N26…
content: Internet-Betrug über N26 "abgewickelt"...Man muss sich schon mal überlegen, sowohl als potenzieller Kunde, wie auch als Überweisender, ob man mit der N26-Bank zusammenarbeiten will.Wem es nichts ausmacht, sein Konto bei der gleichen Bank, wie zahlreiche Betrüger zu haben, bitte ...Wer auf ein Konto überweisen will, dass bei einer Bank ist, die Betrug aufgrund mangelhafter Sicherheitsverfahren zumindestens begünstig, bitte ...Ich jedenfalls nicht !Die Bank zeigt sich in einem Betrugsfall sehr unkooperativ und zudem noch sehr langsam, also das glatte Gegenteil einer modernen Internet-Bank. Ich denke, dass dieses Geschäftsmodell geschlossen werden sollte, bevor noch mehr Menschen ihr Geld in dubiosen Kanälen verlieren. Meine Ansicht dazu ...
reply: Hey! Danke für dein Feedback.Sollten Mitmenschen auf Identitätsdiebstahl-Betrug hereinfallen, ist dies immer sehr bedauerlich.Sobald wir davon mitbekommen, unternehmen wir alle nötigen Schritte: Konto einfrieren, Konto schließen, mit den Behörden zusammen arbeiten, den geschädigten helfen und die Betrüger dingfest machen.Wir entwickeln weitere Maßnahmen, damit sich Kunden und Nicht-Kunden gegen sowas schützen können: https://n26.com/de-de/sicherheit https://n26.com/de-de/blog/phishing-attacken-auf-bankkonto-vorbeugenWir entschuldigen uns für alle Unannehmlichkeiten.Dein N26 Support-Team.

name: Alessandro
title: Very bad.
content: Very bad.I opened an account with N26 about 6 months ago, than after 2 months I received an e-mail from them saying that the account was closed because of a substantial violation of the terms and conditions. Very funny because I had not used the card at all and never paid any money in it.What violation? Because the card had not been used for 2 months?Or something bad happened with my account without my knowledge and you guys did not want to say it to avoid being talked about.I replied the e-mail asking for more details of what happened, but never got any response, so very poor customer service.This is the e-mail I received:To ensure our customers’ privacy and account safety , we are obliged to run routine checks on accounts and transactions.Unfortunately, we recently identified a substantial violation of our terms and conditions agreement. Section A14.2 of our Terms and Conditions for Banking - UK* states that we reserve the right to terminate user accounts without prior notice in cases of a substantial violation. Accordingly, we are required to terminate your N26 account. This termination is effective immediately.Usage of the account, the app, as well as the card issued with it, is no longer possible.Thank you for your understanding.Kind regards,N26 Bank GmbH
reply: Hi Alessandro,Thank you for taking the time to leave your feedback.In accordance with certain European banking processes, we are obliged to carry out regular routine checks on user accounts and transactions. If the result of these checks shows that your account with us must be closed, we endeavour to contact you via email within 48 hours informing you of our decision, for example with the above email you have attached. This process is carried out by a dedicated internal department, and for this reason, our customer support team are unable to advise further on these situations via alternative communication channels.We apologise for any disappointment caused.Best Regards,Your N26 Support Team

name: Lelda Šaitere
title: Highly recommended!
content: Using it almost two years and I haven't had any problems with N26 so far. I admire the app design which is simple to understand and manage. Everything is clear and in case it isn't - there are friendly employees waiting for you to ask questions you're concerned about. Also, money transfers very fast. Highly recommended!

name: Lion Summerbell
title: Unbelievably bad customer support
content: Unbelievably bad customer support. Their app wouldn't send me a pairing code (without which you cannot approve any transfers) and customer service REPEATEDLY told me that they could only provide a code over the phone THEN NEVER CALLED. What a wonderful bank that doesn't allow you access to YOUR OWN MONEY.
reply: Hi Lion,Thank you for taking the time to give us your feedback. This assists us greatly in process development and improvement for the future.As security is our main priority, we abide by strict verification processes to ensure that your account is kept safe and secure. We have found that, in the interest of account security, providing pairing codes via a phone call once you have been fully verified is the most secure way to pair and unpair the device which grants you full access to your account. We wish to be absolutely sure that we are speaking with the account holder, and a phone call is one of the safest ways to do so. We endeavour to call you within 30 minutes of your request, and we apologise if this has not happened for you on this occasion. We will pass your feedback on internally, and we encourage you to email ideas@n26.com with any improvement suggestions that you may have.Best Regards,Your N26 Support Team

name: Nick Wilkes
title: Love N26 and would recommend
content: Love N26 and would recommend to EVERYONE I know

title: Most convenient bank account I have
content: Most convenient bank account I have. Easy to use and you can see everyting you need in your n26 app.

name: Rachel
title: Compte bloqué sans raison.....
content: Compte bloqué sans raison...... je n'ai rien fait, pas de découvert, pas de virement bizarre, pas de prélèvement sur ce compte, je l'utilise juste pour mes achats sur internet (sur des sites sécurisés). J'ai reçu un mail me disant que mon compte sera fermé définitivement le 22 mai sans explication et quand on les contacte ils envoient juste les CGU, je les ai lu et je n'ai commis aucune infraction des règles. Pareil pour mon copain. Dommage 3 ans que j y étais j'étais très heureuse. Très déçue pour le coup. Nous ne sommes pas les seuls d'après ce que je vois sur internet. Pas si parfait que ça n26
reply: Bonjour Rachel, merci de votre retour. Nous recevons beaucoup de questions concernant la fermeture supposée de nombreux comptes N26. Cet article répond aux questions que nous avons reçues : https://mag-fr.n26.com/compte-n26-bloqu%C3%A9-nous-vous-expliquons-pourquoi-ef27470083ca

name: Chiraz
title: Récupérer votre argent avant qu'il soit…
content: Oui merci mais votre article je l'ai lu plusieurs fois. Je comprends que pour des raisons de réglementation le compte doit être résilier pour soit-disant le non-respect d'une clause, mais en aucun cas l'argent doit être pris en otage, surtout lorsque les justificatifs sont fournis. Aucun délai ni informations ne sont donnés ! C'est inadmissible. Des personnes ont leur salaire qui arrive sur le compte n26 et ont des loyers à payer !!! On ne roule pas sur l'or pour la plupart. Le pire c'est qu'il avait un délai de 2 semaines avant résiliation du compte, et malgré cela, aucun paiement n'est possible ni virement ... bref. Je n'ai jamais été si déçu, frustré et outré
reply: Bonjour, merci de votre message.Vous pourrez trouver plus d'informations concernant la fermeture et le blocage de votre compte N26 en suivant ce lien :  https://mag-fr.n26.com/compte-n26-bloqu%C3%A9-nous-vous-expliquons-pourquoi-ef27470083ca

name: Andrew Itabor
title: HIDING BEHIND THE LAW. CLEAR EMAIL SEND US YOUR ACOOUNT
content: I know that many out there are judgemental and quick to find fault but what I want anyone reading to do is to focus on the facts below,N26 has not given a reason for their actions on my account since April 9th - May14th which is 35days.On April 26th N26 emailed to request for a bank account to transfer my funds. In 15mins replied with authentic documents and bank card photo. which they claimed I should have sent to support and not replied to the email requesting this document. This was May1stBetween May 1-3rd I got confirmation after a online chat that the appropriate department has been forwarded my documents and I will hear from them in 1-2days. Today is May 14th and still no transfer of funds or positive communication.WHATEVER N26 REASONS ARE, THEY HAVE MADE A DECISION TO SEND MY MONEY. SO WHY GIVE ME A RUN AROUND?Below are some emails receivedHey Andrew,Thanks for getting in touch!Please correspond directly with the email you have received, I am very sorry Customer Service has no information for you at this time.Have a great day,PhilipN26 Customer Service N26 Bank GmbH | Managing Directors: Markus Gunter, Richard Groeneveld Klosterstraße 62 | 10179 Berlin | Germany HRB ID: 170602B (Berlin District Court Charlottenburg) | VAT ID: DE 30/595/7096==============Hey  Andrew, Thanks for your email and for the documents you provided; we forwarded them to the dept. in charge for your folder.We will come back to you as soon as possible.Have a nice day, N26 Bank GmbH Managing Directors: Markus Gunter, Matthias Oetken Klosterstraße 62 | 10179 Berlin | Germany HRB ID: 170602B (Berlin District Court Charlottenburg) | VAT ID: DE 30/595/7096.--------------- Original Message ---------------FromSent 01.05.2019 11:17ToSubject: FW: 04908925From:Sent: 01 May 2019 09:19Subject: RE: 04908925Hello,I submitted a bank verified copy of my Nationwide bank statement as requested in less than 15mins of receiving your email requesting that I provide you with this documentation. Note that your N26 bank has previously credited this same account which bears my name, so practically and legally there should be no cause for delay.Today is 1st of May which means that any transaction thresholds limiting my/your ability to make transactions is over and I can make transactions in accordance with your terms and conditions.I would like to state that as a financial institution in a customer facing industry you have failed to provide any details whatsoever regarding the restrictions placed on my account. So how can I address any dispute or issues arising?I would be forced to take FURTHER STEPS INCLUDING LEGAL ACTION and compensation if you fail to address this issue of releasing my funds promptly.RegardsAndrewSent from Mail for WindoSent: Friday, April 26, 2019 9:1Subject: 04908925Hey Andrew,In order to be able to transfer the remaining funds from your N26 account, we kindly ask you to send us an official bank statement of the desired recipient account, with the following information clearly visible:* Beneficiary Name (name of the account holder)* Account number* Sort codePlease note that this account should be in your name.Thank you for your cooperation.Kind regards,Your N26 TeamN26 Bank GmbH | Managing Directors: Markus Gunter, Matthias OetkenKlosterstraße 62 | 10179 Berlin | GermanyHRB ID: 170602B (Berlin District Court Charlottenburg) | VAT ID: DE 30/595/7096. ref:_00D24H3gm._5001o3RnyAL:refAFTER THE EMAIL AND TRUST PILOT REVIEWI am glad to comment the utter rudeness from the customer service personnel was not continued.However, THIS ISSUE HAS NOTHING TO DO WITH EUROPEAN LAW.YOU INFORMED CUSTOMER THAT ROUTINE CHECKS WERE BEING CONDUCTED ON ACCOUNT from April 9th. You N26 said expect email from us.N26 did not send email until April 26thThe EMAIL CLEARLY STATED PLEASE PROVIDE AN ACCOUNT IN YOUR NAME FOR US TO TRANSFER YOUR FUNDS.A decision has been made. WHY HIDE UNDER THE PRETEXT OF ROUTINE CHECKS. WHO DOES ROUTINE CHECKS FOR 35DAYS OR AFTER SAYING WE WANT TO TRANSFER YOUR FUNDS????? WHO? I WANT MY MONEY AND NOTHING MORE BUT I WILL GO TWITTER AND FACEBOOK NEXT.LET THE WORLD KNOW HOW YOU TRULY THREAT YOUR CUSTOMERS.
reply: Hi Andrew,Thank you for taking the time to leave your review.We sincerely apologise for the inconvenience this has caused you, and that this process has. In accordance with European banking processes, N26 must carry out regular routine checks on user accounts. We follow these processes to ensure our user accounts are kept safe and secure. We understand your query and the concern you may have for the status of your account, but for your own security, we are unable to provide detailed information and support through here. We will continue this correspondence via your registered email address.Best,Your N26 Support Team

name: cedric
title: - Efficace.
content: - Efficace.- Qualité/prix imbattable.- La banque la plus efficace que j'ai trouvé à ce jour. Et pour un prix défiant toute concurrence, même (surtout) pour l'utiliser en voyage à l'étranger. - enfin une application qui à tout, mais sans le superflu et les menus inutiles ou publicitaires. Hyper intuitif.- chaque mouvement bancaire envoi une notification en temps réel. Si un mouvement bizarre passe, on le sait tout suite et on peut reagir immédiatement. C'est toujours plus efficace que s'en rendre compte 15j après quand on consulte ses comptes.-> gestion en temps réel de ses plafonds de retrait (au distributeur),-> du paiement par internet (grosse sécurité par rapport à la plupart des banques traditionnelles), -> et du paiement à l'étranger (terminé les appels à 50euros à 4h du matin dans un pays en decalage horaire parce que ton conseiller n'avait pas noté ton voyage dans ton dossier... et donc t'as bloqué. Et que tu ne peux plus retirer pour manger)-j'ai été tant de fois bloqué dans ma banque traditionnelle sur ces 3 derniers points et sur les frais intempestifs (parfois bizarrement justifiés), qu'être à n26 me simplifie la vie et reduit mon stress (les appels sans fin pour comprendre qu'est ce qui bloque encore et/ou se faire rembourser de frais indus)points négatifs :- le service client par tchat un peu lent et inefficace. -Un tchat qui se deconnecte en pleine discussion. Et on repart à 0 avec un autre conseiller. Il ne faut pas être pressé - des conseillers qui répètent ce qui est déjà écrit sur le site sans trop chercher à comprendre. Idem pour le support technique.- incompatibilité de ma carte avec certains système 3d secure. Personne n'a jamais su m'expliquer pourquoi. A ce jour ces problèmes ont été moins gênants que ceux que j'avais avec ma cb dans une banque traditionnelle.

name: Tiia Leppänen
title: The is the most simple mobile bank I…
content: The is the most simple mobile bank I have ever used. The customer service answers quickly and is very friendly. I love the Spaces feature - I am able to put money aside without creating another account or withdraw it.There are few things to improve though: 1) It is so irritating that when my fingerprint login doesn't work anymore, but it wants to get the password, I have to go to the settings to confirm AGAIN that I want to use my finger print. Why doesn't the app can learn that? Why the system resets my settings? Isn't this against "usability rules" which says that the user should have control over his/her options/ways of using the system?2) When I change the category for e.g. Vodafone which is recurrent expense and is taken automatically from my account, the app doesn't learn the new category, but I have the change the category every single time - every month. This is not difficult to implement. It is just couple of rows of code. I think this feature affect on the expenses pie chart also, and that way it has quite big impact on the system. The user needs to make unnecessary acts to keep the expenses pie chart up-to-date, even though it is easy to automise.3) On website, I have to go to my profile to be able to logout. Why there is no logout possibility in the main navigation / every page. This is against commonly know place to find logout functionality (which preferably should be followed in UX design). It took me a while to find a way to logout and caused frustration. But all in all, this is the best solution/system _in Germany_, but not Europe. Take a look of the solution of the Nordic web banks. Don't copy, but e.g. Danske Bank and Nordea have good features, solutions for many of above problems.

title: Come già descritto sul playstore
content: Come già descritto sul playstore , servizio inadeguato e maleducato , pensano di aver ragione sempre ma non ammettono gli errori  , se casomai il sistema non vi accredita il bonus quello iniziale beh so fatti vostri non lo ottenete mai a causa dell'assistenza pessima , con me hanno chiuso subito :)
reply: Ciao Mauro, ci spiace di sentirti dispiaciuto e capiamo la tua frustrazione.È possibile ricevere una ricompensa tramite il codice invito di un amico o tramite delle nostre parterships. Entrambe le modalità richiedono l'inserimento di un codice promozionale al momento della regitrazione. Questa è una condizione fondamentale per l'accredito del bonus, in quanto i nostri sistemi processano tutti i pagamenti dei bonus in modo automatico. Se il nostro sistema non identifica il corretto inserimento del codice, l'accredito dello stesso non avviene.Ad ogni modo puoi ancora ottenere il bonus invitando un amico e ottenere una ricompensa di 15€ per ogni amico che apre il conto e soddisfa tutti requisiti espressi nei nostri Termini&Condizioni, che puoi trovare al seguente link https://support.n26.com/it-it/come-iniziare/altro/come-guadagnare-soldi-invitando-amici-in-n26. Purtroppo da questa piattaforma nonn riusciamo a capire bene esattamente cosa sia accaduto nel tuo caso e di quale bonus si tratta con esattezza. Sarebbe utile se potessi fornirci il numero del tuo caso, di modo da poter dare un'ulteriore occhiata. Oppure contattaci nuovamente via chat.Ci scusiamo nuovamente  e speriamo che questo accaduto non ti scoraggi a continuare ad usare il tuo conto.  Ti auguriamo ancora una buona giornata e buon proseguimento.Cordialmente,Il team di N26

name: lisa wigfield
title: They take the 'care' out of customer care!!!
content: If I could give this zero stars I would. I opened this account, never received the card in the post, contacted them. They advised I needed to pay the complete 12 months charges. Held me to ransom in affect so I would have to keep the account and pay monthly charges. No offer of changing the account type to a standard one. Their devoted customer service is definitely not what you would pay for. I advised on my current situation, just not interested, just kept telling me to go onto chat to order a new card. I had advised I never received the fist one and the account was never 'activated' they just don't seem to care about their customers at all. I am going to the financial ombudsmen. Absolutely shocking. I would never out so much as a penny into this account, wouldn't trust them with it. Sticking with my English main account.
reply: Hi Lisa,Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We regret to learn that your experience with us thus far has not been a positive one.It appears that you have opted for a premium account with us, which does have a monthly fee of 14,90 GBP. The contract for our premium offerings last for a year, although we offer a 30 day revocation period with the UK in which you can revert to a standard account for free if you decide our Metal account is not for you. Once this 30 day period has passed, it is not possible to revert to a different account without paying the agreed upon fees for the remainder of the contract. We kindly ask that you contact us via chat so that we can resolve this situation for you, as for verification reasons we can only proceed with a card reorder via that channel. You can access live chat in your mobile app via My Account > Help > Support Chat, or via a desktop on our web app at https://app.n26.com/loginLive chat is available in the UK from Monday - Saturday from 8am until 9pm.Best Regards,Your N26 Support Team

title: Molto bella N26 la banca online
content: N26 è una delle banche più innovative dell'eurozona. Lo scopo della banca è quello di offrire un conto corrente interamente GRATUITO e gestibile completamente da smartphone.Tra i vantaggi offerti da questa banca troviamo:✔ Zero spese di apertura e gestione conto.✔ Carta di debito mastercard gratuita.✔Prelievi ATM gratis.✔ Bonifici gratis.✔ Conto gestibile interamente da smartphone.Aprire il conto N26 è davvero facile e si può fare interamente online in pochi minuti scaricando l'app o se preferite da pc desktop INSERITE IL CODICE INVITO alessiob7484 in fase di registrazione per ricevere il bonus di benvenuto.Effettuata la registrazione riceverete a casa la carta mastercard per posta ordinaria.Attivate la carta tramite l'app e ilvostro conto sarà completamente operativo.Inoltre N26 da la possibilità di guadagnare invitando i vostri amici ad aprire un conto: 15€ per ogni amico che si iscrive con il vostro invito e completa la fase di registrazione effettuando una transazione di almeno 15€ con la carta.Davvero una buona opportunità di guadagnare un po' di soldini!Non posso fare altro che consigliare di aprire il conto N26!!!

reply: Hey Doener Mann, danke für dein Feedback.Wir ermöglichen keinen Betrügern ein Konto bei uns zu eröffnen oder dieses zu nutzen.Leider fallen Menschen auf Identitätsdiebstahl und Betrügereien herein, welches diesen erlaubt, ein Konto zu eröffnen.Sobald dies bei uns gemeldet wird, unternehmen wir natürlich alles, damit das Konto sofort geschlossen wird.Wir empfehlen dabei, dem Betrogenen eine Anzeige bei der Polizei einzureichen, damit wir mit den Behörden dagegen vorgehen können.Sofern du uns über diesen Betrug informiert hast, werden wir auch alles in unserer Macht stehende tun, um dir zu helfen.Beste Grüße, dein N26 Support-Team.

name: Ben Haworth
title: Easy online banking AND in English (for non-native speakers)
content: I set up my N26 account when arriving in Germany a little over two years ago. The process was relatively simple and all the security checks were done online and via a video call. In comparison, to be a co-signatory on a bank account with Berliner Volksbank, I had two or three trips to the bank, plus a few phone calls. I'm told that setting up a bank account in Germany is pretty painful, and this definitely wasn't the case with N26.I'm a Black card customer, mostly because of the travel insurances that come with this which means I don't have to think about this when I go to visit friends back in the UK. I enquired about the Metal card because I saw that it had airport lounge benefits. It wasn't so easy to find out the precise details, first via the website, then via customer support, and then being told to call the airport Lounge partner. The end result was that there is a small discount to using airport Lounges (I can't remember exactly now, but it was either 24€ or 28€), and this doesn't really make it worth it for me.The online interface is pretty intuitive and easy to use. It's a bit frustrating that if I use my computer with a web browser, I still have to authenticate all transactions on my mobile phone, but I assume this is necessary additional security. Again, in comparison, it's a lot easier than Berliner Volksbank.The "winning feature" though as a non-native German living in Germany is that I can do my banking, including customer support, etc, all in English. This would be less daunting now that I've lived here for two years, but I wouldn't have wanted to deal with that on Day 1 in Germany.

reply: Hey Pablo,We really appreciate your thoughts and suggestions! We would be more than happy to look into this for you! You can open a chat from certain Support Center articles about opening an account without having to be a client. You can cancel a standard account for free by sending an email to support@n26.com. If you have a premium account, it most likely is a twelve-month contract. You will then be asked to pay the remaining fees.You can find out more information on the following page of our Support Center: https://support.n26.com/en-gb/fixing-an-issue/account/how-to-close-my-accountBest regards,Your N26 Support Team

content: j'ai un compte chez eux depuis janvier 2018, j'avais la formule black a 5,90 qui est passer a 10€ je crois bref, il y a deux jours je reçois un mail m'indiquant que mon compte est clôturer sans raison valable évoquant un article de leur condition générale qui ne veut rien dire, on nous informe que l'on pourra utiliser le compte encore 20 jours mais il bloque toutes les transactions !!!!!! et on ne sait pas quand on récupérera notre argent je suis extrêmement déçu faites attentions a eux. name: Lenka Flip
title: Unfortunately a big disappointment from…
content: Unfortunately a big disappointment from customers services! These guys don't have your back! Extra charges without reason from ATMs, no compassion and coldness! That's not what you expected from modern online bank! Not recommend! Avoid if possible!
reply: Hi Lenka,Thank you for taking the time to leave your review. We apologise if you have experienced any inconvenience as a result of the ATM fee you were charged.We do offer a set amount of free ATM withdrawals per month depending on your location, and once you have availed of all of these free withdrawals, you will be charged 2 EUR per ATM transaction. In the event you have been charged a fee greater than this, this would be a private ATM fee which, sadly, we have no control over, and cannot reject or reverse them, as they are not related to N26 in any way. These are fees which have been decided on by the ATM provider rather than by N26, and they must be clearly listed upon making your withdrawal. To avoid fees such as these, we recommend using our ATM map which can be accessed from within our mobile app, or by only using official bank ATMs where possible.You can see more in relation to ATM fees via our support center: https://support.n26.com/en-es/fixing-an-issue/cash/why-was-i-charged-an-atm-feeBest Regards,Your N26 Support Team

name: Jack
title: WARNING DO NOT BOTHER WITH THIS COMPANY
content: I read the reviews before opening the account, I went against my better judgement as I thought I would give them a chance.I put money into my N26 account (only £100, transferred from my Barclays account) and within 24 hours they had frozen my account for 'routine compliance checks'Customer service say they cannot give any information about how long this will be and I cannot access my funds.PLEASE HEED THIS ADVICE AND DO NOT UNDER ANY CIRCUMSTANCES OPEN AN ACCOUNT WITH N26 THEY ARE THE WORST BANK I HAVE EVER COME ACROSS THEY WILL JUST FREEZE YOUR MONEY FOR ABSOLUTELY NO REASON!!!EDIT: I can see they have replied below saying that "an account is never blocked for no reason".This is completely untrue because they have blocked my money for no reason! All I did was transfer £100 pounds from my main current account after I got my wages from my employer and they next thing they have blocked the account.It has now been 5 days since I replied to their email and still no answer whatsoever, my money is still frozen even though their email states that their checks only take a day!AS I SAID PREVIOUSLY, BEFORE YOU OPEN AN ACCOUNT WITH N26 PLEASE READ THIS REVIEW AND AVOID LIKE THE PLAGUE!!!IF YOU ARE WANTING A MOBILE BANK OPEN A MONZO ACCOUNT I HAVE HAD ONE FOR A LONG TIME AND NEVER ONCE HAD IT BLOCKED!
reply: Hi Jack,Thank you for taking the time to leave this feedback. In accordance with European banking processes, N26 must carry out regular routine compliance checks on user accounts. We follow these processes to ensure our user accounts are kept safe and secure. In some cases, we must close an account after these checks have been completed. An account is never blocked for no reason, and our Customer Service agents do not have information on this subject, as it is processed by another dedicated department, and further information is provided to you exclusively via email. We kindly ask that you respond to the email you will receive from us with any further queries or concerns that you may have about your account.Best Regards,Your N26 Support Team

title: N26 est un très bon service, fiable, rapide et avec un bon service client !
content: N26 est un super service : Gratuit pour les moins de 26ans, paiement à l'étranger sans frais (très pratique pour les voyages !), une application en temps réelle, facile d'utilisation, sécurisée, un bon service client réactif et ouvert... que demander de plus ? Une ouverture rapide ? Et bien c'est le cas ! en 10mins, votre compte est ouvert, une semaine plus tard votre carte !Les seuls défauts sont les mêmes que n'importe quelle banque en ligne : complexe d'encaisser de la monnaie. De plus les retraits sont limités dans la version "de base". De plus en France, mettre ses revenus sur un compte allemand est complexe et très contrôlé; à éviter pour ce cas précis !

content: La banque du futur oui, quelques ajustements sont encore nécessaires mais la bonne voie est devant nous

name: Dennis Genge
title: Auf keinen Fall weiter zu empfehlen! - Support ist unterirdisch schlecht!!
content: Ich war anfangs sehr begeistert und zufriedener N26 Kunde, da die Online Plattform schick aussieht und soweit auch funktionierte.Nun wollte ich als N26 Geschäftskunde einen Leasingvertrag aufnehmen und wartete über drei Wochen auf eine Rückmeldung. Nach mehreren Anrufen bei der Leasing-Bank habe ich erfahren, dass es nur an N26 liegt, da diese noch nicht die Bankauskunft meines Kontos ausgehändigt haben, sodass ich die Zusage für meinen Leasingvertrag erhalten kann.Einen telefonischen Support bei N26 gibt es nicht und auf meine Nachfrage im Kundenservice Chat wurde ich nur darauf verwiesen, dass Sie solche Auskünfte nur der Bank aushändigen und wurde abgewimmelt. Auf eine weitere Anfrage an die Support E-Mail von N26 erhielt ich lediglich eine Antwort mit dem erneuten Verweis auf den Kunden Service Chat.Ich als Kunde, habe also keine Möglichkeit mit einem internen Mitarbeiter zu telefonieren und den aktuellen Stand abzufragen und meine Leasingbank wartet heute noch auf eine Bankauskunft seitens N26, die jedoch nie eintreffen wird, da sich bei N26 scheinbar niemand darum kümmert. Nun habe ich mir ein neues Geschäftskonto bei einer anderen Bank eröffnet und hoffe dort auf eine bessere Kundenbetreuung.
reply: Hey Dennis, danke für dein ausführliches Feedback.Eine Bankauskunft erteilen wir nur anderen Banken, keinen Privatpersonen oder dem Kunden, sondern nur der anderen Bank. Bitte entschuldige, wenn dich dies verärgert, dennoch kann der Kundensupport dir diese nicht aushändigen.Diese wird bald fertig gestellt sein und dann sofort an die Auftraggeber gesendet.Wir entschuldigen uns für die Unannehmlichkeiten.

name: Chuck
title: Not worth it just for a metal card
content: It's great having a metal card, ran into a few key issue with this card... first of all the app is really quite Buggy, they also make you reset your face ID on your phone and if you travel abroad, don't get me started. Most importantly if you aren't happy with it, they make it really painful for you to leave, they charge you a full year worth of fee's before you are allowed to leave. All in all really disappointing.
reply: Hey Chuck,Thank you for your feedback. This will assist us greatly in improving our processes and services for the future.In the interest of account safety and security, we will ask our customers to reset Face/Touch ID every 30 days. In relation to travelling abroad, our card is accepted worldwide with any merchant which accepts Mastercard. To enable payments in a foreign country, you must go to your mobile app via My Account > Card Settings > Payments Abroad, and there should be no issue with making transactions. In the event you run into an issue when making a transaction, you can contact us from within our mobile app via My Account > Help > Support Chat.We grant a 30 day revocation period when you have opted for a premium Metal or Black account with us. If you decide the account is not for you within that time, you can revert to a free account without charge. Once this 30 day period has passed, it is not possible to revert to a different account without paying the agreed upon fees for the remainder of the contract. Best Regards,Your N26 Support Team

name: Scott
title: Exactement ce que l’on veut.
content: La simplicité d’utilisation et surtout le pouvoir de gérer son argent comme bon nous semble en fait une banque parfaite. les conseillers sont sympathiques et à l’écoute pour n’importe quelle question. einfach perfekt.

name: Daxane Peiller
title: Really bad customer service
content: I am really disappointed with N26, I used it for my trip in South America. And one day I woke up someone did two transactions In India for 240€. I really don’t understand the security process of N26, how can I be in Equador one day and some few hours later in India. There should be a way where when you enter a new country the N26 ask for confirmation instead of just giving away money to Stranger especially India as there is a lot of bank fraud going there. The person was able to withdraw money in a ATM without my physical card witch should not be allowed or it should be a fonction that you can allow in N26. But what I am the most angry about is when I contacted an agent for help he was really unhelpful and could not understand my situation.  All he said to me was you have to cancel your card, I tried to explain that I was in South America and needed money but he kept repeating the same, and avoiding my question about security. In the end I really don’t think that this bank is safe it’s fun because they give you the choice to control your paramètre but it’s seriously missing security features. They add some stuff but forget the most important no one should be able to withdraw money from an ATM without a physical card or it should be linked first with security measure.
reply: Hey Daxane,We apologise for the inconvenience.You can read more about the act of card skimming by reading this N26 Mag article: https://mag.n26.com/what-is-a-an-atm-skimmer-how-to-protect-your-bank-account-when-withdrawing-cash-e9447e24b809If you don’t recognise a transaction or you’re sure you didn’t authorise it, blocking your card won’t be enough. We will send you a chargeback form so you can dispute the fraudulent transaction.You can read more about this here: https://support.n26.com/en-eu/fixing-an-issue/cards/how-to-get-my-money-back-in-case-of-fraudBest regards,Your N26 Support Team

name: Dim
title: Très bien très rapide pour les…
content: Très bien très rapide pour les virements.Juste eu un léger souci administratif qui s'est réglé très rapidement (2 jours).  Je recommande

title: The best innovative banking experience

It is very easy and simple to use with a lot of innovative features.They also have a very good service and they keep improving everything and moving forward.N26 should be a good example to follow by classic banks. They keep the good things from classic banks and make it even better with their innovative technology and user experience.I would recommend N26 to ask my family and friends.

name: B
title: Fraud do not sign up for this!!
content: Fraud do not sign up for this!!I ordered a card that was advertised as being free I was then sent a n26 black card and was expected to pay a monthly fee for it and was unable to cancel the card until I had paid the money.Customer services insisted that I had ordered this card and said there was nothing they could do.
reply: Hey,We offer a Standard account which is free of charge. We also offer premium accounts, Black and Metal which come with a monthly fee. You can find our pricing list on our support center. Here is the link: https://support.n26.com/en-gb/getting-started/account/how-much-does-an-n26-account-costIf you signed up for a Black account, during the sign up process you would have been asked to confirm and accept the Black membership terms and conditions. If you'd like to cancel your N26 Black account you can do so up to 14 days after you signed up. Once this date has passed you will need to pay the remaining fees. Best,Your N26 Support Team

name: Shahin
title: Dont bother trying to get n26 to help with unauthorised transactions
content: I have so far been very satisfied with n26. I joined just under 2 years ago.Then on my card recently i had 2 unauthorised transactions. After having about 4 conversations with different agents explaining myself again and again (i dont think they leave notes anywhere on the acvoubt).. a few weeks later they tell me i need to fill a form out. Not an online form. Old school style..print it off..fill it in and sign it and then email it back. After a week they ask me AGAIN for the same information i gave 4 times on the chat. I replied. Then its just again the same questions per email. The chargeback amount is small so i told them to forget it. This is just not worth my time going back and forth having to have 10 different conversations repeating myself over and over again. They make this process very complex and comletely put me off trying to grt my money back. Anyway their reply was simply 'As per your request I have cancelled your chargeback request,'. Couldnt believe it. No acknowledgement that i told them i dont have time to waste on their over complex process where they make you go back and forth a million times. Maybe they just couldnt be bothered helping one of their customers. My normal bank does it better!
reply: Hi Shahin,Thank you for taking the time to leave your review. Feedback such as this is incredibly important for us to improve our processes and services for the future.We're sorry to learn that the chargeback dispute did not go smoothly for you on this occasion. For future reference, it is not completely necessary for the required chargeback dispute form to be printed out. It can simply be filled in on your computer, signed electronically, and then sent back to us, where it will then be sent to our dedicated specialists to be taken care of. Once you contact us from your registered email address, each correspondence will be recorded to your N26 account so that it can be accessed if you are connected with a different agent, so that they can assist you with your query. We do apologise that this did not happen in relation to your case.Obviously the communication you have received on this topic is not of the standard you had expected from us, and this is not the type of service we endeavour to provide to our customers. Again, we thank you for the valuable feedback that you have provided us with.Best Regards,Your N26 Support Team

name: Eric Raha
title: C'est sûre et pratique.

name: Alex
title: Concordo
content: Concordo, qui stanno truffando tutti, chiuso il conto, ma i bonifici che avevo fatto ad un altro conto per portare fuori il denaro risultano da loro fatti, ma in realtà non sono mai arrivati a destinazione...ridatemi i miei soldi!!!

name: Marcus Sharratt
title: Smooth process
content: So far it's five stars filled in form online sent documents they said it could take five days to be verified took about 10/15 minutes (UK)so I'm up and running just going to wait for my card to arrive before I start using it but so far it's been a smooth process not like the traditional banks in UK where you have to visit and they want to know your shoe size (being sarcastic) but they do want loads of information 👍👍🤞🤞

name: Stela Lourenço
title: I don't have any answer until several…
content: I don't have any answer until several days, after trying to open an accoutn with N26

name: Julian G
title: Eine furchtbare Bank - Betrug?!
content: Eine furchtbare Bank. Ich fühle mich seit Wochen vom Support verarscht. Keine Antworten oder nur halbausgegorene. Man kann diese Menschen nicht einmal anrufen und ich bezweifle das dieser Support der Deutschen sprache mächtig ist. Meistens wirken die Antworten wie von Google Translate kopiert. Ich werde schnellstmöglich Kündigen und mich einer richtigen Bank zuwenden.Zusätzlich wird mir ein Teil meines Geldes vorenthalten - welches der Grund für meinen Kontakt mit dem Support ist - Achtung Betrug !
reply: Hey Stela,We're sorry the verification didn't work as expected. We're obligated to verify your identity before opening an account. To ensure quality photos and a successful verification process, please make sure to check your lighting, consider switching mobile devices, or switching your connection from WiFi to your phone's network.https://support.n26.com/en-eu/fixing-an-issue/personal-information/why-isnt-my-photo-verification-workingBest regards,Your N26 Support Team

name: Carsten Sanonym
title: Account wurde ohne Begründung gekündigt
content: Account wurde ohne Begründung sofort gekündigt. Den Restbetrag konnte ich selber nicht mehr auf ein eigenes Konto überweisen. Der Support antwortet nicht auf die Mail zur Bitte um Überweisung. Im Chat Support gibt es keinerlei Auskünfte über den Verbleib meines Geldes. Von der Verwendung war ich ursprünglich begeistert, das hat sich jetzt natürlich relativiert. Es ist eine Bank auf die man sich nicht verlassen kann.
reply: Hey Julian, danke für dein Feedback.Sofern du nicht gegen unsere AGB verstößt, haben wir keinen Grund ein Konto einzufrieren.Sofern dies geschehen ist, kann der Kundensupport dir keine Auskünfte geben.Alle Informationen kannst du nur noch über die Kollegen des Back-Office erhalten, welche dir dies bezüglich auch eine Email senden und dich um eine zusätzliche Kontoverbindung bitten, damit wir dir dein restliches Geld auszahlen können, sofern es dem Kunden zusteht.Sofern alle Informationen vorhanden sind, wird das Geld auch bald auf deinem Konto ausgezahlt werden.Gruß, dein N26 Support-Team.

name: Danny
title: Inaktzeptabler Support (keine Antworten…
content: Inaktzeptabler Support (keine Antworten auf Anfragen).Wie der derzeitigen Berichterstattung zu entnehmen ist, sind bei der N26-Bank hunderte gefälschte Konten im Umlauf. Fragwürdig ist auch die Sicherheit des Identifikationsprozesses.Auch ich habe sehr schlechte Erfahrungen mit der Bank machen müssen und habe keinen Support bekommen.Wer sein Geld sicher verwahrt haben möchte sollte dieses Unternehmen auf jeden Fall meiden.
reply: Hey Carsten, danke für dein Feedback.Als vollwertige Bank muss sich N26 den geltenden Bankvorschriften unterwerfen. Diese Regelung zielt darauf ab, unsere Nutzer zu schützen.Bei der Verwendung deines Bankkontos treten keine Probleme auf, wenn du nicht gegen unsere Allgemeinen Geschäftsbedingungen verstößt.Sollte dies geschehen sein, werden wir dich kontaktieren, um weiteres vorgehen zu besprechen und dir auch dein Restgeld auszuzahlen.Inzwischen sollte dies geschehen sein und wir wünschen dir weiterhin alles Gute.

name: Gabriele Loffredo
title: N26 Bank
content: So easy and so fast
reply: Hey Danny, danke für dein Feedback.Solltest du den Verdacht auf Betrug mit einem unserer Konten hegen, kannst du dies bei unserem Kundensupport sofort melden, sodass wir alle nötigen Schritte unternehmen können.Wir helfen dir gerne bei allen möglichen Problemen weiter.https://n26.com/de-de/sicherheit

name: Artur Boghiu
title: N26 Bank does exactly what you expect...
content: The service what they provide does exactly what you are expecting. You need a bank, it’s the one you’ll be happy with. Easy to use and no restrictions on overdraws. I love my new N26 card

name: Valérie Heimbach
title: Très satisfaite jusqu'à présent pour mes voyages
content: Très satisfaite jusqu'à présent pour mes voyages à New York et Prague. J'espère que la suite sera toujours aussi bien. Pas de commissions sur les achats par cb bien que ma carte soit la version gratuite. Application bien pensée. Le nécessaire y est. Un plus serait un tchat dispo à toute heure selon les décalages horaires mais il faut quand même respecter le temps de travail des agents. Que du bien pour le moment. Par contre le live tchat NEON ne comprend rien à mes demandes donc à améliorer très rapidement.

name: Sandra C
title: Indispensable pour les voyageurs
content: La carte N26 m'a permis de faire de belles économies en partant en vacances en Malaisie.  j'ai payé tous les hôtels avec la carte et aucun frais de change .La sécurité de la carte est accessible depuis l'application : quand je ne l'utilise pas je bloque tout (retrait -achat en ligne- paiement )Le virement depuis ma banque vers le compte N26 est rapide (jour ouvré +1) . Pensez à anticiper le virement les week-ends. SAV par chat efficace et rapide . C'est ma carte vacances- sorties - week-end : je ne pourrais plus m'en passer .

name: L99S93
title: All Round Amazing
content: Customer Service is Amazing. Wide array of products are amazing.One of very few banks that make you feel like a person, not just an account.You're never waiting more than a minute to speak to an advisor. Only ever had one issue (which was not N26's fault), and they helped and assisted me to resolve it.

name: Ruki Michaelis
title: Utilisation de N26 depuis octobre 2018…
content: Utilisation de N26 depuis octobre 2018 et je suis ravi. Application très bien pensée, aucun bug. Possibilité d’avoir un conseiller sur le tchat rapidement.J’ai testé les divers offres de N26 : Black puis maintenant métal et j’ai rien à redire tout est parfait. Je garde un compte en France pour les chèques et espèces car il n’est pas encore possible d’en déposé.

name: Yvette Martins
title: I can't even believe I was unaware of…
content: I can't even believe I was unaware of the ease of mind and spirit that N26 would bring to my current way of banking. I'm never going back to traditional banking - I'm N26 for life. Fast, secure, amazing customer support and I love the many features the app provides for savings, it makes savings fun, if that's even possible. I'm really glad to be a customer.

name: Sami
title: Rien à dire
content: Rien à dire, tout simplement satisfait.

name: Ghita El Bouamri
title: N26 is the best choice I made this year!
content: N26 is the best choice I made this year!Aside from being very convenient, frictionless in registration and usage; the user experience is amazing!I hardly ever had problem managing my money with N26 as a banking app and the speed and convenience really suits me as a digital consumer.Keep it up!!

name: François Bacquet
title: From "amazing service" down to "useless card"...
content: Amazing service!Very safe with the option to enable or not services like ATM withdrawal, online payment, etcVery efficient with a chat to talk to the support team if needed to solve an issue fast.Good insurance (I already used them for a delayed flight and the service was spot on)*** UPDATE FROM MY PREVIOUS REVIEW ***The service of N26 went downhill since my last review. I am now totally unable to use my card abroad. Every single time I use it in Indonesia or Thailand the card triggers a security and is blocked. I always spend so much time with the chat support trying to unblock it. Sometimes it works, most of the time it doesn't. It gets very frustrating. The card already has features to protect from fraud so i don't understand why there are so many security triggers.Imagine when you arrive in a country with no possibility to use your credit card to pay or withdraw. You better have some cash at hand just in case. Very unreliable credit card... I feel sorry for recommending your services to so many of my friends

name: Mercedes
title: No Panic! At The Bank
content: Really comfortable and easy!Best option for people with anxiety to be honest.

name: Dadamoh Houacine
title: Ouverture du compte très facile
content: Ouverture du compte très facileService sans aucun bug

name: Jiraya
title: SAV très reactif
content: SAV très réactif … sauf pendant les jours fériés:-))Réponses pertinentes et adaptées

name: Kawa Banda
title: I love iy
content: I love it. The bank is exactly what I wanted it to be. Being a young person who doesn’t need the luxury of specific card insurances, I’m absolutely satisfied with the basic account, the immediate updates on my expenses, ease of making transfers through transferwise and also ability to save money. I’ve had some bug issues on the app with money transfers or had issues printing out account information. In the first case downloading the app again solved the problem and in the second the person I chatted with made sure to send me the info via email. So voila !

name: Marina Bueckle
title: Sehr sehr schlehte Bank
content: Sehr sehr schlehte Bank, hat mein Konto gekündigt, auf dem 1750 Euro von uns liegen. Sie antworten weder auf emails, noch kann ich sie erreichen. Der Kunden Support ist eine absolute Katastrophe. Sie sagen einfach: Ich bin nicht dazu befugt, ihnen eine Antworte zu geben! Lasst bloss eure finger weg!
reply: Hey Martina, danke für dein Feedback.Sollte ein Kunde gegen unsere AGB verstoßen, kann der Kundensupport dir darüber keine Informationen geben.Alle Informationen, welche wir benötigen, um dir den Geld auszahlen zu können, werden dir in einer Email von den zuständigen Kollegen mitgeteilt. Auf diese Email kannst du Antworten, sodass dir dein Geld bald ausgezahlt werden wird.Wir entschuldigen uns, wenn die Auszahlung ein wenig Zeit in Anspruch nimmt, um alles zu kontrollieren und zu protokollieren.Grüße, dein N26 Support Team

name: Nadja Dallagnol
title: After losing my credit card I needed to…
content: After losing my credit card I needed to get in touch with the customer support for the first time. It's very easy to block the lost card, just a few clicks in the app. I then used the chat support to let N26 know what happened and they flagged my account for me, in case anybody would try to impersonate me and have me advise on how to request a new card (which is also pretty easy and doable through the app). All in all, N26 is a great bank. It really makes banking so easy and no matter what the issue is, you're able to solve it in under 5 minutes.

name: Myriam Diana
title: Peggio che pessima
content: Metto una stella perché di meno non si può. PESSIMI. Chiudono il conto improvvisamente inventandosi una scusa e non restituiscono i soldi trattenuti, con la scusa che la mail non è associata a nessun conto. Ovvio che non è più associata se ne lo avete chiuso senza motivo, senza preavviso e senza darmi la possibilità di prelevare o spostare i miei soldi. Inoltre l'assistenza non risponde, rimanda all'estero mail ricevuta, una mail a cui o non si hanno risposte, o rispondono incompetenti. Ottima banca per chi si vuole far chiudere il conto senza preavviso. Chiudono in blocco, dando a tutti la stessa motivazione, ovviamente inventata. Nella mia famiglia ne hanno chiusi 3 nello stesso istante, con la scusa di aver superato i limiti, peccato che l'unico conto che veniva usato era il mio, e stavo ben attenta. Sconsigliatissima

name: Cedric Darquey
title: Excellent
content: Excellent je recommande

name: Maikel Van Eylen
title: Great expirience
content: Great expirience! That's everything I can say. A prepaud card that's accepted everywhere, you don'nt find that very often

name: saft saft
title: Urgence n ouvrez jamais de compte chez N26.......
content: Urgence n ouvrez jamais de compte chez n 26 .....car le jour où ils veulent vous bloquer votre compte vous pourrez pleurer des larmes mais en vain....Bloque sans raison motif réel et sérieux, et aucun contact possible.Donc plaintes, tribunal européen. Etc. reply: Bonjour, nous vous remercions d'avoir pris le temps d'écrire ce message.Si vous souhaitez avoir plus d'informations concernant le blocage/la fermeture de votre compte N26, vous pouvez suivre ce lien :  https://mag-fr.n26.com/compte-n26-bloqu%C3%A9-nous-vous-expliquons-pourquoi-ef27470083ca Salutations,Votre équipe N26.

name: Tobias Stephan
title: !!!!!Konto ist verloren!!!!!
content: !!!!!Konto ist verloren!!!!!Aus irgendeinem Grund hat die N26 App mich aus meinem Konto ausgesperrt und eine längst nicht mehr in Benutzung befindliche Handynummer als "Inhaber-Handy" gesetzt. Die mit dem Account verknüpfte eMail Adresse läuft diesen Monat aus, und lässt sich nicht ändern, da ich (wegen falscher Handynummer (s.o.)) die Änderung nicht bestätigen kann. Die 'Entknüpfung' läuft auf Fehler, und ein Hinweis wird eingeblendet ich soll den Support kontaktieren. - Englischer Support (nicht genügend deutsche Kapazitäten?) sagte das meine Personalausweisnummer falsch ist, ich soll meine Reisepassnummer durchgeben. WIE BITTE? Ich habe mich mit Personalausweis verifiziert. Wie soll dann Bitteschön die Reisepassnummer im System stehen?!Lange Rede kurzer Sinn: Auch mit Support lies sich weder Mail- noch Handyangaben ändern. Das Konto ist somit Herrenlos, und es ist nicht wieder möglich den Besitz zu erlangen. Konto ist quasi gekündigt. Geldbewegungen übernimmt glücklicherweise die neue Bank.

reply: Hey Tobias, danke für dein Feedback.Sollte sich dein Personalausweis in der Zeit seit der Anmeldung aktualisiert haben, musst du dieses auch bei uns melden, sodass wir die neue Nummer zur Verifikation übernehmen können.Dies kannst du ganz einfach im N26 Chat ansprechen.Nach der Änderung und der Möglichkeit für dich, dich zu verifizieren, können die Kollegen dir auch helfen und die Änderungen in deinem Konto vornehmen.Gruß, dein N26 Support Team

name: Steven Dewsbery
title: AVOID Banking equivalent to a tinder date with a Stalker
content: Foolishly responded to free account link on an Instagram add that opened a ‘Free’ N26 account. During sign up I was shown the shinny metal card as a card option......so selected the shinny thing .... a few screens later my free account was now £14.50 month, with sketchy details of benefits (lounge access sounded nice but lounge key had zero details online), so I stepped back and instead selected basic card and opened the free version of the account.  I received no emails or other correspondence and no card arrived basic or otherwise.Months later N26 long since forgotten a shinny metal card arrives to my home..Ok so I guess no one was willing to pay £14.50 for nothing and now everyone gets the metal one......still no such thing as free so I did some research and saw that others had experienced this..... key callout was make sure it’s inactive in the AppSo I launched the N26 app and saw that Metal account was indeed active, so I immediately deactivated it.So to be clear I did not order the metal card and then cancelled the card account I did not as soon as unordered card was unexpectedly received.Now months later I logged into app because it showed a notifications.... since the card and account was inactive I was curious at the notifications, so sought to read them before deleting them. They advised that I owed 2 x £14.50 to N26.....for the unordered card that was cancelledSo I used chat to get in touch....only available means for this bank.Agent told me that since I did not cancel within 30 days I was now locked into a 12 month contract.This is my worst ‘banking’ experience.N26 is like going on a Tinder date with a stalker, sure you went on a date once but you ended the date in the first 10 minutes after realising their was no chemistry between you....Meanwhile Stalky N26 went and told all its friends your dating and sent you a gift one month later that you did not return.......So now N26 thinks your married.....N26 even managed to get an online marriage certificate......... sure you did not sign anything.... but N26 saw the way you smiled in that dreamy first date, plus you loved his gift..... so that must mean your married right?On the plus side I doubt N26’s marriage certificate will stand up to legal scrutiny......... but sadly that won’t get your wasted time back.Searching trust pilot I see many people were just sent the metal card and then had my above experience even when they ordered the basic card one..... if only I’d done more research before clicking that Instagram ‘FREE BANK ACCOUNT’ link.You would probably not knowingly date a stalker so don’t enter into any form of interaction with N26, unless that’s your thing. In which case I hope you and N26 have a nice life together.Plenty of decent online banks that offer the same but without the stalky extortion component. Monzo, Tide etc.
reply: Hey Steven,We offer a Standard account which is free of charge and premium accounts which come with a monthly fee. If you signed up for a Metal account, during the sign up process you would have been asked to confirm and accept the Metal membership terms and conditions. To cancel your N26 Metal account you can do so up to 30 days after you signed up. Once this date has passed you will need to pay the remaining fees. You can read more about our revocation process on our support center: https://support.n26.com/en-eu/fixing-an-issue/membership-plans/how-to-cancel-my-n26-black-or-n26-metal-membershipBest,Your N26 Support Team

reply: Hey Can, danke für dein Feedback.Eine Mastercard Reklamation kann nur 120 Tage rückwirkend beansprucht werden, dies ist in den AGB und den Vorgaben von Mastercard vorgehalten.Du hast uns die Dokumente am 23.04 zugesendet, für eine Abbuchung vom 13.12. dadurch sind die 120 Tage bereits abgelaufen und ein Chargeback ist unserer Seite aus nicht möglich.Du kannst dich dies bezüglich immer noch mit dem Händler auseinander setzen und mit diesem eine Einigung treffen.Grüße, dein N26 Support Team.

title: Seit rund 2 Jahren dabei ohne Probleme
content: Ich bin bereits seit rund zwei Jahren Kunde dieser Bank und kann die vielen schlechten Bewertungen nicht nachvollziehen, da ich auch den Vergleich zu anderen traditionellen Banken habe. Überweisungen gehen gleich raus, Gutschriften werden in der Regel noch am selben Werktag abends gutgeschrieben, wenn andere Banken den Betrag erst am Folgetag gutschreiben. Das ganze kostenlos. Ich wäre gerne bereit für das Konto zu zahlen, aber das Premiumkonto mit den Versicherungsleistungen bietet mir persönlich keinen Mehrwert. Google Pay und Apple Pay wird angeboten. Probleme hatte ich in alle den Jahren nicht, um die Bank einem Stresstest zu unterziehen. Dann erst merkt man wie gut eine Bank wirklich ist. Ich bin allgemein sehr zufrieden mit N26 und würde es jederzeit weiterempfehlen.

content: J’ai un compte depuis six mois et d’un seul coup ils m’ont bloqué mon compte pour vérification des virements que j’ai reçu de ma voiture que j’ai vendu et là ça fait cinq mois que j’essaie de récupérer 16 000 € sur mon compte la date de clôture était le 24 avril année j’ai envoyé quatre fois pour transférer l’argent sur mon compte en France je n’ai toujours rien ils ne répondent à aucun e-mail et le  Live chat vous envoie balader à chaque fois la conversation de répondre directement à l’e-mail reçu de moi argent a disparu de mon compte et je n’ai rien faites attention

name: PizzaXprezz
title: Irgendwas stimmt hier gewaltig nicht...
content: Vorab: sowohl mein Vater als auch ich besitzen die Albanische Staatsbürgerschaft. Mein Vater hat sein N26-Konto (die Kostenlose) erstellt und konnte sie sogar per VideoIdent mit seiner Aufenthaltserlaubnis bestätigen. Die Karte kam schnell und bislang funktionierte das Bezahlen und Einzahlen wie geschmiert. Die Nutzung per Smartphone ist so komfortabel und simpel, dass das jeder hinkriegt. Bezahlen per Google Pay macht sogar viel zu viel Spaß, da reicht das Geld aber nicht :PJetzt aber mal eine ernst gemeinte Frage, N26: es ist April 2019 und ich bekomme keine Erlaubnis mehr ein Konto mit meiner Albanischen Staatsangehörigkeit zu öffnen, obwohl es mein Vater hingekriegt hat? Ich habe ein Konto eröffnet und wollte mich dann in der App verifizieren. Pustekuchen... meine nationalen Dokumente werden angeblich nicht unterstützt. HÄ? Das ging doch bei meinem Vater... also direkt Chat mit einem Supporter geöffnet, der mir sagt, dass die App automatisch die Identifikationsart auswählt und diese nicht mehr änderbar sei. VideoIdent sei nicht verfügbar mit den albanischen Pass, nur PostIdent, UND DAS NOCH NICHT EINMAL MIT DEM REISEPASS, SONDERN NUR MIT DEM AUSWEIS! Die Liste an unterstützten Dokumenten ist schon fast ein Witz, denn jeder Reisepass im Balkan wird als VideoIdent unterstützt oder per PostIdent, der Albanische Pass aber nicht, trotz gleichen Standards der biometrischen Sicherheit? Das grenzt schon fast an Rassismus.Also hab ich den Support gefragt, was ich machen kann? Abwarten, anscheinend kann man da nichts machen, bis die Dokumente von Albanien, einem anscheinend krass gefährlichen Staat mit Terrorgefahr, unterstützt werden. Sogar der Afghanische Pass, der Pass mit der eingeschränktesten Reisemöglichkeit der Welt, kann per VideoIdent bestätigt werden! Das nennt ihr "Transparenz"? Ihr habt es innerhalb eines Jahres geschafft, einen Rückschritt zu machen. Bringt das endlich in Ordnung, sonst geh ich einfach zur DKB oder einer anderen internationalen Bank mit smartem Online-Banking.
reply: Hey PizzaXprezz, danke für dein ausführliches Feedback.Hier findest du eine Liste mit allen Dokumenten, welche wir zur Verifizierung nutzen dürfen: https://support.n26.com/de-de/erste-schritte/persoenliche-daten/wie-kann-ich-mich-ausweisenDiese Liste wird von der BAFIN vorausgesetzt, wir haben darüber keinen Einfluss, sondern wird reguliert, damit es keine Probleme in der Sicherheit gibt.Sofern du einen Deutschen Pass beantragst, kann eine Verifizierung durchgeführt werden aber der momentane Stand lässt dies nicht zu.Grüße, dein N26 Support Team
