name: Sara Spencer
title: Love it!
content: Easy, instant, graphic information on spending, which gives me more insight and control over spending.   I am happy to spend money but I dislike wasting it.  N26 helps me know where my money goes. It's quick and easy to make payments and it's all there for me to see.

name: Sarah
title: Never thought I’d like a bank...
content: N26 is so easy to use and easy to set up. The customer service team are really helpful, and the fees for travellers are the cheapest I’ve found. Instant notifications when you receive money or spend. And “Spaces” make it so easy to set up savings and budgeting. I definitely recommend!

name: LM LM
title: Arnaque
content: Arnaque ! Très satisfaite au départ des l’ouverure De mon compte, j’ai reçu il y a deux jours un mail me disant sans explications que mon compte serait résilié le 24/04Mon fils dont le nom de famille est différent a reçu exactement le même J’ai contacté le chat de N26 qui n’ont pas voulu me donner de réponse, impossible de les avoir au téléphone ! Pas de réponse par mail ... je ne sais toujours pas la raison et je dois annuler tous mes prélèvements et retirer mon argent ! Scandaleux ...

title: Une banque dynamique et à l'écoute !

name: scott
title: This is the account we have all been…
content: This is the account we have all been waiting for. Simple to use. Your own space to manage your money. Effortless app. Excellent customer service. Highly recommend.

name: Vince Kruger
title: Outstanding Service
content: The service from N26 is amazing.  I've had a number of queries and every query has been dealt with correctly and efficiently.

name: BEAUFRET Ep. CASIER
title: Mon mari et moi avons ouvert un compte…
content: Mon mari et moi avons ouvert un compte N26 il y a moins d'un mois, environ 2 semaines après nous avons émis chacun les même virements à parts égales sur nos nouveaux comptes N26 depuis notre compte joint.Pour mon mari aucun problème, ses virements sont arrivés et son compte fonctionne très bien.Pour moi en revanche, cela a été particulièrement difficile puisque le Back Office m'a envoyé un mail me demandant d'envoyer les 3 derniers relevés compte de mon comte N26 que je venais d'ouvrir... Absurde ! N'est ce pas ? J'ai donc écrit plusieurs fois, par intuition j'ai envoyé mes preuves d'ordre de virement depuis le compte joint... Mais aucune réponse... Seulement des rappels toujours incompréhensibles... J'en ai déduit que le problème résidait peut-être sur mon nom d'épouse et nom de jeune fille, les virements étant partie du compte joint intitulé M. & Mme + (Nom de mon époux) après 10 jours d'échanges par mail infructueux, j'ai reçu en fin de semaine dernière un avis d'annulation de mon compte... Et je ne sais toujours pas où se trouve mon argent virés depuis notre compte joint, ni ce que N26 va faire avec ces virements qui ne sont toujours pas crédités  sur mon compte N26... Le Back Office va t'il renvoyer mes virements vers ma banque émettrice ? Je l'espère... d'autant qu'il s'agit d'une somme importante...11 mars 2019 : BONNE NOUVELLE ! N26 ne clôturera pas mon compte finalement... Avec de l'aide informatique, nous avons envoyé des documents justificatifs par courriel et N26 a annulé la procédure de clôture dont je faisais l'objet.Par souci d'équité, je comprends les obligations de la banque à devoir suivre certaines procédures, car en cas ne non respect N26 peut avoir des sanctions voir même au pire perdre leur agrément...Seulement leur mode opératoire est tout de même compliqué pour le commun des mortels... et gérer tout par échange virtuel en ligne peut être très pénalisant pour les clients.Je suggèrerai que N26 se dote d'un service téléphonique pour les questions de Back-Office notamment pour guider les clients comme moi...Mes virements sont tout de même revenus sur mon compte très rapidement, je vais juste devoir refaire mes opérations...

name: D. Steinmann
title: N26 Bank GmbH Berlin Verdachtsanzeigen...
content: N26 Bank GmbH macht einfach so massen Verdachtsanzeigen und es ist einfach nur eine Frechheit! Viel Rennerei, man bekommt sein Geld nicht solange das Verfahren läuft und da Zoll und BKA hinterher hängen kann das mal gut 1 Jahr dauern bis man eine Vorladung erhält. Solange schlummert das Verfahren und leider ist man total machtlos, da ja auch die Bank nach der verfachtsanzeige zum Stillschweigen angehalten ist. Deshalb bekommt man seitens des Chats oder per E-Mail keine Antwort !Danke N26 für diesen „Service“
reply: Hey, vielen Dank für deine ehrlichen Worte. Es tut uns Leid, dass wir dich in solch eine Lage versetzt haben. Wir werden dein Feedback an die entsprechende Abteilung weiterleiten.

As soon as I can I am closing my account.  I was so upset I told them I am contacting the ombudsman..respnse - "You are welcome to do that. Have a nice day." STUNNINGLY BAD

content: Not possible to make transfer out of SEPA. Payments abroad are not working in some countries (CAPE VERDE) even though i set all the limits and authorisation... tried to manage it with the customer service, which is really handy, but still didn't work... Otherwise, transfers in SEPA zone and payments in Europe are quite handy with the application...  but I took this bank account to facilitate my payments out of SEPA,... this is too bad...!

name: Paul Tyler
title: Most stupid process
content: I tried to open an account over 7 weeks ago. I went through all the steps and I was informed that a card would be delivered in 3 weeks (too long but OK). I waited nearly 5 weeks for a card to arrive but nothing. I contacted "customer services" who told me they would send another and that it would be with me in 10 days so I waited over 2 weeks but again nothing. I then contacted customer service again and proceeded to go through the security measures of which one is what date did the welcome email come through. Sadly I no longer have this email from nearly 2 months ago, this is my fault, fair enough, however I was then told that there was no way to proceed without knowing the date of this email other than requesting my account to be deleted and then start the process all over again. I was then told but Lewis (who was terribly unhelpful) this would "need some patience" as I would have to wait a while for this to happen. Is it really the case that without this WELCOME email, it is now impossible to open an account?

name: Chris Galliver
title: Missing payment
content: Up until now been more that happy with N26. I am also a metal card holder and was advised on the N26 Twitter account that bacs payments are now available and you can get your wages paid into your accounts on the 4TH but to allow 6 weeks for all banks to update their systems. I have done this and was paid on the Monday and should have received funds on the Wednesday, it is now Friday and the monies £3450 have still not hit my account, was told that the issue would be resolved and I now have defaulted on a mortgage payment and no money to pay my bills, very rude agent on the customer chat (Stephen) that wouldn’t even give me a timeframe of when this would be resolved, left with no money and in debt with no fault of my own :( just pray I haven’t been scammed unsure how legitimate this company is that’s trading in the UK  :(

name: Mélanie
title: Un compte 100% gratuit
content: Un compte 100% gratuit, ça peut paraître incroyable, pourtant, c'est la vérité le seul problème est qu'en France, il y a pas mal d'organismes qui refusent le compte allemand car informatiquement ça ne passe pas, le il manque 5 chiffres au rib, donc l'ordinateur détecte une erreur, par contre, pour les organismes qui acceptent ce rib, il faut bien se renseigner de la date précise de prélèvement, car si le virement ne passe pas, les frais sont immédiat (3euros par prélèvement refusé (malheureusement, il n'y a pas de découvert autorisé chez N26 pour les Français)) , sinon, les virements sont très rapides (le lendemain les sous sont sur le compte destinataire) , si le destinataire est également chez N26, le virement est immédiat je recommande vivement cette banque, cela fait plusieurs années que mon conjoint l'utilise pour tous ces paiement (carte bancaire) et qu'il reçoit sa paie dessu, il n'y a jamais eu de soucis.

name: CSGO TROLLTEAM
title: PUES EL MEJOR BANCO
content: PUES EL MEJOR BANCO, SIN COMISONES SIN ERRORES, SIN PAGOS MENSUALES, SIN SEGUROS OBLIGATORIOS. ADEMAS TARJETA GRATIS, MUY ULTIL, DEJO LINK DE REFERIDO POR SI ALGUIEN QUIERE REGISTRARSE.https:// goo.gl/ kwz75r

name: Nick Steen
title: Top notch bank with excellent customer service.
content: An excellent bank with all tools necessary for travellers and daily transfers. Very smooth customer service and of course very beautiful credit cards (it's the simple things in life that count).I have contacted the customer service a couple of times, both for small questions and urgent requests, and every time I was helped smoothly and friendly. The issues were resolved in record time and I never had a feeling of being left in the dark, which is really nice considering it's your money they're working with.The app works intuitively, and most importantly, has never failed on me. It's both secure and simple, so you can find everything you need in an easy manner. The diagnostics are great, though the automated payment type recognition could use some more refinement, but nothing that a little manual correction can't solve.As a frequent traveller, it's especially great to have the Mastercard charges dropped. It has saved me quite some money in the long term.All in all a perfect allround bank with a smooth app and never failing credit card, which is all you need for regular transactions. If necessary, the customer service is great and helps you sort out your issues quickly and accurately.

name: Illia Smieshkov
title: Fast and transparent
content: Being a paperless bank N26 is able to process all incoming requests immediately. Everything looks transparent and easy to understand.Although I meet some minor bugs in iOS app from time to time, my experience is still smooth.

name: Alex Grosjean
title: Match with my expectations
content: Match with my expectations Works in almost every places i've been (bit harder in China). Low fees for withdrawal, clearly said in your bank account sum up (1.7%). Possibility to pay in local currency for free and free for under 26 people. Fast to answer in case of emergency (credit card lost in Cuba)Can't ask for more

content: Nicht nur für junge Leute! Mit knapp 50 habe ich in meinem Leben viele Banken erlebt, Sparkasse, Deutsche Bank, Postbank .... Keine Bank war so unkompliziert wie N26. Alles ohne Papierkram, von der Kontoeröffnung bis zum Dispo. Ein Irrglaube ist jedoch, dass N26 Schufafrei ist, so wie es in vielen Portalen beworben wird. Ganz im Gegenteil, es erfolgt eine Anfrage an die Schufa und ein Eintrag zum Girokonto. Das ist auch gut so, denn ich selber möchte die Bonität meines gegenüber auch wissen.

In all it might seem like a great idea, however sadly I would defiently not recommend N26, as a tradiontal bank you would still get better service and experience.

name: Saad Asif
title: The worst customer service I have ever experienced.
content: I contacted N26 regarding a basic feature which all banks offer. That feature being the ability to save Payee details for future payments. However the customer service representative I was chatting with was very rude when asking her regarding this feature.She ended the chat before I got done asking questions and she had the nerve to tell me that if you do not like our services, you can close down your account. Now I am no customer service expert, but to my knowledge, customer retention is a big part of customer services and I have never before been told that if you do not like our services then close your account. I am a metal account holder and I expected greater customer service, however that was not the case. To make matters worse, when I tried to call N26 through the app, I was told that the lines were closed and I was re-directed to the chat again. I called N26 once at 9 AM and then again at 1Pm and then again at 4 PM. However every time I got the message that out phone lines are closed. What is the point of offering a customer service number, when the lines are closed all day. By the end of this month I will be closing my account and I will never consider their services again.

name: Pascal Grund
title: Finger weg von N 26
content: Rate jedem sich eine andere Bank zu suchen.Am 23.01.2019 wurde mein Konto angeblich aufgrund von Routineprufungen kurzzeitig geschlossen. Am 24.1. 2019 kam die Kündigung per Mail mit dem Hinweis das Konto sei bis zum 18.2. Nutzbar.War es aber nicht.Am 18.2. Erneut Email erhalten mit Schließung bzw entknüpfung meines Smartphones. Vom 26.1. Bis 18.2. mehrmals Kundendienst abgeschrieben immer wurde gesagt Geld wurde am 18.2. Überwiesen.Bis heute kein Geld auf dem neuen Konto. Und seit dem 18.2. meldet sich keiner mehr.Es handelt sich um 690 Eur

title: Stick with Starling or Monzo, at least they know what they're doing
content: Very poor communication, applied for an account in December, app still says my paperwork is being checked, how hard can it be? No emails, texts or calls, so shove your paperwork, if you can't be arsed to sort an application, I can't be arsed to trust you with my money. Have opened an account with Starling that's equal if not better than what you offer.

I've been waiting for 3 months for a resolution on a transfer that never arrived and 16 old kid cant solve it . Completely amateur.

content: SimplicityI am using N26 for almost a year now and must say that I like the most is simplicity and efficiency in services I need from a neobank.I am excited to see how the future services will evolved but sincerely hope it magic of simplicity will stay.

name: Pedro A.
title: N26 - Great banking option
content: Easy sign-up, easy banking, great app and great communication. Exchange rates/fees for payments in foreign currencies are also better than most conventional banks. Got nothing but positive things to say about N26.

name: M ASIM
title: N26 is mind blowing mobile account and…
content: N26 is mind blowing mobile account and i'm in love with them. If you need lighting fast payments and notifications without fuss i would prefer to jump in and get N26. Really easy to use awesome app and you will receive real time notifications whenever you use your account weather to shope online or at store which is the most important for me to keep and eye.To be honest i was really fed up with UK high street accounts although paying monthly charges to them from years but every other day i face problems with them specifically late payments or fussy in clearing payments and lot of time wasting appointments caused me stress as i need to take off from job just to go and solve problem with bank. Also calling them and waiting in queue so long makes me so sick.N26 is peace of mind. No fuss, no appointments for account opening, get real time notifications, providing you spaces to save money or achieve your target. I received faster payments and also send faster payments without any fuss and stress. I love N26 i'm happy i joined as a early bird and waited so long for them to start banking in UK.Highly recommended bank to all those who need bank without any fuss and someone very responsive. Go for it

name: Mauro
title: One of the best services ever.

name: Frédéric

name: Michael Barbasso
title: Super, dans le cas ou on ne vous bloque pas votre compte !!!
content: Super,J'ai ouvert un compte N26 pour mon activité d'auto entrepreneur sans vraiment tenir compte des messages négatif.J'avoue, c'est une bonne banque gratuite, avec de bons services, tout en ligne.Par contre, premier point négatif, si vous être un auto entrepreneur qui doit payer la TVA (dépassement du première plafond), impossible de faire des prélèvement avec le SIE.EN PLUS, ils peuvent, pour des raisons qui m'échappent bloquer votre compte. Impossible de faire des virements, des retraits, ...Je me retrouve avec une bonne partie de mon argent bloqué. J'ai beau contacter le service client en ligne (très réactif), il me demande de patienter !Je trouve juste hallucinant qu'une banque soit dans la légalité de bloquer les fonds d'une personne pendant plus d'une semaine !Donc voilà pourquoi, je ne conseillerai pas N26 !

name: Adam
title: International app
content: International currrency accounts at a reasonable rate with a one click conversion to local currency

name: Phen ph
title: Il prelievo all'estero non è gratuito!!!!
content: Ciao, ho aperto un conto N26 da poco e devo riscontrare che la gratuità del prelievo in area Euro non è assolutamente vera.Mi trovo in Spagna ed ho provato a ritirare in 3 ATM diversi. Tutti e tre mi chiedono una commissione di 1,75 Euro. Ho protestato con l’assistenza clienti e mi hanno risposto che loro non controllano le commissioni applicate dalle banche locali. La stessa cosa è scritta nelle FAQ del sito.Peraltro interrompendo l’operazione quando viene indicato il costo della commissione il denaro viene comunque bloccato sul conto come se il prelievo fosse stato effettuato. All’assistenza clienti mi hanno detto di aspettare 10 giorni e ricontattarli se i soldi non vengono riaccreditati.Sono molto deluso. Sicuramente chiuderò il conto al più presto.

Très agréable, et a résolu mon problème très rapidement . Je recommande fortement N26, il y a l'ai d'avoir un suivi encore mieux qu'une banque physique

name: Christopher Rom
title: Potential Scam - Be careful
content: Potential Scam - Be carefulFirst time I heard about N26, it seemed to good to be true. But I still gave it a go. I talked to somebody via video chat to verify, which seemed already very dodgey. Nevertheless I went through the process. Once all said and done I was told the card was on its way and would arrive within 2weeks.Nothing. No response to my email. So I waited patiently a few more months, nothing whatsoever. It never arrived. I doubt it was ever sent out.So I didn't keep bothering for obvious reasons.One year passes, I stumbled over an email from N26, logged into my account to see whats going on.Looks like they want me to pay now. Absolute insane.Screenshots:gyazo.com/ ab3315fe9f1340ea502c66e2e810770egyazo.com/ 1dc63cdd830bf0c7fd88ee710742239c(remove the space after the / )I can't even believe half of the positive comments here. Can't be just bad luck. Be careful guys!

title: Une banque transparente et avantageuse !

name: Biagio Passaro
title: SOLDI RESTITUITI ATTENZIONE ALLA TRUFFA!
content: Dopo 4 mesi e lettere dell' avvocato di Berlino, Avv. Aurelio Monaco email: mail @ anwalt-avvocato.de hanno restituito i fondi, come ha spiegato il legale questi personaggi sono avventurieri e sfruttano l'ignoranza delle persone normali che affrontano l'apertura di un cc on line e all'estero, pertanto se qualcuno ha subito questa truffa, contattate subito l'avvocato con studio a Berlino e fategliela pagare a questi crucchi, sono state avvertite anche le Iene di questa truffa e presto vedremo un bel servizio.Io sono a disposizione per qualsiasi chiarimento e dubbio. Biagio Passaro.

name: Patrick Marboeuf
title: Parfait très bon service.
content: Parfait très bon service.Bravo

name: Sebastian D Bracey
title: Decent Bank - Still Growing.
content: I would love to give it 5 stars but as you can't yet save payees which can be rather tiring and the fact the faster payments isn't available to banks outside the N26 bank I can only give it 4 stars. I hope this all becomes available and standard practice and at which point I would definitely give it a 5 star.The debit MasterCard is cool as it's transparent so it's something a little different however I don't really use it as I have it on GooglePay but it's a nice addition to my wallet. You get real time notifications when your balance changes and I love the various savings pots you can set up for different things such as Holidays etc. I have a mainstream bank which I'm happy with but I will be switching to N26 as my main bank as soon as it has all the features such as saved Payees etc.

name: Daniel (Knallmond)
title: Aussen Hui, Innen Pfui
content: Ich bin seit Gründung bei N26.Ich habe es bis vor kurzem noch nicht als Zweitkonto genutzt und bereue es mittlerweile auch es nun getan zu haben.Nach aussen bewirbt sich N26 immer als moderne, coole, neue Bank die alles besser macht als die Bank von nebenan.Ganz ehrlich ? Dachte ich anfangs auch aber nun habe ich festgestellt das die Bank nebenan nicht nur günstiger ist sondern auch direkter.Wenn man ein richtiges Problem hat gibts nur Email oder Chat.Telefonsupport ? Fehlanzeige.Dieser wurde eingestellt um schneller Support leisten zu können.So schnell das mein Anliegen seit einer Woche nicht geklärt, und das Konto nicht nutzbar ist.Auf Nachfrage wird nur mitgeteilt: "bearbeitet man gerade".Dann: "Ist nichts angekommen", "Ach doch ... wird nun bearbeitet"Hä ?! Was nun ?Ich muss sagen bei so sensiblen Dingen wie einer Bank, wo auch Existenzen abhängen, darf so etwas nicht passieren.Ich werde N26 als Hauptkonto wieder verlassen und mich lieber wieder an eine regionale Bankfiliale wenden.Da habe ich auch tausende Bankautomaten OHNE mtl. Abhebelimit.All das hatte N26 zu beginn beworben.Draus geworden ist eine Unternehmen was nur WILL und nichts mehr gibt. Unflexibel und unerreichbar. Schade !!!
reply: Hey, vielen Dank für deine ehrlichen Worte. Es tut uns Leid, dass wir dich in solch eine Lage versetzt haben. Wir werden dein Feedback an die entsprechende Abteilung weiterleiten.

name: Daiana Gonçalves
title: Very good support!
content: I received the card I am eager to start using and enjoying its benefits. I already had to use the support via chat and they were super attentive and solved my problem very fast. I loved it!

title: Chat support is really very efficient
content: Chat support is really very efficient. I was in contact with a N26 agent within seconds, and he provided all the information I needed!

name: Charline Venefica
title: Merci N26
content: Si je le pouvais, ce serait mon unique banque

name: Andi A
title: The best online banking in the world
content: The best online banking in the world

name: customer
title: Good app
content: Good app, awesome bank, friendly customer service, compatible with Apple Pay,

name: Larry
title: Une des banques les plus faciles à utiliser
content: Une des banques les plus faciles à l'utilisation.Une CB une application pour gérer son compte sans chichi sans blabla, pas de minimum a verser comme d'autres. Nous sommes libre de faire ce que nous désirons de notre compte et c'est le plus important

name: Andy
title: Poor customer on-boarding and service
content: ProsApp is pretty slick and nice and easy to navigate.ConsTime to open an account - I get there is probably more hoops to jump through as they are a German bank but I had a Monzo account opened in 24 hours. N26 took over a week.My card - I'm still waiting for it after a month of opening my account.Customer Services - Is there even any? I've contacted them twice and had no response which instantly makes me think they have problems.Spaces - While I think it's a great idea to be able to make sub accounts of your main account it falls short when on the standard account model you can only create 2 spaces.Again Monzo come up trumps here as I've got 4 sub accounts and they dont charge me any extra for it. N26 want an extra £5 a month.SummaryFor a company which is trying to gain market share and traction in an already competitive UK market they've got a lot of customer service issues to sort out and quickly.People dont want to be kept waiting especially with the new Fintech banking capabilities available from other companies they can onboard customers quickly and with little fuss.Maybe I just got unlucky but I've already pulled my money out of N26 and gone elsewhere.

name: Kristof
title: A new customer's opinion
content: I'm a new customer, and so far I'm very satisfied with n26.I can't give five star because with the mobile app I can't send money without typing sort code, account number and name over and over again.Hope they will fix it soon.Desktop version is OK.

name: Maria Gazotto
title: Mi stanno lentamente derubando.
content: In 5 mesi non mi hanno ancora inviato la carta, già richiesta più e più volte, nel mentre mi stanno addebitando tasse una dopo l'altra mandando il mio conto in debito. Così facendo io non posso chiudere il conto (mai usato non avendolo potuto attivare non avendo la carta) e continuo a ricevere solleciti di pagamento da 3€ l'uno.Ieri ho ricevuto un'email che mi avvisa che il mio conto si chiuderà automaticamente il 21 febbraio, e nel caso di chiusura del conto prima del termine del contratto annuale vanno pagate tutte le tasse mensili da 9,90€ ciascuna, quindi in sostanza mi faranno pagare 70€ per una cosa mai usata.Inoltre il supporto mi ha confermato più volte di avermi annullato il rinnovo automatico del contratto, mentre un altro assistente mi ha detto che non si può fare.In sostanza nel migliore dei casi mi ruberanno 70€La sconsiglio a chiunque, in più le persone del supporto sono sempre scortesi e cercano di liquidarti il prima possibile, a volte persino chiudono la conversazione senza rispondere alle domande.

name: Pierre
title: N26 & More
content: Efficient, reliable and smart!

name: Gavriel Wayenberg
title: Expérience positive avec N26
content: Je suis très satisfait de ma commande, elle est arrivée endéans les délais prévus, chaque transaction est détaillée au moment où elle est réalisée, et lors d'un souci de retrait à l'étranger, j'ai reçu un support plein de bon sens et sympathique, le problème étant résolu.

So easy to get used to it. When I had a problem with a cancelled puchase N26 was very helpfull and solved the problem as soon as possible.

Also not a lot of wasted trees in sending letters etc compared to other banking experiences in Germany. As someone who travels to different countries relatively frequently it is also a big value to be able to easily or always use the card in foreign currency or atms. The customer service, though I couldn't actually call someone, was very helpful and personal through chatting online and emails.

The mobile App doesn't allow you to do it, the website with support center doesn't tell you how to do it, so I had to sent e-mail to team opening up the account to close it. name: Un fesso che ci ha creduto
title: Soldi spariti e trattenuti da loro…
content: Purtroppo si sono rivelati per quello che sono, in attesa di un bonifico da cliente di 4800€, se non chiamavo il cliente non avrei saputo che era arrivato, e solo dopo mi hanno chiesto di documentare l'importo per poterlo accreditare, ho mandato l'offerta fatta al cliente dettagliatissima con importi e fatture relative, se ne sono fregati, dopo 2 giorni mi hanno chiesto di dimostrare che il denaro era mio, ho mandato dichiarazione del cliente e copia bonifico fatto dal mio cliente, dopo un'altro giorno hanno chiesto di nuovo di dimostrare che il denaro fosse mio ma in inglese, a questo punto ho chiesto di rispedire il denaro indietro al cliente, ma niente hanno ancora chiesto che dimostrassi che era mio il denaro altrimenti lo trattenevano loro "COME DA NORMATIVA" la mia banca in Italia mi ha risposto che non esiste una cosa del genere.A parte che il mio cliente ed io stiamo preparando un'esposto alla polizia postale per chiedere l'oscuramento temporaneo del sito per frode, non resta da pensare che sono ridotti "alle assi"...

name: Dermot
title: So far so good
content: So far so good! Fast and responsive- next generation of banking is here! This is a great service in comparison to my options with the conventional Irish banking system.

name: Thierry Martin
title: Bad customer service
content: Bad customer service, difficult to resign, was asked to pay for a full year charge to close my account that I didn't want to renew.

name: Oliver
title: Ich bin total zufrieden, aber...
content: Eines vorneweg: N26 ist nicht meine primäre Bank. Ich nutze das Konto beim Reisen, um Geld anzusparen und um hier und da eine Überweisung zu tätigen. Ich nutze auch nur die kostenlose Variante und hebe auch kein Geld ab, somit kann ich nichts zu den "Premium" Angeboten sagen.Als kostenloses Zusatzkonto ist N26 top. Die App ist schnell installiert und man kann sich ohne Mühen identifizieren. Ich konnte das ganz bequem bei einem Video-Chat erledigen. Einfach den Personalausweis ans Gesicht halten und ein paar Worte sagen - fertig!Die Karte kam auch zügig und ich muss gestehen: Sie sieht schon richtig schön aus.Das N26 keine "herkömmliche" Bank mit Filialen ist, stört mich überhaupt nicht. Über die App kann man alles schnell und einfach erledigen.Was mir richtig gut gefällt:Die einfachen Überweisungen und die Möglichkeit, mit ein paar Klicks eigene "Unterkonten" anzulegen, auf die man dann Geld zur Seite legen kann. Natürlich ist das nichts neues, aber wie einfach es hier geht ist erstaunlich. Bei meiner primären Bank muss ich erst ein Formular ausfüllen und unterschreiben, bevor ich ein Unterkonto erstellen kann.Das Manko:Man braucht ein Smartphone, da N26 nur darüber funktioniert. Ein kleiner Bequemlichkeits-Nachteil ist, das man sich alle 30 Tage mit dem eigentlichen Passwort in die App einloggen muss. FaceID oder Fingerabdrucksensor müssen dann wieder neu "erlaubt" werden. Nachdem man das gemacht hat, kann man ohne Probleme FaceID oder den Fingerabdruck zum Login nutzen.Meine Empfehlung: Versuchen Sie es einfach mal. Nutzen Sie N26 als Zweit- oder Drittkonto und machen Sie sich mit den Möglichkeiten vertraut. Wenn es Ihnen gefällt, dann können Sie auch einen der Premium-Kontomodelle ausprobieren. Wenn nicht, dann nicht :)

name: G. FIRAT AYDIN
title: I would write a review if i could start…
content: I would write a review if i could start using the service but despite many people saying that it takes 10 minutes to open an account, today I received the 4th automated email saying that my documents weren't accepted. It is always the same automated message something along the lines "uugghhhhh something went wrong with your stuff try again", no other information.. what went wrong? what should I be careful about? nothing.. To contact customer support you have to have the app, to have the app you have to get your documents registered first. So I guess they expect me to send the same photos for the next 50 years again and again considering the avarage life expectancy in my country. After googling the problem here and there and try to find a solution, I realise that they actually have a customer service. But it is on twitter or facebook. I don't know if it can get more lame than that. So if you are not using facebook or twitter don't even think about n26 because f you if you are not addicted to social media. Now I totally changed my mind about the service because think about it... Lets say you put 10000 euros to your account, and one day you realized that is 0 .It is suddenly gone. Who will you contact? Some guy on twitter? Some application? Or you can try to answer their noreply mails. This extremely easy to use no headache banking style in the end of the day can make you very very angry. And there is no real person whom you can shout at. So.. No thank you. I will pay my 3 euro something monthly fee and have a regular every day normal bank account. Which I can call and go to and write an email.

content: After applying for my account I was very sceptical, based on reviews I read.  However, so far my experience of this bank has been very positive.  My card arrived within an acceptable time span and loading money on to it has been a breeze. I contacted customer support and spoke to a very pleasant and professional member of staff, who assisted me really well.  My query was dealt with professionally and I felt like a valued customer.  My only gripe is the cost of changing my card. I wanted to change from a rose gold to a black card, but the cost of changing card colour is an eye watering £45, which is far too much money! Other than that, I'm very happy I opened my account with N26.

name: Martin Privoznik
title: Trust me, the best bank for everyone who hates coventional banks.
content: The best bank, not only in Germany (where the banks are still in stone age), but also comparable to any other modern foreign bank. N26 solves all the issues that make you furious about other banks - the balance is updated instantly after payment or transfer, great clean app with categorizing of the expenses, payment with your smartphone with Google pay, super easy to reach support via chat in the app and all done online, spaces function to separate your savings from your current account, easy overdraft for a minimal fee (I paid like 1,5 € for something over 1000 € overdraft) and the best - no fees for a basic account, which is totally fine and sufficient, and no fees for card payments home and abroad. If you despise the cash culture in Germany and are used to paying with a card, then the allowance of 5 withdrawals per month from any ATM is perfectly sufficient.

name: André Silva Bender
title: The N26 is a "trustworthy" financial institution. I strongly recommend!
content: I only have good things to say about N26. The N26 Mastercard Debit card is broadly accepted, the web interface, as well as the N26 app, are plenty useful and user-friendly. I sent money from my bank account in Brazil, through Transferwise, directly to N26 and it worked perfectly and fast. If I could translate my experience with one word, this word would be TRUSTWORTHY. Thanks to N26 for keeping me living in Ireland in 2018.

name: Tony Colton
title: A breath of fresh air for banking!
content: N26 is easy to set up and even easier to use. The app in intuitive and responsive. It's easy to connect with customer service via chat from the app should you have any queries or need help. Transferring funds is quick and the sub accounts is great for saving for particular things by setting a Target and letting you know your current % of that target. Control over the account is also amazing as you can set spend limits and control where the card can be used. The categorization of purchases is also great for budgeting. Would highly recommend this amazing account to all.

name: MR
title: Solid Banking Experience
content: I've had my account for almost two months now. Overall I would say that it's a solid banking product.PROS:+ Minimalistic app design+ Prompt customer care+ Almost no fees (apart from 1.7% on overseas cash withdrawals)+ Instant notifications+ Monthly spending breakdown / statistics by categoryCONS:- No 24/7 customer care (unlike some of its finch rivals in the UK)- No standing orders (which should be added to the app quite soon hopefully)- No payee management - account details have to be entered manually (which should be added to the app quite soon hopefully)

title: Rapide et efficace
content: Rapide, efficace, pas cher super service client... , 3€ pour un rejet d'impayé, achat sur internet  sur sites étrangers  sans frais de change (avec  l'abonnement  à 5€), je recommande vivement...

name: Nina G
title: Super easy and user friendly
content: Super easy and user friendly, clearly and transparent, excellent customer service

name: Ioana
title: Incompetent personnel
content: I would say I've never experienced such a bad customer service anywhere. I simply gave up the process. Just as a note. As a Romanian citizen, you cannot be part of N26, not with the new biometric passport (nobody tells you that). My verification was stuck. Don't lose your time, I've lost 3 weeks writing emails, getting the most ambiguous and contradictory answers and nobody could take care or at least notify me on the issue. So the last email that I got was telling me that I should suggest the bank to add the Romanian passport in their new ideas section which I found absolutely incredibly annoying. So it might be a quick great bank unless you will have the tiniest problem for which you will lose weeks in anger and nerves with the most incompetent personnel.

name: Adrien Le Mérovingien
title: Attention très mauvaise affaire contrat abusif aucune résiliation possible
content: Attention très mauvaise affaire, pour N26 Métal: aucune résiliation possible pendant 12 mois donc 12*16,90€ à payer quoi qu’il arrive, que vous soyiez satisfait du service ou pas, sinon huissier ! Sûrement la seule banque qui fait ça en Europe.Tres mauvais aussi : 5 retraits maximum par mois !Le service client est inexistant, très long à joindre et toujours retranché derrière ses notes impersonnelles et pas gentilles. Enfin, beaucoup de virements et prélèvements français sont inaccessibles avec N26 car cela reste un compte allemand en DE et non en FR. Très problématique. N’y allez pas. Pour ce prix là, autant privilégier d’autres banques dont les services seront bien meilleures.Mais si vous désirez absolument payer 200€ pour avoir une carte en métal alors faites le mais c’est le seul avantage que vous aurez, et, après un mois à s’amuser avec, on s’en lasse finalement assez vite.

name: Arthur Prior
title: IDnow is awful
content: I read great things about N26 and selected this account as my first account when relocating to Germany from the UK. After 4 hours of frustrating struggle with the incredibly unhelpful people at N26, I was finally able to verify my ID using their rubbish third-party service provider IDnow. If you can bear the verification process, this bank might be right for you.

name: Yacine
title: Ca aurait été parfait  si on avait plus…
content: Ca aurait été parfait  si on avait plus d'options pour les virements Comme par exemple utilisé une autre carte bancaire pour alimenter nos compte simplement et directement

name: Aleyna Korkmaz
title: Recommended 10/10
content: I don’t know how the system works in other countries, but here in Germany you have to wait and suffer if you want to open a new bank account. couple of months ago I was waiting in different bank and it was taking so long, I discovered N26 while in line. it took me about 10 minutes to open my account. If you don’t have time for waste N26 is perfect bank for you. Don’t have to wait, Don’t have to fill papers, Don’t have to suffer. Easiest and fastest way to transfer money. I’m really loving it. They have simply beautiful mobile app and website.

name: Kimberley burton

content: Although a new bank and always preferred visual contact with banks the experience of online banking with this company  has been very positive.

name: Sergio Davis
title: This is fraud!
content: This is fraud!They are misleading UK costumers with promises of access to 1000 airport lounges around the world. But in reality it's £15 per lounge visit - This information is nowhere to be found.Their customer service is horrible, I am on free trial now and trying to cancel the membership on the basis that I have been mislead to sign up and that I should be able to cancel anytime within the 2 months free trial but no reply from them! Horrible service

Je ne trouve pas les mots mais n26 a révolutionné mon regard envers les banques, mon rapport aux achats sur internet et mes transactions en général.Je recommande à 10 000% !

title: Enjoying it.
content: Short experience so far (few months). Very intuitive to use and great customer care the one time I had to contact them. Enjoying it.

name: Tania martins
title: I opened an account with this stupid…
content: I opened an account with this stupid bank and after a week and few days a friend transferred £200 to my account which i purposely left in the account and after a week or so my cousin was unable to meet up her bank opening time and was due to travel the next day and i told her to send the funds she will be needing on holiday to my account that i will take it out for her through the cash machine..At first my pin i set up initially wasn't working so i had to reset and still wasn't working, contact the customer support and they did something and the card worked and i asked them if i can use the maximum withdrawal limit of my card and i was told yes i can.Used the machine after one withdrawal the card keep saying contact card issuer which i did and i was told the problem as been resolved...Next day went to the machine to make a withdrawal and after making a withdrawal same thing happens contact the support, was told all will be fine i should go back after 20mins and still same problem...later that day went to a shop to purchase something of £20 and card declined...I had to contact them again and cos it was a saturday they said i had to wait till monday..Monday morning received an email saying Account cancellation that i violated the terms and condition..Ask for the remains funds in my acct and was told to provide proof/document which i did, contacted them again to ask about the update and was told to send the same document again which i did..i have sent them this proofs and explanation over four times and still no update..i said i will sue this bank and i got an email telling me to send the same document/proof have sent over four times still not response..Its over a month now and still haven't  received the remaining funds left in my account..This bank is not reliable i repeat until you have a problem with them before you can experience this issues..No number to call and when you send an email it takes forever to reply..Still waiting for the remaining amount in my account of £850

name: Stephan Wik
title: Easy to setup
content: Easy to setup, works well. Good iPhone app

name: Miguel Cabral
title: I have been waiting 3 months for my…
content: I have been waiting 3 months for my metal card first ordered in November. I have never received the card, so contacted customer support trough the app chat, and was told I can’t close my account because I’m in contract. This is I have never received a product to be in contract. So there’s a breach of N26 for non delivery. Now I want to cancel my account and move elsewhere and was told I can’t because I’m in contract. That’s absolutely rubbish, they never even sent me an email reminder to see if I revived it.Anyone expericing this, I’ll get my solicitor to write to them.Absolutely rubbish on their part. And I won’t be paying anything.

name: Michele G
title: 2 su 5
content: Fin ora non mi trovo male, purtroppo però le due stelle sono date dall' assistenza chat:Frenetica ed insopportabileLa prima volta che tutto il corpo assistenza di un sito mi dà sui nervi: presuntuosi, spocchiosi, arroganti, non trasparenti e non spiegano nullaSembra che stanno col cronometro affianco, ti fanno sentire la soggezione anche di fare domande.Tutto ciò, alimentata da questa storia della chiusura dei conti fa calare notevolmente la fiducia (non avendo un assistenza decente)Troppo acerba adesso, sconsigliata p.s:Loro pubblicizzano il conto gratis perché è gratisPlatfond illimitato e prelievi ILLIMITATISE NON TI STANNO BENE QUESTE COSE NON PUBBLICIZZARLE, CI SONO MOLTE ALTRE COMOAGNIE CHE DICONO "HAI TOT PRELIEVI GRATIS AL MESE" O "HAI TOT SOLDI AL MESE DA PRELEVARE GRATIS AL MESE"Comunque a me non è stato ancora chiuso

name: Askin Ümit
title: Benutze seid ca.2 Jahren  N26. FINGER WEG!!
content: Benutze seid ca.2 Jahren  N26.Kann leider nicht weiter empfehlen weil angeblich kostenlose Abhebungen  bis auf paar mal begrenzt sind.Telefonisch können sie ca. nach 90 Minuten Wartezeit jemand vielleicht erreichen und wenn sie endlich durchgekommen sind dann erwartet sie ein Sehr sehr unfreundliche total gestresste Mitarbeiter.Seid Oktober 2018 versuche ich meine Konto bei der N26 zu kündigen Per Mail /Fax/Einschreiben etc, aber leider vergeblich.Diese Woche habe ich erneut eine Kündigung mit Einschreiben und Rückschein geschickt, mal sehen ob es klappt.Wenns nicht klappt dann werde ich das ganze an einen Anwalt weitergeben.Also Leute Finger weg von dem angeblich Kostengünstigen Smartphon Banking so einfach kommt ihr da nicht mehr raus.
reply: Hey, vielen Dank für deine ehrlichen Worte. Es tut uns Leid, dass wir dich in solch eine Lage versetzt haben. Wir werden dein Feedback an die entsprechende Abteilung weiterleiten.

content: Great banking for everyone. The user experience is just amazing. Everything is clear and neat. The customer support was helpful. All formalities were done online. I wish I had discovered this bank earlier.

name: nero michael
title: Very helpful and very safe
content: Very helpful and very safe

name: Joy de Ménilmontant
title: Virement rapides uniquement petits montants…
content: J'ai eu la mauvaise idée de vouloir faire verser mon salaire sur ce compte. Et bien je vais l'attendre jusqu'au lundi ou mardi pour un virement exécuté le mercredi précédent tandis que tous mes collègues ont reçu le leur le lendemain du virement sur leurs banques habituelles. Le service client n'a pas d'explication, il vous dit que cela prend 72h alors que c'est un SEPA (J+1), ils s'engagent à "faire des recherches" et vous tenir informé par e-mail mais ils ne le font pas. C'est bien uniquement comme un compte de liquidité de secours mais pas pour un courant. Comme par hasard les petits montants de compte à compte passent en quelques heures, si c'est un salaire N26 se réserve le temps de le traiter quand ça leur  chante et charge son service client de vous balader. Comme j'étais confiante à tort, cela m'a occasionné des refus de prélèvement et des retard sur un autre compte et j'en aurai les frais à charges puisque le délai étendu de N26 ne m'aura pas permis de transférer les sommes nécessaires sur mon compte principal. Très largement déçue, je voulais rendre ma cb à ma banque principale mais ça ne risque pas d'arriver pour N26. Dites voud tjs que N26 peut mettre 72h+ à opérer vos virements. . . .
reply: Bonjour. Certaines banques émettrices nous ont confirmé avoir envoyé des virements SWIFT et non SEPA depuis le 1er février. Cela a pu entraîner un retard à la réception de votre virement, mais celui-ci est activement rattrapé. Nous vous prions de nous excuser pour la gêne occasionnée.

name: Solomon Nadar
title: Good to have a free bank account…
content: Good to have a free bank account without much hassles. However, even if you pay your salary in it for a year, you'll never get overdraft facilities. Also, if you want to do payments which involve special codes, it is better to look for another local bank since they don't currently have an option despite being a start-up.

name: Ivan Ivanov
title: A great true online bank with adequate…
content: A great true online bank with adequate and fast-responding support. Great app (I'm using iOS), features, transparency (I mean iOS notifications, e-mails and intuitive app) and security (again: notifications, features allowing card locking, PIN reset, Card limits). No intrusive propaganda (as for example Apple promotes iCloud) on upgrading to a paid plan (N26 Black, Metal). I am using the version without taxes, but I think maybe to upgrade to a paid plan because of the rent-a-car insurance.

content: Terrible service!! Absolutely no recommendation!I opened invest over 4 months ago and already transfered money to it and it is still not open!I contacted them over 5 times per chat - no one ever helped me. They even stopped answering!My emails are barely answered to without giving me any details! I only receive standard answers such as “I transferred your issue to the corresponding person please be patient.”DO NOT OPEN AN ACCOUNT! You might not see your money again!!

name: David

content: Service client au top rapidité amabilité réactivité je vous conseille d ouvrir un compte chez ils tiennent la route

name: Luca Luca
title: Domenico ma davvero pensi che n26…
content: Domenico ma davvero pensi che n26 chiude i conti così a caso ???? O che sia una truffa??? Ovvio che se tutti vi fate i conti a 0 spese e volete prelevare moltissime volte magari girandovi i soldi su n26 e avendo tutto gratis non avete capito niente....siete solo un costo per la banca e i prelievi gratis per voi li paga la banca nessuno regala niente ricordatelo , io ho il conto metal pago tanto si ma almeno sono sicuro che blocchi non ne ho , giro sul conto migliaia di euro , prelievo faccio bonifici e lo uso anche sui casinò online e a quasi 1 anno non ho mai avuto blocchi o altro .....ovviamente se avessi avuto il conto a 0 canone a quest'ora sarebbe chiuso da una vita io penso che n26 dovrebbe o togliere proprio i conti a 0 spese o almeno spiegarli bene come limitazioni di prelievo etc perché uno pensa sia tutto gratis e illimitato ma così ovviamente non lo è

name: Félicien Rousseau
title: Déçu du serviceBlack Métal
content: Je suis très satisfait des possibilités permises par l’app lié à ma carte. C’est un vrai plaisirs pouvoir voir en temps réel mes paiements, les catégories qui y sont liées et les possibilités de créer des livrets si simplement ou bien faire des virements internationaux easy ou encore de changer son code ou bloquer et débloquer sa carte. Tout ça est une vrai réussite/révolution. Le seul hic pour m’est apparu il y a quelques jours. J’ai cassé ma Black Métal qui à un coût mensuel qui nous prépare à un service exigent. Je me retrouve à devoir attendre 3 semaines pour avoir ma nouvelle carte. C’est inacceptable a notre époque et pourtant c’est ce qui ce passe.

Totally recommend it if you are living in Germany.

name: Vanmassenhove

name: Unk Boštjan
title: The best bank ever

name: Dinant
title: Top rekening met Mastercard, Maestro en goede app
content: Ik gebruik N26 nu een maand of 6. Heb eerst in UK Monzo gebruikt, daar was ik zeer tevreden mee (gratis online rekening, met app met push berichten wanneer je geld overmaakt, en erg handig om uitgaven in de gaten te houden).In Nederland opereert Monzo niet, dus ben overgestapt naar N26.Werkt bijna net zo goed, wel even weekje gedoe om Maestro kaart aan te vragen. Je krijgt eerst namelijk alleen de Mastercard. Pas als je die geactiveerd hebt, en 100 euro hebt gestort, kun je de Maestro kaart aanvragen. Ze gaan wel beide van dezelfde rekening.Je kunt zelf via de app je pincode instellen, en betaal-limieten voor binnen- en buitenland regelen. Geld overmaken is ook zo gepiept.Mastercard (debit) is zeer handig om in buitenland ook bv auto te kunnen huren. Heb hiernaast ook geen creditcard meer nodig.N26 heeft Duitse IBAN. Nadeel daarvan is 1 dag vertraging bij overmaken van en naar Nederlandse rekeningen. Wel goed tegen impuls-aankopen!Ik gebruik m'n N26 voor boodschappen en reguliere uitgaves, als ook internationale uitgaven. Voor Nederlandse automatische incasso's en sparen gebruik ik m'n Triodos rekening. Deze combinatie bevalt me erg goed.

name: Celine B
title: N26 sans hésitation !
content: Après plus de 2 ans je suis toujours aussi satisfaite de N26. Je suis même passée à la carte Black certe elle est à 5.90 euros par mois mais ça reste toujours moins chers qu'une banque française.Pour les voyageurs, aucun frais de paiement ou de retrait à l'étranger.L'appli est super simple d'utilisation, super design, et facilité de joindre un conseiller en cas de besoin.Bref, je recommande !!

title: terrible

name: Dennis Tux
title: Schlechtester Support den ich geh erlebt habe.
content: Ich bin selber n26 Kunde und extrem Unzufrieden mit dem Schlechten Support. Keine anrufe möglich, nichtmal Rückrufe werden angeboten.  Sobald man wirklich Hilfe braucht , wird man sehen was es für eine Anstrengung ist , mit Übervorderten , Schlecht ausgebildeten "Studenten" zu chatten. Mehrfach einfach aus dem chat geworfen zu werden - Beschwerden werden verschleppt, nur  35% meiner anfragen überhaupt beantwortet.. Oder inhaltlich erst garnicht verstanden.  alles in allem kann ich n26 nicht als ernst zu nehmende Bank Lösung empfehlen. Technisch gesehen hab ich hier und da mal Schwierigkeiten mit der Akzeptanz oder mit der Bargeldabhebung, Support sagt zu 90% immer das selbe. Müsste doch gehen - das liegt nicht an uns , das liegt an dem Hotel, der Fluggesellschaft, an mcdonalds , oder dem System des Anbieters im Allgemeinen .. "immer an anderen"    Unterm strich ist N26 eine Bank wo ich nach 3 Jahren sagen kann, NICHT als HauptKonto zu empfehlen ! Als Kostenloses SpielKonto vielleicht.. . Ach ja & das ding mit dem Du - Ich : wieso Duzen sie mich ? n26: Steht so in den AGB's dafür hast du unterschrieben.. Ich : ich möchte das nicht. N26: dann Kündige - ich mach nur mein Job.  01.02.2019
reply: Hey! Danke für dein Feedback.Wir haben herausgefunden, dass die meisten unserer Kunden es bevorzugen uns per LiveChat in der N26 App oder auf unserer Webseite zu kontaktieren. Erfahrungsgemäß bietet diese Methode die schnellste und befriedigendste Hilfe, daher wird die telefonische Hotline geschlossen bleiben.Ein Rückruf ist nur im Notfall möglich.Gerne können wir dich auch siezen, dies kann im Kundensupport Chat angefragt werden.

name: Emmanuel
title: Speed service but some of your customer…
content: Speed service but some of your customer service team need training

name: adonias junior
title: fast and simple
content: fast and simple

name: kouchi63
title: Great app..
content: Great app... fantastic online banking..👍

name: Customer
title: The bank is almost perfect for my…
content: The bank is almost perfect for my using. The only thing that I had some issues is that the bank account can not be in Spain. Some companies didn't accept some things I had to do because my account is german. Just that.

name: Hervé Tischmacher
title: Une banque qui devient un allié.
content: Membre depuis 2016 - oui je dis membre car je me sens plus qu'un client - je n'ai jamais eu un seul problème contrairement à mon expérience avec ma banque "traditionnelle". Tout est facile, intuitif et clair dans l'utilisation. Un design épuré et très agréable - autant le site et l'application que les cartes.Une gestion simplifiée au quotidien. Indispensable pour les personnes qui voyagent beaucoup.Un système de frais extrêmement transparent (aucun frais avec la carte standard). Vous n'allez jamais avoir besoin de contacter votre conseiller pour demander à quoi correspond ce -13,46€ de frais sur votre compte. Bref, elle est devenue indispensable pour moi. J'attends avec impatience les prochaines innovations qu'ils vont apporter. Seul point négatif : impossible pour le moment de disposer simultanément d'un compte privé et d'un compte professionnel.

name: Mambo Taunton
title: Stay Away
content: Be very careful this bank is all but useless, the customer service is absent and toothless in getting to grips with simple issuesMoney transfers into N26 are not allocated to your account and you then get the run around by text and e-mail as no one will speak to you directlyIts all a front I suspect stay clear !!

name: Dialla Daye Nabou
title: J'ai pas encore un compte je ne peux…
content: J'ai pas encore un compte je ne peux pas donné d'avis

name: PIERRE
title: TRÈS MAUVAIS SERVICE CLIENT
content: l'expérience ouverture d'un compte virtuel est une torture, et ne peut pas être mise entre les mains de tous le monde. Non reconnaissance des photos, multi-bogues de la reconnaissance de votre pièce d'identité, aucun support digne de ce non.Après avoir enfin ouvert un compte et commander une carte metal.La carte n'arrive jamais, pendant ce temps les frais cours et vont vite...Malgré plusieurs relances la carte métal n'arrive pas. Au bout de 3 mois, j'ai enfin gain de cause, j'obtiens le remboursement de mes frais ( dû à rien...) et de la gratuité de la carte metal pour 6 mois. mais je n'ai toujours pas la carte.On pourrait dire super, sauf que 6 mois plus tard la carte n'est toujours pas arrivé, que les frais repartent que, que l'on m'annonce que je suis obligé d'allez jusqu'à la fin de mon contrat d'un an alors que je n'ai toujours pas reçu la carte...A ce jour je ne possède toujours pas la carte, les frais me sont quand même facturer, le service client fait la sourde oreille...Je ne sais plus quoi faire...

name: Rsoares
title: Incompetent Support Staff
content: When registering they ask me about my legal address, i made the registration, got approved, got an welcoming email saying my card would be sent to my default address and if i wanted to change it i had to contact support.So i did.. Went to live chat asked to change the delivery address.The customer rep said i would have to pay to emit a new card, instead of changing the delivery address as stated in the welcoming email.The rep agent then terminated the live chat session, preventing me from chatting and find a solution..

name: matt stone
title: No principles
content: So the N 26 bank claimed to have sent me a card to my address which I never received Then I kept writing them and they ignored me so the contract of cancellation kicked in and now I have to pay the full contract when I want this service cancelled!!!!This company is extortion

reply: Hey, vielen Dank für deine ehrlichen Worte. Es tut uns Leid, dass wir dich in solch eine Lage versetzt haben. Wir werden dein Feedback an die entsprechende Abteilung weiterleiten.

title: Does what its  expected

title: Ouverture du compte rapide
content: Ouverture du compte rapide. Service client disponible par chat facilement. Jamais un seul souci

name: John
title: Trying to opening an account
content: I completed an application some weeks ago and was informed that verification could take two days. It never happened.I could get no information from the App, nor find direct contact details to talk to anyone through the App, as the account was not in place.Eventually ( 3-4 weeks later) I was asked for a video verification so waited for a contact, which took a few minutes but was then told by a not too polite gentleman that my internet connection was not good enough. I also received an email ( from No-reply) tell me my Nationality had been changed and to contact them if I had not made this request..WHY WOULD I ??I have now requested my application be cancelled. Very disappointing experience.

name: Celine Lemonnier

title: SOLDI E CONTO BLOCCATI
content: Conto inutilizzabile dal 17-11-2018 (bloccato senza spiegazioni solo appellandosi al "paragrafo 8.3 dei nostri Termini e condizioni e il comma 3 dell’articolo 19 del nostro accordo sulle Regole principali per il rapporto") il 1-12-2018 ricevo una mail che diceva di inviare i dati per il bonifico da parte loro, ad oggi 31-01-2019 (circa 2 mesi) nessuno risponde alle mail e dei soldi neppure mezza traccia.STATE LONTANI DA N26, aprono il conto veloce (in alcuni casi), e con la stessa velocità ve lo chiudono senza spiegazioni trattenendo i soldi. ATTENZIONE

name: Jaraya Wood
title: Great modern banking option
content: N26 is simplified banking service for a modern world! I love the app and it's speedy reaction to my card transactions. I've been a happy customer for a few of years now (while it was still Number 26!) and look forward to seeing how it continues to evolve!

content: Simple and quick! So far very reliable.

content: So far I have been using N26 only for a little amount of time, but so far I am quite happy. Not all the stores in NL accept N26 yet. I had an issue transferring money, that was solved in a very acceptable time. I can surely recommend N26 :)

content: Une banque en ligne à coût zéro et de qualité

content: Love the app and the services. Exactly what I signed up for!

name: nicolas keiling

content: Très agréablement surpris. BRAVO

name: Lau G-d
title: Le pire service client existant au…
content: Le pire service client existant au monde.Suite au refus de prendre en compte ma demande de bloquer un paiement frauduleux comme le feraient toutes les banques (finalement j'ai récupéré mon argent après de longues procédures directement avec la firme arnaqueuse), j'ai décidé de ne plus faire affaire avec N26. Et là le cauchemar commence : on est a un mois de la fin de mon abonnement, et on m'annonce que je ne peux pas mettre fin au contrat (ne pas le renouveler) et que j'ai reçu un mail pour m'avertir que j'avais 8 semaines pour le faire. Problème ? Je n'ai pas vu le mail. Et là, impossible de résilier. J'informe que je ne me servirai plus de N26 (j'ai en plus changé de pays, je n'ai plus l'utilité du compte!), et que je souhaite cloturer le compte. On me répond que je dois alors payer pour 2019 (je n'ai jamais rien signé ni signifié mon intérêt a continuer avec eux je rappelle!). J'explique que je ne paierai pas, mais que je veux cloturer le compte quand meme quitte à me faire harceler par leur service contentieux ensuite... Ils m'obligent à conserver le compte ! Ils refusent la fermeture, purement et simplement. À savoir que depuis que j'ai signifié mon intention de ne plus faire affaire avec eux, ils m'ont bloqué les virements sortants ! Les agents du livechat sont impolis, condescendants, et n'ont jamais la moindre solution pour aider. Un conseil ? FUYEZ !

name: Vincent P
title: Intuitivité simplicité rapidité
content: Intuitivité simplicité rapidité

name: Rober T B
title: Nunca sabes realmente si no te cobrarán
content: Tras seis meses sin problema, me cobran 1,9€ por reintegro en Caja Rural, además de descontarme 1 de 5 retiradas gratuitas. En chat me dicen que me lo devuelven pero han pasado dos semanas y no lo han devuelto, y que utilize La Caixa, BBVA, vamos a ver , no eran 5 gratuitas, si tengo que mirar rótulo cajero para eso tengo los bancos tradicionales…

name: Bill Holtrop
title: The best so far, other banks can learn from it.
content: N26 has a very good and fast service. I recommend this bank. The only disadvantage in Holland is that you're not able to do ideal payments. Also the app works great. Other banks can learn from it, they are far behind.The customer service is helpful, kind and fast. All is in English but not a problem for me. And almost everything is free. Even traveling outside the EU, no extra cost. This is the only bank where I have seen this!I use both cards, the Maestro and the Mastercard. If you use both wisely, you will have a free bank account. Other wise there will be some cost charges if you don't read good how to use both of them.I use N26 as a second bank account because I'm located in Holland. If I'll be living elsewhere in the EU N26 will be my mean bank.

name: Kid
title: Simple an efficient
content: Extremely easy to use and transfer between N26 accounts, with a simple and modern app.

name: Julio Wagner Machado Espindola
title: God experiência until now
content: God experiência until now

name: Poizat
title: I was looking for a solution to easily…
content: I was looking for a solution to easily pay during my journey .I found N26 and now, I use it for my daily life in France.What I really enjoy is the possibility to control my payment card and lock it for internet payment.

name: Meg
title: Easy, super peasy
content: I love it, it's so easy to open the account and manage it from mobile. I feel secure, it's super easy to use, much cheaper when I travel, customer service is always helpful and quick to respond.Been with them for a year now, nothing to complain about, really!

name: Aura Lindholm
title: From initiating a customer relationship…
content: From initiating a customer relationship and opening an account to using the service (incl. payment card) everything has been very clear and easy. On situations where help desk was needed, my requests were not only answered fast (less than a day via mail, less than a minute via chat) but also resolved immediately (address change, phone number change, ordering of a new card). From ordering the card I received it in less than a week (in Germany) which was also from my point of view very efficient. There was only some delay in sending the automated confirmation pin for pairing a new phone ( the text message which is sent to stated phone number) which resulted to me ordering a new code after the first one didn't arrive after 20min. However, the newly ordered code came then immediately.

name: Faye Trossèl
title: Very satisfied
content: Quick responses, clear use of language and a cheap MasterCard convenient for travelling

name: Royluxe
title: virement non reçu depuis 8 jours
content: virement non reçu depuis 8 jours A fuir ...Je suis en colère car depuis 8 jours j'attends le virement.J'ai contacté la banque émettrice du virement et elle m'a conseillé d'envoyer une preuve de virement à N26, ce que j'ai fait, et N26 me répond le même message:  "Comme indiqué précédemment, en tant que banque réceptrice du virement nous n'avons pas de visibilité sur les virements effectués. Je vous invite à contacter la banque émettrice pour effectuer une demande de rappel de fonds"Ils gardent les fonds bloqués sans plus d'explications.

name: Adèle Poirier
title: Love it all the way through
content: I started using N26 about a year ago and it made me hates traditional banking. Moving from one country to another, my need for a physical office for my bank is not existent. I need easily bank details modifications and fast reply support. Obviously also free of charge withdrawals in foreign countries. All that is met by N26 and so far I had very little to complain about, especially because they are improving fast.

name: Pedro Miele
title: Worst customer service ever
content: Worst customer service ever, did transactions that was never completed, customer support doesn’t give attention at all and they can never sort any issue they just keep passing you from one department to another very messy service. Lost money, didn’t receive it back as I was charged but they didn’t give the money for the merchant. On the chat the attendant just finish the chat in a very rude way. I’m Just trying to use the money that I have in the account to close my account.  They simply don’t care about the clients.

name: Miroslav Csonka
title: So far nothing but disappointment.
content: I tried using the service a year or two ago in Germany as my parents moved there, but we were greeted with an error page during the signup process, and no-one reached out to us about it, so we just forgot.After that, I convinced my parents to give it another go, and we tried it again in December 2018. During the signup process, we had to wait for someone to show up at the sign-up call to verify our identity, but no one did within 40 minutes and we just lost the patience. We tried it next day and after a few minutes, we got greeted by a rude person on video that we couldn't understand and t hung up on us after a few seconds of miscommunication.When I tried to sign-up for my personal account in the UK, the experience was fine, and I was told that within 2 days I'll have my account approved. After a week I got an email saying that the demand is high and it will take a bit longer (the app said within 5 days), it has been a couple of weeks now and still nothing.During this whole experience getting a hold of someone at the company is extremely difficult as I couldn't find a phone number, email to reach them at. Their preferred way of communication is a chat inside the app, but you have to have an approved N26 account (so if you are having issues with sign-up, good luck). I somehow found a web-based chat which was only available within a specific page in their guide, which I found very awkward.I have absolutely no idea why anyone in the UK would even consider opening an account with them since Starling, Monzo, and Revolut seem like superior choices.

name: Adrian
title: Kundenkommunikation und Geschwindigkeit der Abläufe sehr mangelhaft!
content: Am 21.01.2019 wurde mir über Pfändung meines Kontos mitgeteilt, welches daher gleichzeitig gesperrt wurde. In der eingehenden Email hat man unter anderem angeboten, den Gläubiger direkt vom N26 Konto zu bezahlen, falls der Betrag darauf ausreicht. Da der Betrag auf dem Konto fast 3 mal so hoch ist, habe ich die Bank direkt per Email mit allen Notwendigen Verifizierungsschritten beauftragt, den Betrag samt evtl. Gebühren zu begleichen. In der Email von der Bank stand, dass dafür 3-4 Tage gebraucht werden. Als nach 3 Tagen nichts passiert ist, hat man mir per Chat bestätigt, dass mein Überweisungsauftrag ausreichend verifiziert vorliegt und die "entsprechende Abteilung" sich darum kümmert. Als heute, 8 Tage nach der Pfändung, immer noch nichts passiert ist, habe ich noch ein mal den Chat gestartet und erklärt, dass es Ende des Monates ist und ich den Zugriff zum Konto für wichtige Zahlungen brauche und dementsprechend sehr dringend auf die Entsperrung des Kontos angewiesen bin.  Die Rückmeldung war praktisch identisch der von meinem ersten Kontakt. Fazit: Ich bekomme bereits 8 Tage lang weder den Gläubiger trotz ausreichend Geld auf dem Konto bezahlt noch eine Rückmeldung, warum es so ist bzw. dass es evtl. ein Problem gäbe.Aus welchem Grund es bei N26 auch immer so läuft, sind sowohl die Kommunikation mit den Kunden als auch die Dauer der Abläufe absolut mangelhaft. Dazu kommt, dass es bei mir bereits keine erste negative Erfahrung mit N26 ist. Abschließend möchte ich noch bemängeln, dass das Zirkus, das N26 "Kundenschutz" bzw. "Datenschutz" oder wie auch immer nennt, einfach nur gewaltig und auf Kosten der Benutzerfreundlichkeit übertrieben ist. So hat man unzählige Verifizierungsschritte eingebaut, die in deren Zahl einfach nur nerven. So starte ich den Support-Chat von der N26-App, die für jedes Konto nur einmal auf einem Mobiltelefon installiert und erst mir Passworteingabe oder Face-ID gestartet werden kann und zwar auf meinem ebenfalls durch Face-ID oder Passworteingabe zu entsperrenden iPhone. Dann kann ich zwar alle Umsätze sehen, muss mich für den Kundenchat noch mehrstufig durch Geburtsort, den auf der Karte angegebenen Token und auch noch durch die Nennung eines Umsatzes auf meinem Konto verifizieren. Das komische ist aber, dass ich zweimal aufeinander beim Starten vom Kundenchat gebeten wurde, denselben Umsatz zu nennen, genauer gesagt den fünftletzten. Und da sich während der Sperrung nichts tut, ist das beide Male derselbe Umsatz gewesen.Hätte ich heute den Bedarf ein neues Konto zu eröffnen, würde ich mich mit meinen N26-Erfahrungen definitiv für einen anderen Anbieter entscheiden.
reply: Vielen Dank für deine ehrlichen Worte. Es tut uns leid zu hören, dass wir deine Erwartungen nicht erfüllen konnten. Wir werden dein Feedback an die entsprechende Abteilung weiterleiten

name: Victor Lamy
title: Service client exelent et practicité du compte très bonne
content: Une carte au design épuré et simple en apparence mais avec des services plus que convenables pour une banque dematerialisé.Ouverture de compte rapide et simple Agent du service client à votre écoute Service de transaction en devise avantageux 0€ frais + calcul automatique de la devise grâce à la cartePossibilité de régler ses plafonds comme bon vous semble tout en évitant la paperasse des banques traditionnellesEt surtout Mise à jour automatique et instantanée de votre compte à chaque opération, pas d’operation En différé .Je recommande vivement le service métal de N26.

name: Gilles De Boysson
title: 0 service
content: 0 service, no contact for the inscription, 5 times asking to make pictures. Might be Ok once opened but their process is really a pain. Opened at the end with Revolut, flawless.

name: Michael Dabah
title: Even doe my account stil in pending to…
content: Even doe my account stil in pending to verify my account and been weeks am I was told to be paition due to demand from UK there will update me by email to get me going

name: philip boland
title: Card can take up to 35 days...
content: I joined the 7th of January and still have not received my rose gold creditcard. Yes I opted for the most expensive one, but at the same time I expected a very high service level for that. The chat is always fast and friendly and they have credited the first month. However now the card will take up to 35 days to get to me....For now 3 stars, maybe I will change it after I get my card...if I get my card...

name: Dmytro Dudenko
title: online customer service experience
content: Lovely service, efficient support.Quickly spotted my problem and helped me to solve it.I have no bad experience to share, every time N26 does suprise me in a good way! Thank you for changing modern banking.

name: lahcen ouahbi
title: C’est bien comme compte bancaire

name: عبد العزيز أبو مريم
title: tout se passait bien et puis....
content: tout se passait bien depuis plusieurs mois puis, comme 3 de mes amis, compte bloqué du jour au lendemain, résiliation du contrat en vertu d'une " violation des conditions d'utilisation" Aucun motif précis avancé par la banque. très étrange moi qui ne me servait de ce compte que pour faire de petits achats en ligne, le plein d'essence, payer des péages, etc.... aucune raison annoncée, aucune communication possible avec le service client qui n'est pas en mesure de répondre. Après avoir regardé des commentaires sur des situations identiques sur internet je me rends compte que beaucoup ont eu de l'argent bloqué, certains ont portés plainte, bref : très décevant !

title: Suite a un transfert de la poste a n26
content: Suite a un transfert de la poste a n26, n26 a bloqué les fonds et demande des justificatifs. jusque la ok, sauf que leur demande est impossible a satisfaire n'ayant pas acces aux docs demandes...impossible de parler a quelqu'un - le service client dit ne rien vouloir savoir, et ne repond 1 fois par semaine aux mails...j'ai porte plainte au niveau européen- si j'avais su...fuyez!

name: rush
title: changer de numéro de téléphone semblait…

name: Waqas Ahmed

content: Makes you go through all the process to create an account and then say no you do not qualify because you are a pakistani. Chat gets closed straight after without being able to reply that when they started up they didnt care about this as a lot of same nationality holders are already on it. Weird polices and bad customer service. Still happy i didnt get started and then they said we wnt release your money because you are a national of a country we dont like. Couldve been worse. Thanks

content: Everything is going well so far :-)! The only things that are missing are there is no hotline phone number to call and speak with someone at N26, and there is also no e-mail address for contact through writing :-(? :-(?

name: Dan Brown
title: Account Denied
content: After reading several positive reviews about opening a new bank account with n26 I thought I would join the crowd.After completing the application however, I uploaded my ID, baring in mind I have an excellent credit rating a business and 5 UK bank accounts I was told they cannot open an account for me.The email says there is no available answer or explanation offered. No customer service support or number to call. Save yourself the time and effort, don’t bother.

name: Heidi
title: Good chat customer service and easy to…
content: Good chat customer service and easy to open an account and the card.

name: olivier lauret

content: Appli sobre et simple d'utilisation les conseillers sont réactive

name: Simon Pal
title: Great
content: Easy, Mobile supported, Cheap

name: Jochen
title: Professional and easy way to get…
content: Professional and easy way to get banking done, this is how it should work. Thank you N26

name: Dañiel Gerhardt
title: Great with some drawbacks for now.
content: Most things are great. The bank is modern, cool, supports contactless payment via card, Apple Pay, Google Pay and they have good customer support. The only problem is the app which you use for everything from withdrawing, depositing and checking your balance. Unfortunately, the app has a few bugs and the categories for your transactions are pretty bad but overall I’m satisfied. Much better than “regular” banks like Sparkasse or Volksbank.

name: Patrick Wurmbach
title: N26 top for Main Bank account and travel
content: N26 delivers a easy to use Bank account with a free MasterCard.I use the N26 Black MasterCard with insurance, the best for travel :)

name: Apostolos Lymperis

name: CHRIS BBT
title: JE VOUS RECOMMANE D'UTILISEZ LES…
content: JE VOUS RECOMMANE D'UTILISEZ LES SERVICES DE N26..

name: Muhammad Ali
title: Debit card stuck in ATM machine.
content: I had a problem with debit card being stuck in ATM machine. The N26 was helpful I first blocked the card using N26 app because it was a night time. And In morning I sent the message to N26 support about the problem and they resolved my problem and sent me the new card right away by blocking the old one. The good thing about N26 is that I can still use my N26 account at merchants without having card in my pocket, just with mobile app with Cash26. name: Janak Roka

content: The first time I used the app, I was thinking: wow the UI is better than any banking app I’ve used or seen up until now. Anything you do, feels fast, is structured in an easy way. There are much better methods to protect against tweaking and bypassing passcodes than anti-jailbreak Input. Anything is modern, it’s 1 app that contains all the features other banks use in 3 to 5 apps. This makes it a a wonderful competitor to any other.

name: Perrogon
title: N26, la révolution est en marche
content: Bonjour Pour un service de banque en ligne, N26 se démarque de part sa réactivité et facilite de prise en charge. La gestion de son compte bancaire devient un jeu d enfant. Tout y simplifie et très intuitif.Pour ma part, j ai pris la carte N26 métal faisant partit du réseau world elite. On m avait recommandé cette carte je ne regrette pas...On peut tout payer et elle passe partout ( automate 24/24 station, péages routiers, ) le paiement en ligne est fabuleux tant qu il y a bcp de sécurité... de plus N26 à chaque paiements  vous informe en instantané sur votre appli tel le montant correspondant à votre achat. Je recommande, bcp mieux que boursorama, vuabuy ou autres banques en ligne.Allez y vous ne serez pas déçu !Je réside en France et tout est plus simple...J ai un iban et exécuté mes virements directement par internet. L employeur peut effectuer virement salaire dessus également.Sous 48,72h suivant virement bancaire français, vous aurez l argent sur N26. Le service client est français et disponible.Seul petit bémol : les formulaires de contestation par exemple pour une opposition sur un prélèvement sont en anglais et non en français...Il faut bien leur trouver un petit truc qui va pas 😁, mais ils vont vite y remédier j en suis sûr car ils sont au fait de leur client et très proche d eux. Je me sens écouter dans mes remarques et ils possèdent un service qualité pour écouter remarques clients pertinentes.Mise a part ce petit détail, N26 en terme de fonctionnement, c’est une banque de l avenir ...Merci à toute l équipe et vous souhaite de continuer à nous servir avec autant d écoute et de qualités.J. perrogon
