name: David Chevance
title: Virement de fonds de clôture d'un PEA rejeté par N26 et clôture surprise de mon compte
content: Virement de fonds de clôture d'un PEA rejeté par N26 malgré la fourniture de tous les justificatifs possibles sur l'origine des fonds.Le même jour, réception de l'email standard de N26 m'informant de la clôture de mon compte avec deux mois de préavis.Comme d'autres personnes ont commenté ici, il est difficile de comprendre en quoi mon "usage" aurait été contraire à la section § 9.3 (section qui n'existe pas!) des Conditions Générales d’Utilisation “Compte courant N26”.Mon interprétation personnelle est que je n'ai pas encore utilisé ma carte bancaire depuis que j'ai ouvert mon compte N26, et il est probable que N26 tire l'essentiel de ses revenus des paiements par carte (commissions payées par les commerçants) et autres produits commerciaux tels que crédits à la consommation etc. (je n'ai pas vérifié quels produits ils proposent exactement à ce jour). Donc pour dire les choses crûment je ne suis pas un client rentable pur eux.Evidemment, si j'ai raison sur ce point, c'est un aspect plutôt embarrassant pour eux, donc on comprend qu'ils préfèrent rester le plus évasif possible sur les vraies raisons de clôture de comptes.Je voulais tester mon compte avec différents types d'opérations plus ou moins complexes avant de décider d'en faire ma banque principale et j'ai bien fait! Au moins je n'ai pas à ce jour de fonds bloqués chez eux comme nombre de leurs malheureux clients français, s'il faut en croire tous les avis qui mentionnent ce problème.Très déçus de mon expérience chez N26, même si je n'ai pas subi de conséquences vraiment fâcheuse comme nombres de leurs malheureux clients français. Ma femme et moi déconseilleront cette banque en ligne à toute notre famille, nos collègues de travail et nos amis, comme étant extrêmement peu fiable. Le compte N26 est un produit attractif qui présente de nombreux avantages, et si vous ouvrez un compte N26, tout peut se passer très bien pendant longtemps, mais si vous faites de N26 votre banque principale, alors vous aurez toujours une épée de Damoclès au dessus de votre tête.Je ne serais pas étonné que N26 mette bientôt la clé sous la porte s'ils ne revoient pas totalement leur politique de service client et que ce genre de problèmes se multiplient.

name: JULIEN LE ROUX
title: Une tirelire connectée
content: Voilà ce que j’attendais d’une banque...En fait non, ce n’est pas une banque, N26 est quelques chose de nouveau, une application où je peux faire ce que je veux avec mon argent.Finit les appels de conseillers éphémères, les courriers papiers, les frais, les virements qui prennent une à deux journées à arriver, les dépenses du Week-end qui apparaissent le lundi. Les plafonds de cartes explosés, les codes de CB à retenir...Après 6 mois d’utilisation, pas de soucis, mon salaire est viré sur mon compte N26, je gères mes budgets dans Espaces, je vois tout de suite ce qui me reste. Pas de surprise pour le moment.Les défauts ? Le RIB allemand qu’il faut faire accepter par tout le monde GrrrIl manque une flèche sur la CB... les commerçants galèrent souvant...Les chèques qui ne peuvent pas être encaissés (pour ma part moins de 5 par an)J’aurais mis 4,5 pour les derniers défauts tant les qualités les font oubliées.

Things started moving again and within 48 hours, my account was verified and card shipped. What happened to me is most likely quite a rare event, so apart from this, I would still recommend them with 5+ stars, cause these things happen and in the end, it's just about getting in touch, though one can feel a bit frustrated when things don't go quite as planned :) Thank you N26.

content: The bank that you could ever ask for!  I have recently joined N26 banking, and it couldn't be more amazing than what I have imagined. The service is so grand that it'll make you kind of hate the traditional banks. The customer service is amazing, helpful, and flexible. Furthermore, the design of both app and website is literally amazing. But, I'm not rating it 5 stars only because of some things that I would love for them to improve or add. The Mastercard Secure system that is linked to your card and their app is abysmal! It rarely works, and when I make purchases they go right through, which is quite disturbing, and it feels like my security is breached while shopping online. Also, I'd love to see the multicurrency option on the N26 platform, because it's a huge plus! Apart from all of this, the BANK IS AMAZING! And the bad reviews given here are just from people who had trouble getting verified so they throw shade on it, and describe it with such negativity that the bank actually doesn't have!  I would strongly advise anyone reading this to join them because it's worth it. Use my link for registration and get the ultimate experience with N26! n26'.'com/r/saadeddm3283

name: blaze
title: Long Story Short
content: Long story short, this is a great online banking option for travelers but after some recent experiences with their customer service and their inability to dispute a charge made on my account by a fraudulent website without blocking/re-ordering my card really killed my faith in them as a serious financial institution. It seems that as they grow in size their client support is decreasing. When it comes to resolving problems with my money, I do not appreciate speaking automated chat robots or being told that my bank cannot do anything for me with out causing me great inconvenience. I think banks and other financial institutions should remember that it is our money that allows them to stay in business, so it may be a good idea to protect your clients assets.. All that said I still recommend them as a temporary banking solution for travelers or those without other banking options available. Great company that is growing fast, maybe too fast.

Da diversi mesi sono diventato anche Partner di N26 così ho dato la possibilità a molti di conoscere ed adoperare i vantaggiosi servizi di N26. Non ho mai riscontrato problemi nell'utilizzo dei servizi e neppure i miei clienti ed amici che la usano hanno reclamato disagi di qualsiasi genere. Da migliorare il servizio clienti che risponde solo via chat e si spera che vengano presto implementati nuovi servizi come il calcolo della giacenza media ( per i clienti italiani) e la possibilità di alimentare il conto da altri canali, diversi dal bonifico bancario. title: Amazing Bank!
content: Everything is amazing, and super fast with this bank. They keep adding features, that you need before you ask for it. In particular, I love their:- Moneybeam feature, where you can send money to other N26 accounts instantly- Spaces, where you can set aside money, either for saving, or whatever reason you want, and they keep it aside and exclude it from your main account calculation. Tremendous help for budgeting!- Their SUPPORT! The support is amazing, super responsive, and they know their stuff pretty well.

content: N26 is not a normal bank. When I first joined I didn't expect to have some good service for an online bank. Recommend it to all people without thinking.

name: Monsieur BENOIT
title: Très satisfait de cette enseigne .
content: Très satisfait de cette enseigne .Je pense sérieusement dans faire mon compte courant certainement dans peut  de temps .Car J'en ai vraiment marre  des banque traditionnelle qui se gavent sur nôtre  dos .Avec N26 à l'occurrence au moins on sais où  l'ont  vas .Franchement j'apprécie N26 .Cordialement

name: Philippe M. (Lyon)
title: Super, Efficace... et gratuit
content: Super,Rapide Efficace et gratuit !!Appli au top (à part la fenêtre pour préparer sa question lors des chats)Pas d'épargne possible pour l'instantDepuis 4 mois : Aucun problème

name: Henry Dixon
title: N26 is an excellent and secure product offering…
content: N26 is an excellent product offering convenience and security for transactions through immediate notification on phone or smart watch as soon as a transaction is executed. I use it especially for travel outside my home country.   Customer service is excellent on the very few occasions you may need it.  It is a truly modern banking product which puts the customer first.

name: Tathagata Sarkar
title: Great Service and a Great Product
content: I have been using N26 for more than 2 years now and I have nothing to complain. The credit card is easy to use in terms of withdrawal and deposition of funds.The best aspect of N26 is the very low conversion charges when I use the card abroad. It has saved me a lot of money in transaction andconversion charges when compared to using either my Deutsche Bank or Sparkasse cards.They are also very prompt in solving issues. My card data was stolen to make a withdrawal in Malaysia and N26 were very helpful and even reimbursed me for the entire sum.I am very happy to be their customer and I can only recommend them highly. Great service and a great product.

name: Romy Schneider
title: Banque très facile et pratique!
content: Banque très facile et pratique!

content: Best experience in online banking, best mobile app and website, best feature, best fees, send money easily and quickly with your friends, control your limits easily.

name: Merlin Jürgens
title: Use this Bank. Just registered for having a credit card, but got amazed and made it my main bank account.
content: Haven't received my card yet, but am already amazed by this bank.In the few days I am there I feel more valued as a customer than I ever felt at other banks.Also they are managed by the younger generation. So, more innovative. I absolutely hate it to already have to go to the bank to do all kinds of stuff. Or like some banks a support chat that works from 10am till 1pm and only with like 20mins of waiting.N26 did a great job simplifying things. You can call me lazy, but would you walk upstairs 8 floors again if you have an elevator?No. Thats why I think I'll stick with them.Deposit/Withdraw Money? Just go to a supermarked that supports it. Need support? Just log into the support chat (Till now I haven't catched a time where the chat was offline or i had to wait more than 5 mins). What to transfer money or invest? Use the Webinterface/App.I just love that it has all the functions of a normal bank and is still so simple. This will pretty soon spread and then the other banks are put on the spot. Looking forward :)

content: I have only contacted support 3 days ago and when choose /human I was connected real fast and the support person was very friendly and willing to help. If the support person would have enough time to get back to me I would have find and answer to my request.

name: Islem Betta

content: This is good if I can or this can working my phone is not

name: Andrea Cesarano
title: Troppo rischiosa
content: Il servizio è scadente, l'app funziona male con continui problemi al controllo accesso lato sicurezza, password/impronta, l'assistenza incompetente ed alcuni operazioni fondamentali, possibili on line con banche italiane con N26 non sono possibili, come il versamento degli f24... Soluzione proposta dall'assistenza N26, andarli a pagare allo sportello di un'altra banca... Ridicoli. Sconsiglio vivamente di aprire un conto con N26, troppo immaturi come realtà per affidargli i nostri soldi.

name: Ronan
title: Excellente banque : Simple, basique.
content: N26 est une excellente banque qui va à l'essentiel, qui ne démarche pas, qui propose tous les services dont on peut avoir besoin.Il manque néanmoins quelques facilités et innovations même si je pinaille un peu :- Une IA qui pourrait donner des conseils pour mettre de l'argent dans nos espaces (centimes à chaque transaction par exemple), ou même le faire d'elle même selon certains critères- Une API open-source et ouverte aux particuliers. Aucune banque ne propose cela aujourd'hui et je suis convaincu que ce serai un véritable raz-de-marée- Une carte bancaire plus durable dans le temps pour les clients metal car elle est belle, certes mais se raye et s’abîme trop rapidement- De meilleurs services pour les clients Black et Metal autre que du service de riches comme la conciergerie : par exemple des deals, des offres intéressantes, des bons d'achat, etc.- Des services comme le cashback même sous forme de réduction, comme peut le proposer Revolut par exemple- Une solution de coffre-fort avec une offre premium permettant de stocker nos documents confidentiels- Un IBAN FR pour éviter les réticences auprès de certains services

name: lahouassa
title: merci
content: Vous êtes des professionnels j’ai adoré Ouvrir un compte chez N26 et l’accueil elle est formidable et je remercie Laurent de sa gentillesse

name: Mbayee Mbaye
title: Excellente bank
content: Excellente bank

content: Accessible, rapide, simple

name: Charlotte
title: Very good card
content: Very good card, good app, fast and good helpservice

name: franck maintenay
title: Satisfaction ++
content: 6 mois après l'ouverture de ce compte, je suis pleinement satisfait. L'appli mobile est une vraie réussite : loin des usines à gaz de la BNP et de la Société générale (c elles que je connais). Tout est gratuit. Je ne sais pas comment N26 gagne de l'argent, mais j'imagine que c'est le cas. Ça montre que nos banques françaises se gavent gracieusement. Seule ombre au tableau, mais pas du fait de N26 : pour le paiement de la CFE, les impôts rejettent les IBAN ne commençant pas par FR. Une limite imposée par le lobby des banques françaises sur l'état. C'est dommage mais c'est la "loi" (malgré les textes européens qui disent le contraire).

name: Rollfsen
title: Mir wurde wurde am 03.01.2019 mein N26…
content: Mir wurde wurde am 03.01.2019 mein N26 Konto aufgrund einer Angeblichen Routineüberprüfung Gesperrt. Der komplette Zahlungsverkehr war sofort Eingeschränkt. E-Mails wurden nicht beantwortet, inkompetenter Chat. Heute haben wir den 18.01.2019 und leider noch immer nichts. Weder kann ich über meinen vier stelligen Betrag Verfügen noch bekommt man eine Antwort. Es heißt immer nur im Chat, die Kollegen sind am Ball und melden sich.....ich soll noch ein wenig Geduld haben. Das ist alles eine Frechheit so dass ich heute meinen Rechtsanwalt Beauftragt habe. Eine E-Mail habe ich auch Geschrieben und die BaFin ins CC gesetzt, aber auch keine Reaktion !

name: Kel Singh
title: Easy efficient banking
content: Easy efficient banking. Prompt notifications on phone for all transactions. Future of banking!
reply: Vielen Dank für deine ehrlichen Worte. Es tut uns leid zu hören, dass wir deine Erwartungen nicht erfüllen konnten. Wir werden dein Feedback an die entsprechende Abteilung weiterleiten.Bei Verletzung der AGB oder Verdacht auf Betrug haben wir das Recht das Konto des Kunden einzufrieren und zu überprüfen.

name: Victor
title: Excellent bank account
content: Excellent bank account. I can manage by phone with a clean and intuitive app. They send me the credit card that binds with nfc and google pay easily. Support is exceptionally fast and good. They solved my problem in minutes.

name: MagdaLena Matyjek
title: It's definitely the best bank I've ever had!
content: It's definitely the best bank I've ever had. All sources are in English, the agents are very helpful and pleasant when I contact them through the online chat, all the changes (even legal) or updates are communicated via emails in easy language, which doesn't want me wish I never got this email in the first place (which is the case with other banks), the transfers and payments are super easy, transparent, and fast. And the master cards are beautiful!I only miss the option to download statements for a particular transaction with a credit card, instead of the whole month statement. And I can't wait to see new features of the Spaces (something like sub-accounts of the main one) - like sharing a space with someone else.

content: Very helpful have kept me up to date quite quick very friendly but I'm still very new and still getting to know what everything is about highly recommended

name: Dimitrios Athanasiou
title: The bank how it should be.
content: The bank how it should be.Me and my wife use the bank over a year now. Best choice of in our life. We have now absolute and easy control of our finance through the app and the ease of pay with GPay. And we don't need to pay fees like we used to do from our old banks.

name: Kristen
title: Great and easy bank option!
content: My account was easy to set up but seems secure. I got my card in less than a week! Plus, transfers and bill pay is very easy to do. I've had to use the help feature twice for small things and both times the customer service was fast and helpful.

name: Andrew
title: Beware
content: Beware! it's not a real bank. Nice frontend and app, but then may cost you a lot because they don't do the basics a bank does. For example, I receive a cheque. Impossible to cash in... A bank eur to eur transfer from another company, lost and hours trying to resolve. It turns out they only want SEPA transfers, not swift which all other banks accept, but this is not something you control when someone asks you for your Iban. Anyway, they are good at raising money and spending it on plush offices, but the banking basics aren't there, even after several years of existence.

name: Thierry Dufour
title: Bien et professionnel
content: Bien et professionnel, attention aux IBAN car ils ne sont pas accepté sur la majorité des entreprises Françaises.Je souhaitais résilier mes banques Françaises mais serai contraint d'en garder une !

name: customer
title: Better to put your trust elsewhere
content: From my experience, this lot have a long way to go before they can be considered a fully functional bank.  It looks nice and slick and the app does its job pretty well. But if you hit any problems, then things unravel quickly - as others have noted here.  For me, they refused to credit a chunky deposit to my account - even though I had asked in advance if this was ok and provided evidence of where it came from.  It took two weeks to resolve. And through all that time it was impossible to get any replies from their Back Office staff. The in-app chat people are generally friendly but seem disconnected from the actual banking staff, so are of little help in these situations. And there is no phone number available to try and actually talk to someone. I wrote a formal complaint to their banking CEO Markus Gunter - no reply.I messaged their CEO Valentin Stalf on Linkedin - no reply.In the end they reversed the deposit payment, so at least I got my money back in the end.And now today I get an email saying my account was being terminated. Well that's just peachy.So no attempt from them to really look at the problem or raise any dialogue with me to find a solution.  And then it seems they consider me too much of a bother to keep as a customer.There are far better options available to you - Revolut, TransferWise etc that have much better reputations and people you can speak to when problems arise.

name: Adel Fellah
title: Excellente banque
content: Excellente banque

name: Ivan Husar
title: The best service
content: The system is easy to use and the support prompt and patient.

name: Patrick Andrzejewski
title: N26 banque en ligne d'une très grande fiabilité et sécurité.
content: N26 banque en ligne d'une très grande fiabilité.,réactivité, évolutive, adapté aux besoins de ses clients.Sédentaire ou globle trotter l'on peut toujours compter sur elle et son service client ou que nous soyons sur la planète grâce au live chat..Je recommande les yeux fermés !

name: Laurence Mann
title: Upgraded account to metal card and was…
content: Upgraded account to metal card and was instantly charged 16e , told card would be 3 weeks as its christmas , i understand this now probem. I explained that from 24th Decemeber i would be in the UK for 2 months for my employer so if my card is late then i wont be able to recieve it - i was told if no one was home to sign for it they would send it back to HQ and can resend to my address in the UK. Card was delivered to address is spain and left in a communal post box !!  i have now had to cancel the card and asked for replacement to be sent onto me in the UK and no one has come back to me , the time the new card comes i will be back in spain and could have used the card on the floor !!! however they are still charging me 16e a month even though i have no card .Spoke to online chat , women was rude and didnt understand what was going on, she cut me off after 30 minutes of talking as she didnt have answer to any questions still no card and still no phone call or email but they keep taking the 16e a month !

name: edouard boinot
title: C'est une vrai banque Numérique
content: Je ne regrette tellement pas d'avoir quitté la société générale.Rapide, simple et un service client vraiment à l'écoute. J'attends encore quelques petites optimisation de l'app pour tout soi parfait.

name: Alex Gottard
title: GOOD SUPPORT SERVICE
content: I contacted the agent through the chat, for knowing if my bank account and card were activated, she checked it up and replied that all was ok; fast and very good support service

name: OLIVIER RUTON
title: Recommandation 5 étoiles !
content: Une banque moderne sans chichi qui répond à tous les besoins digitaux attendu dans l'ère du temps

name: Raynaud
title: Simple, efficace et avantageux
content: Banque simple, efficace, et surtout tres avantageuse pour les personnes mobiles. J'envisage de l'utiliser comme compte principal.

name: Antony boyard
title: Compte d une simplicité on ne peut…excellente banque
content: Compte d une simplicité on ne peut mieux la carte métal est top les virements se font rapidement le service client est facile à joindre ne cherchez plus d autres banques N26 est la meilleure

name: Maylis Jorand
title: Never found banking so easy!
content: Never found banking so easy. It's the perfect option for travelers. From the fees to the customer care or the app, it has got everything you want. Since taking the leap, I never looked back. You control everything and you get good and quick help when an issue arises. I definitely recommend it. One of the best decision I took.

name: MaxBaier
title: Absolut unseriös
content: Absolut unseriös, ganz sicher keine Firma, der man sein Geld anvertrauen kann. Solange solche Firmen eine Banklizenz bekommen brauchen wir uns vor einer Abschaffung des Bargelds nicht fürchten. Die sperrten über Neujahr einfach mein Konto mit allen Funktionen wegen irgendeiner "Routineüberprüfung".Zum Glück habe ich vorher schon genug über dieses unwürdige Geschäftsgebaren dieser Firma gelesen und hatte nur mehr Geld in homöopathischen Dosen auf diesem Konto, aber was ist mit den Leuten, die das ernsthaft einsetzen möchten? Die schauen dann wirklich blöd aus der Wäsche.Beschwerde an die BAFIN ist auf jeden Fall raus, ich kann nur jedem empfehlen, falls er Geld auf dieses Konto bekommt sofort vom Konto nehmen und in Zukunft ein anderes Konto verwenden.Die Arbeit einer Kündigung muss man sich nicht machen, kann man einfach leer lassen, weils eh - wertentsprechend - nichts kostet.

name: Guerin-Morel Dimitri
title: Presque Parfait
content: Très bon établissement bancaire, ne manque que le RIB FR, et plus de partenariat pour les membres "Métal"

name: Giusi Gamba
title: È dal 21/12/18 aspetto un bonifico… truffa
content: È dal 21/12/18 aspetto un bonifico nessuno sa dirmi dove sono i miei soldi alle mail il supporto non risponde e nella chat gli operatori non hanno mai informazioni da darmi, ormai non so più che cosa fare la banca emittente ha fatto anche un reclamo via swift per avere il rimborso dei soldi e non rispondono nemmeno via swift allaBanca . Ho chiesto più volte al supporto che se non possono accreditare il bonifico di mandarlo indietro e niente, mi hanno chiesto dei documenti che attestano il tutto ed è stato inviato tutto. Se qualcuno può aiutarmi lascio la mail lora10@yahoopuntocom

name: Pj
title: Still no card!!!!
content: Opened my account late Dec and still mid Jan, no card. Sent them a mail about this but no response. Talked in online chat today and they say they have a backlog. Communicate this then!!!! Instead they send me ridiculous e-mails like top up your account. Errr no, not until I can use the money. Very poor introduction to an institution you should be able to trust.

name: Stefan
title: Absolut unseriöse Bankerfahrung - nie wieder N26 für mich.
content: Ich bin bzw. war seit 2016 N26 Kunde. Eigentlich war ich recht zufrieden mit der Bank. Tolle App, tolle Features. Habe die Bank als Hauptkonto verwendet, bei dem all mein Zahlungsverkehr abgewickelt wurde, also Gehaltseingang, Miete, Versicherungen, Rechnungen, Einkäufe usw.Auf dem Konto war ein 5-stelliger Betrag.Am 28.12.2018 wurde dann plötzlich mein Konto gesperrt mit dem Hinweis einer "Routineüberprüfung". Die geforderten Unterlagen habe ich am selben Tag noch eingereicht. Das Konto blieb jedoch gesperrt.Im Januar werden viele Versicherungen, Mietzahlungen usw. fällig, so dass die Lastschriften nicht eingelöst werden konnten und mir dadurch Probleme und Kosten entstanden sind.Am 08.01.2019 habe ich den Kundenservice gebeten, mein Geld auf ein anderes Konto zu überweisen und mein N26 Konto zu schließen. Das war auch nicht möglich.Gestern bekam ich eine Email, dass die "Routineüberprüfung" abgeschlossen sei und ich mein Konto wieder normal nutzen kann. Habe sofort alles Geld auf mein neues Konto bei der Deutschen Bank überwiesen und mein N26 Konto gekündigt."Routineüberprüfung" ist ja OK, aber doch bitte ohne mehr als 2 wöchige Kontosperrung, bei der man weder an Bargeld kommt oder Zahlungen mit der Mastercard tätigen kann, noch Überweisungen tätigen kann oder Lastschriften eingelöst werden.Ich kann nur von N26 abraten, das ist kein seriöses Bankverhalten. Ich bin nun wieder bei der Deutschen Bank.Den Fall habe ich meinem Rechtsanwalt übergeben und werde den mir entstandenen Schaden (Rücklastschriftgebühren, etc) zurückfordern, nötigenfalls gerichtlich. Darüberhinaus habe ich den Fall der BaFin gemeldet.

name: David
title: Slower than the slowest!
content: Sadly I have to agree with Ollie. I was really impressed with N26 in Germany but am still waiting for my account to be opened in the UK. No response after 5 days - other than the app being stuck on “we are still checking your documents”. Every bank in the UK can do better than that - and Monzo managed it in minutes!
reply: Hey, vielen Dank für deine ehrlichen Worte. Es tut uns Leid, dass wir dich in solch eine Lage versetzt haben. Wir werden dein Feedback an die entsprechende Abteilung weiterleiten.

name: Michael
title: Easy to get started
content: Easy to get started, everything happens when they say, the app is great, the security spot on. Banking as it should be.

name: Kanat Sydykov
title: The online banking interface is so easy…
content: The online banking interface is so easy to use and designed so efficiently that you actually enjoy it. Customer support is fast and friendly. I also keep getting the same reviews from my friends who also enjoy using N26.

name: Atmane
title: Meilleurs banc
content: Meilleurs banc

name: daniele cabras
title: Mi hanno consgliato un avvocato tedesco…
content: Mi hanno consigliato un avvocato tedesco che parla italiano e sa tutto di questa truffa chiamata n26 se altri hanno problemi con il rimborso mandatemi pure una email a danielecabras88@gmailpuntocom cosi che ci aiuta tutti insieme e recuperiamo i nostri soldi da questo squallore

name: maurizio polidori
title: attenzione che ti fregano i soldi
content: ho aperto un conto a ottobre 2018, il 9 novembre mi è arrivata una mail dove mi dicevano che avrebbero chiuso il conto l'1/10/2019, me l'hanno chiuso il 10/1/2019, senza alcuna spiegazione e creandomi non pochi problemi. Ho inviato una mail chiedendo spiegazioni e con i dati dove bonificare il mio saldo: nessuna risposta.In chat gli operatori sono gentili ma non sanno niente.A questo punto posso dire forte: LADRI  INAFFIDABILI TRUFFATORI

name: Sebastin Müller
title: Lächerliche Kontensperrung /Kündigung
content: Habe gestern meine Kontokündigung erhalten. Wegen was? Tja, keine Ahnung. Die komische Facebook Community (Der User wird bei negativen Beiträge zerfleischt) meint, es könnte mit Ebay zu tun haben.Ich habe tatsächlich, letzte Woche, 3 Artikel verkauft. Deshalb eine Kündigung? Ich hab langsam das Gefühl, N26 möchte unbedingt nur noch zahlende Kunden. Die völlig überteuerten Konten können nur nichts.Die Kündigung ist das eine, aber eine Sperrung zu verhängen, das andere. Ich komme nicht mehr an mein Geld. Der Chat dauert ewig und beantwortet keine Fragen.

name: Ollie
title: Unbelievably bad customer service!
content: I created an account two weeks ago having liked the idea of the spending analysis, app and financial control having smart bank account offers.However, I still haven't had an account set up after two weeks of radio silence, no card  and customer service tells me the delay would deffinately be resolved in 2 days, 3 days ago... I am exasperated with this pathetic attempt to complete a basic administrative task such a create a new user account, and from this experience I am certainly not going to continue to get involved with this headache of a company.It is a shame as I genuinely wanted to see what N26 has to offer and was very keen to find an alternative to monzo so was very hopeful. However I think N26 make it very clear to us all: their competitors simply do it better than them... There are so many better mobile banks on the market and N26 want you to know it. There are mobile banks that get back to you quickly and set up accounts swiftly and simply generate a passive service to help you manage your finances and offer reassurence through good customer care..... My advice is simple listen to all the bad reviews from. People who have had a similar experience to me..... look at what N26s staff are trying to tell you.... DO NOT USE THIS  HOPLESS, STRESSFUL, TIME CONSUMING WASTE OF TIME... Nice idea... Badly executed
reply: Hey, vielen Dank für deine ehrlichen Worte. Es tut uns Leid, dass wir dich in solch eine Lage versetzt haben. Wir werden dein Feedback an die entsprechende Abteilung weiterleiten.

name: Mateo Freudenthal
title: Miserabler Kundenservice
content: Ich bin seit Anfang an Kunde. Angelockt natürlich mit den kostenlosen Abhebungen und der Idee ein KOnto über sein Konto zu führen. Wenn alles funktioniert, ist die Technik natürlich super. Sollte man mit seiner Bank mal reden müssen(Egal was, z.B. Man waret auf eine Überweisung), ist N26 wahrscheinlich die schlechteste Bank die man haben kann. Es gibt keinen Support. Man kann keine Nachrichten/Kontaktformular schreiben(!) sondern muss nach eingabe eines Tokens mind. 20 Minuten auf einen CHAT-Bot warten. Wenn man die App zwischenzeitlich zu macht, dann wirft man auch aus der warteschleife geworfen. Ich werde das Konto behalten, aber niemals würde ich komplett auf N26 setzen. Wenn man eine gute Kreditkarte sucht, dann empfehle ich American Express.Ich bin auch seit 2013 dort und kann es jedem ans Herz legen.

name: Alejandro Font
title: Effective
content: Quick, simple to use, and straight to the point. There are no complicated barriers of entry, no complex tiered subscription plans or fees. Their support team very quickly fixed a small issue I had, and whilst the documents verification process failed multiple times on me, it came down to a videocall (directly in the app itself) that helped me validate correctly in a matter of minutes.
reply: Hey, vielen Dank für deine ehrlichen Worte. Es tut uns Leid, dass wir dich in solch eine Lage versetzt haben. Wir werden dein Feedback an die entsprechende Abteilung weiterleiten.

name: Erda
title: Good service
content: Easy to use, friendly customer service. The only and obvious problem is that there is no option for personal contact. But that being part of the concept you can't really complain about it. I have only had good experiences with N26 who are always ready to help me when needed.

name: Getallthespam Spammeplenty
title: They blocked my acount
content: They blocked my acount telling  me that there was a violation of the contractual agreement, but they didn't say exactly what this violation was.I guess that maybe the reason was that recently I withdrew more frequently from ATM.When I contact them via chat they close it immediately and provide no further explanation.They said they'll be transfering my money to the bank I have designed, but this is taking more than a week now.

name: Munteanu Traian
title: Good services and client support
content: Good services and client supportPros:- Open the account was easy and fast.- Their customer support is good.- Mobile appCons:- they do not offer shared account

title: Not a great start!
content: Not a great start! Opened an account on the 07th of January and the app is telling me they are checking my documents and it will take 2 business days! That’s me now on 36 days! There is not a contact number listed any where! The help center is also rather unhelpful. Some help would be nice.

name: Ichchou
title: Je recommande vivement
content: Je recommande vivement

name: billay
title: Le service s'est complètement dégradé…
content: Le service s'est complètement dégradé au point de penser que  cette néo-banque est au plus mal et qu'elle va bientôt fermer .Le chat est lamentable avec une attente très longue et un conseiller client qui ferme le chat sans avoir répondu à votre demande .N26 ne communique plus que par mail et se permet de bloquer l'argent d'un compte qu'il annule à son gré au fallacieux prétexte d'enfreindre les conditions générales .Cette banque est à fuir au plus vite .

name: Andrea
title: Buon conto con qualche limite da conoscere
content: Conto corrente veramente a zero spese, a patto a) di scegliere la versione base b) di non superare 5.000 € di giacenza media, oltre i quali scatta il bollo statale di 37 euro (clausola valida per qualunque altro conto). Difficilmente può sostituire in toto un conto corrente, non solo perché in Italia non si può versare contante, ma anche perché molte utenze (gas, luce ecc) non accettano l'Iban tedesco di N26.La pecca maggiore è tuttavia l'usabilità. L'interfaccia della app si sforza di mostrarsi amichevole, ma è organizzata in modo contorto, con funzioni sparse senza logica e procedure controituitive anche per le operazioni più banali.

name: Khan
title: This bank is a joke.
content: This bank is a joke.I was victim of fraud as someone used my debit card details online and spent a big amount.I disputed the transactions and ordered a replacement debit card.The bank asked me to fill in dispute forms which I did. The bank told me that they would send the forms to Mastercard for review. Two days later, I received an email from N26 bank that my dispute has been approved by Mastercard and I will get my money back in 3 days.However, after 3 days, there was no money in my bank and the bank 'seized my account'. I was given no reason whatsoever. After several days, I received an email from bank asking me to provide some personal details to confirm my identity and source of funds.I provided the requested information on the same day.Two days later, I received another email from N26 that the checks on my account were successful and my account was 'fully operational'.I asked again about the status of the dispute I had raised. But no reply.Next day, I received yet another email from N26 support team that my account has been closed with immediate effect.I was given no reason why they did so. I was given no response to my dispute. I have been asking them again and again to give me my money back but there is a complete silence.To make things worse, there is no telephone line where you could call and complain.This bank is a scam. Please stay away; your money is not safe with them.

name: Jonas Hendrickx;
title: I asked to have my account closed on a…
content: I asked to have my account closed on a certain date, so I made sure balance was zero as instructed. And they did not close it.Suddenly direct debits start racking up fees for bouncing.I talked to an agent who started insulting me and said I had to wait when they reached my e-mail in the inbox to close it...I decided to close my account after I had 5 debit cards broken in less than 6 months. I have 10 other cards in that same wallet that have never broken in 29 years.

name: Mr Shane Addison
title: Very clear and easy yet feel secure…
content: Very clear and easy yet feel secure with my money

name: M Fox
title: Best Bank & Banking App Ever
content: N26 has managed to make banking fun, sleek, and painless. They've managed to innovate a very boring and stuffy industry.  All of your banking can be done within their intuitive and user-friendly app which provides many features to help you seamlessly manage your finances.  When you do need to speak to a real person for support, you can do so easily and receive excellent customer service.

name: Guillaume Guinard
title: Carte fragile, service client fastidieux a contacter, renouvellement vicieux
content: Excellent service, jusqu'à ce que vous avez un problème de carte, ce qui va se passer a un moment ou à un autre vu que celle-ci est très fine et se fissure toute seule à l'usage (n26 black). Un jour elle n'est plus acceptée par les machines, ou avalée.La seule manière de contacter le service est via le livechat de l'application, si vous n'êtes pas disponible tôt le matin il faut être prêt à faire la queue derrière au moins 20 personnes en gardant l'application ouverte pour la verifier regulierement. (attente moyenne : entre 15 et 30 minutes).Dans mon cas, j'ai commandé une nouvelle carte après que la mienne a été avalée par une machine. En commander une nouvelle est facile via l'application, mais mon colis ne m'est jamais parvenu (la faute à UPS, et non n26). Cependant, étant au Royaume Uni je n'ai eu aucun moyen de suivre mon colis a moins de contacter mon service client, ce qui est fastidieux, et qui ne peut rien pour moi une fois la carte envoyée. Résultat, j'ai passé 1 mois et demie sans carte, car je n'ai pas pu contacter le service client pour être averti que la carte ne sera jamais livrée chez moi mais envoyée a un point relais a la place, me rendre au point relais qu'il fallait a cause d'un voyage, ou meme retrouver le point relais en question (un lavomatique isolé dans une ruelle perdue). J'ai quand même dû payer mes frais et payer pour ma nouvelle carte, sans dédommagement. A noter aussi: Le renouvellement de votre abonnement est automatique. Si vous résiliez moins de deux semaines avant la fin de votre abonnement, c'est mort, quand bien même vous n’avez pas l’usage de votre carte. Je recommande de résilier dès la réception de votre carte, vu que la résiliation ne sera effective qu’un an plus tard, et d’annuler la résiliation au dernier moment si besoin. Tout se fait en un lien via l’application.

name: Albert Attard
title: N26 is great
content: N26 is great.  I can do most of the things I need without having to go to a bank and this including opening the account.  Also, I do not pay any charges when I transfer money to pay my rent for example, even when the recipient uses another bank.You need to be careful as N26 only permits 5 free withdrawals from the ATMs.  Also, my N26 card is not accepted everywhere, such as places where they only accept debit cards.  Finally, the card is basically a Master-Card.  There can be places where they only take VISA, in which case you cannot pay with your N26 card.

Unfortunately, we cannot offer you an account due to legal requirements. Please note that our Customer Service cannot help you any further or make an exception for you. Thank you and all the best. 🙂I'm using Monzo, Starling, Revolut and a also traditional banking accounts plus clean credit score rating! Avoid it.

name: Baby armstrong
title: I needed a bank that offered easy…highly recommended *****
content: I needed a bank that offered easy online use, a debit card, contactless payments.N26 offered everything I needed and more!I have read mixed reviews but I can happily say that I have not experienced any of the issues that I’ve seen in the bad reviews. My money goes in fine, I can use my card everywhere and withdraw money from ATM points.I am able to move my money about within my account into my designated ‘spaces’ designed to help manage my money. I’ve had to speak to the customer support via the ‘chat’ section on the app and was with an advisor within seconds who after a few security questions was able to assist me and they did so quickly giving me all the information I required. I not normally someone that writes reviews but I am so over impressed by my new account I couldn’t not express this!If your thinking about getting an account with chip and pin, contactless, use everywhere and you want to easily be able to manage your account then this is the account for you!You get a seethrough card that looks stylish and a sleek!You download the N26 app that is easy to use and secure to your fingerprint (if your phone offers this) or use a personal password.Highly recommended!! *****

name: Ali Ismailov
title: Terrible Customer Support
content: Customer Support experience:1. Click on the Chat button in the web.2. Tell the bot that I need a confirmation for my transaction.3. Bot didn't help.4. Wait for human.5. Human asks again, "How can I help?"6. "I want a confirmation for one transaction."7. CS advices me to check Statistics page in the app.8. I'm browsing the app to find where the Statistics page is....9. I get dropped from the chat for inactivity.10. Start a chat again.11. Do the steps 2-7 again. Including CS asking me again, "How can I help?" after bot failed to process the request and my previous conversation got dropped because of inactivity....19. I'm on the Statistics page.20. CS: "Press and hold on the transaction"21. Me: "Nothing is happening"22. CS: "Is it a transfer or card payment?"23. Me: "Card payment."24. CS: "We do not provide that."25. I need it for the customs authorities.26. You can print the whole month statement and highlight the transaction.27. But I do not want to share my whole month statement with a third party. I need it only for this one transaction.28. Sorry, we do not provide that currently.29. Could you please explain me why is it not possible?30. Got dropped from the chat....This is one experience from today. I don't remember ever having smooth CS experience with N26. If you never need to talk their CS, it's an OK app to use.

They refuse to engage in discussion saying customer services don't know why so can't help. If this is culture and service I'd avoid - stick with others above who all have better service and at least engage - especially Monzo who are head and shoulders the best

content: Awful experience, I mistakenly transferred some money from my account to a non existent bank account number.  I expected this money to bounce back as it should.  a week later i checked and still noting returned.  I contacted N26 who said they had no idea where this money was and would investigate,  Weeks and weeks went by and every time i contacted to support team via the messenger service it was the same fob off "its being looked into, we will update you soon" plus the customer service function were incredibly rude and even cut me off a few times when i had reached out again.I will be contacting them daily until i have my money back as it is clearly a issue with N26 as i have already been in touch with the bank sent to and they have confirmed that the account i sent the money to is an inactive account.Do not go near this bank for day to day banking as they clearly have no clue how to treat customers!

name: Azeem
title: Quick and excellent support through the…
content: Quick and excellent support through the app. I am sure the same resolution through another German bank like duetsche bank would take weeks. Here it took 5 mins. Very happy

name: Karsten Knorr
title: Kunden statt Runden
content: In der Presse liest man gerade über die neu abgeschlossene Finanzierungsrunde von 260 Mio EUR für die weitere Expansion. Und gleichzeitig hier und auf vielen weiteren Bewertungsseiten von den mangelhaften Erfahrungen, die wir als Kunden mit N26 machen. Wobei N26 auf diese nicht einmal mehr reagiert.Es scheint so, als wären wir Kunden nur noch überflüssiges Beiwerk, nachdem N26 gerade am Anfang alles getan hat, um so viele Kunden wie möglich zu gewinnen. Denn die Anzahl der Kunden ist wie bei vielen Startups der Multiplikator für die Bewertung des Unternehmens.Vielleicht ist das auch einer der Gründe, warum Kündigungen ignoriert und nicht bearbeitet werden? Und vielleicht wird es Zeit, mit den Füßen abzustimmen und N26 den Rücken zu kehren? So, wie viele von uns zahlreiche Freunde für N26 geworben haben, bekommen wir Diese Freunde bestimmt auch wieder von N26 weg. Und ein größerer Kundenverlust bringt N26 vielleicht zum Nachdenken..Was denkt Ihr? Bitte Beitrag als hilreich markieren, wenn Du zustimmst.Ah, jetzt probiert N26 schon, solche Beiträge sperren zu lassen. Und Trustpilot bittet um Ergänzung des Beitrages um persönliche Erfahrung. Aber gerne :-)Kundendienst ist nicht erreichbar, es dauert Stunden, bis auf den Chat geantwortet wird, oftmals erfolgt gar keine Antwort. Wenn die Rückmeldung an den Kundendienst auch nur die kleinste Kritik an den Produkten von N26 erhält oder N26 um Behebung eines Fehlers gebeten wird, wird der Chat sofort beendet. Keiner fühlt sich für irgend etwas zuständig, Kündigungen werden ignoriert und Emails nicht beantwortet.

name: Julia
title: Je recommande vraiment cette banque !!
content: Je recommande vraiment cette banque !!! On a pour habitude de dire quand ça ne va pas et bien je vais vous dire c'est vraiment fluide et simple, bien sûr il y a des petites choses qui pourraient êtres améliorées mais sinon je ne regrette pas mon compte chez eux !
reply: Danke für dein jetziges Feedback.Der Chat ist innerhalb unter 2 Minuten zu erreichen.Um Kritik oder eine Beschwerde zu äußern haben wir dafür Ideas@n26.com und Complaints@n26.com eingerichtet. Auch jede Art von Fehler wird vom Kundensupport an das BackOffice weitergeleitet.

name: Christopher Robert
title: N26 is the worst bank I’ve dealt with
content: N26 is the worst bank. Card sent the 4th. UPS of course leaves no info notice. UPS wants address from N26... I have spent the last 4 days trying to get N26 to correct the address. No update on UPS site. N26 says you are was sent to a department to correct the address. The address was never incorrect!!I’m about ready to go to HSBC, if I want bad service, at least they have a branch office. Without the card I can’t fix my internet, phone etc. It was ordered literally last year on December 27th

name: Robert Kroselj
title: N26 is very good
content: N26 is very good, because the is no fee for the ATM withdraw, no fee for paying payment orders. Support is exelent and helpful. I realy recommend N26.

name: Arman
title: Update at the bottom. was 1* now 4*
content: Opened a metal account almost a month ago. Have contacted N26 on the phone and via the online chat feature a number of times. The phone calls didn't resolve the issue but the people on the phone were friendly and professional.However still no card. All I'm given is a link to UPS tracking, then told the card has not arrived from the manufacturer. So I'm being given a tracking link to something the N26 themselves don't have. There are no timescales to when I can expect my card. Rather the support staff say I will have it ASAP or soon. Also in the most recent exchange the support staff assured me that I "could use the account the fully".When I challenged them on how I make atm withdrawals without a card, they simply offered me the email address to make a complaint. As it stands, I have signed up to a paid account with a host of benefits that I can not access.UpdateSo the card finally arrived, just in time for my holiday. Works like a charm. Didn't have any issues using it abroad. The app kept me up to date with all transactions through instant alerts. Most of the reasons for calling my traditional bank, I can manage myself through the app. Not sure if the production and delivery issues with the metal card have been resolved, but now I have the card. Very happy with the functionality of the card and account.

name: gertrude des bois enchantées
title: J’ai ouvert un compte N26
content: J’ai ouvert un compte N26, la simplicité et la fluidité sont très agréable. Toutes les questions sont traités grâce au Tchat et les interlocuteurs sont très compréhensifs et compétents. J’ai pris un cb gratuite. Et l application est parfaite, nous pouvons créer des projets et mettre de l’argent de côté. C’est la première fois que j’ai cette possibilité, je trouve cela génial. On choisit son code cb c’est drôlement pratique. Je suis très contente. Je recommande vivement

name: Artūrs Mančinskis

name: Hannah Rice
title: Overall experience and seeking replacement card
content: Overall my experience with N26 has been good my first card arrived promptly and the card is easy to use and great for travelling however I have had issues when I had to re order my card still have not received my replacement card and have no idea when it will arrive. Was difficult to contact N26 to try and rectify this situation and it still has not been resolved, considering I paid extra for the replacement card I feel this should be handled better.

name: Michel Aerts
title: tout commence bien..
content: tout commence bien... p uis, le désastre: il y a deux mois, je n'ai pas reçu une notification de virement: inquiet, j'interroge la seule assistance en ligne (aucun appel tel..): qui, au bout de plusieurs heures, me signifie que je dois désynchroniser mon téléphone: ce que j'ai fait: depuis ce jour, mon compte est bloqué: impossible de faire des virements, des achats en ligne: impossible de re-synchroniser mon téléphone ou de changer de code de validation: je vais devoir abandonner la banque, vu que l'assistance est INEXISTANTE: avis aux amateurs: n'espèrez jamais avoir une assistance: elle n'existe pas, meme avec des heures d'attente !

name: Marcin Sierant
title: Messy registration process
content: I'd love to become a customer, but I wasn't able to – they didn't like my residential address. Also, customer service is more unhelpful than helpful. Stay away!

name: Jordan
title: Grenzt an Betrug
content: Ich war immer stehts zufrieden mit der Usability der App, der Funktionalität und den unkomplizierten Transaktionen.Nun gab es an Neujahr das erste Problem. Ein Hotel hatte vor der abbuchung bereits Beträge authorisiert / reserviert und dann beim Check-Out den korrekten Betrag abgebucht. Nun nach fast zwei Wochen ist auf dem Kontoauszug auch alles korrekt, im Onlinebanking werden mir die reservierten Zahlungen allerdings immer noch angezeigt - sprich: kein Zugriff auf über 400 Euro!Nun versucht mal in so einem Fall den Support zu erreichen: keine Hotline, nicht mal eine E-Mail Adresse! Man soll sich erstmal mit einem Chatbot rumschlagen der einem nach Stunden erst zu jemanden weiterleitet der sich ca. 15 Sekunden Zeit nimmt. Und das bei der Business Version!Ich empfehle allen nur die Finger von dieser Bank zu lassen.Guten Morgen und nie wieder!
reply: Danke für dein Feedback.Ein Mitarbeiter kann von Anfang an verlangt werden, wenn wie im Chat erwähnt "/Mitarbeiter" eingegeben wird.Die Kollegen nehmen sich alle Zeit der Welt, bis das Problem behoben ist.Wie lange ein Händler Zahlungen autorisiert und wie oft abbucht, darauf hat keine Bank einen Einfluss.

name: Franck Fromont
title: Déçu et en colère..
content: Le 21/11/2018 je fais un virement de 5100€ pour l'achat d'un véhicule d'occasion auprès du vendeur. Je n'ai pas vu tout de suite le mail de N26 (corbeille spams) me demandant de leur fournir divers documents afin de procéder à des contrôles de routine et d'assurer les comptes. Pas de problème, je comprend. J'envoie tous les éléments demandés et je reçoit ceci : "En référence à votre transaction précédente de 5 100 EUR qui a été refusée, vous pouvez essayer de la déclencher à nouveau. Cette fois, il sera accepté.".Entre temps ne pouvant faire patienter davantage le vendeur j’effectue un virement depuis un autre compte d'une autre banque sans problème.A ce jour N26 m'a débité cette somme (5100€) alors que je n'ai initié aucune autre demande de virement et que la première à été refusée. J'ai répondu par 2 couriels au backoffice N26, 3 conversations par chat auprès du service client m'indiquant qu'une réponse me serait apportée par mail or je n'ai reçu aucune information, aucun mail pas même un appel depuis bientôt 2 mois que ça dure....  Le service client me renvoie vers le backoffice qui ne me répond pas.On me prive de MON argent sans qu'aucune explication me soit donnée et je n'ai aucun autre moyen d'avoir une réponse à mon problème. Pour facturer leurs frais en revanche c'est instantané. Bref, déçu et en colère.Franck FROMONT.

name: Luigi
title: FINGER WEG VON N26 - nicht zu empfehlen
content: Vor einem Monat das N26 Konto eröffnet.Wir haben es als Geschäftskonto eröffnet, Winterbetrieb, Gastronomie.95% Kartenzahlungen.Es gab tägliche Einzahlung sowie Abbuchungen.Ganz plötzlich wird das Konto mit knapp 3500€ gesperrt, laut N26 eine „automatisierte Routineüberprüfung“ !Absoluter Schwachsinn!!Der Geschäftsbetrieb ist dadurch drastisch eingeschränkt.Mehrfach per Chat und per E-Mail versucht Kontakt aufzunehmen- vergeblich!Anwalt ist beauftragt!
reply: Danke für dein Feedback.Wir bieten keine Gemeinschaftskonten an, daher war dies ein AGB Verstoß, wenn ihr es zusammen genutzt habt.Wir entschuldigen uns für die Unannehmlichkeiten.

name: Walter Bringmann
title: überfordertes Management
content: Im Oktober 2017 richtete ich online mein Konto ein.Das klappte innerhalb von 10 Min. Nach und nach benutzte ich immer häufiger die Debitkarte. Hauptvorteil gegenüber den anderen Kreditkarten war, dass ich sekundenschnell über mein Handy über die Zahlung informiert wurde. Damit entfiel das lässtige Überprüfen von Kreditkartenabrechungen nach 4 bis 6 Wochen.Im Dezember 2017 verlor ich meine Karte in den USA. Innerhalb von 2 Minuten hatte ich die Karte mit meiner App auf meinem Handy gesprerrt und die neue Karte gleich bestellt.Auch waren die Gebühren gegenüber meinen anderen Kreditkarten ( sowohl bessere Devisenkurse als auch  weniger Kosten) deutlich besser. Kurz gesagt, ich wurde ein richtiger Fan von der N26. Mindestens 30 Freunde habe ich überzeugen können. Manche fragten sogar, ob ich an der Firma beteiligt bin, da ich so von ihr schwärmte.Ich fing an, selbst kleinste Beträge mit Karte zu bezahlen. Bargeldzahlungen tendierten gegen Null. Am 8 November wurden von der Karte insgesamt 6 Beträge von einer Autovermietung über 504€ abgebucht, die nicht von mir autorisiert waren.Da ich ja über mein Handy unmittelbar über die Abbuchungen informiert wurde, sperrte ich die Karte unverzüglich und bestellte am selben Tag per Express die neue Karte. Die Kosten für die Expressbestellung (25€) wurden noch am selben Tag belastet. Bis heute 8.01.2019 habe ich weder die Karte, noch das ungerechtfertigte abgebuchte Geld.Meine ca.10 E-Mails wurden entweder gar nicht beantwortet, oder ich bekam Mails mit der überraschten Frage: Hast du deine Karte immer noch nicht bekommen??? Deshalb habe ich jetzt einen Anwalt eingeschalten, aber auch dessen Frist haben sie verstreichen lassen, sodass jetzt Klage erhoben wird. Meiner Meinung ist die Firma zu groß geworden und die Führung offensichtlich überfordert, sie zu steuern. Eigentlich wirklich schade. Eine super Idee aber unfähiges Führungs- und sonstiges Personal.
reply: Danke für dein Feedback.Sollte eine Karte per Express nicht rechtzeitig erscheinen, erstatten wir natürlich den Preis.In deinem Fall haben wir dies natürlich auch gemacht.Wir entschuldige uns für die Unannehmlichkeiten.

content: Je recommande N26 pour sa simplicité d utilisation et le suivi en temps réel des opérations sur le compte .Je n ai utilisé que cette banque pour mes voyages a l étranger ,pas de frais de devises et la carte MasterCard black accepté partout , US , EUROPE !

name: tendresse sundi
title: J'ai fais mon compte en moins de 10…
content: J'ai fais mon compte en moins de 10 minutes, ils annoncé 48h a 72h pour la validation mais en quelques heures tout était bon. name: Stuart Grant
title: Fantastic service
content: Fantastic service, love my N26 card

name: Dory Manea
title: you're the best
content: you're the best

name: Geronimo Poggio
title: Perhaps the most comfortable banking experience in the whole of Europe
content: N26 has been my bank of choice for the last 4 years, and I have not once regretted signing up. They have never charged me a penny, and even though they have restricted their product considerably since launch, they are still above the competition in my book. It has been a very user-friendly experience for me, and I feel like a valued customer each time I contact support. Which hasn't been often mind you, because once you have signed up and been verified, the product basically just works.Pros:- No recurrent fees- Full checking account- Debit MasterCard- Easily manageable app- Enable/Disable access to MasterCard in full or in part with the touch of a button- Send money without a banking address with MoneyBeam- No foreign currency fee- Fast responsive customer supportCons:- Credit rating might hurt you now when trying to sign up, didn't in the beginning- Google Play dependency (not desirable for Custom ROM lovers like myself) - Only 3-5 ATM withdrawals per month in Germany (unlimited in the beginning)- Cash withdrawal now comes with a fee in some countriesThe cons are not that important to me, that's why I would recommend it to anyone who is looking for a basic checking account with some nice bonus features sprinkled on top.

name: Rabz Rowner
title: Unbelievable Negligence UK
content: Simply Ridiculous, money was sent by BACS which they do not support , that's fine. But my money hasn't been returned over 14 days and as far as I am concerned . That is theft . Do not use this bank

name: Sergio da Silva
title: Banking as it should be
content: Online banking as it should be: simple, fast, easy. The main caveat is that the MasterCard provided is a debit card and not a credit card. Not that it bothers me to see my bank account being debited immediately, but some merchants do not accept debit cards for securing a deposit and only accept credit cards (e.g. hotels, car rentals, ...). Support via the mobile app is great due to the tight integration. Would like to see more services being offered in markets other than Germany (I use it Luxembourg) and would like to have more ATMs support money withdrawal (very little ATMs in Luxembourg allow to withdraw money using the N26 MasterCard debit card - so far ING ATMs work but there are very little such ATMs available throughout Luxembourg).

name: Gavin
title: Highly recommend N26... Very competitive and progressive!
content: Highly recommend N26... It is a very progressive service... international outlook, very competitive charges, good travel cover, super simple and effective saving "space" idea towards goals etc, very good customer support... All in all I'm very happy and looking forward to future updates to the service!

name: Jay Lindsay
title: Great customer service
content: Great customer service , fast and friendly

name: Lorenzo Pedullà
title: Chiusura conti, ecco qualche risposta.
content: Qualche considerazione sui casi di chiusura dei conti.Facendo delle ricerche online mi sembra di capire che i conti vengano chiusi principalmente per tre motivi:1. Violazioni del contratto e delle condizioni d'uso (es. creazione di account per minorenni, utilizzo della carta standard per fini commerciali, cessione della carta a terzi)2. Attività illegali o al limite della legalità (es. acquisto di criptovalute, acquisti da siti segnalati come pericolosi, bonifici o pagamenti senza causale e quindi sospetti)3. Attività che recano svantaggio a N26.Quest'ultimo è il punto importante, che cercherò di spiegare come meglio posso;N26, essendo una startup, ha l'obbiettivo di crescere il più in fretta possibile e per questo motivo, cerca di attirare clienti offrendo un servizio a condizioni vantaggiose, quali la creazione di un conto estero in 8 minuti senza troppi controlli, prelievi e bonifici senza commissioni, spedizione della carta gratuita, e utilizzo gratuito dei servizi Spaces e Moneybeam. Con il programma inviti, N26 regala addirittura soldi ai suoi nuovi clienti!Quello che però alcune persone non prendono in considerazione, è che alcuni di questi servizi e privilegi, come i prelievi ATM e i bonifici SEPA, hanno un costo, e ogni volta che noi facciamo una di queste operazioni, le commissioni vengono pagate dalla banca invece che dal cliente.La chiusura dei conti potrebbe quindi essere una conseguenza di prelievi troppo frequenti o bonifici troppo frequenti e/o elevati.Questa mia tesi è supportata da alcune recensioni su Trustpilot che lamentavano di aver avuto il proprio account bloccato dopo aver provato a fare più bonifici SEPA di fila con somme abbastanza elevate, e da un articolo del 2016 su Startmoney*** (vi consiglio vivamente di leggerlo) in cui il CEO di N26 ammetteva di aver chiuso il conto dei clienti che facevano troppi prelievi. Se ci pensate, questo spiega anche come mai la N26 è stata sempre pubblicizzata come "smart card" da utilizzare principalmente per pagamenti online, contactless o bancomat. Nel contratto c'è infatti scritto (punti 8.3, 12.1, 12.2) che la banca ha il diritto di chiudere il conto o modificare il contratto nel caso in cui l'utilizzo porti svantaggio a N26.Detto ciò, tenendo a mente che potrei anche aver scritto cose senza senso; io, personalmente, cercherò di stare più attento quando uso la carta, pagando contactless o bancomat quando posso e cercando di limitare i prelievi e i bonifici solo a quando è strettamente necessario. Sono sicuro al 100% che un utilizzo ragionevole della carta non creerà problemi a nessuno.PS. Customer care non soddisfacente al 100%, è un po' lento, niente di grave comunque. Per il resto, uso N26 da Novembre del 2018 e fin ora non ho avuto nessun problema.

name: Océane
title: Carte gratuite n26

name: Nike Brass
title: Truffatori
content: Dó una stella perché non si può dare meno. Ad un certo punto non mi era più possibile effettuare transazioni online, ho chiesto il perché e mi é stato detto che probabilmente avevo inserito il PIN errato, lo ho resettato con un agente. Al momento del pagamento al supermercato il PIN risultava errato. Ho ricontattato, ho resettato nuovamente il PIN ma non funziona... Allo stato attuale riesco nuovamente (per ora) a fare transazioni contact-less e online. Qualcosa non quadra. Il disagio per me é molto e ho ricontattato, ricevendo sempre risposte vacue ed inutili. Non posso fare bonifici e sono abbastanza disperata. Questa settimana andrò a fare reclamo di persona alla banca d'Italia. Se qualcuno avesse suggerimenti o volesse fare una class-action ecco può cercarmi su Google come Nike Brass Alghisio (non é possibile mettere email)

Je vois le déconseille fortement .Nous allons les attaquer en justice et moi en attendant j’irais voir personnellement leur pdg Jérémie !!! name: ANDRIAN Luc
title: Attention!
content: Attention! Si vous souhaitez annuler votre adhésion. L'engagement est effectivement d'un an, mais vous devez faire votre demande d'annulation 1 mois (31 jours) avant la date anniversaire de votre adhésion.Résultat, je fais une demande 23 jours avant la date anniversaire et je repars pour un an d'engagement. J'aurais donc payé 2 ans d'adhésion (237€) au total pour un service que je n'utilise pas. Soyez prudent avant d'enrichir les banques et de vous appauvrir!!! On ne le dit jamais assez...Edit: Je viens de lire certains avis parlant de comptes clôturés sans raisons valables et d'argents bloqués de façons incompréhensible...du coup je relativise. Bien content de ne pas en avoir fait ma banque principale.

name: Dean Brooks
title: After reading the terrible reviews on…
content: After reading the terrible reviews on here, I am actually quite shocked that folk would still attempt to open accounts with this mob! No one in their right minds should do this, unless they’re blind, or stupid!Besides, what’s wrong with using a real physical bank account? One that you can go into a physical branch, call real humans if things go wrong?If I needed a bank account, and a “virtual” online bank was the only option, I would prefer to stick my money in my mattress, use a trusted friend / relative’s bank account. Better than using a Sham Bank who’s sole objective is to fleece the uninformed.Remember, a fool and his / her money are soon parted.

name: Antonio Dominguez Enrich

title: It's very easy to use and good support
content: It's very easy to use. Sometimes there are minor bugs but the support is very helpful so the bugs can be tolerated. Very convenient to do everything on phone without going to a physical bank. They have both MasterCard and Maestro card which is amazing.

name: Fortune petrdP
title: No reservations like it's said.
content: No reservations like it's said.. I recommend this company to anyone who's interested with online banking here in Europe.

name: Matthew Vella
title: ABUSIVE BEHAVIOR from n26
content: Abusive behavior from n26. I have been a customer since Feb 2015 and it was all great **BUT** On December 18, 2018, I received an email for a standard routine check, which happens on every account at some point. They asked me to send proof of my income and how I'm using N26. So I sent all proof of my income and payslips and they immediately decided to freeze my account without any prior notice. I couldn't access my funds, pay my bills or withdraw. I have contacted customer care every day however they were not willing to engage and simply cut the chat immediately. I also begged customer care to close my account for good and transfer the money to another bank account that I have so I could move on. This is abusive behavior and I have reported this to BaFin too. They have no right to freeze my money without any legit reason. At this point, I felt scammed. On January 15, 2019, I received an email from a customer agent that my account has been unfrozen and that I can continue using my account normally. At this point I am upset. They treated me like a criminal, they didn't engage with my issues and also I had clients who have paid me and the transfer didn't go through - So I lost money from incoming transfers because N26 are saying that transfers should bounce back to client but they haven't. *** UPDATE - I got a call from N26 higher management to explain the situation since it got out of hand and mishandled badly. They apologized for the delay and had no excuse to my case. The reason of these routine checks is because they found out certain users have been using the personal account as a business account. The offered me a premium service for a year for free - which is a nice gift.

name: JFP
title: Very poor service
content: Very poor service - account opened quickly and easily and ran ok for a while. Don’t try and do transfers on a weekend - they just don’t work - when they do if there has been a problem with it - it shows on your statement but doesn’t tell you whether they have taken it or not. It has NO pending payments method. Off their own back they said their systems aren’t up to scratch and don’t have the facility to show pending or bounced payments. The downside to this is that you never actually know what your balance is as it shows pending payments as proper payments on you statements so these are are subject to change. My account was closed by then as I used my card on two occasions and had cancelled card transactions on both because I had a credit balance but apparently I had no money!!!!! Down to their poor functioning systems not showing me a live balance it causes errors - stay away from this company!Also if you need any help you have to do it through an online chat which is slow and cumbersome. For one query I had someone tell me that they were going to get back to me - no one did - I had to call NatWest who could tell me what they were doing wrong. N26 is a brilliant idea but sadly lacking and more like a Mickey Mouse bank - a bit all mouth and no trousers. Just stick to your normal bank - much easier.

name: Philip Howard
title: Helpfully fantastic
content: Helpful, efficient, friendly, patient and knowledgeable... I highly recommend their services

name: Eudes David
title: Support client
content: Support client très réactive

name: marco
title: stay way
content: business as usual is fine, but if you have a problem they don't do anything and they're arrogant. No way to look into the issue and try to solve it. Keep your money safe from these thiefs

name: oscar5060
title: Llevo varios dias intentado que me den…
content: Llevo varios días intentado que me den una solución y sigo esperando solo me dan largas y largas hoy envié un correo a (reclamaciones arroba n26.com) veremos si me dan solución a mi caso particular de ser así modificare esta opinión pero por el momento tienen mi dinero y no me dan ninguna explicación ni ayuda.De momento descontento con el soporte por este incidente.

name: Username
title: I have posted a review a week ago…
content: I have posted a review a week ago giving the company the lowest score. I have pointed out that the company does not keep the timeframes it promises and that customer services do not treat complaints seriously. Another week has past since my complaint was allegedly forwarded to the management and I have not been contacted. After submitting my private data I have no account and the company is silent about the complaint.

name: Christian Kay
title: N26 banking app in UK
content: I was recommended N26 by a friend and I was intrigued and excited about this new (to me) virtual banking app. Application through N26 app was easy (free download in Apple app store or Android app store). N26 is a German bank but with UK banking licence, UK sort code and UK bank account numbers. BACs wage payments can also be set-up if this is your only bank. My new Mastercard card arrived made from very cool see thru plastic. Black and metal cards also available apparently. I transferred some money from my Barclays bank account to my N26 bank account as a test and it was instantly available. App is easy to use and navigate. N26 staff on hand if you have a problem. I used the chat function to ask a few additional questions. Mastercard is contactless once you've used it in an ATM. Pin number chosen by me through the app. Excellent banking concept.

name: Hervé Devesa
title: Simplicité
content: Simple, net et précis

content: Excellent knowledge.Not 5 stars because in Germany and Austria the N26-bank delivers more services and opportunities we miss in Holland
reply: Danke für dein Feedback.Wir möchten unsere Kunden darauf hinweisen unsere Links und offiziellen Support-Center Website zu nutzen, da dort 99% aller Anfragen selbst nachgelesen und geklärt werden können.Daher bedienen wir uns dieser Sätze und der Links dafür um die Kunden darauf hinzuweisen und so selbst und noch schneller eine eigene Lösung und Information zu finden.

title: I love N26 because of their no-bsht policy
content: I love N26 because of their no bsht policy. App is intuitive and beautiful. They sent you newsletters with money saving tips. They don't bsht you. Comission charges are clear. Policies are clear. Everything is simple and easy and online. It makes every other bank look ridiculously non efficient.Whenever I had to speak to a customer representative it was fast and simple and straight forward. Nobody has attempted to sell anything to me. And this is why I love them. THANK YOU.

name: Yassine
title: Une banque qui sauve des vies
content: Meilleure banque que j'ai connu. En général quand j'entends le mot banque, le terme dentiste a l'air plus doux à côté. Sauf que N26 est une banque qui vous sert vraiment, efficace, et avec des tarifs records et exceptionnels.Fondamentalement dans mon expérience, c'est aussi une banque qui sauve des vies, la mienne notamment ! Il y a longtemps à l'étranger ma carte Société générale (soit disant de leur slogan "nous vous accompagnons partout où que vous soyez") m'abandonne lâchement durant un retrait qui était très très important. Ils n'ont pas su le faire malgré que j'ai prévenu de mon départ. N26 eux ont su le faire. Retrait sans problèmes et sans frais. Et dire qu'avec nos banques françaises on paye des fortunes tout les mois pour nous mettre dans le pétrin au final ! N26 a su, et à coût moindre (la black card), me dépanner et ça aurait fonctionné avec la gratuite.Efficace et moins cher, et surtout plus pratique que toutes ces soi-disant banques multinationales ! Dès que j'aurai plus rien à leur rendre je déchire ma carte et je resterai chez N26 et en annexe d'autres néo banque. Mais c'est celle-là qui reste N°1 sur beaucoup de critères.N'hésitez pas, foncez! En plus vous avez une MasterCard : la classe!

name: Patrick kipick
title: Pas de temps d'attente

title: N26 is the best online bank to you
content: N26 is the best online bank to your day a day tasks.Very simple to register, and really easy to use.The app is very trustable and secure. I recommend to everyone.

name: Sabrina Ribeiro
title: I would definitely recommend N26
content: I would definitely recommend N26 to everyone. My wife and I are big fans of the company. The easy way we transfer money each other and control the finances with the monthly dashboard. Great!

name: Markus Beschoner
title: Gutes Zweitkonto
content: Ich nutze das Konto zusätzlich zu meinen Hauptkonto bei einer Sparkasse und bin zufrieden.Mit dem Support hatte ich noch keinen Kontakt, so dass ich zu dessen Qualität nichts sagen kann.Pro:* einfache Eröffnung per Vor-der-Webcam-mit-dem-Ausweis-fuchteln-Authentifizierung.* kostenlose Giro- und Kreditkarte.* Apple Pay* Push-Nachrichten bei Transaktionen und Buchungen sind sofort in der App sichtbar.* die App erscheint mir gut zu bedienen, auch wenn immer mehr Zusatzangebote beworben werden.Contra:* Kein Gemeinschaftskonto möglich.* Akzeptanz der EC-Karte erscheint mir schlechter als die der Sparkasse.* Der Umgang mit Bargeld ist eingeschränkt (nur 5 Abhebungen pro Monat, Einzahlungen eher nicht vorgesehen). Das ist aber keine Limitierung an die ich persönlich stoße.* Keine Unterstützung offener Standards (HBCI), so dass andere Banking-Apps ausgeschlossen werden.

name: Jack Olivieri
title: N26 is the ultimate direct bank
content: N26 is the ultimate no-brainer bank which not only offers a fee-free account but also ensures the user experience is always smooth and clean through a highly easy-to-use app.The one down side is that the investment plans are somewhat poor and not so transparent as to what exactly they consist of. Hopefully once they grow to an even larger size, they will be able to offer a wide portfolio of investment plans such as government bonds and bonds of stocks.

name: Priscila Rufatto
title: No hassle, no cash
content: I recommended N26 to everyone who was having trouble with bureaucracy in Italy, since I had tried to open an account twice and couldn't. N26 was the only one that allowed me to set up my account without hassle and without even leaving the house.The only downside of having a N26 account is that you cannot add funds with cash (unless you live in Germany). This can be a bummer for some people, as the only way is to give someone the cash and asking them to transfer the money to you - that's what I had to do to add funds to my account when I only had cash. But I guess if you get your salary straight into your N26 account you won't have much to worry about.

name: Ahmed
title: Customer Support is an absolute joke
content: Customer Support is an absolute jokeI haven't received my card after 3 weeks and after contacting customer support 4 times. They all ask the same questions, offer the same solution, I accept and they tell me I will receive an email (not right away) with a tracking number. Then the next agent tells me that nothing has been sent. No explanation and no apology.I am a customer support manager and I just wanted to see how they will handle it. Never got angry and never sounded demanding because I know agents hate to help this kind of people. But it seems that they either hate doing their job, or worse yet, their system is flowed.I am transferring all my money to Revolut and closing my account.

name: Enttäusche Kundin
title: Nie wieder N26!!!
content: Nach Jahrelanger Treue wurde ich einfach grundlos per Mail gekündigt! Auf meine Anfrage per Mail warum ich gekündigt wurde, kam als Antwort wiederholt die Mail mit der Kündigung. Nicht zu fassen! Die telefonische Hotline existiert nicht mehr und nach über eineinhalb Stunden Wartezeit auf den Chatsupport kam auch nur, dass er mir keine Auskunft geben kann. Absolut katastrophal diese „Bank“!
reply: Hey, vielen Dank für deine ehrlichen Worte. Es tut uns Leid, dass wir dich in solch eine Lage versetzt haben. Wir werden dein Feedback an die entsprechende Abteilung weiterleiten.

name: H.H.
title: Bei N26 Konto plötzlich über 1.300.- weg!
content: Bei N26 Konto plötzlich über 1.300.- weg!Vor nicht ganz einem Monat bemerkte ich das durch unberechtigte Abbuchungen 1.300.- auf meinem N26 Konto fehlten.Die Kontaktaufnahme mit der N26 Bank war nur über einen Chat möglich. Nach 1,5 Stunden Wartezeit erfuhr ich von einem N26 Mitarbeiter, dass ich für jede Abbuchung ein eigenes Formular ausfüllen musste. Es waren über 30 Abbuchungen! Ok, ausgefüllt, hingeschickt, keine Rückmeldung von N26. Nach etwa 2 Wochen schickt ich ein sehr unfreundliche Email an die N26 Bank. Darauf hin musste ich weitere Formulare (Eidesstattliche Erklärung) ausfüllen und abgeben. Bin gespannt was als nächstes passiert und wie lange N26 noch braucht bis Sie mir mein Geld zurück buchen!Nachtag: Habe hier in einer anderen Bewertung gerade gelesen, dass diese Vorgangsweise von N26 gesetzeswidrig ist und es die Möglichkeit einer BaFin Beschwerde gibt und hab mich nun auch gleich über N26 bei BaFin beschwert :-)
reply: Hey, vielen Dank für deine ehrlichen Worte. Es tut uns Leid, dass wir dich in solch eine Lage versetzt haben. Wir werden dein Feedback an die entsprechende Abteilung weiterleiten.
