Unfreundliche Mitarbeiter.Es gibt andere Banken die gut und kundenfreundlich sind da braucht man so ein Firma nicht.

name: Julia Berlinghoff
title: Dont do it!!
content: Dont open your account with N26 if you can!!! They lie, are NEVER available and when you lose your phone you are left on your own. But they wont give a damn about that.Before opening the account I asked the support about charges and they said there were none. After some more research in the internet I found an article pointing out some of these charges would occure. Asking the agent again, she confirmed there are these charges. WHY did she lie before?Then whenever you have an issue it takes for them like over a week to reply and they will only reply one of your questions and with their already existing sentences. After asking more specific the agent again figured out she was wrong. Until then she still answered only one of my questions. Then my phone got stolen in south america and I have no access to my account, cannot unlink my phone without calling. But of course it is expensive making an international phone call without a phone! Its a unacceptable and what they allow themselves should not been called bank! Its just a joke. A joke they make with your money.I am so disappointed!!!!

name: Eddie Olsen
title: A complete joke of an organisation
content: This company is a real joke of an organisation. They claim to be able to set you up within 7 minutes, but in truth are utterly incompetent, and did not accept my British passport as proof of identity after spending more than 30 minutes of my time on the phone to them.Although they advertise in English, their reps call you and immediately start talking in German. It's almost a con how deceitful their marketing stance is.It seems they have also sold my telephone number to tele marketers, as I am now regularly receiving calls from random financial institutions across Europe and other "data research" organisations.I would avoid this company like the plague and find better online banks elsewhere...

name: Lora Vardarova
title: Unacceptable for a bank
content: This is a joke of a bank. Don't waste your time. Their app does work only on the latest smartphones. You can't do anything with the online banking only. They closed our account as we could not migrate to their new accounts as the app does not work on our smartphones. And now they do not provide any support to get the outstanding balance.

name: Dennis Bommer
title: Nie wieder! Ich würde diese Bank meiden.
content: Sehr schlechter Kundenservice. Durch die Kontomigration komme ich nun an mein Geld nicht mehr ran. Vom Support erhält man keinerlei Reaktion.

name: Jorge
title: Good at end.
content: I opened a bank account without any problems. I successfully transfered money to N26 using SEPA transfer in 1 or 2 days. Then, I haven't received my N26 black credit card after 15 days. However, they charged me the 5.90 euros subscription. I contacted the customer support and they told me that it was because there was no name on my mailbox. I asked on German Quora if it was true they told me it is not true. I asked the french post (because i live in france) to tell me if it was the problem and they told me it is not the problem. Furthermore, I sent a message to their support team to tell them that the format of their french address was wrong and that the number had to be before the street on a french address like 23 rue du pont while they send their mails to rue du pont 23They ignored my comment. However, after 9 days I received my black N26 card. I transferred money from and to N26. They are fast. They respect the SEPA transfer and they never block the transfers. I transferred up to 2000 euros and I didn't face issues about due diligence.I give 5 stars because my credit card has never been blocked and no SEPA transfers have been blocked even if I heavely used the N26 cards and transfers.

name: Patrick Ackermann
title: zukunftsträchtig mit Verbesserungspotenzial
content: Gegenüber dem klassischen Banking fühlt sich N26 an wie Banking aus der Zukunft :-)  Ein bisschen merkt man zwar, dass N26 noch in der Aufbauphase ist. Aber es wird immer besser. Meine Empfehlung für Leute die mal was neues probieren wollen. Die beste Banking App die ich kenne!

name: charlie
title: Nice idea, terrible customer service
content: The rates look competitive compared to similar services, but customer service is almost non existent. After 3 days I finally reached someone who told me he couldn't help or even suggest a possible solution (I just needed to check that my delivery details for a debit card were correct). He essentially called me a liar when i explained that it had taken 3 days to reach someone and I'd hoped for a little more advice... guess I'll just wait to see if my card turns up. If you can find a number or an e-mail address (takes some searching), don't expect to be answered.

name: Sam Mac
title: broken
content: signed up, gave all my details via video including my passport and received nothing in the 5 months since.

name: Bob Salita
title: Excellent Banking but Usual FinTech Startup Pains
content: Every banking transaction has worked as expected. Their app continually improves and now seems polished. Withdrawals, deposits and notifications are fast. I've never had any problems with their debit MasterCard. That said, if you have an issue not addressed by their FAQ, good luck on getting timely answers and service. I can cautiously recommend them.

name: Theodore Georgas
title: Impossible to even get a message through to customer service.  THEY SUCK!!!
content: My card doesn't work and they don't even allow you to send customer service a message.   They force you to go to the help files with standard questions but if something does not work then you are screwed.

name: Davy
title: Worst customer service ever!!!!
content: I was a client of N26 for quite some time. When N26 got its official license all customers had to transfer their account. Was it not only the horrible app that doesn't work at all, when I called them they said they arranged the transfer for me. But when the deadline came that my account would be closed, I called them where my new card was and if everything went right. They told me that I didn't transfer my account, which the employee of N26 clearly told me she did on the phone. They didn't come up with any solution at all and said I had to wait and then MAYBE I could open a new account. They were very rude on the phone, I have never experienced worse customer service than this. If you want all your customers to go to another bank then keep up this awfull appalling customer service!

name: Reginald Beach
title: So disappointed Customer service appalling.
content: My experience with N26 started so well. I loved the concept and the control one had over one's card. But then disaster...... When they actually become a bank.I received my new card, but every attempt to get it registered failed.It became almost impossible to talk to any one about this.The phone was never answered and after waiting for 20mins or more I would be cut off.More then a week after emails sent I would still be waiting for a reply.I did get through once by phone and followed all instructions to try to rectify the situation. No luck. In the meantime my wife was having the same problem.I did get one email response, finally, but no follow up to my reply. I had no choice but to transfer our funds out of our accounts.WILL NOT RECOMMEND TO ANY ONE.

name: Jacob
title: Nice idea but it is a complete disaster in execution
content: In the first months I joined N26 I actually enjoyed the bank and the experience. It was a fresh take on banking and we all know that we need something fresh when it comes to banking since regular banks just suck.I knew that there would be some troubles since N26 is a startup and still growing but boy I had no idea what I was getting myself into. But one thing after another.First of all I really don't like the fact that they release new unstable features. Guys this is supposed to be a god damn bank and not some toy that I don't mind if it stops working for a day or two. A lot of their stuff either doesn't work at all, isn't supported in your country or is "temporarily unavailable and they are working on fixing the issue"See the problem with that is that I need my bank account to work. I don't care what kind of problems you have. Every bank manages to run smoothly but N26 just simply doesn't work pretty often. They have issues where you cannot access your account or even sometimes not use your card at all because of internal issues.Second I want to rant about the "MasterCard" which is not a real MasterCard as they state it. It is not accepted in a lot of places which say that they accept MasterCard payments. This applies to online shops and local stores.My worst experience so far was by far my trip to England. There I apparently got scamed ? All my money was taken from my account because it seems like some guy withdraw all my money at an ATM even though I haven't lost my card. Despite being broke and stuck with no money at all in England for four weeks I called N26 (Had to call them 4 times because I was waiting for about 1 hour each in their line because apparently they don't have enough workers) and the gentlemen told me not to worry locked my card and send me a new one at my address back at home and he ensured me that I will get my money back within 14 days since it was not me who took out the money.3 months and 10 calls later I got my money back... (I didn't actually expect to get it back after 3 months but I was positively surprised) so I started spending money again yay.2 days later they took the money away again and there I was sitting with a negative account balance without even activating the feature to go below zero. I called them again and they once again told me to wait 14 days. 2 months later I got my money back again but this time I was done with this god damn bank and about to close my account.After some research I found out that a lot of people got scamed like me with an N26 account. Some of them from the exact same merchant as me which I find very shady but if you ask N26 directly they of course just tell you that it is a coincidence.Besides that everything that seemed to make N26 appealing was taken away with the new bank accounts.Now the free tier doesn't offer free international withdrawals anymore and I find it interesting that the free account doesn't cover ATM withdrawal theft anymore which is a huge warning sign for me. You have to pay for the premium card if you want to protect yourself from theft which is absurd.I could go on and on and on but I think you get the bigger picture.N26 is a joke. They are a startup experiment which I doubt will survive in a 10 year stretch. They are unreliable, unsecure and sometimes even unreachable when it comes to customer support and when it comes to banking and choosing this bank as your go to bank you will have a hard time.

name: Asic Rebels
title: Don't trust berlin hipsters
content: N26 is the perfect example of what you get when hipster morons businessmen-wannabes try get into serious business, like banking.They have f'ed up everything they can:1. Design is actually quite horrible. I've used several banking apps and this is really a bad one. Combined with constant crashes there is no joy of using it.2. They roll out half-baked features that are buggy (buzzword "MVP") - the newly added feature "N26 invest" has "+" sign hardwired into the GUI in the field of your performance. So when performance is negative, you get "+-" :)App constantly crashes and most certainly can't work with semi-stable internet connection (EDGE/GRPS)3. Desktop app is a second-class citizen. very rudimentary interface, redicilous tab navigation, fixed (!) comma sign in the cash field, etc. etc.4. They haven't told that their IBAN will be temporary. I've moved everything to this piece of crap only to find myself moving again. And it is not easy in Germany. Most services require a written letter to change your IBAN.5. They actively conceal the fact that their maestro card is not a real german "EC" card. Technically they are not lying, but this is a clear marketing deception, which was critisized. Be ready for your card not being accepted A LOT.6. Their support is ridicilous. Can only help with basic issues. Also, they ask for your card number for an identity confirmation :D you know, the information you see when you are already logged in the webapp and you don't have to have a card to "identify" yourself.

name: Rastislav Vasicka
title: My money was stolen
content: My money are stolen and the bank send me the e-mail I need pay for stolen money.I have debit card and even I am in minus. When I allow it?Really bad bank ever.GO AWAY OF THIS BRAND!!!

name: Bernhard
title: Seriös ist anders...
content: War bis jetzt fast 2 Jahre Lang wirklich zufrieden mit Number26  ja die Karte sogar in den USA genutzt und dann Gestern ohne Begründung einfach Konto gekündigt!? Aber wie ich jetzt im Netz nachgelesen habe bin ich da  ja kein Einzelfall wie es aussieht ...! Auch das über 400 Kunden einfach  das Konto gekündigt wurde weil Sie zu oft am Bankomaten abgehoben haben ..?Oder auch wie auf deutscheskonto.org     Beitrag 9288 zu lesen :Hinweis: N26 hat Kontoführungsgebühren von 6 Euro pro Monat eingeführt für bonitätsschwache Leute bzw. Leute, die das Konto nicht so nutzen wie gewünscht. Bitte habe das auf dem „Schirm“, damit du ggf. das Konto wieder kündigst. Wir wünschen dir eine gute Reise!Also seit Euch im Klaren das Ihr mit der Mastercard Kunde der Wirecard Bank seit (Number26 ist nur ein Mittler) dann googelt mal nach einer überraschenden unbegründeten Kündigung so wie ich nach Wirecard und Sicherheit oder Betrug... wirklich schade war vollstens zufrieden mit meiner Zweitkarte..:( Aber ohne Begründung einfach mein rein als  Guthabenkonto genutztes Konto sowie Karten zu kündigen ..?Oder Nutzer in 2 Klassen einzuteilen..?Schockiert mich nun..:(Seriös ist anders zumindest eine Begründung verlangt eigentlich der Anstand!

name: Carsten-Pascal
title: Mein Geld wurde einige Wochen gesperrt bei N26 Bank
content: Meine eigenen gemachten Erfahrungen mit dieser Bank sind schrecklich. lch hatte 2x Geld per MoneyBeam an einen Freund gesendet, der auch bei N26 Kunde ist und da mein Kontostand ein Plus zeigte, wurde der MoneyBeam auch angenommen von N26. Mir wurde der Betrag abgezogen und dem Freund gebucht, aber mit dem Punkt bei seiner Buchungen in der APP, Geld steht in 1-2 Tage zur Verfügung, was auch korrekt ist, aber er hatte das Geld auch nach Wochen nicht erhalten, obwohl mein Konto zu diesem Zeitpunkt ein Plus zeigte. Ich hatte dann zur Sicherheit von beiden Konten Screenshots gemacht ( liegen vor ), wo die Abbuchung auf meinem Konto zu sehen ist und bei dem Freund dass die Buchung nicht richtig als Guthaben verbucht wurde. Er konnte über das Geld nicht verfügen. ( Sondern nur über den Betrag den er vorher als Guthaben hatte ). Mir wurden die Buchung aber belastet und abgezogen vom Kontostand.  Wochen wurde nicht´s Unternommen von N26. Dann erhalte ich eine Mail eines Chat Hotliner ( liegt mir vor ) der N26, dass dieser meinen Kontostand per Hand nochmal um einen Betrag per Hand belasten wird. Der Empfänger hat das Geld per MoneyBeam weiterhin nicht erhalten, obwohl mein Kontostand ein Plus zeigte. ( wurde meinem Konto aber belastet ) Die Änderung per Hand des Hotline Chat Mitarbeiter, meinen Kontostand nochmals zu ändern, ergab dann das ich ein Minus hatte und meine Karten nicht mehr einsetzen konnte, keine überweisungen mehr machen und nicht mehr an mein restliches Geld konnte, obwohl ich ein Plus hatte auf dem Kontoauszug aber nun nicht mehr im Kontostand, da dieser von dem N26 Mitarbeiter ins Minus gesetzt wurde, was er mir ja auch in der Mail bestätigte, aber durch die Änderung des Kontostand des N26 Mitarbeiter auf ein Minus Kontostand, war nun alles gesperrt. Mails an den Chat wurden Wochen nicht bearbeitet. Somit wurde mein Konto falsch belastet. Dann erhalte ich eine Mail von der Bank, dass Sie festgestellt haben, dass sich mein Konto momentan leider im Minus befindet. Und sollte dafür sorgen, dass der fehlende Betrag in den nächsten 7 Tagen wieder ausgeglichen wird, um weitere Schritte zu vermeiden. Mein Kontoauszug ( liegen vor ) zeigte weiterhin mein richtiges Guthaben PLUS an, meine Kontostand Änderung durch den Mitarbeiter aber ein Minus. Wenn der Mitarbeiter nicht mein Kontostand geändert hätte, wäre alles bestens gewesen. Tolle Bank, die einfach per Hand meine Kontostände ändern kann mir das noch in einer Mail Mitteilen, aber den Fehler erst Monate später erledigt, obwohl ich mehrmals wochenlang mitgeteilt habe, da es ja eine Fehlbuchung ist und ich somit nicht mehr an mein Geld auf dem Konto dran konnte.

name: Yoav Ben Tal
title: Does exactly what it says on the label
content: Have been using for 4 years and overall it's been fantastic. Very simple, app and website are maybe little too basic. Customer support in English is probably the best you will find for a German bank.

name: Kostas Tsiakalos
title: It is a fantastic
content: It is a fantastic, easy and pretty fast way to manage your financial worldwide

name: Marina Psichogiou
title: Great experience overall
content: I am able to use my card all over the world without issues and without ridiculous charges, this is making my life easy.A few issues when trying to move money outside of the EU, hopefully it will be solved.

name: Calin
title: Works perfect for me !
content: Works perfect for me !

name: Scott Gillies
title: This is one of the worse company's I…
content: This is one of the worse company's I have ever dealt with. I have as abusive staff members calling me stupid over the phone for not having headphones to be able to talk to them with. I have been verified with a valid UK passport 3 times and been severities 2 times. I have spend over 100 euros trying to call between I'd now and n26 which are two separate company's. There is zero communication between these company's and there is extreme holes within the security of this company as all you have to do is keep calling until you accepted. My application is a legitamet application but if I was trying to commit fraud I could of easily got threw the process as or representative says my passport isn't valid another says it is. I am out of pocket because of this company and I'm still waiting to see if they will return the 90 euros that was entered to my account and no magically disappeared with no trace. DO NOT USE THIS COMPANY THERE ARE DATA SALES SCAMMERS. Use TransferWise, Monese, PayPal, revolut or any of provider do not let seethrew and metal bank cards lure you into this scam.Tried to complain but no one cares and I get passed on to other people. Done wasting my phonecreditnand time on this easy of space. I will take this to the relevant financial conduct authoritys.

name: Maria João Rhodes
title: Free card shipping and 15€ credit.
content: Free card shipping and 15€ credit.No taxes or fees, receive your free card and 15€ welcome credit!Use my ambassador code to receive the offers: mariajor6397

name: Bernardo Sarto de Lucena
title: Really happy with n26
content: Really happy with n26

name: geeh
title: Good bank
content: Good bank and good customer support. The app is well designed and easy to use.

name: Edson Luis Silva
title: Super
content: Easy to use, secure and human support very much helpful!👏👏👏

name: Zoltan Tomcsanyi
title: Easy quick good costumer service well…
content: Easy quick good costumer service well done 👍

name: Simon Maryan
title: New to N26 and been brilliant
content: New to N26 and been brilliant since I got set up. Great customer service with a minor issue which they resolved within 5 mins.

name: Roy
title: exceptionally awesome
content: exceptionally awesome. great banking experience. im enjoying my account so far so good.

name: EDSON MONTEIRO
title: Excellent service
content: Excellent service

name: Matus
title: Easy to setup
content: Easy to setup, card comes quick(within central europe) and app is all the bank you ever need to visit. And all free. For me is N26 the best. Thank you

name: Rao
title: I opened and closed
content: I could open it but within the first week, I got a mail that they can not continue free service and impose 1,5% charge on cash withdrawal more than 100 Euro/month and 1,5% charge on incoming transfers more than 100 Euro/month. That means if you receive only 100 Euro and cash transaction only 100 Euro, then it is free. More than that 1.5% charges. Hence I cancelled.If the service is improved, please let me know, I want to open again.

name: Sadiq
title: AVOID MOST OF THESE MOBILE BANKS!!!
content: I had an account with them and everything was smooth at first. This all turned horrible when the closed my account with a balance of £6000+ and a pending incoming transfer of £3000+ and held on to the funds with no response. I have sent several messages and requested a final response letter to the closure which have all been ignored. What they are using the funds for i have no idea. But i have reported it to the ombudsman and will now also seek other avenues like the FCA in order to claim back my funds. AVOID BY ANY MEANS IF YOU DO NOT WANT TO HAVE THE SAME ISSUE HAPPEN TO YOU!!!

name: Умная Лиса
title: Very good service
content: Damn, this bank rocks

name: Kenrick Williamson
title: Easy to get in information and to be…
content: Easy to get in information and to be helpful and not rude, i would recommend the bank to all my friends

name: Rosie Riley
title: Dreadful bank please stay away
content: Dreadful bank please stay away! Issue now with the FCA. They have had over 7 weeks to return just short of £300 to my account that was transferred to another account using the wrong sort code  in error ( this was my fault admittedly  but I told both banks immediately)  and they can’t even do it! I’m not updated as to what is happening with the complaint and I honestly don’t think I will see my money again! If they could just tell me when I will see my money again then that would be acceptable. It was my mistake but I’m always told that it’s the other banks fault and to be patient it will be sorted “soon”Upsetting experience

name: J B
title: Customer service representative was…
content: Customer service representative was disconnected so many times I had to keep repeating myself about the issue I experienced. Apart from that I like metal etc

This all turned horrible when the closed my account with a balance of £6000+ and a pending incoming transfer of £3000+ and held on to the funds with no response. I have sent several messages and requested a final response letter to the closure which have all been ignored. What they are using the funds for i have no idea. But i have reported it to the ombudsman and will now also seek other avenues like the FCA in order to claim back my funds. AVOID BY ANY MEANS IF YOU DO NOT WANT TO HAVE THE SAME ISSUE HAPPEN TO YOU!!!

name: Умная Лиса
title: Very good service
content: Damn, this bank rocks

name: Kenrick Williamson
title: Easy to get in information and to be…
content: Easy to get in information and to be helpful and not rude, i would recommend the bank to all my friends

name: Rosie Riley
title: Dreadful bank please stay away
content: Dreadful bank please stay away! Issue now with the FCA. They have had over 7 weeks to return just short of £300 to my account that was transferred to another account using the wrong sort code  in error ( this was my fault admittedly  but I told both banks immediately)  and they can’t even do it! I’m not updated as to what is happening with the complaint and I honestly don’t think I will see my money again! If they could just tell me when I will see my money again then that would be acceptable. It was my mistake but I’m always told that it’s the other banks fault and to be patient it will be sorted “soon”Upsetting experience

name: J B
title: Customer service representative was…
content: Customer service representative was disconnected so many times I had to keep repeating myself about the issue I experienced. Apart from that I like metal etc

name: Yoav Ben Tal
title: Does exactly what it says on the label
content: Have been using for 4 years and overall it's been fantastic. Very simple, app and website are maybe little too basic. Customer support in English is probably the best you will find for a German bank.

name: Kostas Tsiakalos
title: It is a fantastic
content: It is a fantastic, easy and pretty fast way to manage your financial worldwide

name: Marina Psichogiou
title: Great experience overall
content: I am able to use my card all over the world without issues and without ridiculous charges, this is making my life easy.A few issues when trying to move money outside of the EU, hopefully it will be solved.

name: Calin
title: Works perfect for me !
content: Works perfect for me !

name: Scott Gillies
title: This is one of the worse company's I…
content: This is one of the worse company's I have ever dealt with. I have as abusive staff members calling me stupid over the phone for not having headphones to be able to talk to them with. I have been verified with a valid UK passport 3 times and been severities 2 times. I have spend over 100 euros trying to call between I'd now and n26 which are two separate company's. There is zero communication between these company's and there is extreme holes within the security of this company as all you have to do is keep calling until you accepted. My application is a legitamet application but if I was trying to commit fraud I could of easily got threw the process as or representative says my passport isn't valid another says it is. I am out of pocket because of this company and I'm still waiting to see if they will return the 90 euros that was entered to my account and no magically disappeared with no trace. DO NOT USE THIS COMPANY THERE ARE DATA SALES SCAMMERS. Use TransferWise, Monese, PayPal, revolut or any of provider do not let seethrew and metal bank cards lure you into this scam.Tried to complain but no one cares and I get passed on to other people. Done wasting my phonecreditnand time on this easy of space. I will take this to the relevant financial conduct authoritys.

name: Rao
title: I opened and closed
content: I could open it but within the first week, I got a mail that they can not continue free service and impose 1,5% charge on cash withdrawal more than 100 Euro/month and 1,5% charge on incoming transfers more than 100 Euro/month. That means if you receive only 100 Euro and cash transaction only 100 Euro, then it is free. More than that 1.5% charges. Hence I cancelled.If the service is improved, please let me know, I want to open again.

content: Easy to get in information and to be helpful and not rude, i would recommend the bank to all my friends

name: Rosie Riley
title: Dreadful bank please stay away
content: Dreadful bank please stay away! Issue now with the FCA. They have had over 7 weeks to return just short of £300 to my account that was transferred to another account using the wrong sort code  in error ( this was my fault admittedly  but I told both banks immediately)  and they can’t even do it! I’m not updated as to what is happening with the complaint and I honestly don’t think I will see my money again! If they could just tell me when I will see my money again then that would be acceptable. It was my mistake but I’m always told that it’s the other banks fault and to be patient it will be sorted “soon”Upsetting experience

name: J B
title: Customer service representative was…
content: Customer service representative was disconnected so many times I had to keep repeating myself about the issue I experienced. Apart from that I like metal etc

name: Yoav Ben Tal
title: Does exactly what it says on the label
content: Have been using for 4 years and overall it's been fantastic. Very simple, app and website are maybe little too basic. Customer support in English is probably the best you will find for a German bank.

name: Kostas Tsiakalos
title: It is a fantastic
content: It is a fantastic, easy and pretty fast way to manage your financial worldwide

name: Marina Psichogiou
title: Great experience overall
content: I am able to use my card all over the world without issues and without ridiculous charges, this is making my life easy.A few issues when trying to move money outside of the EU, hopefully it will be solved.

name: Calin
title: Works perfect for me !
content: Works perfect for me !

name: Scott Gillies
title: This is one of the worse company's I…
content: This is one of the worse company's I have ever dealt with. I have as abusive staff members calling me stupid over the phone for not having headphones to be able to talk to them with. I have been verified with a valid UK passport 3 times and been severities 2 times. I have spend over 100 euros trying to call between I'd now and n26 which are two separate company's. There is zero communication between these company's and there is extreme holes within the security of this company as all you have to do is keep calling until you accepted. My application is a legitamet application but if I was trying to commit fraud I could of easily got threw the process as or representative says my passport isn't valid another says it is. I am out of pocket because of this company and I'm still waiting to see if they will return the 90 euros that was entered to my account and no magically disappeared with no trace. DO NOT USE THIS COMPANY THERE ARE DATA SALES SCAMMERS. Use TransferWise, Monese, PayPal, revolut or any of provider do not let seethrew and metal bank cards lure you into this scam.Tried to complain but no one cares and I get passed on to other people. Done wasting my phonecreditnand time on this easy of space. I will take this to the relevant financial conduct authoritys.

title: New to N26 and been brilliant

title: exceptionally awesome
content: exceptionally awesome. great banking experience. im enjoying my account so far so good.

name: EDSON MONTEIRO
title: Excellent service
content: Excellent service

name: Matus
title: Easy to setup
content: Easy to setup, card comes quick(within central europe) and app is all the bank you ever need to visit. And all free. For me is N26 the best. Thank you

name: Rao
title: I opened and closed
content: I could open it but within the first week, I got a mail that they can not continue free service and impose 1,5% charge on cash withdrawal more than 100 Euro/month and 1,5% charge on incoming transfers more than 100 Euro/month. That means if you receive only 100 Euro and cash transaction only 100 Euro, then it is free. More than that 1.5% charges. Hence I cancelled.If the service is improved, please let me know, I want to open again.

name: Sadiq
title: AVOID MOST OF THESE MOBILE BANKS!!!
content: I had an account with them and everything was smooth at first. This all turned horrible when the closed my account with a balance of £6000+ and a pending incoming transfer of £3000+ and held on to the funds with no response. I have sent several messages and requested a final response letter to the closure which have all been ignored. What they are using the funds for i have no idea. But i have reported it to the ombudsman and will now also seek other avenues like the FCA in order to claim back my funds. AVOID BY ANY MEANS IF YOU DO NOT WANT TO HAVE THE SAME ISSUE HAPPEN TO YOU!!!
